 545  7B26                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 7B26              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 7B26                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 7B26 ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 7B26 ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 7B26 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
   6+ 7B26 ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		e,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value              ;
   7+ 7B26 ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
   8+ 7B26 ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
   9+ 7B26 ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  10+ 7B26 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  11+ 7B26 ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  12+ 7B26 ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 7B26 ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  14+ 7B26 ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  15+ 7B26 ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  16+ 7B26 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  17+ 7B26 ~                                    pop		hl
  18+ 7B26 ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  19+ 7B26 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  20+ 7B26 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  21+ 7B26 ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  22+ 7B26 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  23+ 7B26 ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  24+ 7B26 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  25+ 7B26 ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  26+ 7B26 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 7B26 ~                                    ret
  28+ 7B26                      ELSE
  29+ 7B26 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  30+ 7B28 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  31+ 7B2A 21 81 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  32+ 7B2D 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  33+ 7B2E 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
  34+ 7B2F 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
  35+ 7B30 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  36+ 7B31 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  37+ 7B32 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  38+ 7B34 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  39+ 7B36                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  39+ 7B36 CB 23       >			   sla e
  39+ 7B38 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  40+ 7B3A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  41+ 7B3B C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  42+ 7B3C E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  43+ 7B3D CD 29 97                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  44+ 7B40 E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ 7B41 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  46+ 7B42 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  47+ 7B43 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  48+ 7B44                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  49+ 7B44                                  ;    and     $80
  50+ 7B44 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  51+ 7B46 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  52+ 7B47 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  53+ 7B48 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  54+ 7B49 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  55+ 7B4B C9                                   ret
  56+ 7B4C                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
 546  7B4C                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 7B4C              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 7B4C              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 7B4C              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 7B4C              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 7B4C
   6+ 7B4C              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 7B4C              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 7B4C
   9+ 7B4C EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 7B4D CD D2 85                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 7B50 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 7B51 F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 7B53 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 7B54 E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 7B56 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 7B57 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 7B58 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 7B59 CD D2 85                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 7B5C EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 7B5D 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 7B5E E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 7B60 B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 7B61 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 7B62 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 7B63 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 7B64 CD D2 85                             call    doRND
  27+ 7B67 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 7B68 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 7B6A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 7B6B 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 7B6C E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 7B6E 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 7B6F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 7B70 CD D2 85                             call    doRND
  35+ 7B73 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 7B74 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 7B75 E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 7B77 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 7B78 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 7B79 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 7B7A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 7B7B CD D2 85                             call    doRND
  43+ 7B7E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 7B7F F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 7B81 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 7B82 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 7B83 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 7B85 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 7B87 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 7B88 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 7B89 C9                                   ret
  52+ 7B8A
  53+ 7B8A EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 7B8B CD D2 85                             call    doRND
  55+ 7B8E CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 7B90 CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 7B92 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 7B93 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 7B95 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 7B96 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 7B98 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 7B99 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 7B9A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 7B9B CD D2 85                             call    doRND
  65+ 7B9E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 7B9F 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 7BA0 E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 7BA2 B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 7BA3 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 7BA4 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 7BA5 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 7BA6 CD D2 85                             call    doRND
  73+ 7BA9 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 7BAB CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 7BAD EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 7BAE E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 7BB0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 7BB1 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 7BB2 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 7BB4 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 7BB5 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 7BB6 CD D2 85                             call    doRND
  83+ 7BB9 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 7BBA 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 7BBB E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 7BBD B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 7BBE 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 7BBF 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 7BC0 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 7BC1 CD D2 85                             call    doRND
  91+ 7BC4 EB                                   ex      de,hl

  93+ 7BC7 77                                   ld      (hl),a

  95+ 7BC9 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 7BCB E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 7BCD 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 7BCE 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 7BCF C9                                   ret

 102+ 7BD0 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 103+ 7BD2 21 EE 80                             ld      hl,varDust
 104+ 7BD5 CD 4C 7B     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 105+ 7BD8 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 106+ 7BDA C9                                   ret

 109+ 7BDD 21 EE 80                             ld      hl,varDust
 110+ 7BE0 CD 8A 7B     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 111+ 7BE3 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop

 114+ 7BE6 FD 21 EE 80  SaveCurrentDust:        ld          iy,varDust
 115+ 7BEA DD 21 D8 80                          ld          ix,varDustWarpRender
 116+ 7BEE 06 0B                                ld          b, MaxNumberOfStars
 117+ 7BF0 FD 7E 01     .SaveLoop               ld          a,(iy+1)
 118+ 7BF3 6F                                   ld          l,a
 119+ 7BF4 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 120+ 7BF6                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegXPt
 120+ 7BF6 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 120+ 7BF8 C2 01 7C    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegXPt
 121+ 7BFB C6 80                                add         a,$80
 122+ 7BFD 5F                                   ld          e,a
 123+ 7BFE C3 06 7C                             jp          .StarDoneX
 124+ 7C01 57           .StarNegXPt:            ld          d,a
 125+ 7C02 3E 80                                ld          a,$80
 126+ 7C04 92                                   sub         d
 127+ 7C05 5F                                   ld          e,a
 128+ 7C06 FD 7E 03     .StarDoneX:             ld          a,(iy+3)
 129+ 7C09 6F                                   ld          l,a
 130+ 7C0A E6 7F                                and         $7F
 131+ 7C0C                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegYPt
 131+ 7C0C CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 131+ 7C0E C2 17 7C    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegYPt
 132+ 7C11 C6 60                                add         a,$60
 133+ 7C13 57                                   ld          d,a
 134+ 7C14 C3 1C 7C                             jp          .StarDoneY
 135+ 7C17 57           .StarNegYPt:            ld          d,a
 136+ 7C18 3E 60                                ld          a,$60
 137+ 7C1A 92                                   sub         d
 138+ 7C1B 57                                   ld          d,a
 139+ 7C1C DD 73 00     .StarDoneY:             ld          (ix+0),e
 140+ 7C1F DD 72 01                             ld          (ix+1),d
 141+ 7C22 DD 23                                inc         ix
 142+ 7C24 DD 23                                inc         ix
 143+ 7C26 FD E5 E1                             ld          hl,iy
 144+ 7C29 3E 06                                ld          a,6
 145+ 7C2B ED 31                                add         hl,a
 146+ 7C2D E5 FD E1                             ld          iy,hl
 147+ 7C30 10 BE                                djnz        .SaveLoop
 148+ 7C32 C9                                   ret
 149+ 7C33
 150+ 7C33              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ 7C33 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 152+ 7C35 FD 21 EE 80                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 153+ 7C39 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 154+ 7C3A FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 155+ 7C3D 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 156+ 7C3E 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 157+ 7C40 3A A6 7F                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 158+ 7C43                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 158+ 7C43 A7          >                        and     a
 158+ 7C44 C2 48 7C    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 159+ 7C47 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 160+ 7C48 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 161+ 7C49 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 162+ 7C4B CD B5 97                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 163+ 7C4E                                      ShiftHLRight1
 163+ 7C4E CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 7C50 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 7C52                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 164+ 7C52 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 164+ 7C54 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 165+ 7C56 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 166+ 7C57 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 167+ 7C59 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 168+ 7C5B FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 168+ 7C5F 66 05
 169+ 7C61 ED 5B A7 7F                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 170+ 7C65 CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15
 171+ 7C68                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 171+ 7C68 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 171+ 7C6A C2 BF 7D    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 172+ 7C6D FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 172+ 7C71 74 05
 173+ 7C73 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 173+ 7C77 66 01
 174+ 7C79 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 175+ 7C7A E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 176+ 7C7C 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 177+ 7C7D DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 178+ 7C7F ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 179+ 7C81 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 180+ 7C82 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 181+ 7C84 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 182+ 7C85 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 183+ 7C86 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 184+ 7C89 7C                                   ld      a,h
 185+ 7C8A E6 7F                                and     $7F
 186+ 7C8C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 186+ 7C8C FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 186+ 7C8E D2 BF 7D    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 187+ 7C91 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 187+ 7C95 74 01
 188+ 7C97 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 188+ 7C9B 66 03
 189+ 7C9D 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 190+ 7C9E E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 191+ 7CA0 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 192+ 7CA1 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 193+ 7CA3 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 194+ 7CA5 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 195+ 7CA6 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 196+ 7CA8 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 197+ 7CA9 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 198+ 7CAA CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 199+ 7CAD 7C                                   ld      a,h
 200+ 7CAE E6 7F                                and     $7F
 201+ 7CB0                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 201+ 7CB0 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 201+ 7CB2 D2 BF 7D    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 202+ 7CB5 7C                                   ld      a,h
 203+ 7CB6 E6 80                                and     $80
 204+ 7CB8 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 205+ 7CBA 7C                                   ld      a,h
 206+ 7CBB                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 206+ 7CBB FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 206+ 7CBD D2 BF 7D    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 207+ 7CC0 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 207+ 7CC4 74 03
 208+ 7CC6              ; Now roll
 209+ 7CC6              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 210+ 7CC6 3A C6 7E     .XRoll:                 ld      a,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 211+ 7CC9 FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 7CCB 28 4D                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 7CCD                                   ;   break
 214+ 7CCD 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ; roll magnitude
 215+ 7CCE 3A C8 7E                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                        ; inverted roll sign
 216+ 7CD1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; sanitise sign bit
 217+ 7CD3 67                                   ld      h,a                                 ; h = roll sign
 218+ 7CD4 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save on the stack
 219+ 7CD5 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 7CD6 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 7CD7 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 7CDA 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save signed byte
 223+ 7CDB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; a = sign only
 224+ 7CDD 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 7CDE 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e                                 ; e = abs byte
 226+ 7CDF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 227+ 7CE1 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 7CE2 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 7CE4 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back sign from roll
 230+ 7CE5 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 7CE6 B2                                   or      d
 232+ 7CE7 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 7CE8 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 7CEC 66 01
 234+ 7CEE CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15                       ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 7CF1 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 7CF5 74 01
 236+ 7CF7              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 7CF7              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 7CF7 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 7CF8 4C           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,h                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 240+ 7CF9 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 241+ 7CFA FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 242+ 7CFD 5F                                   ld      e,a
 243+ 7CFE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 244+ 7D00 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 245+ 7D01 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 246+ 7D02 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 247+ 7D04 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 248+ 7D05 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 249+ 7D07 79                                   ld      a,c
 250+ 7D08 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 251+ 7D09 B2                                   or      d
 252+ 7D0A 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 253+ 7D0B FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 253+ 7D0F 66 03
 254+ 7D11 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 255+ 7D14 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 255+ 7D18 74 03
 256+ 7D1A 3A BA 7E     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 257+ 7D1D FE 00                                cp      0
 258+ 7D1F 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 259+ 7D21              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 260+ 7D21 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 261+ 7D22 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 262+ 7D25 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 263+ 7D26 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 264+ 7D28 5F                                   ld      e,a
 265+ 7D29 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 266+ 7D2B                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 266+ 7D2B CB 23       >			   sla e
 266+ 7D2D CB 12       >			   rl  d
 267+ 7D2F 3A BB 7E                             ld      a,(BET2)                            ; get inverted Sign
 268+ 7D32 B2                                   or      d
 269+ 7D33 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 270+ 7D34 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 270+ 7D38 66 03
 271+ 7D3A CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4
 272+ 7D3D FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 272+ 7D41 74 03
 273+ 7D43              ; now work out screen pos
 274+ 7D43              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 275+ 7D43              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 276+ 7D43              ;        pop     de
 277+ 7D43               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 278+ 7D43                                      ;pop     de
 279+ 7D43              .NoPitch:
 280+ 7D43 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 281+ 7D46 6F                                   ld      l,a
 282+ 7D47 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 7D49                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 283+ 7D49 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 283+ 7D4B C2 54 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 284+ 7D4E C6 80                                add     a,$80
 285+ 7D50 4F                                   ld      c,a
 286+ 7D51 C3 59 7D                             jp      StarDoneX
 287+ 7D54 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 288+ 7D55 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 289+ 7D57 90                                   sub     b
 290+ 7D58 4F                                   ld      c,a
 291+ 7D59 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 292+ 7D5C 6F                                   ld      l,a
 293+ 7D5D E6 7F                                and     $7F
 294+ 7D5F                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 294+ 7D5F CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 294+ 7D61 C2 6A 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 295+ 7D64 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 296+ 7D66 47                                   ld      b,a
 297+ 7D67 C3 6F 7D                             jp      StarDoneY
 298+ 7D6A 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 299+ 7D6B 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 300+ 7D6D 90                                   sub     b
 301+ 7D6E 47                                   ld      b,a
 302+ 7D6F 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 303+ 7D71 C5                                   push    bc
 304+ 7D72              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 304+ 7D72 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 305+ 7D76 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 306+ 7D79 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 307+ 7D7C C1                                   pop    bc
 308+ 7D7D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 308+ 7D7D FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 308+ 7D7F D2 AF 7D    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 309+ 7D82 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 310+ 7D84 0C                                   inc     c
 311+ 7D85 C5                                   push    bc
 312+ 7D86                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 312+ 7D86 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 313+ 7D8A CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 314+ 7D8D FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 315+ 7D90 C1                                   pop    bc
 316+ 7D91                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 316+ 7D91 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 316+ 7D93 D2 AF 7D    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 317+ 7D96 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 318+ 7D98 04                                   inc     b
 319+ 7D99 C5                                   push    bc
 320+ 7D9A                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 320+ 7D9A ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 321+ 7D9E CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 322+ 7DA1 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 323+ 7DA4 C1                                   pop    bc
 324+ 7DA5 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 325+ 7DA7 0D                                   dec     c
 326+ 7DA8                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 326+ 7DA8 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 327+ 7DAC CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 328+ 7DAF C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 329+ 7DB0 FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 330+ 7DB2 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 331+ 7DB3 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 332+ 7DB7 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 333+ 7DB8 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 334+ 7DBA 05                                   dec     b
 335+ 7DBB C2 39 7C                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 336+ 7DBE C9                                   ret
 337+ 7DBF C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 338+ 7DC0 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 339+ 7DC2 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 340+ 7DC3 CD 4C 7B                             call    InitStarAtHL
 341+ 7DC6 C3 B0 7D                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 342+ 7DC9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 343+ 7DC9 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 344+ 7DCC FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 345+ 7DCF 6F                                   ld      l,a
 346+ 7DD0 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 347+ 7DD2 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 7DD3 CD 40 97                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 349+ 7DD6 7D                                   ld      a,l
 350+ 7DD7                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 350+ 7DD7 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 350+ 7DD9 C2 E4 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 351+ 7DDC              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 352+ 7DDC 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 353+ 7DDE 26 00                                ld          h,0
 354+ 7DE0 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 355+ 7DE1 C3 EB 7D                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 356+ 7DE4              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 357+ 7DE4 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 358+ 7DE6 26 00                                ld          h,0
 359+ 7DE8                                      ClearCarryFlag
 359+ 7DE8 B7          >                        or a
 360+ 7DE9 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 361+ 7DEB              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 362+ 7DEB 7D                                   ld          a,l
 363+ 7DEC 32 46 81                             ld          (varStarX),a
 364+ 7DEF C9                                   ret
 365+ 7DF0
 366+ 7DF0 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 367+ 7DF3 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 368+ 7DF6 6F                                   ld          l,a
 369+ 7DF7 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 370+ 7DF9 47                                   ld          b,a
 371+ 7DFA CD 40 97                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 372+ 7DFD 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 373+ 7DFE                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 373+ 7DFE CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 373+ 7E00 C2 0B 7E    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 374+ 7E03                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 375+ 7E03 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 376+ 7E05                                      ClearCarryFlag
 376+ 7E05 B7          >                        or a
 377+ 7E06 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 378+ 7E08 C3 10 7E                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 379+ 7E0B              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 380+ 7E0B 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 381+ 7E0D 26 00                                ld          h,0
 382+ 7E0F 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 383+ 7E10              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 384+ 7E10 7D                                   ld          a,l
 385+ 7E11 32 47 81                             ld          (varStarY),a
 386+ 7E14 C9                                   ret
 387+ 7E15
 388+ 7E15
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
 547  7E15                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 7E15
   2+ 7E15 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 7E16 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 7E1A 7D
   4+ 7E1B 15 7E        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 7E1D 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 7E1F 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 7E22 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 7E24 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 7E28              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 7E28
  11+ 7E28              memfill_dma:
  12+ 7E28              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 7E28              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 7E28 32 15 7E     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 7E2B              .set_target:
  16+ 7E2B 22 22 7E     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 7E2E              .set_length:
  18+ 7E2E ED 53 1D 7E  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 7E32              .write_dma:
  20+ 7E32 21 16 7E     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 7E35 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 7E37 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 7E39 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 7E3B C9           	ret
  25+ 7E3C
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 548  7E3C                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 7E3C
   2+ 7E3C 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 7E40 7D
   3+ 7E41 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 7E43 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 7E45 14 10 CD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_BURST_MODE;DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 7E48 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 7E4A 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 7E4E              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 7E4E
  10+ 7E4E              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 7E4E              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 7E4E              .set_target:
  13+ 7E4E 22 48 7E     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 7E51              .set_source:
  15+ 7E51 ED 53 41 7E  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 7E55              .set_length:
  17+ 7E55 ED 43 43 7E  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 7E59              .write_dma:
  19+ 7E59 21 3C 7E     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 7E5C 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 7E5E 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 7E60 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 7E62 C9           	ret
  24+ 7E63
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
 549  7E63 00 00        XX12PVarQ			DW 0
 550  7E65 00 00        XX12PVarR			DW 0
 551  7E67 00 00        XX12PVarS			DW 0
 552  7E69 00 00        XX12PVarResult1		DW 0
 553  7E6B 00 00        XX12PVarResult2		DW 0
 554  7E6D 00 00        XX12PVarResult3		DW 0
 555  7E6F 00           XX12PVarSign2		DB 0
 556  7E70 00           XX12PVarSign1		DB 0								; Note reversed so BC can do a little endian fetch
 557  7E71 00           XX12PVarSign3		DB 0

 219+ 7E72              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen

 228+ 7E72              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
 229+ 7E72              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa

 251+ 7E72              ;;;;			\ NEWB examples
 252+ 7E72              ;;;;\ 21			EQUB &21    \ 0010 0001    9 Shuttle has no escape pod, inno, trader.
 253+ 7E72              ;;;;\ 61			EQUB &61    \ 0110 0001   10 Tansporter no escape pod, Cop, inno, trader.

 255+ 7E72              ;;;;\ C2			EQUB &C2    \ 1100 0010   16 Viper has Escape pod, Cop, hunter.

   1+ 7E72                  IFNDEF LASER_V2
   2+ 7E72 ~                DEFINE  LASER_V2    1

   4+ 7E72              ; Debugging data
   5+ 7E72 00 00 00...  failureDiag DS  10              ; 10 bytes to log data before a failure
   6+ 7E7C
   7+ 7E7C              LogFailure:     MACRO messageAddress
   8+ 7E7C ~                            ld      hl,messageAddress
   9+ 7E7C ~                            ld      de,failureDiag
  10+ 7E7C ~                            ld      bc,10
  11+ 7E7C ~                            ldir
  12+ 7E7C                              ENDM
  13+ 7E7C              ;-- Memory management variables
  14+ 7E7C 00 00 00...  SaveMMU0Queue:          DS      5                   ; Allows up to 5 levels of depth for queue stacking
  15+ 7E81 00 00 00...  SaveMMU6Queue:          DS      5                   ; Allows up to 5 levels of depth for queue stacking
  16+ 7E86 00 00 00...  SaveMMU7Queue:          DS      5                   ; Allows up to 5 levels of depth for queue stacking

  90+ 7EBA 00           BET1 					DB	0               ; 2B        lower7 magnitude
  91+ 7EBB 00           BET2                    DB  0               ;            climb sign

  93+ 7EBD 1F           BET1MAXC                DB  31              ; max climb
  94+ 7EBE E1           BET1MAXD                DB  -31             ; max dive
  95+ 7EBF 00           XC						DB	0               ; 2C
  96+ 7EC0 00           YC						DB 	0               ; 2D

  99+ 7EC2 00           ECMLoopB                DB  0
 100+ 7EC3 00 00        JSTX                    DW  0               ;           Joystick analog value

 179+ 7FBA                                                          ;      1 1  Front view , i.e. $03

   1+ 82C7
   2+ 82C7              ; This will save to current queue position. it also asusmes that we never go beyond queue
   3+ 82C7              ; limit so does not do bounds checking for speed
   4+ 82C7              SaveMMU0:               GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_0_REGISTER             ; Get current reg value
   4+ 82C7 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
   4+ 82CA 3E 50       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_0_REGISTER
   4+ 82CC ED 79       >            out (c),a
   4+ 82CE 04          >            inc b
   4+ 82CF ED 78       >            in a,(c)
   5+ 82D1 2A 8B 7E                             ld          hl,(SaveMMU0QueueHead)               ; get address of current slot
   6+ 82D4 77                                   ld          (hl),a                          ; and write reg value to this address
   7+ 82D5 21 8B 7E                             ld          hl,SaveMMU0QueueHead                ; move address pointer up one
   8+ 82D8 34                                   inc         (hl)
   9+ 82D9 C9                                   ret
  10+ 82DA
  11+ 82DA 21 8B 7E     RestoreMMU0:            ld          hl,SaveMMU0QueueHead                ; Currently looking at next free
  12+ 82DD 35                                   dec         (hl)                            ; so step back one
  13+ 82DE 2A 8B 7E                             ld          hl,(SaveMMU0QueueHead)              ; save position as next free
  14+ 82E1 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                          ; get value that was there
  15+ 82E2 ED 92 50                             nextreg     MMU_SLOT_0_REGISTER,a           ; and swap MMU bank
  16+ 82E5 C9                                   ret
  17+ 82E6
  18+ 82E6              SaveMMU6:               GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER             ; Get current reg value
  18+ 82E6 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
  18+ 82E9 3E 56       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
  18+ 82EB ED 79       >            out (c),a
  18+ 82ED 04          >            inc b
  18+ 82EE ED 78       >            in a,(c)
  19+ 82F0 2A 8D 7E                             ld          hl,(SaveMMU6QueueHead)              ; get address of current slot
  20+ 82F3 77                                   ld          (hl),a                          ; and write reg value to this address
  21+ 82F4 21 8D 7E                             ld          hl,SaveMMU6QueueHead                ; move address pointer up one
  22+ 82F7 34                                   inc         (hl)
  23+ 82F8 C9                                   ret
  24+ 82F9
  25+ 82F9 21 8D 7E     RestoreMMU6:            ld          hl,SaveMMU6QueueHead            ; Currently address pointer looking at next free
  26+ 82FC 35                                   dec         (hl)                            ; so step back one
  27+ 82FD 2A 8D 7E                             ld          hl,(SaveMMU6QueueHead)              ; save position as next free
  28+ 8300 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                          ; get value that was there
  29+ 8301 ED 92 56                             nextreg     MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a           ; and swap MMU bank
  30+ 8304 C9                                   ret
  31+ 8305
  32+ 8305              SaveMMU7:               GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER             ; Get current reg value

  32+ 8308 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER

 183+ 8489              ; sets carry to true if target
 184+ 8489 3A 4E 82     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 185+ 848C CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 186+ 848E 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 187+ 8490 E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 188+ 8492 CA 97 84                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 189+ 8495                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 189+ 8495 B7          >                        or a
 190+ 8496 C9                                   ret
 191+ 8497              .TargetSelected:        JumpIfSlotAEmpty .TargetInvalid     ; does slot A have an target
 191+ 8497 21 9C 81    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList

 191+ 849C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 191+ 849D 3C          >                        inc     a
 191+ 849E CA A4 84    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 191+ 84A1 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 192+ 84A2                                      SetCarryFlag
 192+ 84A2 37          >                        scf
 193+ 84A3 C9                                   ret

   3+ 84AB 21 9C 81                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList

   7+ 84B2 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   8+ 84B4 C9                                   ret

  66+ 84EF
  67+ 84EF 21 9C 81     ClearSlotA:             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  68+ 84F2 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  69+ 84F4 36 FF                                ld      (hl),$FF
  70+ 84F6 3E 0C                                ld      a,UniverseSlotListSize  ; move to types
  71+ 84F8 ED 31                                add     hl,a
  72+ 84FA 36 FF                                ld      (hl),$FF
  73+ 84FC C9                                   ret
  74+ 84FD
  75+ 84FD              ; Space Station will always be slot 0
  76+ 84FD 21 A9 81     ClearJunk:              ld      hl,UniverseSlotType+1
  77+ 8500 0E 01                                ld      c,1
  78+ 8502 06 0B                                ld      b,UniverseSlotListSize -1      ; ignore space station
  79+ 8504 7E           .NextShip:              ld      a,(hl)
  80+ 8505 FE 03                                cp      ShipTypeJunk
  81+ 8507 CA 18 85                             jp      z,.ProcessJunk
  82+ 850A FE 04                                cp      ShipTypeScoopable
  83+ 850C CA 18 85                             jp      z,.ProcessJunk
  84+ 850F 23           .DoneIteration:         inc     hl
  85+ 8510 0C                                   inc     c
  86+ 8511 10 F1                                djnz    .NextShip
  87+ 8513                                      ClearJunkCount
  87+ 8513             >                        ZeroA
  87+ 8513 AF          >                        xor a
  87+ 8514 32 56 80    >                        ld      (JunkCount),a
  88+ 8517 C9                                   ret
  89+ 8518 79           .ProcessJunk:           ld      a,c
  90+ 8519 CD EF 84                             call    ClearSlotA
  91+ 851C C3 0F 85                             jp      .DoneIteration
  92+ 851F
  93+ 851F
  94+ 851F 21 A9 81     WarpJunk:               ld      hl,UniverseSlotType+1
  95+ 8522 0E 01                                ld      c,1
  96+ 8524 06 0B                                ld      b,UniverseSlotListSize -1      ; ignore space station
  97+ 8526 7E           .NextShip:              ld      a,(hl)
  98+ 8527 FE 03                                cp      ShipTypeJunk
  99+ 8529 CA 36 85                             jp      z,.ProcessJunk
 100+ 852C FE 04                                cp      ShipTypeScoopable
 101+ 852E CA 36 85                             jp      z,.ProcessJunk
 102+ 8531 23           .DoneIteration:         inc     hl
 103+ 8532 0C                                   inc     c
 104+ 8533 10 F1                                djnz    .NextShip
 105+ 8535 C9                                   ret
 106+ 8536 79           .ProcessJunk:           ld      a,c
 107+ 8537                                      MMUSelectUniverseA
 107+ 8537 C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 107+ 8539 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 108+ 853C CD 94 C6                             call    WarpOffset
 109+ 853F C3 31 85                             jp      .DoneIteration
 110+ 8542
 111+ 8542 21 A9 81     AreShipsPresent:        ld      hl,UniverseSlotType+1
 112+ 8545 06 0B                                ld      b,UniverseSlotListSize -1      ; ignore space station
 113+ 8547 7E           .NextShip:              ld      a,(hl)
 114+ 8548 FE 00                                cp      ShipTypeNormal
 115+ 854A                                      ClearCarryFlag
 115+ 854A B7          >                        or a
 116+ 854B C8                                   ret     z
 117+ 854C 23                                   inc     hl
 118+ 854D 10 F8                                djnz    .NextShip
 119+ 854F                                      SetCarryFlag
 119+ 854F 37          >                        scf
 120+ 8550 C9                                   ret
 121+ 8551
 122+ 8551 21 9C 81     IsSpaceStationPresent:  ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 123+ 8554                                      ClearCarryFlag
 123+ 8554 B7          >                        or a
 124+ 8555 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
 125+ 8556                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeStation
 125+ 8556 FE 02       >                        cp      ShipTypeStation
 125+ 8558 C8          >                        ret     z
 126+ 8559                                      SetCarryFlag
 126+ 8559 37          >                        scf
 127+ 855A C9                                   ret
 128+ 855B
 129+ 855B 21 9C 81     GetTypeAtSlotA:         ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 130+ 855E ED 31                                add     hl,a
 131+ 8560 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 132+ 8561 C9                                   ret
 133+ 8562
 134+ 8562 21 9D 81     IsPlanetOrSpaceStation: ld      hl,UniverseSlotList+1
 135+ 8565 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 136+ 8566 C9                                   ret
 137+ 8567              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 138+ 8567              ;-- Search the slot list for a free slot and return the result in c register.
 139+ 8567              ;-- Carry is clear if successful, else carry is set if all slots full
 140+ 8567              ;-- uses hl, bc, a
 141+ 8567 21 9C 81     FindNextFreeSlotInC:    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 142+ 856A 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize
 143+ 856C 0E 00                                ld      c, 0
 144+ 856E 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
 145+ 856F                                      JumpIfAEqNusng $FF, .FoundSlot
 145+ 856F FE FF       >                        cp     $FF
 145+ 8571 CA 7A 85    >                        jp      z,.FoundSlot
 146+ 8574 0C                                   inc     c
 147+ 8575 23                                   inc     hl
 148+ 8576 10 F6                                djnz    .SearchLoop
 149+ 8578                                      SetCarryFlag
 149+ 8578 37          >                        scf
 150+ 8579 C9                                   ret
 151+ 857A              .FoundSlot:             ClearCarryFlag
 151+ 857A B7          >                        or a
 152+ 857B C9                                   ret
 153+ 857C
 154+ 857C              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 155+ 857C              ;-- calls FindNextFreeSlotInC and returns the result in a and c registers.
 156+ 857C              ;-- Carry is clear if successful, else carry is set if all slots full
 157+ 857C              ;-- uses hl, bc, a
 158+ 857C CD 67 85     FindNextFreeSlotInA:    call    FindNextFreeSlotInC
 159+ 857F 79                                   ld      a,c
 160+ 8580 C9                                   ret
 161+ 8581
# file closed: ./Variables/UniverseSlotRoutines.asm

 563  85D1                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 85D1              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 85D1              doRND2:
   3+ 85D1 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 85D2              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 85D2              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 85D2              ; uses a 'a c h l registers, de not affected
   7+ 85D2              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 85D2 3A A1 7E                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 85D5 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 85D7 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 85D8 21 A3 7E     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 85DB 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 85DC 32 A1 7E     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 85DF 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 85E0 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 85E1 32 A3 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 85E4 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 85E5 3A A2 7E                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 85E8 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 85E9 21 A4 7E     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 85EC 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 85ED 32 A2 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 85F0 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 85F1 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 85F2 32 A4 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 85F5 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 85F6                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 85F6 C9                                   ret
  29+ 85F7
  30+ 85F7 21 A1 7E     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ 85FA 11 A5 7E                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ 85FD 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ 8600 ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 8602 ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 8604 ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 8606 ED A0                                ldi
  37+ 8608 C9                                   ret
  38+ 8609
  39+ 8609 21 A5 7E     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave

  42+ 8612 ED A0                                ldi
  43+ 8614 ED A0                                ldi
  44+ 8616 ED A0                                ldi
  45+ 8618 ED A0                                ldi

   1+ 861B 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"

   2+ 8625 21 48 80     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 8628 11 24 80                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 862B ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi

  15+ 8640
  16+ 8640 21 48 80     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 8643 11 3C 80                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 8646 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 8648
  20+ 8648 21 3C 80     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 864B 11 48 80                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 864E 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 8650
  24+ 8650 21 3C 80     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 8653 11 24 80                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 8656 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 8658
  28+ 8658 21 24 80     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 865B 11 3C 80                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 865E 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 8660
  32+ 8660              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 8660 CD 63 86     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 8663              .NextStep:
  35+ 8663 CD 66 86     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 8666              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 8666 3A 24 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 8669 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 866A 21 26 80     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 866D 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 866E 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 866F 3A 25 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 8672 21 27 80     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 8675 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 8676 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 8677 3A 26 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 867A 32 24 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 867D 3A 27 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 8680 32 25 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 8683 3A 29 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 8686 32 27 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 8689 3A 28 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 868C 32 26 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 868F B7           		or		a
  55+ 8690 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 8691 21 26 80     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 8694 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 8695 32 28 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 8698 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 8699 21 27 80     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 869C 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 869D 32 29 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 86A0 C9           		ret
  64+ 86A1
  65+ 86A1              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 86A1 CD A4 86     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 86A4              .NextStep:
  68+ 86A4 CD A7 86     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 86A7              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 86A7              ; x = a + c
  71+ 86A7 3A 3C 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 86AA B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 86AB 21 3E 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 86AE 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 86AF 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 86B0              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 86B0 3A 3D 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 86B3 21 3F 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 86B6 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 86B7 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 86B8 3A 3E 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 86BB 32 3C 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 86BE 3A 3F 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 86C1 32 3D 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 86C4 3A 41 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 86C7 32 3F 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 86CA 3A 40 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 86CD 32 3E 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 86D0 B7           		or		a
  90+ 86D1 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 86D2 21 3E 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 86D5 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 86D6 32 40 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 86D9 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 86DA 21 3F 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 86DD 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 86DE 32 41 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 86E1 C9           		ret
  99+ 86E2
 100+ 86E2 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 86E3 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 86E4 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 86E5
 104+ 86E5 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 86E6 32 B1 7F                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 86E9 3A 25 80     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 86EC 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 86ED 3A 4F 80     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 86F0 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 86F1 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 86F2 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 86F3 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 86F5 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 86F7 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 86F9 32 E4 86     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 86FC ED 5B E2 86                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 8700 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 8701 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 8703 3A 27 80     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 8706 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 8707 3A 4E 80                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 870A 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 870B 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 870C 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 870D CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 870F 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 8711 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 8713 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 8714 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 8715 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 8717 3A E4 86     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 871A 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 871B ED 43 E2 86                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 871F C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 8720 CD 58 86                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 8723 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 8724 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 8725 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 8726 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 8727 CD 60 86     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 872A 3A B1 7F                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 872D 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 872E FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 8730 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 8731 32 B1 7F                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 8734 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 8736
 148+ 8736              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 8736 3A 3D 80     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 8739 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 873B 32 69 80     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 873E 3A 3E 80     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 8741 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 8743 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 8745 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 8747 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 8749 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 874B 32 6A 80     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 874E CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 8750 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 8752 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 8754              .Fedual:
 163+ 8754 3A 69 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 8757 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 8759 32 69 80     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 875C              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 875C 3A 69 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 875F EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 8761 32 6B 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 8764 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 8765 3A 3F 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 8768 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 876A 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 876B 32 6B 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 876E 3A 6A 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 8771 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 8773 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 8774 3A 6B 80     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 8777 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 8778 32 6B 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 877B CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 877D CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 877F 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 8780 3A 69 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 8783 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 8784 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 8785 3A 6A 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 8788 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 8789 32 6C 80     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 878C 3A 69 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 878F EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 8791 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 8793 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 8794 3A 6A 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 8797 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 8799 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 879A ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 879C 3A 6C 80     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 879F 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 87A0 ED 30        		mul
 201+ 87A2 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 87A4 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 87A6 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 87A8 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 87AA CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 87AC CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 87AE ED 53 6E 80  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 87B2              .DoRadius:
 209+ 87B2 3A 3F 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 87B5 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 87B6 3A 41 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 87B9 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 87BB C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 87BD 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 87BE ED 43 72 80  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 87C2 C9           		ret
 217+ 87C3
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  52+ 891F
  53+ 891F              getTableText:
  54+ 891F              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  55+ 891F              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  56+ 891F D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  57+ 8920 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  58+ 8922 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  59+ 8924 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  60+ 8925 23           	inc		hl
  61+ 8926 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  62+ 8927 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  63+ 8928 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  64+ 8929 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  65+ 892A
  66+ 892A
  67+ 892A              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  68+ 892A              ;               -----------------------------------
  69+ 892A              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  70+ 892A              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  71+ 892A              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  72+ 892A              ;               1       1       Impossible
  73+ 892A              getRankIndex:
  74+ 892A              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  75+ 892A              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  76+ 892A 7A           	ld		a,d
  77+ 892B B3           	or		e
  78+ 892C FE 00        	cp		0
  79+ 892E C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  80+ 892F AF           	xor 	a
  81+ 8930 21 68 88     	ld		hl,RankingTableLow
  82+ 8933              .testLoop:
  83+ 8933 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  84+ 8934 23           	inc		hl
  85+ 8935 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  86+ 8936 E5           	push	hl
  87+ 8937 60           	ld		h,b
  88+ 8938 69           	ld		l,c
  89+ 8939 CD BD 9A     	call	compare16HLDE
  90+ 893C 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  91+ 893E              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  92+ 893E E1           	pop		hl
  93+ 893F 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  94+ 8940 23           	inc		hl
  95+ 8941 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  96+ 8942 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  97+ 8944              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  98+ 8944 E1           	pop		hl
  99+ 8945 C9           	ret
 100+ 8946

 231+ 8F78 00 00 00...  TextBuffer			DS	33
 232+ 8F99
 233+ 8F99              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 234+ 8F99              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 235+ 8F99
 236+ 8F99              CapitaliseString:
 237+ 8F99              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 238+ 8F99              .CapLoop:
 239+ 8F99 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 8F9A 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 8F9B FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 8F9D C8           	ret		z
 243+ 8F9E FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 8FA0 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 8FA2 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 8FA4 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 8FA6              .LowerCase:
 248+ 8FA6 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 249+ 8FA8 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 8FA9 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 251+ 8FAB
 252+ 8FAB 21 92 8E     ShipIndexToAddress      ld      hl,WordIdxShipNames
 253+ 8FAE C3 B4 8F                             jp      WordLookup
 254+ 8FB1
 255+ 8FB1 21 C4 8D     WordIndexToAddress:     ld		hl,WordIdx
 256+ 8FB4 ED 31        WordLookup:             add		hl,a
 257+ 8FB6 ED 31                                add		hl,a
 258+ 8FB8 D5                                   push	de
 259+ 8FB9 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 8FBA 23                                   inc		hl
 261+ 8FBB 56                                   ld		d,(hl)
 262+ 8FBC EB                                   ex		de,hl
 263+ 8FBD D1                                   pop		de
 264+ 8FBE C9                                   ret
 265+ 8FBF
 266+ 8FBF
 267+ 8FBF              expandTokenToString:
 268+ 8FBF              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 269+ 8FBF 21 42 8F     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 270+ 8FC2 CD 1F 89     	call	getTableText
 271+ 8FC5 11 78 8F     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 272+ 8FC8              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 8FC8 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 8FC9 FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 8FCB 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 276+ 8FCD E5           	push	hl
 277+ 8FCE D5           	push	de
 278+ 8FCF 21 C4 8D     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 279+ 8FD2 CD 1F 89     	call	getTableText
 280+ 8FD5 D1           	pop		de
 281+ 8FD6              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 8FD6 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 8FD7 FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 8FD9 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 8FDB              ;.GetChar:
 286+ 8FDB 12           	ld		(de),a
 287+ 8FDC 13           	inc		de
 288+ 8FDD 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 8FDE 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 8FE0              .AddSpace:
 291+ 8FE0 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 8FE2 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 8FE3 13           	inc		de
 294+ 8FE4 E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 8FE5 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 8FE6 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 8FE8              .ReadDone:
 298+ 8FE8 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 8FE9 AF           	xor		a
 300+ 8FEA 12           	ld		(de),a
 301+ 8FEB C9           	ret
 302+ 8FEC
# file closed: ./Tables/dictionary.asm

   7+ 9044 00 00 00...  name_expanded	DS 32

  10+ 9065
  11+ 9065
  12+ 9065              NamingLoop:
  13+ 9065 3A 41 80     	ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)	; a = first byte of name seed
  14+ 9068 E6 1F        	and 	$1F					; Keep bottom 5 bits only
  15+ 906A FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  16+ 906C 28 12        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  17+ 906E C6 0C        	add		a,12
  18+ 9070 CB 27        	sla		a					; phrase = (a+12)*2
  19+ 9072 21 EC 8F     	ld		hl,name_digrams
  20+ 9075 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  21+ 9077 ED A0        	ldi
  22+ 9079 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
  23+ 907A FE 3F        	cp		'?'
  24+ 907C 28 02        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  25+ 907E              .AddExtra:
  26+ 907E ED A0        	ldi
  27+ 9080              .SkipPhrase:

  29+ 9081 CD A7 86     	call	working_seed

 132+ 9086              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index

 136+ 9086              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1

 138+ 9086              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 139+ 9086              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 140+ 9086              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token

 148+ 9086              ;C8                      INY
 149+ 9086              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word

 152+ 9086              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 153+ 9086              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 154+ 9086              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct

 156+ 9086              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex

 168+ 9086              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1

 175+ 9086              ;

 177+ 9086              ;
 178+ 9086              ;
 179+ 9086              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ 9086              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down

 185+ 9086              ;CA                      DEX

 187+ 9086              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ 9086              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0

 192+ 9086              ;CA                      DEX
