 194+ 9086              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ 9086              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ 9086              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ 9086              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ 9086              ;60                      RTS
 199+ 9086              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ 9086              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ 9086              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ 9086              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ 9086              ;60                      RTS
 204+ 9086              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ 9086              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ 9086              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ 9086              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ 9086              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ 9086              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ 9086              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ 9086              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ 9086              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ 9086              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ 9086              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ 9086              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ 9086              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ 9086              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ 9086              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ 9086              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ 9086              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ 9086              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ 9086              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ 9086              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ 9086              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ 9086              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ 9086              ;
 227+ 9086              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ 9086              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ 9086              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ 9086              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ 9086              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ 9086              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 9086              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ 9086              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ 9086              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ 9086              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ 9086              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ 9086              ;
 239+ 9086              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ 9086              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ 9086              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ 9086              ;
 243+ 9086              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ 9086              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ 9086              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ 9086              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ 9086              ;
 248+ 9086              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ 9086              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ 9086              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ 9086              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ 9086              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ 9086              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ 9086              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ 9086              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ 9086              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ 9086              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ 9086              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ 9086              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ 9086              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ 9086              ;
 262+ 9086              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.

 265+ 9086              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31

 268+ 9086              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.

   1+ 90C8              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ 90C8              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ 90C8 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ 90C9 E5                                   push hl
   5+ 90CA DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ 90CC 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 90CE E5                                   push hl
   8+ 90CF AF                                   xor a
   9+ 90D0 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 90D1 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 90D2 DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 90D4 CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 90D6 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 90D8 17                                   rla
  15+ 90D9 B9                                   cp c
  16+ 90DA 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 90DC 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit

  20+ 90E1 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 90E3 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 90E5 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 90E6 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 90E8 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 90E9 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 90EA E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 90EB 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop

  34+ 90F3 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 90F5 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 90F7 CD C8 90                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 90FA F5                                   push    af
  38+ 90FB FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 90FD E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 90FF B1                                   or      c

  44+ 9103
  45+ 9103                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 9103 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 9105 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 9106 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 9108 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 910A 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 910B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 910D 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 910E FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 9110 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 9112 CD C8 90                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 9115 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 9117 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 9119 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 911A FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 911C 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 911D FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 911F C9                                   ret

  64+ 9120              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 9120              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 9120              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 9120              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 9120 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 9121 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 9123 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 9125 3A AC 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 9128 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 9129 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 912C 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 912D 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 912F CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 9131 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 9132 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 9134 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 9136 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 9138 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 9139 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 913A 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 913C 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 913D 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 9140 C9                                   ret

   1+ 9141              AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     JumpIfAGTENusng d, .Unity    			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96)
   1+ 9141 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 9142 D2 5D 91    >                        jp		nc,.Unity
   2+ 9145 06 FF                                ld          b,%11111111                 ; Loop through 8 bits
   3+ 9147 CB 27        .DivLoop:               sla         a                           ; shift a left
   4+ 9149                                      JumpIfALTNusng d, .skipSubtract         ; if a < q skip the following
   4+ 9149 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 914A DA 4E 91    >                        jp		c, .skipSubtract
   5+ 914D 92                                   sub         d
   6+ 914E              .skipSubtract:          FlipCarryFlag
   6+ 914E 3F          >                        ccf
   7+ 914F CB 10                                rl          b
   8+ 9151 38 F4                                jr          c,.DivLoop
   9+ 9153 78                                   ld          a,b
  10+ 9154 CB 3F                                srl         a                  			; t = t /4
  11+ 9156 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  12+ 9158 47                                   ld          b,a
  13+ 9159 CB 3F                                srl         a
  14+ 915B 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 915C C9                                   ret

  17+ 915F C9                                   ret

  54+ 918E 7A           mulDbyESigned:          ld      a,d
  55+ 918F AB                                   xor     e
  56+ 9190 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  57+ 9192 47                                   ld      b,a
  58+ 9193 7A                                   ld      a,d
  59+ 9194 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  60+ 9196 57                                   ld      d,a
  61+ 9197 7B                                   ld      a,e
  62+ 9198 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  63+ 919A 5F                                   ld      e,a

  65+ 919D 7A                                   ld      a,d

  72+ 91A1              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  73+ 91A1 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  74+ 91A1 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  75+ 91A1 ~                                    ld      e,a
  76+ 91A1 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  77+ 91A1 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  78+ 91A1 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  79+ 91A1 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  80+ 91A1 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  81+ 91A1 ~                                    ld      d,a
  82+ 91A1 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  83+ 91A1 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  84+ 91A1 ~                                    ld      e,a
  85+ 91A1 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  86+ 91A1 ~                                    ld      a,d
  87+ 91A1 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  88+ 91A1 ~                                    ld      d,a
  89+ 91A1                                      ENDM

 110+ 91E2 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 111+ 91E3 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 112+ 91E5 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 113+ 91E6 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 114+ 91E7                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 114+ 91E7 FA FF 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 115+ 91EA 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 116+ 91EB B2                                   or      d
 117+ 91EC                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 117+ 91EC FA F1 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 118+ 91EF 19                                   add     hl,de
 119+ 91F0 C9                                   ret
 120+ 91F1 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 121+ 91F2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 122+ 91F4 67                                   ld      h,a
 123+ 91F5 7A                                   ld      a,d
 124+ 91F6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 125+ 91F8 57                                   ld      d,a
 126+ 91F9 19                                   add     hl,de
 127+ 91FA 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 128+ 91FC B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 129+ 91FD 67                                   ld      h,a
 130+ 91FE C9                                   ret
 131+ 91FF 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 132+ 9200 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 133+ 9202 67                                   ld      h,a
 134+ 9203 7A                                   ld      a,d
 135+ 9204 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 136+ 9206 57                                   ld      d,a
 137+ 9207 B7                                   or      a
 138+ 9208 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 139+ 920A 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 140+ 920C 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 141+ 920D B4                                   or      h
 142+ 920E 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 143+ 920F C9                                   ret
 144+ 9210              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 144+ 9210 AF          >                    xor a
 144+ 9211 95          >                    sub l
 144+ 9212 6F          >                    ld l,a
 144+ 9213 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 144+ 9214 94          >                    sub h
 144+ 9215 67          >                    ld h,a
 145+ 9216 78                                   ld      a,b
 146+ 9217 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 147+ 9219 B4                                   or      h
 148+ 921A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 149+ 921B C9                                   ret

 151+ 921C
 152+ 921C                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 153+ 921C                  ;
 154+ 921C                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 155+ 921C                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 156+ 921C                  ;
 157+ 921C                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 158+ 921C                  ;         carry reset
 159+ 921C                  ;
 160+ 921C                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 161+ 921C 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 162+ 921D 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 163+ 921E ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 164+ 9220 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ 9221 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 166+ 9223
 167+ 9223 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 168+ 9224 85                                   add a,l
 169+ 9225 57                                   ld  d,a
 170+ 9226 EB                                   ex de,hl
 171+ 9227
 172+ 9227 7A                                   ld  a,d
 173+ 9228 CE 00                                adc a,0
 174+ 922A C9                                   ret
 175+ 922B
 176+ 922B 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 177+ 922C 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 178+ 922D ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 179+ 922F EB                                   ex      de,hl
 180+ 9230 C9                                   ret
 181+ 9231
 182+ 9231                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 183+ 9231                 ;
 184+ 9231                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 185+ 9231                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 186+ 9231                 ;
 187+ 9231                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 188+ 9231                 ;         carry reset
 189+ 9231                 ;
 190+ 9231                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 191+ 9231
 192+ 9231
 193+ 9231
 194+ 9231 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 195+ 9232 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 196+ 9233 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 197+ 9234 6A                                   ld l,d
 198+ 9235 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 199+ 9236 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 200+ 9237              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 201+ 9237 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 202+ 9239 EB                                   ex de,hl
 203+ 923A ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 204+ 923C
 205+ 923C AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 206+ 923D 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 207+ 923E 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 208+ 923F
 209+ 923F 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 210+ 9240 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 211+ 9241 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 212+ 9243
 213+ 9243 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 214+ 9244 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 215+ 9245
 216+ 9245 7A                                   ld a,d
 217+ 9246 85                                   add a,l
 218+ 9247 67                                   ld h,a
 219+ 9248 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 220+ 9249
 221+ 9249 D1                                   pop de
 222+ 924A ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 223+ 924C
 224+ 924C EB                                   ex de,hl
 225+ 924D ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 226+ 924F EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 227+ 9250
 228+ 9250 C9                                   ret
 229+ 9251
 230+ 9251              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 231+ 9251              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 232+ 9251              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 233+ 9251              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 234+ 9251              ;         carry reset
 235+ 9251              ; maths is
 236+ 9251              ;        hl = y , de= x
 237+ 9251              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 238+ 9251              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 239+ 9251              ;
 240+ 9251              ;
 241+ 9251              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 242+ 9251 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 243+ 9252 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 244+ 9253 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 245+ 9254 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 246+ 9255 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 247+ 9256 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 248+ 9257 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 249+ 9259 EB                                   ex de,hl
 250+ 925A ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 251+ 925C 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 252+ 925D 59                                   ld e,c
 253+ 925E 50                                   ld d,b
 254+ 925F ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 255+ 9261 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 256+ 9262 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 257+ 9263 67                                   ld h,a
 258+ 9264 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 259+ 9265                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 260+ 9265 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 261+ 9266 C1                                   pop     bc
 262+ 9267 C9                                   ret
 263+ 9268
 264+ 9268              ; multiplication of 16-bit numbers by 8-bit product
 265+ 9268              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 266+ 9268              ;          l = 8-bit multiplicand
 267+ 9268              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 268+ 9268              ;         carry reset
 269+ 9268              ; maths is
 270+ 9268              ;        hl = y , de= x
 271+ 9268              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 272+ 9268              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 273+ 9268              ;
 274+ 9268              ;
 275+ 9268              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 276+ 9268 C5 E5 D5     mulDEbyLSigned:         push    bc,,hl,,de
 277+ 926B 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 278+ 926C 16 00                                ld d,0                      ; d = yh = 0
 279+ 926E 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 280+ 926F 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 281+ 9270 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 282+ 9271              ;                        mul                         ; yh * xl which will always be 0
 283+ 9271 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = xh yl
 284+ 9272 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 285+ 9274 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; hl = xh * yl
 286+ 9275              ;                        add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 287+ 9275 59                                   ld e,c                      ; de = yl xl
 288+ 9276 50                                   ld d,b                      ; .
 289+ 9277 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 290+ 9279 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 291+ 927A 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 292+ 927B 67                                   ld h,a
 293+ 927C 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 294+ 927D AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 295+ 927E C1                                   pop     bc                  ; get de for sign
 296+ 927F 78                                   ld      a,b
 297+ 9280 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; get hl for sign
 298+ 9281 A8                                   xor     b
 299+ 9282 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; so we now have the sign bit
 300+ 9284 B4                                   or      h                   ; so set the sign
 301+ 9285 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 302+ 9286 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; clear up stack
 303+ 9287 C9                                   ret
 304+ 9288
 305+ 9288                  DISPLAY "TODO: TEST"
 306+ 9288 7A           mulDEbyHLSigned:        ld  a,d                     ; de = abs de
 307+ 9289 47                                   ld  b,a                     ;
 308+ 928A E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; .
 309+ 928C 57                                   ld  d,a                     ; .
 310+ 928D 7C                                   ld  a,h                     ; hl = abs hl
 311+ 928E 4F                                   ld  c,a                     ; .
 312+ 928F E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; .
 313+ 9291 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 314+ 9292 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; ixl = target sign of de * hl
 315+ 9293 AA                                   xor     d                   ;
 316+ 9294 E6 80                                and     $80                 ;
 317+ 9296 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a               ;
 318+ 9298 CD 51 92                             call    mulDEbyHL           ; calculate ABS(DE) * ABS(HL)
 319+ 929B 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; recover sign bit
 320+ 929C DD B5                                or      ixl
 321+ 929E 67                                   ld      h,a
 322+ 929F C9                                   ret
 323+ 92A0
 324+ 92A0              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 325+ 92A0              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 326+ 92A0 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 327+ 92A1 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 328+ 92A2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 329+ 92A4 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 330+ 92A6 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 331+ 92A7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 332+ 92A9 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 333+ 92AA 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 334+ 92AB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 335+ 92AD              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 336+ 92AD 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 337+ 92AE 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 338+ 92AF ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 339+ 92B1 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 340+ 92B2 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 341+ 92B3 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 342+ 92B4 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 343+ 92B5 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 344+ 92B6 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 345+ 92B7 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 346+ 92B9 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 347+ 92BA 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 348+ 92BB 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 349+ 92BC 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 350+ 92BD 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 351+ 92BE 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 352+ 92BF 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 353+ 92C0 ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 354+ 92C2 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 355+ 92C3 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 356+ 92C4 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 357+ 92C6 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 358+ 92C7 C9                                   ret
 359+ 92C8
 360+ 92C8              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 361+ 92C8              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 362+ 92C8              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 363+ 92C8              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 364+ 92C8              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 365+ 92C8              ;mult3
 366+ 92C8              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 367+ 92C8              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 368+ 92C8              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 369+ 92C8              ; Algorithm
 370+ 92C8              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 371+ 92C8              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 372+ 92C8              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 373+ 92C8              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 374+ 92C8              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 375+ 92C8              ;
 376+ 92C8              ;
 377+ 92C8 7A           mulHLbyDE2sc:           ld      a,d
 378+ 92C9 AC                                   xor     h
 379+ 92CA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 380+ 92CC FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; save sign bit for result
 381+ 92CE 7C                                   ld      a,h
 382+ 92CF E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 383+ 92D1 28 06                                jr      z,.HLPositive
 384+ 92D3              .HLNegative:            NegHL
 384+ 92D3 AF          >                    xor a
 384+ 92D4 95          >                    sub l
 384+ 92D5 6F          >                    ld l,a
 384+ 92D6 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 384+ 92D7 94          >                    sub h
 384+ 92D8 67          >                    ld h,a
 385+ 92D9 7A           .HLPositive:            ld      a,d
 386+ 92DA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 387+ 92DC 28 06                                jr      z,.DEPositive
 388+ 92DE              .DENegative:            NegDE
 388+ 92DE AF          >                    xor a
 388+ 92DF 93          >                    sub e
 388+ 92E0 5F          >                    ld e,a
 388+ 92E1 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 388+ 92E2 92          >                    sub d
 388+ 92E3 57          >                    ld d,a
 389+ 92E4 CD 51 92     .DEPositive:            call    mulDEbyHL           ; now do calc
 390+ 92E7 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 391+ 92E9 A7                                   and     a                   ; if its 0 then we are good
 392+ 92EA C8                                   ret     z
 393+ 92EB
 394+ 92EB
 395+ 92EB              ; Mulitply HLE by D leading Sign
 396+ 92EB              ; used IY A BC
 397+ 92EB              ; result it loaded to DELC
 398+ 92EB 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 399+ 92EC AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 400+ 92ED E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 401+ 92EF FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 402+ 92F1 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 403+ 92F2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 404+ 92F4 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 405+ 92F5 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 406+ 92F6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 407+ 92F8 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 408+ 92F9 B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 409+ 92FA 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 410+ 92FC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 411+ 92FD B5                                   or      l
 412+ 92FE B3                                   or      e
 413+ 92FF 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 414+ 9301              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 415+ 9301 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 416+ 9302 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 417+ 9304 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 418+ 9305 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 419+ 9307 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 420+ 9308 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 421+ 9309 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 422+ 930B FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 423+ 930D 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 424+ 930E 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 425+ 930F FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 426+ 9311 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 427+ 9312 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 428+ 9313 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 429+ 9315 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 430+ 9317 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 431+ 9318 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 432+ 9319 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 433+ 931A CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 434+ 931C FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 435+ 931E 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 436+ 931F C9                                   ret
 437+ 9320 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 438+ 9323                                      ZeroA
 438+ 9323 AF          >                        xor a
 439+ 9324 4F                                   ld      c,a
 440+ 9325 6F                                   ld      l,a
 441+ 9326 C9                                   ret
 442+ 9327
 443+ 9327              ;;;
 444+ 9327              ;;;
 445+ 9327              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 446+ 9327              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 447+ 9327              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 448+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 449+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 450+ 9327              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 451+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 452+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 453+ 9327              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 454+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 455+ 9327              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 456+ 9327              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 457+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 458+ 9327              ;;;                        or      l
 459+ 9327              ;;;                        or      e
 460+ 9327              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 461+ 9327              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 462+ 9327              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 463+ 9327              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 464+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 465+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 466+ 9327              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 467+ 9327              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 468+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 469+ 9327              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 470+ 9327              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 471+ 9327              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 472+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 473+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 474+ 9327              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 475+ 9327              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 476+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 477+ 9327              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 478+ 9327              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 479+ 9327              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 480+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 481+ 9327              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 482+ 9327              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 483+ 9327              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 484+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 485+ 9327              ;;;                        ret
 486+ 9327              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 487+ 9327              ;;;                        ZeroA
 488+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 489+ 9327              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 490+ 9327              ;;;                        ret
 491+ 9327
 492+ 9327              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 493+ 9327              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 494+ 9327              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 495+ 9327              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 496+ 9327              ;         carry reset
 497+ 9327              ;
 498+ 9327              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 499+ 9327 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 500+ 9328 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 501+ 9329 32 27 93                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 502+ 932C 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 503+ 932D ED 27 80                             test    $80
 504+ 9330 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 505+ 9332 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 506+ 9334 57                                   ld      d,a
 507+ 9335 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 508+ 9337 32 27 93                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 509+ 933A 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 510+ 933B ED 27 80                             test    $80
 511+ 933E 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 512+ 9340 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 513+ 9342 67                                   ld      h,a
 514+ 9343 3A 27 93                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 515+ 9346 EE 80                                xor     $80
 516+ 9348 32 27 93                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 517+ 934B CD 51 92     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 518+ 934E 3A 27 93     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 519+ 9351 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 520+ 9354 C8                                   ret     z
 521+ 9355 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 522+ 9356 95                                   sub 	l
 523+ 9357 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 524+ 9358 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 525+ 9359 94                                   sub 	h
 526+ 935A 67                                   ld 		h,a
 527+ 935B C9                                   ret
 528+ 935C
 529+ 935C AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 530+ 935D 32 27 93                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 531+ 9360 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 532+ 9361 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 533+ 9364 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 534+ 9366 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 535+ 9368 57                                   ld      d,a
 536+ 9369 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 537+ 936B 32 27 93                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 538+ 936E CD 51 92     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 539+ 9371 3A 27 93     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 540+ 9374 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 541+ 9377 C8                                   ret     z
 542+ 9378 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 543+ 9379 95                                   sub 	l
 544+ 937A 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 545+ 937B 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 546+ 937C 94                                   sub 	h
 547+ 937D 67                                   ld 		h,a
 548+ 937E C9                                   ret
 549+ 937F
 550+ 937F
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_multiply.asm
 573  937F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ 937F              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 937F              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 937F
   4+ 937F              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 937F ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 937F ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 937F ~            			mul
   8+ 937F              			ENDM
   9+ 937F
  10+ 937F              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 937F ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 937F ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 937F ~            			mul
  14+ 937F ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 937F              			ENDM
  16+ 937F
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 574  937F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sine.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sine.asm
   1+ 937F              ;- MACROS
   2+ 937F              LookupSineAMacro:       MACRO
   3+ 937F ~                                    ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   4+ 937F ~                                    add     hl, a
   5+ 937F ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
   6+ 937F                                      ENDM
   7+ 937F
   8+ 937F              ; Gets the sine of A from the lookup table into A
   9+ 937F              LookupSineA:            LookupSineAMacro
   9+ 937F 21 28 94    >                        ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   9+ 9382 ED 31       >                        add     hl, a
   9+ 9384 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  10+ 9385 C9                                   ret
  11+ 9386

 575  9386                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 9386              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 9386              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 9386              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 9386              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 9386              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 9386              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 9386 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 9389 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 938A 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 938B              .sqrloop:
  11+ 938B CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 938D CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 938F 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 9390 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 9391 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 9393 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 9395 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 9396 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 9397 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 9399              .sqrbit:
  21+ 9399 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 939A EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 939B B7           	or a
  24+ 939C ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 939E              .sqrfi:
  26+ 939E CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 93A0 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 93A2 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 93A4 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 93A6 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 93A8 C9           	ret
  32+ 93A9
  33+ 93A9
  34+ 93A9              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 93A9 3A AC 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 93AC 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 93AD 3A AD 7F     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 93B0 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 93B1 CD 86 93     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 93B4 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 93B5 32 AC 7F     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 93B8 C9           	ret
  43+ 93B9
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 576  93B9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_arctan.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
   1+ 93B9              ;Calculate A = arctan(P / Q)
   2+ 93B9              ; This finds the angle in the right-angled triangle where the opposite side to angle A is length P and the adjacent side to angle A has
   3+ 93B9              ; length Q, so:  tan(A) = P / Q
   4+ 93B9              ;
   5+ 93B9              ; The result in A is an integer representing the angle in radians. The routine returns values in the range 0 to 128,  (or 0 to PI radians).
   6+ 93B9 3A AC 7E     ARCTAN:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set T1 = P EOR Q, which will have the sign of P * Q
   7+ 93BC 21 AC 7F                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; EOR Q
   8+ 93BF AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
   9+ 93C0 32 A9 7E                             ld      (varT1),a                   ; STA T1
  10+ 93C3 3A AC 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDA Q                  \ If Q = 0, jump to AR2 to return a right angle
  11+ 93C6 A7                                   and     a                           ; BEQ AR2
  12+ 93C7 CA 09 94                             jp      z, .AR2                     ; .
  13+ 93CA CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Set Q = |Q| * 2 (this is a quick way of clearing the
  14+ 93CC 32 AC 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ sign bit, and we don't need to shift right again as we only ever use this value in the division with |P| * 2, which we set next)
  15+ 93CF 3A AC 7E                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set A = |P| * 2
  16+ 93D2 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A
  17+ 93D4 32 AC 7E                             ld      (varP),a
  18+ 93D7 21 AC 7F                             ld      hl,varQ
  19+ 93DA BE                                   cp      (hl)                        ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, i.e. |P| > |Q|, jump to AR1 to swap P
  20+ 93DB D2 ED 93                             jp      nc, .AR1                    ; BCS AR1                \ and Q around, so we can still use the lookup table
  21+ 93DE CD 15 94                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table:  A = arctan(A / Q)  = arctan(|P / Q|)
  22+ 93E1                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag so the SBC instruction in AR3 will be correct, should we jump there
  22+ 93E1 B7          >                        or a
  23+ 93E2 4F           .AR4:                   ld      c,a                         ; as we have to use a we use c as a temp, we can't push af as we would loose flags on pop
  24+ 93E3 3A A9 7E                             ld      a,(varT1)                   ; LDX T1                 \ If T1 is negative, i.e. P and Q have different signs,
  25+ 93E6 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  26+ 93E7 A7                                   and     a                           ; BMI AR3                \ jump down to AR3 to return arctan(-|P / Q|)
  27+ 93E8 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; .                      \ we need to get a back before jump
  28+ 93E9 FA 0C 94                             jp      m, .AR3                     ; .
  29+ 93EC C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Otherwise P and Q have the same sign, so our result is correct and we can return from the subroutine
  30+ 93ED              ; We want to calculate arctan(t) where |t| > 1, so we can use the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 64 - arctan(1 / t)
  31+ 93ED              ; In the 6502 verion it works with A already being P but we will fetch it
  32+ 93ED 3A AC 7F     .AR1:                   ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDX Q                  \ Swap the values in Q and P, using the fact that we
  33+ 93F0 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  34+ 93F1 3A AC 7E                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; STA Q                  \ called AR1 with A = P
  35+ 93F4 32 AC 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
  36+ 93F7 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; TXA                    \ This also sets A = P (which now contains the original argument |Q|)
  37+ 93F8 32 AC 7E                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STX P                  \
  38+ 93FB CD 15 94                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table: A = arctan(A / Q) = arctan(|Q / P|) = arctan(1 / |P / Q|)
  39+ 93FE 32 C8 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T                  \ Set T = 64 - T, we use B as T (its not really that)
  40+ 9401 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; its actually t = a, a = 64-a
  41+ 9402 3E 40                                ld      a,64                        ; LDA #64 What is going on here is t = result
  42+ 9404                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                            a = 64- result
  42+ 9404 B7          >                        or a
  43+ 9405 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; .
  44+ 9406 C3 E2 93                             jp      .AR4                        ; BCS AR4                \ Jump to AR4 to continue the calculation (this BCS is effectively a JMP as the subtraction will never underflow, as ARS1 returns values in the range 0-31)
  45+ 9409              ; If we get here then Q = 0, so tan(A) = infinity and A is a right angle, or 0.25 of a circle. We allocate 255 to a full circle, so we should return 63 for a right angle
  46+ 9409 3E 3F        .AR2:                   ld      a,63                        ; LDA #63                \ Set A to 63, to represent a right angle
  47+ 940B C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  48+ 940C              ; A contains arctan(|P / Q|) but P and Q have different signs, so we need to return arctan(-|P / Q|), using the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 128 - A
  49+ 940C 32 C8 7F     .AR3:                   ld      (varT),a
  50+ 940F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; STA T                  \ Set A = 128 - A, we use b as T
  51+ 9410 3E 80                                ld      a,128                       ; LDA #128               \
  52+ 9412                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                  \ The subtraction will work because we did a SEC before calling AR3
  52+ 9412 B7          >                        or a
  53+ 9413 98                                   sbc     a,b
  54+ 9414 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  55+ 9415              ; This routine fetches arctan(A / Q) from the ACT table, so A will be set to an integer in the range 0 to 31 that represents an angle from 0 to 45 degrees (or 0 to \ PI / 4 radians)
  56+ 9415 CD D2 94     ARS1:                   call    Amul256DivQ                 ; JSR LL28               \ Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q
  57+ 9418 3A AD 7F                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set X = R / 8
  58+ 941B CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \       = 32 * A / Q
  59+ 941D CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \
  60+ 941F CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ so X has the value t * 32 where t = A / Q, which is
  61+ 9421 21 48 94                             ld      hl,ACT                      ; TAX                    \ what we need to look up values in the ACT table
  62+ 9424 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ; LDA ACT,X              \ Fetch ACT+X from the ACT table into A, so now:
  63+ 9426 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                        \   A = value in ACT + X = value in ACT + (32 * A / Q)= arctan(A / Q)
  64+ 9427 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  65+ 9428
  66+ 9428              ;;;arctan:										; .ARCTAN	\ -> &2A3C  \ A=TAN-1(P/Q) \ A=arctan (P/Q)  called from block E
  67+ 9428              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; a = var P
  68+ 9428              ;;;		ld		hl,varQ
  69+ 9428              ;;;		xor		(hl)						; a = var p XOR varQ
  70+ 9428              ;;;		ld		a,(varT1)					; \ T1	 \ quadrant info
  71+ 9428              ;;;		ld		c,a							; c = copy of T1
  72+ 9428              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; Q
  73+ 9428              ;;;		cp		0
  74+ 9428              ;;;		jr		z,.AR2						;  Q=0 so set angle to 63, pi/2
  75+ 9428              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; Q move to reg B?
  76+ 9428              ;;;		ld		d,a							; copy to reg d
  77+ 9428              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  78+ 9428              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; P
  79+ 9428              ;;;		ld		e,a							; copy to reg e
  80+ 9428              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  81+ 9428              ;;;		cp		d							; compare with b (unsigned varQ * 2)
  82+ 9428              ;;;		jr		nc, .ars1					; if q >  p then adjust  swop A and Q as A >= Q
  83+ 9428              ;;;		call	ars1						; \ ARS1 \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
  84+ 9428              ;;;		scf									; set carry flag
  85+ 9428              ;;;.ar4:										; sub o.k
  86+ 9428              ;;;		bit 	7,c							; is T1 (also in c) negative?
  87+ 9428              ;;;		jr		nz,.ar3						;  -ve quadrant
  88+ 9428              ;;;		ret
  89+ 9428              ;;;.ar1:										; swop A and Q entering here d = q and e = P
  90+ 9428              ;;;		ld		a,d							; a = varQ
  91+ 9428              ;;;		ld		d,e							; varQ = varP
  92+ 9428              ;;;		ld		e,a							; swap D and E around
  93+ 9428              ;;;		ld		(varP),a					; write to actual variables
  94+ 9428              ;;;		ld		a,d
  95+ 9428              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; write to actual variables
  96+ 9428              ;;;		call	.ars1
  97+ 9428              ;;;		ld		(varT),b
  98+ 9428              ;;;		ld		b,a							; B = T = angle
  99+ 9428              ;;;		ld		a,64						; next range of angle, pi/4 to pi/2
 100+ 9428              ;;;		sub		a,b							; a = 64 - T (or b)
 101+ 9428              ;;;		jr		nc,.ar4						;  sub o.k
 102+ 9428              ;;;.ar2:										; .AR2	\ set angle to 90 degrees
 103+ 9428              ;;;		ld 		a,&3F						;  #63
 104+ 9428              ;;;		ret
 105+ 9428              ;;;.ar3:										;.AR3	\ -ve quadrant
 106+ 9428              ;;;		ld		b,a							; b = T	= \ angle
 107+ 9428              ;;;		ld		a,ConstPi					; a = Pi
 108+ 9428              ;;;		sub		b,a							; A = 128-T, so now covering range pi/2 to pi correctly
 109+ 9428              ;;;		ret
 110+ 9428              ;;;.ars1:										; .ARS1	\ -> &2A75  \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
 111+ 9428              ;;;		call	RequAmul256divQ				;  LL28 \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
 112+ 9428              ;;;		ld		a,(regA)
 113+ 9428              ;;;		srl		a
 114+ 9428              ;;;		srl		a
 115+ 9428              ;;;		srl		a							;  31 max.
 116+ 9428              ;;;		ld		hl, ArcTanTable				; root of index into table at end of words data
 117+ 9428              ;;;		add		hl,a						; now at real data
 118+ 9428              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; a =  ACT[a]
 119+ 9428              ;;;.arsr:										; rts used by laser lines below (will not in later code)
 120+ 9428              ;;;		ret
 121+ 9428
 122+ 9428
 123+ 9428
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
 577  9428                  INCLUDE "./Maths/SineTable.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/SineTable.asm
   1+ 9428              ;; PRINT "SIN TABLE"
   2+ 9428              ;; FOR I% =  0 TO  31
   3+ 9428              ;; N = ABS(SIN((I%/64)*2*PI))
   4+ 9428              ;; IF N >= 1 THEN B% = 255  ELSE B% = INT(256 * N + 0.5)
   5+ 9428              ;; PRINT B%
   6+ 9428              ;; NEXT I%
   7+ 9428
   8+ 9428
   9+ 9428 00 19 32 4A  SNE:            DB 000, 025, 050, 074, 098, 121, 142, 162
   9+ 942C 62 79 8E A2
  10+ 9430 B5 C6 D5 E2                  DB 181, 198, 213, 226, 237, 245, 251, 255
  10+ 9434 ED F5 FB FF
  11+ 9438 FF FF FB F5                  DB 255, 255, 251, 245, 237, 226, 213, 198

   6+ 944C 05 06 08 09

   7+ 9454 0F 10 11 12
   8+ 9458 13 14 15 16                  DB 019, 020, 021, 022, 023, 024, 025, 025
   8+ 945C 17 18 19 19
