 579  9468                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 9468              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 9468              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 9468                      ; Input:
   4+ 9468                      ;       HL = value
   5+ 9468                      ; Output:
   6+ 9468                      ;       HL = -value
   7+ 9468                      ; Destroys:
   8+ 9468                      ;       AF
   9+ 9468                      ;
  10+ 9468              negate16:
  11+ 9468 AF           negate16hl:         xor 	a
  12+ 9469 95                               sub 	l
  13+ 946A 6F                               ld 		l,a
  14+ 946B 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  15+ 946C 94                               sub 	h
  16+ 946D 67                               ld 		h,a
  17+ 946E C9                               ret
  18+ 946F
  19+ 946F AF           negate16de:         xor 	a
  20+ 9470 93                               sub 	e
  21+ 9471 5F                               ld 		e,a
  22+ 9472 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  23+ 9473 92                               sub 	d
  24+ 9474 57                               ld 		d,a
  25+ 9475 C9                               ret
  26+ 9476
  27+ 9476 AF           negate16bc:         xor 	a
  28+ 9477 91                               sub 	c
  29+ 9478 4F                               ld 		c,a
  30+ 9479 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  31+ 947A 90                               sub 	b
  32+ 947B 47                               ld 		b,a
  33+ 947C C9                               ret
  34+ 947D
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 580  947D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 947D              ;   K(3 2 1 0)           The result of the division
   2+ 947D              ;   X                    X is preserved
   3+ 947D
   4+ 947D              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) where zsign hi lo is in DE with zsign leading hi
   5+ 947D 00 00 00 00  varQRS                 DS      4
   6+ 9481 00 00 00     varAPP                  DS     3
   7+ 9484
   8+ 9484                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  neds rewrite of whoel DIDV3B2"
   9+ 9484              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO OF WHOLE DIVD3B2
  10+ 9484              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO
  11+ 9484
  12+ 9484              ; b = varR, c= varQ
  13+ 9484              Requ256mulAdivQ_6502:
  14+ 9484 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                   \ Shift A to the left
  15+ 9486 DA 9B 94                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  16+ 9489                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  16+ 9489 3F          >                        ccf
  17+ 948A                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  17+ 948A B9          >                        cp      c
  17+ 948B DA 90 94    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  18+ 948E                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  19+ 948E 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  20+ 948F                                      ClearCarryFlag
  20+ 948F B7          >                        or a
  21+ 9490              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  21+ 9490 3F          >                        ccf
  22+ 9491 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  23+ 9493 DA 84 94                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  24+ 9496 78                                   ld      a,b
  25+ 9497 32 AE EF                             ld      (Rvar),a
  26+ 949A C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  27+ 949B 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  28+ 949C                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  28+ 949C 37          >                        scf
  29+ 949D CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  30+ 949F DA 84 94                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  31+ 94A2 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  32+ 94A3 32 AE EF                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  33+ 94A6 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  34+ 94A7 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  35+ 94A9 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  36+ 94AC 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; as we are using b as varR
  37+ 94AD                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  37+ 94AD 37          >                        scf
  38+ 94AE C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  39+ 94AF                             DISPLAY "TODO : Merge Requ256mulAdivQ_6502  RequAmul256divQ"
  40+ 94AF              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  41+ 94AF              RequAmul256divQ:
  42+ 94AF F5           BFRDIV:                 push	af
  43+ 94B0 3A AC 7F                             ld		a,(varQ)
  44+ 94B3 4F                                   ld		c,a
  45+ 94B4 F1                                   pop		af
  46+ 94B5 FE 00                                cp		0
  47+ 94B7 CA CE 94                             jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  48+ 94BA 2E 00        RequAmul256divC:        ld		l,0
  49+ 94BC 67                                   ld		h,a
  50+ 94BD 06 10        HL_Div_Cold:			ld b,16			; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  51+ 94BF AF                                   xor a
  52+ 94C0 29           LOOPPOINT:	            add hl,hl
  53+ 94C1 17                                   rla
  54+ 94C2 B9                                   cp c
  55+ 94C3 38 02                                jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  56+ 94C5 2C                                   inc l
  57+ 94C6 91                                   sub c
  58+ 94C7 10 F7        SKIPINCSUB:             djnz LOOPPOINT
  59+ 94C9 7D                                   ld		a,l
  60+ 94CA 32 AD 7F                             ld 		(varR),a
  61+ 94CD C9                                   ret
  62+ 94CE 32 AD 7F     HLDIVC_0_BY:            ld		(varR),a
  63+ 94D1 C9                                   ret
  64+ 94D2
  65+ 94D2
  66+ 94D2 21 AC 7F     Amul256DivQ:            ld      hl,varQ                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
  67+ 94D5 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
  68+ 94D6 B9                                   cp      c
  69+ 94D7                                      FlipCarryFlag
  69+ 94D7 3F          >                        ccf
  70+ 94D8 DA 00 95                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  71+ 94DB 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
  72+ 94DD CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
  73+ 94DF DA F4 94                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  74+ 94E2                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  74+ 94E2 3F          >                        ccf
  75+ 94E3                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  75+ 94E3 B9          >                        cp      c
  75+ 94E4 DA E9 94    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  76+ 94E7                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  77+ 94E7 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  78+ 94E8                                      ClearCarryFlag
  78+ 94E8 B7          >                        or a
  79+ 94E9              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  79+ 94E9 3F          >                        ccf
  80+ 94EA CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  81+ 94EC DA DD 94                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  82+ 94EF 78                                   ld      a,b
  83+ 94F0 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  84+ 94F3 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  85+ 94F4 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  86+ 94F5                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  86+ 94F5 37          >                        scf
  87+ 94F6 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  88+ 94F8 DA DD 94                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  89+ 94FB 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  90+ 94FC 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a                ; .
  91+ 94FF C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  92+ 9500 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  93+ 9502 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  94+ 9505                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  94+ 9505 37          >                        scf
  95+ 9506 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  96+ 9507
  97+ 9507
  98+ 9507 00           DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG:       DB      0
  99+ 9508
 100+ 9508 7B           DIV3B2DE:               ld      a,e                         ; load QRS with Z sign hi lo
 101+ 9509 32 7F 94                             ld      (varQRS+2),a
 102+ 950C 7A                                   ld      a,d
 103+ 950D E6 7F                                and     $7F
 104+ 950F 32 7E 94                             ld      (varQRS+1),a
 105+ 9512 7A                                   ld      a,d
 106+ 9513 E6 80                                and     $80
 107+ 9515 32 7D 94                             ld      (varQRS),a
 108+ 9518 C3 1E 95                             jp      DVID3B
 109+ 951B              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) = A P[1 0 ] / (SRQ)
 110+ 951B              ; We don't use zlo and assume its already loaded into SRQ
 111+ 951B 32 AE 7E     DVID3B2:                ld      (varP+2),a                  ;STA P+2                \ Set P+2 = A
 112+ 951E                                                                          ; LDA INWK+6             \ Set Q = z_lo
 113+ 951E                                                                          ; STA Q
 114+ 951E                                                                          ; LDA INWK+7             \ Set R = z_hi
 115+ 951E                                                                          ; STA R
 116+ 951E                                                                          ; LDA INWK+8             \ Set S = z_sign
 117+ 951E                                                                          ; STA S
 118+ 951E              ;  Given the above assignments, we now want to calculate K(3 2 1 0) = P(2 1 0) / (S R Q)
 119+ 951E 3A AC 7E     DVID3B:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                 \ Make sure P(2 1 0) is at least 1
 120+ 9521 F6 01                                or      1                           ; ORA #1
 121+ 9523 32 AC 7E                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STA P
 122+ 9526              ;--- t = sign of P2 xor S (i.e. sign of result) ------------;
 123+ 9526 3A AE 7E                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set T to the sign of P+2 * S (i.e. the sign of the
 124+ 9529 21 AE 7F                             ld      hl, varS                    ; EOR S                  \ result) and store it in T
 125+ 952C AE                                   xor     (hl)
 126+ 952D E6 80                                and     $80                         ; AND #%10000000
 127+ 952F 32 C8 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T
 128+ 9532              ;--- New bit added to aviod a divde by 0 -------------------;
 129+ 9532 3A AC 7F     .CheckQRSAtLeast1:      ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
 130+ 9535 21 AD 7F                             ld      hl,varR                     ;
 131+ 9538 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ;
 132+ 9539 C2 41 95                             jp      nz,.DVL9Prep                ;
 133+ 953C 3E 01                                ld      a,1                         ;
 134+ 953E 32 AC 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;
 135+ 9541              ; A P(1) P(0) = ABS P(2 1 0)
 136+ 9541 06 00        .DVL9Prep:              ld      b,0                         ; LDY #0                 \ Set Y = 0 to store the scale factor (use b as Y)
 137+ 9543 3A AE 7E                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Clear the sign bit of P+2, so the division can be done
 138+ 9546 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111         \ with positive numbers and we'll set the correct sign below, once all the maths is done
 139+ 9548              ; We now shift (A P+1 P) left until A >= 64, counting the number of shifts in Y. This makes the top part of the division as large as possible, thus retaining as
 140+ 9548              ; much accuracy as we can.  When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the number of places in Y, and in the correct direction
 141+ 9548                                      DISPLAY "TODO DVL9 and DVL6 move P and QRS into registers for faster shift"
 142+ 9548              ;-- while A < 64 shift A P(1) P(0) -------------------------;
 143+ 9548 FE 40        .DVL9:                  cp      64                          ; CMP #64                \ If A >= 64, jump down to DV14
 144+ 954A D2 5B 95                             jp      nc, .DV14                   ; BCS DV14
 145+ 954D 21 AC 7E                             ld      hl,varP                     ; ASL P                  \ Shift (A P+1 P) to the left
 146+ 9550 CB 26                                sla     (hl)
 147+ 9552 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL P+1
 148+ 9553 CB 16                                rl      (hl)
 149+ 9555 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
 150+ 9557 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
 151+ 9558 C3 48 95                             jp      .DVL9                       ; BNE DVL9               \ Loop up to DVL9 (this BNE is effectively a JMP, as Y will never be zero)
 152+ 955B              ; If we get here, A >= 64 and contains the highest byte of the numerator, scaled up by the number of left shifts in Y (b in our code)
 153+ 955B 32 AE 7E     .DV14:                  ld      (varP+2),a                  ; Store A in P+2, so we now have the scaled value of the numerator in P(2 1 0)
 154+ 955E 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; LDA S                  \ Set A = |S|
 155+ 9561 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111
 156+ 9563                                      ;nop                                ;  BMI DV9               \ If bit 7 of A is set, jump down to DV9 (which can never happen)
 157+ 9563              ; We now shift (S R Q) left until bit 7 of S is set, reducing Y by the number of shifts. This makes the bottom part of the division as large as possible, thus
 158+ 9563              ; retaining as much accuracy as we can. When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the total number of places in Y, and in the correct
 159+ 9563              ; direction, to give us the correct result
 160+ 9563              ; We set A to |S| above, so the following actually shifts (A R Q)
 161+ 9563 05           .DVL6:                  dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y (b)
 162+ 9564 21 AC 7F                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; ASL Q                  \ Shift (A R Q) to the left
 163+ 9567 CB 26                                sla     (hl)                        ; .
 164+ 9569 21 AD 7F                             ld      hl,varR                     ; ROL R
 165+ 956C CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 166+ 956E CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
 167+ 9570 F2 63 95                             jp      p,.DVL6                     ; BPL DVL6               \ Loop up to DVL6 to do another shift, until bit 7 of A is set and we can't shift left any further
 168+ 9573              ; We have now shifted both the numerator and denominator left as far as they will go, keeping a tally of the overall scale factor of the various shifts in Y. We
 169+ 9573              ; can now divide just the two highest bytes to get our result
 170+ 9573 32 AC 7F     .DV9:                   ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A, the highest byte of the denominator
 171+ 9576 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; for Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 as it uses c as Q
 172+ 9577 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; preserve shift register in DEVD3B_SHIFT_REG
 173+ 9578 32 07 95                             ld      (DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG),a
 174+ 957B              ; Note in Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 we use B as R Var for shift register
 175+ 957B 06 FE                                ld      b,254                       ; LDA #254               \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can pass this to
 176+ 957D 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a                    ; STA R                  \ LL31 to act as the bit counter in the division
 177+ 9580 3A AE 7E                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set A to the highest byte of the numerator
 178+ 9583 CD 84 94                             call    Requ256mulAdivQ_6502        ; JSR LL31               \ Call LL31 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q which means result is in b
 179+ 9586              ; The result of our division is now in R, so we just need to shift it back by the scale factor in Y
 180+ 9586                                      ZeroA                               ; LDA #0                \ Set K(3 2 1) = 0 to hold the result (we populate K)
 180+ 9586 AF          >                        xor a
 181+ 9587 32 C0 7F                             ld      (varK+1),a                  ; STA K+1               \ next)
 182+ 958A 32 C1 7F                             ld      (varK+2),a                  ; STA K+2
 183+ 958D 32 C2 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 184+ 9590 3A 07 95                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)        ; TYA                   \ If Y (shift counter in b) is positive, jump to DV12
 185+ 9593 B7                                   or      a                           ; .                      we want to check the sign or if its zero
 186+ 9594 CA BF 95                             jp      z,.DV13                     ; Optimisation to save a second jump from DV12 to DV13
 187+ 9597 F2 CA 95                             jp      p,.DV12                     ; BPL DV12
 188+ 959A              ; If we get here then Y is negative, so we need to shift the result R to the left by Y places, and then set the correct sign for the result
 189+ 959A                                      DISPLAY "TODO check oprimisation here for var r  in b"
 190+ 959A 48                                   ld      c,b
 191+ 959B 3A 07 95                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 192+ 959E 47                                   ld      b,a
 193+ 959F 79                                   ld      a,c
 194+ 95A0                                      ; OPTIM ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 195+ 95A0 CB 27        .DVL8:                  sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Shift (K+3 K+2 K+1 A) left
 196+ 95A2 21 C0 7F                             ld      hl,varK+1                   ; ROL K+1
 197+ 95A5 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 198+ 95A7 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+2
 199+ 95A8 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 200+ 95AA 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+3
 201+ 95AB CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 202+ 95AD 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
 203+ 95AE C2 A0 95                             jp      nz,.DVL8                    ; BNE DVL8               \ Loop back to DVL8 until we have shifted left by Y places
 204+ 95B1 32 BF 7F                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 205+ 95B4 3A C2 7F                             ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDA K+3                \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 206+ 95B7 21 C8 7F                             ld      hl,varT                     ; ORA T                  \ correct sign for the result
 207+ 95BA B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 208+ 95BB 32 C2 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 209+ 95BE C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 210+ 95BF              ; If we get here then Y is zero, so we don't need to shift the result R, we just need to set the correct sign for the result
 211+ 95BF 78           .DV13:                  ld      a,b; varR)                  ; LDA R                  \ Store R in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 212+ 95C0 32 BF 7F                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K
 213+ 95C3 3A C8 7F                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 214+ 95C6 32 C2 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 215+ 95C9 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 216+ 95CA              ; if we get here U is positive but still could be zero, now this is handled in DV9
 217+ 95CA              .DV12:                  ; nop                               ; BEQ DV13               \ We jumped here having set A to the scale factor in Y, so this jumps up to DV13 if Y = 0
 218+ 95CA              ; If we get here then Y is positive and non-zero, so we need to shift the result R to the right by Y places and then set the correct sign for the result. We also
 219+ 95CA              ; know that K(3 2 1) will stay 0, as we are shifting the lowest byte to the right, so no set bits will make their way into the top three bytes
 220+ 95CA                                      ;ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 221+ 95CA 48                                   ld      c,b
 222+ 95CB 3A 07 95                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 223+ 95CE 47                                   ld      b,a
 224+ 95CF 79                                   ld      a,c
 225+ 95D0 CB 3F        .DVL10:                 srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ Shift A right
 226+ 95D2 05                                   dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y
 227+ 95D3 C2 D0 95                             jp      nz,.DVL10                   ; BNE DVL10              \ Loop back to DVL10 until we have shifted right by Y places
 228+ 95D6 32 BF 7F                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store the shifted A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 229+ 95D9 3A C8 7F                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 230+ 95DC 32 C2 7F                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 231+ 95DF C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 232+ 95E0              ;
 233+ 95E0              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
 234+ 95E0              ;   Loop:   A << 2
 235+ 95E0              ;           if carry was 0
 236+ 95E0              ;               if a >= D
 237+ 95E0              ;                   A = A - D
 238+ 95E0              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
 239+ 95E0              ;           else
 240+ 95E0
 241+ 95E0              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
 242+ 95E0              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
 243+ 95E0              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
 244+ 95E0              ;
 245+ 95E0              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 246+ 95E0              ;
 247+ 95E0              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
 248+ 95E0              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
 249+ 95E0
 250+ 95E0 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 251+ 95E1 3A AC 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
 252+ 95E4 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
 253+ 95E5 3A AC 7E                             ld      a,(varP)
 254+ 95E8 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 255+ 95E9                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 256+ 95E9 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 257+ 95EA B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 258+ 95EB 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 259+ 95ED 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
 260+ 95EE A7                                   and     a                       ;
 261+ 95EF 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
 262+ 95F1 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 263+ 95F2 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 264+ 95F3 E6 80                                and     $80
 265+ 95F5 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 266+ 95F6 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 267+ 95F8 06 10                                ld      b,16
 268+ 95FA                                      ShiftDELeft1
 268+ 95FA CB 23       >			   sla e
 268+ 95FC CB 12       >			   rl  d
 269+ 95FE CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 270+ 9600 CB 39                                srl     c
 271+ 9602 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 272+ 9604                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 272+ 9604 B9          >                        cp      c
 272+ 9605 DA 0B 96    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 273+ 9608                                      ClearCarryFlag
 273+ 9608 B7          >                        or a
 274+ 9609 99                                   sbc     c
 275+ 960A                                      ClearCarryFlag
 275+ 960A B7          >                        or a
 276+ 960B 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 277+ 960C CB 13                                rl      e
 278+ 960E CB 12                                rl      d
 279+ 9610 05                                   dec     b
 280+ 9611 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 281+ 9613 7B                                   ld      a,e
 282+ 9614 B5                                   or      l
 283+ 9615 42                                   ld      b,d
 284+ 9616 C9                                   ret
 285+ 9617              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 285+ 9617 AF          >                        xor a
 286+ 9618 47                                   ld      b,a
 287+ 9619 C9                                   ret
 288+ 961A 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
 289+ 961C 47                                   ld      b,a
 290+ 961D C9                                   ret
 291+ 961E
 292+ 961E 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 293+ 961F 3A AC 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
 294+ 9622 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
 295+ 9624 3A AC 7E                             ld      a,(varP)
 296+ 9627 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 297+ 9628                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 298+ 9628 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 299+ 9629 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 300+ 962A 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 301+ 962C 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 302+ 962D A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 303+ 962E E6 80                                and     $80
 304+ 9630 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 305+ 9631 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 306+ 9633 06 10                                ld      b,16
 307+ 9635                                      ShiftDELeft1
 307+ 9635 CB 23       >			   sla e
 307+ 9637 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 308+ 9639 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 309+ 963B CB 39                                srl     c
 310+ 963D CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 311+ 963F                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 311+ 963F B9          >                        cp      c
 311+ 9640 DA 46 96    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 312+ 9643                                      ClearCarryFlag
 312+ 9643 B7          >                        or a
 313+ 9644 99                                   sbc     c
 314+ 9645                                      ClearCarryFlag
 314+ 9645 B7          >                        or a
 315+ 9646 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 316+ 9647 CB 13                                rl      e
 317+ 9649 CB 12                                rl      d
 318+ 964B 05                                   dec     b
 319+ 964C 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 320+ 964E 7B                                   ld      a,e
 321+ 964F B5                                   or      l
 322+ 9650 42                                   ld      b,d
 323+ 9651 C9                                   ret
 324+ 9652              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 324+ 9652 AF          >                        xor a
 325+ 9653 47                                   ld      b,a
 326+ 9654 C9                                   ret
 327+ 9655
 328+ 9655 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 329+ 9656 15                                   dec     d
 330+ 9657 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 331+ 9659 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 332+ 965B 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 333+ 965D 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 334+ 965E B3                                   or      e
 335+ 965F 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 336+ 9661 14                                   inc     d
 337+ 9662 15                                   dec     d
 338+ 9663 CD B5 97                             call    BC_Div_DE
 339+ 9666                                      ZeroA
 339+ 9666 AF          >                        xor a
 340+ 9667 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 341+ 9668 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 342+ 966A 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 343+ 966B C9                                   ret
 344+ 966C AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 345+ 966D 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 346+ 966E 67                                   ld      h,a
 347+ 966F 6F                                   ld      l,a
 348+ 9670 C9                                   ret
 349+ 9671 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 350+ 9673 67                                   ld      h,a
 351+ 9674 6F                                   ld      l,a
 352+ 9675                                      SetCarryFlag
 352+ 9675 37          >                        scf
 353+ 9676 C9                                   ret
 354+ 9677
 355+ 9677              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 356+ 9677                          IFDEF HLEquAmul256DivD_Used
 357+ 9677 ~            HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 358+ 9677 ~                                    sla		a							;
 359+ 9677 ~                                    ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 360+ 9677 ~            .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 361+ 9677 ~                                    jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 362+ 9677 ~                                    cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 363+ 9677 ~                                    jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 364+ 9677 ~            .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 365+ 9677 ~                                    sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 366+ 9677 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 367+ 9677 ~            .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 368+ 9677 ~                                    rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 369+ 9677 ~                                    djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 370+ 9677 ~            .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 371+ 9677 ~                                    jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 372+ 9677 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 373+ 9677 ~            .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 374+ 9677 ~                                    ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 375+ 9677 ~            .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 376+ 9677 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 377+ 9677 ~                                    cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 378+ 9677 ~                                    jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 379+ 9677 ~                                    sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 380+ 9677 ~            .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 381+ 9677 ~                                    rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 382+ 9677 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 383+ 9677 ~                                    ret
 384+ 9677 ~            .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 385+ 9677 ~                                    SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 386+ 9677 ~                                    rl      l                           ;
 387+ 9677 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 388+ 9677 ~                                    ret
 389+ 9677 ~            .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 390+ 9677 ~                                    ret
 391+ 9677                          ENDIF
 392+ 9677
 393+ 9677 BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 394+ 9678 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 395+ 967A 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 396+ 967C 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 397+ 967E CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 398+ 9680 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 399+ 9682                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 399+ 9682 BA          >                        cp      d
 399+ 9683 DA 88 96    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 400+ 9686 92                                   sub     d
 401+ 9687                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 401+ 9687 B7          >                        or a
 402+ 9688              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 402+ 9688 3F          >                        ccf
 403+ 9689 CB 13                                rl      e
 404+ 968B 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 405+ 968D 7B                                   ld      a,e
 406+ 968E C9                                   ret
 407+ 968F 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 408+ 9690                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 408+ 9690 37          >                        scf
 409+ 9691 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 410+ 9693 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 411+ 9695 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 412+ 9696 C9                                   ret
 413+ 9697 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 414+ 9699 C9                                   ret
 415+ 969A 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 416+ 969C C9                                   ret
 417+ 969D
 418+ 969D              ; Divide 8-bit values
 419+ 969D              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 420+ 969D              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 421+ 969D              ;
 422+ 969D              ;;;Div8:
 423+ 969D              ;;;    xor a
 424+ 969D              ;;;    ld b,8
 425+ 969D              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 426+ 969D              ;;;    rl e
 427+ 969D              ;;;    rla
 428+ 969D              ;;;    sub c
 429+ 969D              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 430+ 969D              ;;;    add a,c
 431+ 969D              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 432+ 969D              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 433+ 969D              ;;;    ld b,a0
 434+ 969D              ;;;    ld a,e
 435+ 969D              ;;;    rla
 436+ 969D              ;;;    cpl
 437+ 969D              ;;;    ret
 438+ 969D
 439+ 969D              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 440+ 969D              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 441+ 969D              ;;         A is a copy of E
 442+ 969D              ;;         HL is the remainder
 443+ 969D              ;;         BC is not changed
 444+ 969D              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 445+ 969D              ;140 bytes
 446+ 969D              ;145cc
 447+ 969D
 448+ 969D              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 449+ 969D ~                                rla
 450+ 969D ~                                adc     hl,hl
 451+ 969D ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 452+ 969D ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 453+ 969D ~                                add     hl,bc
 454+ 969D                                  ENDM
 455+ 969D
 456+ 969D AF           DEequDEDivBC:       xor a
 457+ 969E ED 62                            sbc hl,hl
 458+ 96A0 7A                               ld a,d
 459+ 96A1                                  MacroDEDivBC
 459+ 96A1 17          >                    rla
 459+ 96A2 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 459+ 96A4 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 459+ 96A6 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 459+ 96A8 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 460+ 96A9                                  MacroDEDivBC
 460+ 96A9 17          >                    rla
 460+ 96AA ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 460+ 96AC ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 460+ 96AE 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 460+ 96B0 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 461+ 96B1                                  MacroDEDivBC
 461+ 96B1 17          >                    rla
 461+ 96B2 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 461+ 96B4 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 461+ 96B6 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 461+ 96B8 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 462+ 96B9                                  MacroDEDivBC
 462+ 96B9 17          >                    rla
 462+ 96BA ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 462+ 96BC ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 462+ 96BE 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 462+ 96C0 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 463+ 96C1                                  MacroDEDivBC
 463+ 96C1 17          >                    rla
 463+ 96C2 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 463+ 96C4 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 463+ 96C6 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 463+ 96C8 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 464+ 96C9                                  MacroDEDivBC
 464+ 96C9 17          >                    rla

 464+ 96CC ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 464+ 96CE 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 464+ 96D0 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 465+ 96D1                                  MacroDEDivBC
 465+ 96D1 17          >                    rla
 465+ 96D2 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl

 475+ 96FD                                  MacroDEDivBC
 475+ 96FD 17          >                    rla
 475+ 96FE ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 475+ 9700 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc

 476+ 9705 17          >                    rla

 477+ 9712 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 477+ 9714 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 478+ 9715                                  MacroDEDivBC
 478+ 9715 17          >                    rla
 478+ 9716 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 478+ 9718 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 478+ 971A 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 478+ 971C 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 479+ 971D                                  MacroDEDivBC
 479+ 971D 17          >                    rla
 479+ 971E ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 479+ 9720 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 479+ 9722 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 479+ 9724 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 480+ 9725 17                               rla
 481+ 9726 2F                               cpl
 482+ 9727 5F                               ld e,a
 483+ 9728 C9                               ret
 484+ 9729              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 485+ 9729              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 486+ 9729              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 487+ 9729              ; Our use
 488+ 9729              ; BC = A0
 489+ 9729              ; DE = 0C
 490+ 9729              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 491+ 9729              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 491+ 9729 B9          >                        cp     c
 491+ 972A D2 55 97    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 492+ 972D 47                                   ld      b,a
 493+ 972E 59                                   ld      e,c
 494+ 972F 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 495+ 9731 16 00                                ld      d,0
 496+ 9733 C3 40 97                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 497+ 9736 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 498+ 9737 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 499+ 9739 21 AC 7F                             ld      hl,varQ
 500+ 973C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 501+ 973D 16 00                                ld      d,0
 502+ 973F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 503+ 9740              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 504+ 9740 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 505+ 9743 78                                   ld      a,b
 506+ 9744 06 10                                ld      b,16
 507+ 9746 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 508+ 9748 17                                   rla			; ...
 509+ 9749 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 510+ 974B ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 511+ 974D 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 512+ 974F 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 513+ 9750 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 514+ 9751 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 515+ 9753 47                                   ld   b,a
 516+ 9754 C9                                   ret
 517+ 9755 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 518+ 9758 C9                                   ret
 519+ 9759              ; switch to logarithm version
 520+ 9759              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 521+ 9759 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 522+ 975B AF                                   xor a
 523+ 975C CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 524+ 975E 17                                   rla
 525+ 975F BA                                   cp d
 526+ 9760 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 526+ 9762
 527+ 9762 0C                                   inc c
 528+ 9763 92                                   sub d
 529+ 9764 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 530+ 9766 C9                                   ret
 531+ 9767              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 532+ 9767 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 533+ 9769 AF                                   xor a
 534+ 976A CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 535+ 976C CB 14                                rl	h
 536+ 976E              ;    add hl,hl
 537+ 976E 17                                   rla
 538+ 976F B9                                   cp c
 539+ 9770 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 540+ 9772 2C                                   inc l
 541+ 9773 91                                   sub c
 542+ 9774 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 543+ 9776 C9                                   ret
 544+ 9777              ;
 545+ 9777              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 546+ 9777              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 547+ 9777              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 548+ 9777              ;
 549+ 9777              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 550+ 9777 ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 551+ 9777 ~                                    rla				; ...
 552+ 9777 ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 553+ 9777 ~                                    jr	1F
 554+ 9777 ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 555+ 9777 ~            1:
 556+ 9777 ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 557+ 9777                                      ENDM
 558+ 9777
 559+ 9777              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 560+ 9777 ~                                    rl  e
 561+ 9777 ~                                    rla
 562+ 9777 ~                                    sub c
 563+ 9777 ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 564+ 9777 ~                                    add a,c
 565+ 9777 ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 566+ 9777                                      ENDM
 567+ 9777
 568+ 9777              ; Switch to a logarithm version
 569+ 9777              ; Divide E by divider C Out: A = result, B = rest
 570+ 9777              E_Div_C:                ZeroA
 570+ 9777 AF          >                        xor a
 571+ 9778                                      EDivC_Iteration
 571+ 9778 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 571+ 977A 17          >                        rla

 586+ 97B5              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 587+ 97B5 ~                                    rla
 588+ 97B5 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 589+ 97B5 ~                                    add	    hl,de
 590+ 97B5 ~                                    jr	    c,1F

 592+ 97B5 ~            1:

 594+ 97B5
 595+ 97B5
 596+ 97B5              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 597+ 97B5              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 598+ 97B5              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 599+ 97B5              ;min: 738cc
 600+ 97B5              ;max: 898cc
 601+ 97B5              ;avg: 818cc
 602+ 97B5              ;144 bytes
 603+ 97B5 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 604+ 97B6 67                                   ld h,a
 605+ 97B7 6F                                   ld l,a
 606+ 97B8 93                                   sub e
 607+ 97B9 5F                                   ld e,a
 608+ 97BA 9F                                   sbc a,a
 609+ 97BB 92                                   sub d
 610+ 97BC 57                                   ld d,a
 611+ 97BD 78                                   ld a,b
 612+ 97BE                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 612+ 97BE 17          >                        rla
 612+ 97BF ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 612+ 97C1 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 612+ 97C2 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 612+ 97C4 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 612+ 97C6             >1:
 613+ 97C6                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration

 613+ 97C7 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl

 613+ 97CA 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 613+ 97CC ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de

 634+ 9844 78           Floor_DivQSigned:       ld      a,b             ; save resultant sign
 635+ 9845 AA                                   xor     d               ;
 636+ 9846 E6 80                                and     $80             ;
 637+ 9848 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a           ;
 638+ 984A 78                                   ld      a,b
 639+ 984B E6 7F                                and     $7F
 640+ 984D 47                                   ld      b,a
 641+ 984E 7A                                   ld      a,d
 642+ 984F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 643+ 9851 57                                   ld      d,a
 644+ 9852 CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ
 645+ 9855 78                                   ld      a,b
 646+ 9856 DD B4                                or      ixh
 647+ 9858 47                                   ld      b,a
 648+ 9859 C9                                   ret
 649+ 985A
 650+ 985A
 651+ 985A
 652+ 985A              ; BC = BC / DE
 653+ 985A              ; HL = BC % DE
 654+ 985A              ; if HL > 0 BC -= 1
 655+ 985A 78           Floor_DivQ:             ld      a,b
 656+ 985B B1                                   or      c
 657+ 985C 28 26                                jr      z, .divide0By   ; if bc is zero just return as result will be zero
 658+ 985E 7A                                   ld      a,d
 659+ 985F B3                                   or      e
 660+ 9860 28 26                                jr      z, .divideBy0
 661+ 9862 D5                                   push    de
 662+ 9863 CD B5 97     .DoDivide:              call    BC_Div_DE       ; bc(q0) = bc / de , hl(r0) = bc %de
 663+ 9866 D1                                   pop     de              ; get divisor back to test
 664+ 9867 CB 7A                                bit     7,d             ; if divisor <0 or = 0 goto else branch
 665+ 9869 C2 79 98                             jp      nz,.deLTE0
 666+ 986C 7A                                   ld      a,d
 667+ 986D B3                                   or      e
 668+ 986E CA 79 98                             jp      z,.deLTE0
 669+ 9871 CB 7C        .deGT0:                 bit     7,h             ; if remainder >=0 return with no adjustment
 670+ 9873 C8                                   ret     z               ; if remainder was not negative then all done
 671+ 9874 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 672+ 9875                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 672+ 9875 B7          >                        or a
 673+ 9876 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 674+ 9878 C9                                   ret
 675+ 9879 CB 7C        .deLTE0:                bit     7,h             ; if remainder <= 0 retun with no adjustment
 676+ 987B C8                                   ret     z               ; (return if negative)
 677+ 987C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 678+ 987D B5                                   or      l               ; (return if zero)
 679+ 987E C8                                   ret     z
 680+ 987F 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 681+ 9880                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 681+ 9880 B7          >                        or a
 682+ 9881 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 683+ 9883 C9                                   ret
 684+ 9884 21 00 00     .divide0By:             ld      hl,0            ; hl = 0, bc is already 0
 685+ 9887 C9                                   ret
 686+ 9888 21 00 00     .divideBy0:             ld      hl,0
 687+ 988B 01 01 00                             ld      bc,1
 688+ 988E C9                                   ret

 690+ 988F
 691+ 988F              L_DIV_0_ITERATION:      MACRO
 692+ 988F ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 693+ 988F ~                                    ex      de,hl
 694+ 988F ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 695+ 988F ~                                    ex      de,hl
 696+ 988F ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 697+ 988F ~                                    jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 698+ 988F ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 699+ 988F ~            .skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 700+ 988F ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 701+ 988F ~                                    ex      de,hl
 702+ 988F ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 703+ 988F ~                                    ex      de,hl
 704+ 988F ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 705+ 988F ~                                    jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 706+ 988F ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 707+ 988F ~            .skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 708+ 988F                                      ENDM

 727+ 99B8 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 728+ 99BB              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 728+ 99BB CB 25       >			   sla l

 730+ 99C0 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 731+ 99C2                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 731+ 99C2 B9          >                        cp      c
 731+ 99C3 DA CE 99    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 732+ 99C6 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 733+ 99C7 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 734+ 99C8 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 735+ 99C9 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 736+ 99CA DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 737+ 99CC 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 738+ 99CD 3F                                   ccf
 739+ 99CE              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 739+ 99CE CB 13       >               rl  e
 739+ 99D0 CB 12       >               rl  d
 740+ 99D2 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 741+ 99D4 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 742+ 99D5 C9                                   ret
 743+ 99D6
 744+ 99D6
 745+ 99D6 AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 746+ 99D7 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 747+ 99D9 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 748+ 99DA 17                                   rla
 749+ 99DB 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 750+ 99DD B9                                   cp	c
 751+ 99DE 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 752+ 99E0 91                                   sub	c
 753+ 99E1 2C                                   inc	l
 754+ 99E2 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 755+ 99E4 C9                                   ret
 756+ 99E5              ;l_div, signed division
 757+ 99E5              ; comes in with DE and HL
 758+ 99E5              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 759+ 99E5 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 760+ 99E6 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 761+ 99E7 C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 762+ 99E8 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 763+ 99E9 7A                                   ld      a,d
 764+ 99EA B7                                   or      a
 765+ 99EB F2 F4 99                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 766+ 99EE              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 766+ 99EE AF          >					xor 	a
 766+ 99EF 93          >                    sub 	e
 766+ 99F0 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 766+ 99F1 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 766+ 99F2 92          >                    sub 	d
 766+ 99F3 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 767+ 99F4 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 768+ 99F5 B7                                   or      a
 769+ 99F6 F2 FF 99                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 770+ 99F9                                      macronegate16bc
 770+ 99F9 AF          >					xor 	a
 770+ 99FA 91          >                    sub 	c
 770+ 99FB 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 770+ 99FC 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 770+ 99FD 90          >                    sub 	b
 770+ 99FE 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 771+ 99FF CD 8F 98     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 772+ 9A02                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 773+ 9A02 C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 774+ 9A03 78                                   ld      a,b
 775+ 9A04 A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 776+ 9A05 F2 0E 9A                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 777+ 9A08                                      macronegate16hl
 777+ 9A08 AF          >					xor 	a
 777+ 9A09 95          >					sub 	l
 777+ 9A0A 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 777+ 9A0B 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 777+ 9A0C 94          >					sub 	h
 777+ 9A0D 67          >					ld 		h,a
 778+ 9A0E 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 779+ 9A0F B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 780+ 9A10 F0                                   ret     p
 781+ 9A11                                      macronegate16de
 781+ 9A11 AF          >					xor 	a
 781+ 9A12 93          >                    sub 	e
 781+ 9A13 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 781+ 9A14 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 781+ 9A15 92          >                    sub 	d
 781+ 9A16 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 782+ 9A17 C9                                   ret
 783+ 9A18
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 581  9A18                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 9A18              asm_tis2:
   2+ 9A18              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 9A18              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 9A18 F5           	push af
   5+ 9A19 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 9A1B 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 9A1C 3A AC 7F     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 9A1F 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 9A20 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 9A21 BB           	cp e
  11+ 9A22 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 9A24 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 9A26 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 9A28 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 9A29 3A AC 7F     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 9A2C 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 9A2D CD 67 97     	call asm_div16
  18+ 9A30 F1           	pop af
  19+ 9A31 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 9A33 B5           	or l
  21+ 9A34 C9           	ret
  22+ 9A35              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 9A35 F1           	pop af
  24+ 9A36 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 9A38 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 9A3A C9           	ret
  27+ 9A3B
  28+ 9A3B
  29+ 9A3B              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 9A3B              squareregfx:
  31+ 9A3B 3A C6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 9A3E 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 9A3F 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 9A40 ED 30        	mul
  35+ 9A42 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 9A43              squareregfy:
  37+ 9A43 3A C8 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 9A46 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 9A47 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 9A48 ED 30        	mul
  41+ 9A4A 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 9A4B              squareregfz:
  43+ 9A4B 3A CA C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 9A4E 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 9A4F 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 9A50 ED 30        	mul
  47+ 9A52 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 9A53 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 9A54              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 9A54 CD 86 93     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 9A57 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 9A58 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 9A59 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 9A5A              normfx:
  55+ 9A5A 3A C6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 9A5D E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 9A5E 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 9A5F 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 9A60 CD 18 9A     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 9A63 32 C6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 9A66              normfy:
  62+ 9A66 3A C8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 9A69 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 9A6A 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 9A6B 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 9A6C CD 18 9A     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 9A6F 32 C8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 9A72              normfz:
  69+ 9A72 3A CA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 9A75 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 9A76 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 9A77 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 9A78 CD 18 9A     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 9A7B 32 CA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 9A7E              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 9A7E C9           	ret
  77+ 9A7F
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 582  9A7F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 9A7F              ; Input:
   2+ 9A7F              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 9A7F              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 9A7F              ; Output:
   5+ 9A7F              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 9A7F              ;
   7+ 9A7F              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 9A7F              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 9A7F              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 9A7F              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 9A7F              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 9A7F              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 9A7F              ;
  14+ 9A7F
  15+ 9A7F
  16+ 9A7F E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 9A80 A7                               and     a
  18+ 9A81 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 9A83 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 9A85 E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 9A86 C9                               ret
  22+ 9A87
  23+ 9A87 E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 9A88 A7                               and     a
  25+ 9A89 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 9A8B ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 9A8D E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 9A8E C9                               ret
  29+ 9A8F
  30+ 9A8F
  31+ 9A8F              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 9A8F              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 9A8F 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 9A90 AA                               xor d
  35+ 9A91 FA 9B 9A                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 9A94 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 9A96 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 9A98 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 9A99                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 9A99 37          >                        scf
  40+ 9A9A C9                               ret
  41+ 9A9B CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 9A9D 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 9A9F              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 9A9F B7          >                        or a
  44+ 9AA0 C9                               ret
  45+ 9AA1 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 9AA2                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 9AA2 B7          >                        or a
  47+ 9AA3 C9                               ret
  48+ 9AA4              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 9AA4 37          >                        scf
  49+ 9AA5 C9                               ret
  50+ 9AA6
  51+ 9AA6              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 9AA6 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 9AA7 BA                               cp  d
  54+ 9AA8 C0                               ret nz
  55+ 9AA9 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 9AAA BB                               cp  e
  57+ 9AAB C9                               ret
  58+ 9AAC
  59+ 9AAC
  60+ 9AAC
  61+ 9AAC 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 9AAD A8                               xor b
  63+ 9AAE FA B7 9A                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 9AB1 ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 9AB3 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 9AB5              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 9AB5 37          >                        scf
  67+ 9AB6 C9                               ret
  68+ 9AB7 CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 9AB9 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 9ABB              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 9ABB B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9ABC C9                               ret
  72+ 9ABD
  73+ 9ABD              CompareHLDESigned:
  74+ 9ABD E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  75+ 9ABE A7                               and     a
  76+ 9ABF ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 9AC1 E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 9AC2 C9                               ret
  79+ 9AC3              CompareHLBCSigned:
  80+ 9AC3 E5           CompareHLBC:        push    hl
  81+ 9AC4 A7                               and     a
  82+ 9AC5 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 9AC7 E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 9AC8 C9                               ret
  85+ 9AC9
  86+ 9AC9              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 9AC9              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 9AC9
  89+ 9AC9 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 9ACB 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 9ACC E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 9ACE 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 9ACF 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 9AD0 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 9AD2 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 9AD3 A7                               and     a
  97+ 9AD4 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  98+ 9AD6 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  99+ 9AD8 C9                               ret
