 583  9AD9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 9AD9              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 9AD9              ; Tested and works with signed numbers
   3+ 9AD9 DD 7E 01     NormaliseIXVector:      ld		a,(ix+1)			; Vector X high
   4+ 9ADC E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = abs X high
   5+ 9ADE 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; hl = abs X ^ 2
   6+ 9ADF 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
   7+ 9AE0 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
   8+ 9AE2 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
   9+ 9AE3 DD 7E 03                             ld		a,(ix+3)			; vector = Y high
  10+ 9AE6 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  11+ 9AE8 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; de = abs Y ^ 2
  12+ 9AE9 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  13+ 9AEA ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
  14+ 9AEC 19                                   add     hl,de               ; hl = x^2 + y ^2
  15+ 9AED DD 7E 05                             ld		a,(ix+5)			; vector = Z high
  16+ 9AF0 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  17+ 9AF2 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; de = abs Z ^ 2
  18+ 9AF3 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  19+ 9AF4 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
  20+ 9AF6 19                                   add     hl,de               ; de = x^2 + y ^2 + z ^ 2
  21+ 9AF7 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  22+ 9AF8 CD 86 93     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt de
  23+ 9AFB DD 7E 01     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(ix+1)
  24+ 9AFE 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  25+ 9AFF CD 78 9E                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8    ; does not use HL so we can retain it
  26+ 9B02 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  27+ 9B03 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  28+ 9B05 DD 71 00 DD                          ld		(ix+0),bc           ; .
  28+ 9B09 70 01
  29+ 9B0B DD 7E 03     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(ix+3)
  30+ 9B0E 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  31+ 9B0F CD 78 9E                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  32+ 9B12 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  33+ 9B13 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  34+ 9B15 DD 71 02 DD                          ld		(ix+2),bc           ; .
  34+ 9B19 70 03
  35+ 9B1B DD 7E 05     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(ix+5)
  36+ 9B1E 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  37+ 9B1F CD 78 9E                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8 	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  38+ 9B22 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  39+ 9B23 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  40+ 9B25 DD 71 04 DD                          ld		(ix+4),bc           ; .
  40+ 9B29 70 05
  41+ 9B2B C9                                   ret
  42+ 9B2C
  43+ 9B2C              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  44+ 9B2C 3A C6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
  45+ 9B2F DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  46+ 9B31 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
  47+ 9B33              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  47+ 9B33 5F          >			ld	e,a
  47+ 9B34 57          >			ld  d,a
  47+ 9B35 ED 30       >			mul
  48+ 9B37 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  49+ 9B38 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  50+ 9B39 3A C7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  51+ 9B3C DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  52+ 9B3E E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  53+ 9B40                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  53+ 9B40 5F          >			ld	e,a
  53+ 9B41 57          >			ld  d,a
  53+ 9B42 ED 30       >			mul
  54+ 9B44 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  55+ 9B45 3A C8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  56+ 9B48 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  57+ 9B4A E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  58+ 9B4C                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  58+ 9B4C 5F          >			ld	e,a
  58+ 9B4D 57          >			ld  d,a
  58+ 9B4E ED 30       >			mul
  59+ 9B50 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  60+ 9B51 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  61+ 9B52 CD 86 93     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  62+ 9B55 3A C6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  63+ 9B58 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ 9B5A 4F                                   ld		c,a
  65+ 9B5B 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ 9B5C CD 2E 9E                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ 9B5F 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  68+ 9B60 DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  69+ 9B62 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  70+ 9B64 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  71+ 9B65 32 C6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  72+ 9B68 3A C7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  73+ 9B6B E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  74+ 9B6D 4F                                   ld		c,a
  75+ 9B6E 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  76+ 9B6F CD 2E 9E                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  77+ 9B72 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  78+ 9B73 DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  79+ 9B75 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  80+ 9B77 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  81+ 9B78 32 C7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  82+ 9B7B 3A C8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  83+ 9B7E E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  84+ 9B80 4F                                   ld		c,a
  85+ 9B81 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  86+ 9B82 CD 2E 9E                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  87+ 9B85 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  88+ 9B86 FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  89+ 9B88 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  90+ 9B8A B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  91+ 9B8B 32 C8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  92+ 9B8E C9                                   ret
  93+ 9B8F
  94+ 9B8F              ; Normalise vector
  95+ 9B8F              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  96+ 9B8F              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  97+ 9B8F              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  98+ 9B8F              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  99+ 9B8F
 100+ 9B8F              ;------------------------------------------------------------
 101+ 9B8F              ; To normalise the 24 bit version, bring out sign into TargetVectorxsgn
 102+ 9B8F              ; and make UBnKTargetXpos = abs (UBnKTargetXPos)
 103+ 9B8F              ; set up UBnKTarget[XYZ]Pos with 7 bit version of vector normalised
 104+ 9B8F              ; set up UBnKTargetpXYZ]Sgn with the sign bit
 105+ 9B8F 3A 49 C0     NormalseUnivTarget:     ld      a,(UBnKTargetXPos+2)
 106+ 9B92 47                                   ld      b,a
 107+ 9B93 E6 80                                and     $80
 108+ 9B95 32 50 C0                             ld      (UBnKTargetXPosSgn),a        ; Split out the sign into byte 3
 109+ 9B98 78                                   ld      a,b
 110+ 9B99 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 111+ 9B9B 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKTargetXPos+2),a
 112+ 9B9E 3A 4C C0     .ABSYComponenet:        ld      a,(UBnKTargetYPos+2)
 113+ 9BA1 47                                   ld      b,a
 114+ 9BA2 E6 80                                and     $80
 115+ 9BA4 32 51 C0                             ld      (UBnKTargetYPosSgn),a        ; Split out the sign into byte 3
 116+ 9BA7 78                                   ld      a,b
 117+ 9BA8 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 118+ 9BAA 32 4C C0                             ld      (UBnKTargetYPos+2),a
 119+ 9BAD 3A 4F C0     .ABSXZomponenet:        ld      a,(UBnKTargetZPos+2)
 120+ 9BB0 47                                   ld      b,a
 121+ 9BB1 E6 80                                and     $80
 122+ 9BB3 32 52 C0                             ld      (UBnKTargetZPosSgn),a        ; Split out the sign into byte 3
 123+ 9BB6 78                                   ld      a,b
 124+ 9BB7 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 125+ 9BB9 32 4F C0                             ld      (UBnKTargetZPos+2),a
 126+ 9BBC              ;.. When we hit here the UBnKTargetX,Y and Z are 24 bit abs values to simplify scaling
 127+ 9BBC 2A 89 A2     .Scale:                 ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull 24 bit into registers
 128+ 9BBF 3A 8B A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; h l ixH = X
 129+ 9BC2 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ;
 130+ 9BC4 ED 5B 8D A2                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; d e iyH = Y
 131+ 9BC8 3A 8F A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ;
 132+ 9BCB FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 133+ 9BCD ED 4B 91 A2                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; b c iyL = Y
 134+ 9BD1 3A 93 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ;
 135+ 9BD4 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ;
 136+ 9BD6 DD 7C        .ScaleLoop1:            ld      a,ixh                       ; first pass get to 16 bit
 137+ 9BD8 FD B4                                or      iyh
 138+ 9BDA FD B5                                or      iyl
 139+ 9BDC FD B4                                or      iyh
 140+ 9BDE CA FF 9B                             jp      z,.DoneScaling1
 141+ 9BE1                                      ShiftIXhHLRight1
 141+ 9BE1 DD 7C       >               ld  a,ixh
 141+ 9BE3 CB 3F       >               srl a
 141+ 9BE5 DD 67       >               ld  ixh,a
 141+ 9BE7 CB 1C       >			   rr  h
 141+ 9BE9 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 142+ 9BEB                                      ShiftIYhDERight1
 142+ 9BEB FD 7C       >               ld  a,iyh
 142+ 9BED CB 3F       >               srl a
 142+ 9BEF FD 67       >               ld  iyh,a
 142+ 9BF1 CB 1A       >               rr  d
 142+ 9BF3 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 143+ 9BF5                                      ShiftIYlBCRight1
 143+ 9BF5 FD 7D       >               ld  a,iyl
 143+ 9BF7 CB 3F       >               srl a
 143+ 9BF9 FD 6F       >               ld  iyl,a
 143+ 9BFB CB 18       >			   rr  b
 143+ 9BFD CB 19       >               rr  c
 144+ 9BFF              .DoneScaling1:          ;-- Now we have got here hl = X, de = Y, bc = Z
 145+ 9BFF                                      ;-- we cal just jump into the Normalize Tactics code
 146+ 9BFF 7C           .ScaleLoop2:            ld      a,h
 147+ 9C00 B2                                   or      d
 148+ 9C01 B0                                   or      b
 149+ 9C02 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling2
 150+ 9C04                                      ShiftHLRight1
 150+ 9C04 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 150+ 9C06 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 151+ 9C08                                      ShiftDERight1
 151+ 9C08 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 151+ 9C0A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 152+ 9C0C                                      ShiftBCRight1
 152+ 9C0C CB 38       >			   srl b
 152+ 9C0E CB 19       >			   rr  c
 153+ 9C10 C3 FF 9B                             jp      .ScaleLoop2
 154+ 9C13              ;-- Now we are down to 8 bit values, so we need to scale again to get S7
 155+ 9C13              .DoneScaling2:          ShiftHLRight1
 155+ 9C13 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 155+ 9C15 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 156+ 9C17                                      ShiftDERight1
 156+ 9C17 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 156+ 9C19 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 157+ 9C1B                                      ShiftBCRight1
 157+ 9C1B CB 38       >			   srl b
 157+ 9C1D CB 19       >			   rr  c
 158+ 9C1F E5 D5 C5     .CalculateLength:       push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 159+ 9C22 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y ^ 2
 160+ 9C23 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 161+ 9C25 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 162+ 9C26 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x ^ 2
 163+ 9C27 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 164+ 9C29 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = y^ 2 + x ^ 2
 165+ 9C2A 51                                   ld      d,c
 166+ 9C2B 59                                   ld      e,c
 167+ 9C2C ED 30                                mul     de
 168+ 9C2E 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 169+ 9C2F EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 170+ 9C30 CD 86 93                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 171+ 9C33                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 172+ 9C33 7D           .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,l                         ; save length into iyh
 173+ 9C34 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; .
 174+ 9C36 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
 175+ 9C37 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive z scaled
 176+ 9C38 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 177+ 9C39 CD 2E 9E                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
 178+ 9C3C 32 91 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; now Tactics Vector Z byte 1 is value
 179+ 9C3F D1           .NormaliseY:            pop     de
 180+ 9C40 7B                                   ld      a,e
 181+ 9C41 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 182+ 9C43 CD 2E 9E                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
 183+ 9C46 32 8D A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 184+ 9C49 E1           .NormaliseX:            pop     hl
 185+ 9C4A 7D                                   ld      a,l
 186+ 9C4B FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 187+ 9C4D CD 2E 9E                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
 188+ 9C50 32 89 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a          ;
 189+ 9C53 C9                                   ret
 190+ 9C54
 191+ 9C54                          DISPLAY "TODO: Missle AI only works on S15 spread over 24 bits, i.e. ignores Sign byte 7 bits"
 192+ 9C54              ;-- This norallises the Tactics vector in memory as much as possible, uses 16 bits
 193+ 9C54 2A 89 A2     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 194+ 9C57 ED 5B 8D A2                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 195+ 9C5B ED 4B 91 A2                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 196+ 9C5F 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 197+ 9C60 B2                                   or      d
 198+ 9C61 B0                                   or      b
 199+ 9C62 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 200+ 9C64                                      ShiftHLRight1
 200+ 9C64 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 200+ 9C66 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 201+ 9C68                                      ShiftDERight1
 201+ 9C68 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 201+ 9C6A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 202+ 9C6C                                      ShiftBCRight1
 202+ 9C6C CB 38       >			   srl b
 202+ 9C6E CB 19       >			   rr  c
 203+ 9C70 C3 5F 9C                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 204+ 9C73              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 204+ 9C73 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 204+ 9C75 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 205+ 9C77                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 205+ 9C77 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 205+ 9C79 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 206+ 9C7B                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 206+ 9C7B CB 38       >			   srl b
 206+ 9C7D CB 19       >			   rr  c
 207+ 9C7F E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 208+ 9C82 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y ^ 2
 209+ 9C83 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 210+ 9C85 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 211+ 9C86 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x ^ 2
 212+ 9C87 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 213+ 9C89 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = y^ 2 + x ^ 2
 214+ 9C8A 51                                   ld      d,c
 215+ 9C8B 59                                   ld      e,c
 216+ 9C8C ED 30                                mul     de
 217+ 9C8E 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 218+ 9C8F EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 219+ 9C90 CD 86 93                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 220+ 9C93                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 221+ 9C93 7D                                   ld      a,l
 222+ 9C94 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 223+ 9C96 57                                   ld      d,a
 224+ 9C97 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 225+ 9C98 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 226+ 9C99 CD 2E 9E                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 227+ 9C9C 32 91 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a
 228+ 9C9F D1                                   pop     de
 229+ 9CA0 7B                                   ld      a,e
 230+ 9CA1 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 231+ 9CA3 CD 2E 9E                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 232+ 9CA6 32 8D A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 233+ 9CA9 E1                                   pop     hl
 234+ 9CAA 7D                                   ld      a,l
 235+ 9CAB FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 236+ 9CAD CD 2E 9E                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 237+ 9CB0 32 89 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 238+ 9CB3                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 239+ 9CB3                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 239+ 9CB3 AF          >                        xor a
 240+ 9CB4 32 8A A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 241+ 9CB7 32 8E A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 242+ 9CBA 32 92 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 243+ 9CBD                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 243+ 9CBD 3A 8B A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 243+ 9CC0 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 243+ 9CC2 32 8B A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 244+ 9CC5                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 244+ 9CC5 3A 8F A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 244+ 9CC8 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 244+ 9CCA 32 8F A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 245+ 9CCD                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 245+ 9CCD 3A 93 A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 245+ 9CD0 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 245+ 9CD2 32 93 A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 246+ 9CD5                                    ;; oly using byte 2 for sign  ldCopyByte TacticsVectorX+2, TacticsVectorX+1
 247+ 9CD5                                    ;; oly using byte 2 for sign  ldCopyByte TacticsVectorY+2, TacticsVectorY+1
 248+ 9CD5                                    ;; oly using byte 2 for sign  ldCopyByte TacticsVectorZ+2, TacticsVectorZ+1
 249+ 9CD5                                    ;; oly using byte 2 for sign  SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+1     ; now upper byte is sign only
 250+ 9CD5                                    ;; oly using byte 2 for sign  SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+1     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 251+ 9CD5                                    ;; oly using byte 2 for sign  SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+1     ;  its worth it)
 252+ 9CD5 C9                                   ret
 253+ 9CD6
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 584  9CD6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 9CD6              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 9CD6              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 9CD6              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 9CD6              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 9CD6              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 9CD6              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 9CD6              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 9CD6 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 9CD9 CD EF 9C     	call	Num1
  10+ 9CDC 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 9CDF CD EF 9C     	call	Num1
  12+ 9CE2 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 9CE5 CD EF 9C     	call	Num1
  14+ 9CE8 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 9CEA CD EF 9C     	call	Num1
  16+ 9CED 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 9CEF              Num1:
  18+ 9CEF 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 9CF1              .Num2:
  20+ 9CF1 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 9CF2 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 9CF3 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 9CF5 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 9CF7 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 9CF8 13           	inc	de
  26+ 9CF9 C9           	ret
  27+ 9CFA
  28+ 9CFA              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 9CFA 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 9CFC 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 9CFD C3 D6 9C     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 9D00
  33+ 9D00              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 9D00 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 9D02 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 9D03 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 9D06 CD 16 9D     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 9D09 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 9D0B CD EF 9C     	call	Num1
  40+ 9D0E 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 9D10                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  optimise "
  42+ 9D10 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  43+ 9D11 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  44+ 9D12 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  45+ 9D14 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  46+ 9D16              .NumLeadBlank1:
  47+ 9D16 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  48+ 9D18              .NumLeadBlank2:
  49+ 9D18 3C           	inc	a
  50+ 9D19 09           	add	hl,bc
  51+ 9D1A 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  52+ 9D1C FE 30        	cp	'0'
  53+ 9D1E 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  54+ 9D20              .Blank:
  55+ 9D20 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  56+ 9D22              .DontBlank:
  57+ 9D22 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  58+ 9D24 12           	ld	(de),a
  59+ 9D25 13           	inc	de
  60+ 9D26 C9           	ret
  61+ 9D27
  62+ 9D27              DispQtyAtoDE:
  63+ 9D27 FE 00        	cp	0
  64+ 9D29 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  65+ 9D2B 26 00        	ld h,0
  66+ 9D2D 6F           	ld l,a
  67+ 9D2E 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  68+ 9D31 CD 3D 9D     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  69+ 9D34 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  70+ 9D36 CD 3D 9D     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  71+ 9D39 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  72+ 9D3B 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  73+ 9D3D              .NumLeadBlank1:
  74+ 9D3D 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  75+ 9D3F              .NumLeadBlank2:
  76+ 9D3F 3C           	inc	a
  77+ 9D40 09           	add	hl,bc
  78+ 9D41 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  79+ 9D43 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  80+ 9D45 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  81+ 9D47              .Blank:
  82+ 9D47 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  83+ 9D49              .DontBlank:
  84+ 9D49 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  85+ 9D4B 12           	ld	(de),a
  86+ 9D4C 13           	inc	de
  87+ 9D4D C9           	ret
  88+ 9D4E              .NoStock:
  89+ 9D4E 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  90+ 9D50 12           	ld	(de),a
  91+ 9D51 13           	inc	de
  92+ 9D52 12           	ld	(de),a
  93+ 9D53 13           	inc	de
  94+ 9D54 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  95+ 9D56 12           	ld	(de),a
  96+ 9D57 13           	inc de
  97+ 9D58 C9           	ret
  98+ 9D59
  99+ 9D59
 100+ 9D59              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 101+ 9D59              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 102+ 9D59              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 103+ 9D59              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 104+ 9D59 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 104+ 9D5D 0A 00 00 00
 104+ 9D61 64 00 00 00
 104+ 9D65 E8 03 00 00
 104+ 9D69 10 27 00 00
 105+ 9D6D A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 105+ 9D71 40 42 0F 00
 105+ 9D75 80 96 98 00
 105+ 9D79 00 E1 F5 05
 105+ 9D7D 00 CA 9A 3B
 106+ 9D81 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 107+ 9D85
 108+ 9D85              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 109+ 9D85 CD 94 9D     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 110+ 9D88 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 111+ 9D8B FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 112+ 9D8E 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 113+ 9D90 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 114+ 9D93 C9                                   ret

 116+ 9D94 DD 22 81 9D  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 117+ 9D98 ED 53 83 9D                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 118+ 9D9C DD 21 7D 9D                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 119+ 9DA0 06 09                                ld b,9
 120+ 9DA2 0E 00                                ld c,0
 121+ 9DA4 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 122+ 9DA6 B7                                   or a
 123+ 9DA7 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 124+ 9DAA DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 125+ 9DAD 2A 81 9D                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 126+ 9DB0 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 127+ 9DB2 22 81 9D                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 128+ 9DB5 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 129+ 9DB8 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 130+ 9DBB 2A 83 9D                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 131+ 9DBE ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 132+ 9DC0 22 83 9D                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 133+ 9DC3 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 134+ 9DC5 0C                                   inc c
 135+ 9DC6 3C                                   inc a
 136+ 9DC7 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 137+ 9DC9 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 138+ 9DCC DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 139+ 9DCF 2A 81 9D                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 140+ 9DD2 19                                   add hl,de
 141+ 9DD3 22 81 9D                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 142+ 9DD6 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 143+ 9DD9 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 144+ 9DDC 2A 83 9D                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 145+ 9DDF ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 146+ 9DE1 22 83 9D                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 147+ 9DE4 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 148+ 9DE7 DD 19                                add ix,de
 149+ 9DE9 0C                                   inc c
 150+ 9DEA 0D                                   dec c
 151+ 9DEB 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 152+ 9DED FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 153+ 9DF0 FD 23                                inc iy
 154+ 9DF2 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 155+ 9DF4 3A 81 9D                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 156+ 9DF7 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 157+ 9DF9 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 158+ 9DFC FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 159+ 9E00 C9                                   ret

 585  9E01                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_AequAdivQmul96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_AequAdivQmul96.asm
   1+ 9E01              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 9E01 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 9E02 D2 1D 9E    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 9E05 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 9E07 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 9E09                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 9E09 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 9E0A DA 20 9E    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 9E0D 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 9E0E 37                                   scf
   7+ 9E0F CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 9E11 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 9E13 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 9E14 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 9E16 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 9E18 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 9E19 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 9E1B 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 9E1C C9                                   ret
  16+ 9E1D 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 9E1F C9                                   ret
  18+ 9E20 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9E21 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9E23 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9E25 C3 13 9E                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9E28
  23+ 9E28
  24+ 9E28              ;; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9E28              ;; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9E28              ;TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9E28              ;	bit			        7,a
  28+ 9E28              ;	jr			        z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 9E28              ;	neg			        							; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 9E28              ;	set			        7,a
  31+ 9E28              ;; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 9E28              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 9E28              TIS2:
  34+ 9E28 4F                                   ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9E29 3A AC 7F                             ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9E2C 57                                   ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9E2D 79                                   ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9E2E 4F           AequAdivDmul967Bit:     ld          c,a
  39+ 9E2F 7A                                   ld          a,d
  40+ 9E30 CB 27                                sla         a       ; wipe sign bit
  41+ 9E32 C8                                   ret         z       ; quick exit if dividing 0 as a will have the result of 0
  42+ 9E33 30 10                                jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 9E35 B7           .ScaleDown:             or          a       ; clear carry bit
  44+ 9E36 CB 3A                                srl         d       ; d >> 1 to get back to 7 bit value
  45+ 9E38 79                                   ld          a,c
  46+ 9E39 E6 7F                                and         SignMask8Bit
  47+ 9E3B CB 3F                                srl         a
  48+ 9E3D 47                                   ld          b,a
  49+ 9E3E 79                                   ld          a,c
  50+ 9E3F E6 80                                and         $80
  51+ 9E41 B0                                   or          b
  52+ 9E42 C3 46 9E                             jp          AequAdivDmul96
  53+ 9E45 79           .OKToDivide:            ld          a,c
  54+ 9E46 4F           AequAdivDmul96:         ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  55+ 9E47 E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  56+ 9E49                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  56+ 9E49 BA          >                        cp     d
  56+ 9E4A D2 6A 9E    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  57+ 9E4D 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  58+ 9E4F              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  59+ 9E4F CB 27                                sla			a
  60+ 9E51                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  60+ 9E51 BA          >                        cp      d
  60+ 9E52 DA 70 9E    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  61+ 9E55 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  62+ 9E56 37                                   scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  63+ 9E57 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  64+ 9E59 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  65+ 9E5B 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  66+ 9E5C CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
  67+ 9E5E CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
  68+ 9E60 47                                   ld			b,a							; .
  69+ 9E61 CB 3F                                srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  70+ 9E63 80                                   add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  71+ 9E64 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  72+ 9E65 79                                   ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  73+ 9E66 E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  74+ 9E68 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  75+ 9E69 C9                                   ret
  76+ 9E6A              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  77+ 9E6A 79           .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,c
  78+ 9E6B E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  79+ 9E6D F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  80+ 9E6F C9                                   ret
  81+ 9E70              .TIS2SkipSub:           ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  81+ 9E70 B7          >                        or a
  82+ 9E71 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  83+ 9E73 38 DA                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  84+ 9E75 C3 5B 9E                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  85+ 9E78
  86+ 9E78
  87+ 9E78
  88+ 9E78              ; as per AequAdivDmul967Bit but Q is an 8 bit unsigned
  89+ 9E78              ; a = a(S7)/Q(8u)*96
  90+ 9E78 4F           AequAdivDmul96Q8:       ld          c,a                         ; c = a
  91+ 9E79 7A           .CheckDivide0:          ld          a,d                         ; check if its a / 0
  92+ 9E7A A7                                   and         a                           ; .
  93+ 9E7B CA A2 9E                             jp          z,.TIS2AccGTEQ              ; .
  94+ 9E7E 79           .NotDivide0:            ld          a,c                         ; get back value of A
  95+ 9E7F E6 7F                                and         SignMask8Bit                ; and make it abs, so a = abs(a) c = original a
  96+ 9E81                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  96+ 9E81 BA          >                        cp     d
  96+ 9E82 D2 A2 9E    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  97+ 9E85 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  98+ 9E87              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  99+ 9E87 CB 27                                sla			a
 100+ 9E89                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
 100+ 9E89 BA          >                        cp      d
 100+ 9E8A DA A8 9E    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
 101+ 9E8D 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
 102+ 9E8E 37                                   scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
 103+ 9E8F CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 104+ 9E91 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 105+ 9E93 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
 106+ 9E94 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
 107+ 9E96 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
 108+ 9E98 47                                   ld			b,a							; .
 109+ 9E99 CB 3F                                srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
 110+ 9E9B 80                                   add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
 111+ 9E9C 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
 112+ 9E9D 79                                   ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
 113+ 9E9E E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit    			; recover sign only
 114+ 9EA0 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
 115+ 9EA1 C9                                   ret
 116+ 9EA2              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
 117+ 9EA2 79           .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,c
 118+ 9EA3 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
 119+ 9EA5 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
 120+ 9EA7 C9                                   ret
 121+ 9EA8              .TIS2SkipSub:           ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
 121+ 9EA8 B7          >                        or a
 122+ 9EA9 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 123+ 9EAB 38 DA                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 124+ 9EAD C3 93 9E                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
 125+ 9EB0
 126+ 9EB0
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_AequAdivQmul96.asm
 586  9EB0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ 9EB0              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 9EB0              fmltu:
   3+ 9EB0 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 9EB1 3A AC 7F                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9EB4 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9EB5 ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9EB7 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9EB8 C9                                   ret
   9+ 9EB9
  10+ 9EB9 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 9EBA ED 30                                mul
  12+ 9EBC 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 9EBD C9                                   ret
  14+ 9EBE
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 587  9EBE                  ;INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
 588  9EBE
 589  9EBE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 9EBE              APequQmulA:
   2+ 9EBE              asm_mult1:
   3+ 9EBE              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 9EBE FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 9EC0 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 9EC2 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 9EC3 3A AC 7F     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 9EC6 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 9EC7 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 9EC9 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 9ECB AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 9ECC E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 9ECE 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 9ECF 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 9ED0 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 9ED2 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 9ED3 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 9ED4 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 9ED6 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 9ED7 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 9ED9 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 9EDA 32 AC 7E     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 9EDD 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 9EDE B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 9EDF 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 9EE0 C9           	ret
  27+ 9EE1              .mul0:
  28+ 9EE1 AF           	xor	a
  29+ 9EE2 32 AC 7E     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 9EE5 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 9EE6 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 9EE7 C9           	ret
  33+ 9EE8
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 590  9EE8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 9EE8              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 9EE8              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 9EE8              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 9EE8              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 9EE8              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 9EE8              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 9EE8              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 9EE8              LL38:
   9+ 9EE8              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 9EE8              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 9EE8              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 9EE8              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 9EE8              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 9EE8              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 9EE8              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 9EE8              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 9EE8              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 9EE8              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 9EE8              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 9EE8              ;	ret
  21+ 9EE8              ; calculation table
  22+ 9EE8              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 9EE8              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 9EE8              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 9EE8              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 9EE8              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 9EE8              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 9EE8              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 9EE8              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 9EE8              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 9EE8
  32+ 9EE8              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 9EE8              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 9EE8              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 9EE8              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 9EE8
  37+ 9EE8
  38+ 9EE8              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 9EE8 21 AE 7F     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 9EEB AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 9EEC FA F7 9E     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 9EEF 3A AC 7F     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9EF2 21 AD 7F     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9EF5 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9EF6 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9EF7              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9EF7 3A AD 7F     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9EFA 21 AC 7F     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 9EFD              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 9EFD              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 9EFD B7          >                        or a
  51+ 9EFE 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 9EFF 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9F01              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9F01              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9F01              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9F01 C9           	ret
  57+ 9F02              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9F02 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9F04 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9F06 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9F08 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9F09 3A AE 7F     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 9F0C EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 9F0E 32 AE 7F     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9F11 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9F12                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9F12 B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9F13 C9           	ret
  68+ 9F14              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9F14 32 AE 7F         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9F17                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9F17 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9F18 C9               ret
  72+ 9F19              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9F19              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9F19              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9F19              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9F19              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9F19              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9F19              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9F19              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9F19              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9F19              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9F19              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9F19              ;--	ret
  84+ 9F19
  85+ 9F19              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9F19              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9F19              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9F19              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9F19              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9F19              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9F19              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9F19              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9F19              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9F19              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9F19              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9F19              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9F19              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9F19              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9F19              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9F19              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9F19              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9F19              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9F19              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9F19              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9F19              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9F19              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9F19              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9F19              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9F19              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9F19              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9F19              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9F19              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9F19              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9F19              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9F19              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9F19              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9F19              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9F19              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9F19              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9F19              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9F19              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9F19              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9F19              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9F19              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 9F19
 142+ 9F19
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm

 596  9F19                  include "./Universe/Ships/CopyRotMattoXX15.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/CopyRotMattoXX15.asm
   1+ 9F19              CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15:
   2+ 9F19                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX+1 ,XX15VecX
   2+ 9F19 3A 37 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
   2+ 9F1C 32 C6 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecX),a
   3+ 9F1F                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, XX15VecY
   3+ 9F1F 3A 39 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
   3+ 9F22 32 C7 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecY),a
   4+ 9F25                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
   4+ 9F25 3A 3B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
   4+ 9F28 32 C8 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecZ),a
   5+ 9F2B C9                   ret

   8+ 9F2C 3A 31 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
   8+ 9F2F 32 C6 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecX),a
   9+ 9F32                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1, XX15VecY
   9+ 9F32 3A 33 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
   9+ 9F35 32 C7 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecY),a
  10+ 9F38                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
  10+ 9F38 3A 35 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
  10+ 9F3B 32 C8 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecZ),a
  11+ 9F3E C9                   ret

  13+ 9F3F              CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15:
  14+ 9F3F                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX+1 ,XX15VecX
  14+ 9F3F 3A 2B C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)
  14+ 9F42 32 C6 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecX),a
  15+ 9F45                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevY+1, XX15VecY
  15+ 9F45 3A 2D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)
  15+ 9F48 32 C7 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecY),a
  16+ 9F4B                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
  16+ 9F4B 3A 2F C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)
  16+ 9F4E 32 C8 C0    >                        ld       (XX15VecZ),a
  17+ 9F51 C9                   ret
  18+ 9F52
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/CopyRotMattoXX15.asm
 597  9F52                  include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX15toRotMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/CopyXX15toRotMat.asm
   1+ 9F52              CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV:
   2+ 9F52                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecX, UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
   2+ 9F52 3A C6 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecX)
   2+ 9F55 32 37 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
   3+ 9F58                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatNosevY+1
   3+ 9F58 3A C7 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecY)
   3+ 9F5B 32 39 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
   4+ 9F5E                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecZ, UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
   4+ 9F5E 3A C8 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX15VecZ)
   4+ 9F61 32 3B C0    >                        ld       (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
   5+ 9F64                      ZeroA
   5+ 9F64 AF          >                        xor a
   6+ 9F65 32 36 C0             ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),a
   7+ 9F68 32 38 C0             ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),a
   8+ 9F6B 32 3A C0             ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),a
   9+ 9F6E C9                   ret
  10+ 9F6F

  13+ 9F75                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1

# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/CopyXX15toRotMat.asm
 598  9FA9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_tidy.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_tidy.asm
   1+ 9FA9              ; d = vector 1 e = vector 2 h = vector3 l = vector 4 b = vector 5
   2+ 9FA9              ; performs (d*e + h*l) / b and puts the result in de where e is 0
   3+ 9FA9 C5           TidyCalc:       push    bc
   4+ 9FAA CD 8E 91                     call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 1 * vector 2
   5+ 9FAD EB                           ex      hl,de                   ; get hl into de and save result of de
   6+ 9FAE CD 8E 91                     call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 2 * vector 3
   7+ 9FB1 CD 04 00                     call    AddDEtoHLSigned         ; BC = HL = HL + DE
   8+ 9FB4 D1                           pop     de                      ; DE = BC saved from earlier
   9+ 9FB5 7C                           ld      a,h                     ; check for result 0
  10+ 9FB6 B5                           or      l                       ; .
  11+ 9FB7 CA D8 9F                     jp      z,.ZeroResult           ; .
  12+ 9FBA 44 4D                        ld      bc,hl                   ; .
  13+ 9FBC 7A                           ld      a,d                     ; check for divide by zero
  14+ 9FBD A7                           and     a                       ; .
  15+ 9FBE CA CF 9F                     jp      z,.MaxedResult          ; .
  16+ 9FC1 5A                           ld      e,d                     ; now de = 0b (i.e. b register not hex value)
  17+ 9FC2 16 00                        ld      d,0                     ;
  18+ 9FC4 CD 44 98                     call    Floor_DivQSigned        ; TO BE TESTED should do BC = BC / DE
  19+ 9FC7 78                           ld      a,b                     ; sign bit from b
  20+ 9FC8 E6 80                        and     $80                     ; .
  21+ 9FCA B1                           or      c                       ; bring in the value
  22+ 9FCB 57                           ld      d,a                     ; de = c0 (i.e. c register not hex value)
  23+ 9FCC 1E 00                        ld      e,0                     ; .
  24+ 9FCE C9                           ret
  25+ 9FCF 78           .MaxedResult:   ld      a,b                     ; make result signed unity (i.e. 1 or 96 in our case)
  26+ 9FD0 EE 80                        xor     $80
  27+ 9FD2 F6 60                        or      $60
  28+ 9FD4 57                           ld      d,a
  29+ 9FD5 1E 00                        ld      e,0
  30+ 9FD7 C9                           ret
  31+ 9FD8 11 00 00     .ZeroResult:    ld      de,0
  32+ 9FDB C9                           ret
  33+ 9FDC              ; as per tidy calc except
  34+ 9FDC              ; d = vector 1 e = vector 2 h = vector3 l = vector 4
  35+ 9FDC              ; performs (d*e - h*l) / 96 and puts the result in de where e is 0
  36+ 9FDC
  37+ 9FDC CD 8E 91     TidySide:       call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 1 * vector 2
  38+ 9FDF EB                           ex      de,hl                   ; get hl = vector 1 * vector 2
  39+ 9FE0 CD 8E 91                     call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 2 * vector 3
  40+ 9FE3 CD 00 00                     call    SubDEfromHLSigned       ; BC = HL = HL - DE
  41+ 9FE6 44 4D                        ld      bc,hl                   ; .
  42+ 9FE8 11 60 00                     ld      de,$60                  ; now de = 96
  43+ 9FEB CD 44 98                     call    Floor_DivQSigned        ; TO BE TESTED should do BC = BC / DE
  44+ 9FEE 78                           ld      a,b                     ; sign bit from b
  45+ 9FEF E6 80                        and     $80                     ; .
  46+ 9FF1 B1                           or      c                       ; bring in the value
  47+ 9FF2 57                           ld      d,a                     ; de = c0 (i.e. c register not hex value)
  48+ 9FF3 1E 00                        ld      e,0                     ; .
  49+ 9FF5 C9                           ret
  50+ 9FF6
  51+ 9FF6              ;; orthonormalise vector for UBnK ship vector uses IX IT
  52+ 9FF6                  DISPLAY "TidyVectorsIX"
  53+ 9FF6 DD 21 36 C0  TidyVectorsIX:  ld      ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  54+ 9FFA CD D9 9A                     call    NormaliseIXVector       ; initially we normalise the nose vector
  55+ 9FFD 3A 37 C0     .CheckNoseXSize:ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)  ; a = nose x
  56+ A000 E6 30                        and     %00110000                ; if bits 7 and 6 are clear the work with nosey
  57+ A002 CA 36 A0                     jp      z, .NoseXSmall
  58+ A005              ;-- When nosex is large ------------------------  roofv_x =-(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
  59+ A005 3A 39 C0     .NoseXLarge:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)  ; a = nose x
  60+ A008 57                           ld      d,a
  61+ A009 3A 33 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)  ; hl = nosev_y * roofv_y
  62+ A00C 5F                           ld      e,a                     ; we already have d so only need roofY
  63+ A00D 3A 3B C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)  ; de = nosev_z * roofv_z
  64+ A010 67                           ld      h,a                     ; .
  65+ A011 3A 35 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)  ; .
  66+ A014 6F                           ld      l,a                     ; .
  67+ A015 3A 37 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  68+ A018 47                           ld      b,a
  69+ A019 CD A9 9F                     call    TidyCalc
  70+ A01C 7A                           ld      a,d
  71+ A01D B3                           or      e
  72+ A01E CA 25 A0                     jp      z,.NoRoofXFlip
  73+ A021 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
  74+ A023 AA                           xor     d
  75+ A024 57                           ld      d,a
  76+ A025 ED 53 30 C0  .NoRoofXFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de   ; write roofvx
  77+ A029 C3 91 A0                     jp      .NormaliseRoofv
  78+ A02C 11 00 E0     .MaxedRoofX:    ld      de,$E000                ; TEST if sign is correct for all of these if was divide by zero make it -1
  79+ A02F ED 53 30 C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de   ; write roofvx
  80+ A033 C3 91 A0                     jp      .NormaliseRoofv
  81+ A036              ;-- When noseX is small ------------------------ determine if we are doign roofz or roof y
  82+ A036 3A 38 C0     .NoseXSmall:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
  83+ A039 E6 60                        and     %01100000
  84+ A03B CA 69 A0                     jp      z,.NoseYSmall
  85+ A03E              ;-- When noseY is large ------------------------ roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
  86+ A03E 3A 37 C0     .NoseYLarge:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  87+ A041 57                           ld      d,a
  88+ A042 3A 31 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
  89+ A045 5F                           ld      e,a
  90+ A046 3A 39 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  91+ A049 67                           ld      h,a
  92+ A04A 3A 33 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
  93+ A04D 6F                           ld      l,a
  94+ A04E 3A 3B C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  95+ A051 47                           ld      b,a
  96+ A052 CD A9 9F                     call    TidyCalc
  97+ A055 7A                           ld      a,d
  98+ A056 B3                           or      e
  99+ A057 CA 62 A0                     jp      z,.NoRoofZFlip
 100+ A05A 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
 101+ A05C AA                           xor     d
 102+ A05D 57                           ld      d,a
 103+ A05E 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit
 104+ A060 AA                           xor     d
 105+ A061 57                           ld      d,a
 106+ A062 ED 53 34 C0  .NoRoofZFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de   ; write roofvz
 107+ A066 C3 91 A0                     jp      .NormaliseRoofv
 108+ A069              ;-- When noseY is large ------------------------ roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 109+ A069 3A 37 C0     .NoseYSmall:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 110+ A06C 57                           ld      d,a
 111+ A06D 3A 31 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 112+ A070 5F                           ld      e,a
 113+ A071 3A 3B C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 114+ A074 67                           ld      h,a
 115+ A075 3A 35 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 116+ A078 6F                           ld      l,a
 117+ A079 3A 39 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 118+ A07C 47                           ld      b,a
 119+ A07D CD A9 9F                     call    TidyCalc
 120+ A080 7A                           ld      a,d
 121+ A081 B3                           or      e
 122+ A082 CA 8D A0                     jp      z,.NoRoofYFlip
 123+ A085 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
 124+ A087 AA                           xor     d
 125+ A088 57                           ld      d,a
 126+ A089 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit
 127+ A08B AA                           xor     d
 128+ A08C 57                           ld      d,a
 129+ A08D ED 53 32 C0  .NoRoofYFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de   ; write roofvy
 130+ A091 DD 21 30 C0  .NormaliseRoofv:ld      ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX     ; now normalise roofv
 131+ A095 CD D9 9A                     call    NormaliseIXVector
 132+ A098              ; -- sidev_x = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 133+ A098 3A 3B C0     .CalcSidevX:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 134+ A09B 57                           ld      d,a
 135+ A09C 3A 33 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 136+ A09F 5F                           ld      e,a
 137+ A0A0 3A 39 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 138+ A0A3 67                           ld      h,a
 139+ A0A4 3A 35 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 140+ A0A7 6F                           ld      l,a
 141+ A0A8 CD DC 9F                     call    TidySide
 142+ A0AB ED 53 2A C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de   ; write sidevX
 143+ A0AF              ; -- sidev_y = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 144+ A0AF 3A 37 C0     .CalcSidevY:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 145+ A0B2 57                           ld      d,a
 146+ A0B3 3A 35 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 147+ A0B6 5F                           ld      e,a
 148+ A0B7 3A 3B C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 149+ A0BA 67                           ld      h,a
 150+ A0BB 3A 31 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 151+ A0BE 6F                           ld      l,a
 152+ A0BF CD DC 9F                     call    TidySide
 153+ A0C2 ED 53 2C C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de   ; write sidevX
 154+ A0C6              ; -- sidev_z = (nosev_y * roofv_x - nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 155+ A0C6 3A 39 C0     .CalcSidevZ:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 156+ A0C9 57                           ld      d,a
 157+ A0CA 3A 31 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 158+ A0CD 5F                           ld      e,a
 159+ A0CE 3A 37 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 160+ A0D1 67                           ld      h,a
 161+ A0D2 3A 33 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 162+ A0D5 6F                           ld      l,a
 163+ A0D6 CD DC 9F                     call    TidySide
 164+ A0D9 ED 53 2E C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de   ; write sidevX
 165+ A0DD                          IFDEF ROUND_ROLL_AND_PITCH
 166+ A0DD ~            .ClearLowBytes: ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
 167+ A0DD ~                            ZeroA
 168+ A0DD ~                            ld      b,9
 169+ A0DD ~            .WriteLoop:     ld      (hl),a
 170+ A0DD ~                            inc     hl
 171+ A0DD ~                            inc     hl
 172+ A0DD ~                            djnz    .WriteLoop
 173+ A0DD                          ENDIF
 174+ A0DD C9                           ret

  30+ A0E6 07 A1
  31+ A0E8 08 A1 09 A1                        DW    ThargoidAI, NoAI,       NoAI,       NoAI,       NoAI
  31+ A0EC 09 A1 09 A1
  31+ A0F0 09 A1
  32+ A0F2              ShipAiJumpTableMax:   EQU ($ - ShipAIJumpTable)/2

  59+ A0F5                                                 DISPLAY "TODO: capture duff jumps"
  60+ A0F5                                     ReturnIfAGTEusng ShipAiJumpTableMax              ; TODO capture duff jumps whilst debugging in case a new shjip type code is added
  60+ A0F5 FE 0A       >                        cp    ShipAiJumpTableMax

  61+ A0F8 21 DE A0                            ld       hl,ShipAIJumpTable
  62+ A0FB ED 31                               add      hl,a
  63+ A0FD ED 31                               add      hl,a
  64+ A0FF 7E                                  ld       a,(hl)                                  ; contrary to the name
  65+ A100 23                                  inc      hl                                      ; jp (hl) is really
  66+ A101 66                                  ld       h,(hl)                                  ; jp hl
  67+ A102 6F                                  ld       l,a                                     ;

  81+ A10A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  82+ A10A              CalculateAgression:     IFDEF   ALWAYSANGRY
  83+ A10A ~                                        jp  UltraHostile
  84+ A10A                                      ENDIF
  85+ A10A 3A 2F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  86+ A10D 47                                   ld      b,a
  87+ A10E E6 02                                and     %00000010
  88+ A110 20 20                                jr      nz,.UltraHostile
  89+ A112 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A113 E6 F0                                and     %11110000                               ; if it can can anger a fighter bay then generally more hostile as implies its a large ship
  91+ A115 21 7B C0                             ld      hl,UBnKMissilesLeft                     ; more missiles more agression
  92+ A118 B6                                   or      (hl)
  93+ A119 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ A11A 3A 2E C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  95+ A11D E6 4E                                and     %01001110                               ; We look at if its a bounty hunter, hostile already, pirate and cop
  96+ A11F B0                                   or      b
  97+ A120 47                                   ld      b,a
  98+ A121 3A 72 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKShipAggression)
  99+ A124                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64,.NotAlreadyAgressive
  99+ A124 FE 40       >                        cp      64
  99+ A126 DA 2D A1    >                        jp		c, .NotAlreadyAgressive
 100+ A129 78                                   ld      a,b
 101+ A12A F6 80                                or      %10000000                               ; if its already at least 64 agressive then likley to stay so
 102+ A12C 47                                   ld      b,a
 103+ A12D 78           .NotAlreadyAgressive:   ld      a,b
 104+ A12E 32 72 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
 105+ A131 C9                                   ret
 106+ A132 3E FF        .UltraHostile:          ld      a,$FF
 107+ A134 32 72 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
 108+ A137 C9                                   ret
 109+ A138              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 110+ A138              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
 111+ A138 3A 2E C4     MakeHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
 112+ A13B                                      ;break
 113+ A13B                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbHostile
 113+ A13B 3A 2D C4    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 113+ A13E FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
 113+ A140 CA 5F A1    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbHostile
 114+ A143 E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
 115+ A145 C4 99 A1                             call    nz, SetStationHostile                   ; Set Space Station if present, Angry
 116+ A148                                      IsAIEnabled                                     ; get AI data
 116+ A148 21 73 C0    >                        ld      hl, UBnkaiatkecm
 116+ A14B CB 7E       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,(hl)
 117+ A14D C8                                   ret     z                                       ; if 0 then no AI attached so it can't get angry
 118+ A14E 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
 119+ A14F                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
 119+ A14F 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
 119+ A151 32 66 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 120+ A154 CB 27                                sla     a                                       ; set pitch to 4
 121+ A156 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .
 122+ A159 3A 2F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
 123+ A15C                                      ReturnIfBitMaskClear ShipCanAnger
 123+ A15C E6 80       >                        and     ShipCanAnger
 123+ A15E C8          >                        ret     z

 136+ A170 47                                   ld      b,a                                     ; b = damage

 139+ A176 20 0A                                jr      nz,.HitRear

 203+ A1CB              ;...................................................................
 204+ A1CB              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
 205+ A1CB 3A 9A 81     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 206+ A1CE                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
 206+ A1CE FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 206+ A1D0 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 207+ A1D1 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 208+ A1D3 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks
 209+ A1D4 32 9A 81                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 210+ A1D7                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
 210+ A1D7 21 9C 81    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList

 210+ A1DC 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 210+ A1DD 3C          >                        inc     a
 210+ A1DE C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 210+ A1DF 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later

 212+ A1E3 D8                                   ret     c                                   ; if we have a special mission to kill a staion then its type won't be space station for game logic

 215+ A1E9 C0          >                        ret     nz

 225+ A205                                      ;CheckPointRange UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn, MissileZPos, MissileZSgn

 241+ A221 B2                                   or      d

 251+ A22A C0          >                        ret     nz

   1++A2E0                                      DEFINE MISSILEDEBUG 1

   3++A2E0
