   5++A2E0              MISSILEMAXDECEL         equ -3
   6++A2E0                                      ;DEFINE MISSILEBREAK
   7++A2E0              ;.. Thsi version uses new kind logic
   8++A2E0              ;... Now the tactics if current ship is the missile, when we enter this SelectedUniverseSlot holds slot of missile
   9++A2E0              MissileAIV3:            ;ld      a,(ShipAIEnabled)
  10++A2E0                                      ;ReturnOnBitClear a, ShipAIEnabledBitNbr
  11++A2E0                                      IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
  12++A2E0                                          JumpIfMemTrue UBnKMissleHitToProcess, .ProcessMissileHit
  12++A2E0 3A 45 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKMissleHitToProcess)
  12++A2E3 A7          >                        and     a
  12++A2E4 CA 4A A4    >                        jp      z, .ProcessMissileHit
  13++A2E7                                      ENDIF
  14++A2E7              .CheckForECM:           JumpIfMemNotZero ECMCountDown,.ECMIsActive  ; If ECM is running then kill the missile
  14++A2E7 3A C1 7E    >                        ld  a,(ECMCountDown)
  14++A2EA A7          >                        and a
  14++A2EB C2 53 A4    >                        jp  nz,.ECMIsActive
  15++A2EE              .IsMissileHostile:      IsShipHostile                               ; is missle attacking us?
  15++A2EE 3A 2E C4    >                        ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  15++A2F1 E6 04       >                        and     ShipIsHostile
  16++A2F3                                      JumpIfZero .MissileTargetingShip            ; Missile is friendly then z is set else targetting us
  16++A2F3 CA 19 A3    >                        jp	z,.MissileTargetingShip

  19++A2FC 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; c holds detonation range
  20++A2FD CD 15 A2                             call    MissileHitUsCheckPos
  21++A300 D2 09 A3     .MissileNotHitUsYet:    jp      nc, .UpdateTargetingUsPos
  22++A303 CD 64 A1     .MissleHitUs:           call    PlayerHitByMissile
  23++A306 C3 53 A4                             jp      .ECMIsActive                        ; we use ECM logic to destroy missile which eqneues is
  24++A309 CD DF A9     .UpdateTargetingUsPos:  call    SetPlayerAsTarget
  25++A30C CD BA A9                             call    CopyPosToVector

  28++A314 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
  29++A316 C3 24 A4                             jp      .NormaliseDirection
  30++A319              ;--- Missile is targeting other ship
  31++A319 3A 8D 81     .MissileTargetingShip:  ld      a,(SelectedUniverseSlot)            ; we will use this quite a lot with next bank switching
  32++A31C C6 46        .SaveMissileBank:       add     a,BankUNIVDATA0                     ; pre calculate add to optimise
  33++A31E FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
  34++A320                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  35++A320 32 46 A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileBank),a
  36++A323                                      ENDIF

  38++A326 C6 46                                add     a,BankUNIVDATA0                     ; pre calculate add to optimise
  39++A328 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                               ; save target
  40++A32A                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  41++A32A 32 47 A2                                 ld  (TacticsTargetBank),a
  42++A32D                                      ENDIF
  43++A32D              .IsMissleTargetGone:    JumpIfSlotAEmpty    .ECMIsActive            ; if the target was blown up then detonate
  43++A32D 21 9C 81    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList

  43++A332 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)

  43++A337 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
  44++A338              ;... Note we don't have to check for impact as we already have a loop doing that
  45++A338              .SelectTargetShip:      SelectTargetBank

  46++A33D              .IsShipExploding:       IsShipExploding                             ; check exploding status
  46++A33D 3A 73 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
  46++A340 E6 20       >                        and     ShipExploding
  47++A342 28 08                                jr      z,.UpdateTargetingShipX             ; as if exploding then the missile will also explode
  48++A344              .ShipIsExploding:       SelectMissileBank                           ; get missile back into memory
  48++A344 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
  48++A346             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  48++A346 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  49++A349 C3 53 A4                             jp      .ECMIsActive
  50++A34C              ;--- At this point we already have the target banked in ready for calculating vector
  51++A34C              ; Tactics vector = missile - target
  52++A34C ED 5B 20 C0  .UpdateTargetingShipX:  ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get target ship X
  53++A350 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
  54++A353                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  55++A353 ED 53 79 A2                              ld  (TacticsTargetX),de
  56++A357 32 7B A2                                 ld  (TacticsTargetX+2),a
  57++A35A                                      ENDIF
  58++A35A                                      FlipSignBitA
  58++A35A EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
  59++A35C 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
  60++A35D                                      SelectMissileBank
  60++A35D FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
  60++A35F             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  60++A35F ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  61++A362 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
  62++A365 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
  63++A368                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  64++A368 22 59 A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileX),hl
  65++A36B 32 5B A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileX+2),a
  66++A36E                                      ENDIF
  67++A36E 47                                   ld      b,a
  68++A36F CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
  69++A372 22 89 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
  70++A375 32 8B A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
  71++A378              .UpdateTargetingShipY:  SelectTargetBank
  71++A378 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
  71++A37A             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  71++A37A ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  72++A37D ED 5B 23 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKylo)                        ; get target ship X
  73++A381 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  74++A384                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  75++A384 ED 53 7C A2                              ld  (TacticsTargetY),de
  76++A388 32 7E A2                                 ld  (TacticsTargetY+2),a
  77++A38B                                      ENDIF
  78++A38B                                      FlipSignBitA
  78++A38B EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
  79++A38D 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
  80++A38E                                      SelectMissileBank
  80++A38E FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
  80++A390             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  80++A390 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  81++A393 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
  82++A396 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
  83++A399                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  84++A399 22 5D A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileY),hl
  85++A39C 32 5F A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileY+2),a
  86++A39F                                      ENDIF
  87++A39F 47                                   ld      b,a
  88++A3A0 CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
  89++A3A3 22 8D A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
  90++A3A6 32 8F A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
  91++A3A9              .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  SelectTargetBank
  91++A3A9 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
  91++A3AB             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
  91++A3AB ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
  92++A3AE ED 5B 26 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get target ship X
  93++A3B2 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  94++A3B5                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
  95++A3B5 ED 53 7F A2                              ld  (TacticsTargetZ),de
  96++A3B9 32 81 A2                                 ld  (TacticsTargetZ+2),a
  97++A3BC                                      ENDIF
  98++A3BC                                      FlipSignBitA
  98++A3BC EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
  99++A3BE 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 100++A3BF                                      SelectMissileBank
 100++A3BF FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 100++A3C1             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 100++A3C1 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 101++A3C4 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 102++A3C7 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 103++A3CA                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 104++A3CA 22 61 A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileZ),hl
 105++A3CD 32 63 A2                                 ld  (TacticsMissileZ+2),a
 106++A3D0                                      ENDIF
 107++A3D0
 108++A3D0 47                                   ld      b,a
 109++A3D1 CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 110++A3D4 22 91 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 111++A3D7 32 93 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 112++A3DA              ; by here missile in in memory and TacticsVector now holds distance
 113++A3DA              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 114++A3DA              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 115++A3DA 2A 8A A2                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 116++A3DD 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 117++A3DE ED 5B 8E A2                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 118++A3E2 B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 119++A3E3 ED 4B 92 A2                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 120++A3E7 B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 121++A3E8                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 121++A3E8 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 122++A3EA                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 122++A3EA C2 F9 A3    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 123++A3ED B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 124++A3EE B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 125++A3EF B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 126++A3F0                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 126++A3F0 C2 F9 A3    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 127++A3F3                                      ELSE
 128++A3F3 ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 129++A3F3                                      ENDIF
 130++A3F3              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 131++A3F3 3A 46 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 132++A3F6 C3 8C A1                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 133++A3F9                          DISPLAY "TODO: far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0"
 134++A3F9              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 134++A3F9 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 134++A3FB             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 134++A3FB ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 135++A3FE                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 135++A3FE 3A 79 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)
 135++A401 A7          >                        and     a
 135++A402 C2 1F A4    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 136++A405                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnKEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 136++A405 3A 77 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 136++A408 FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 136++A40A DA 1F A4    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM
 137++A40D                                      JumpIfMemIsNotZero   ECMCountDown, .NoECM                ; . ECM is already active
 137++A40D 3A C1 7E    >                        ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 137++A410 A7          >                        and     a
 137++A411 C2 1F A4    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 138++A414 3A A3 7E     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 139++A417                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 139++A417 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 139++A419 D2 1F A4    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 140++A41C              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 141++A41C C3 62 C6     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 142++A41F              ;                       implicit ret
 143++A41F              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 144++A41F              .NoECM:
 145++A41F                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 146++A41F                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 147++A41F              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 148++A41F              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 149++A41F                                      SelectMissileBank
 149++A41F FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 149++A421             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 149++A421 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 150++A424                                      ;break
 151++A424                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 152++A424              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 153++A424 ~                                        ;break
 154++A424                                      ENDIF
 155++A424                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 155++A424 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 156++A428 CD 54 9C                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 157++A42B                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 158++A42B CD 09 A9                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 159++A42E                                      ENDIF
 160++A42E              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 160++A42E 3A 8B A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 160++A431 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 160++A433 32 8B A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 161++A436                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 161++A436 3A 8F A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 161++A439 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 161++A43B 32 8F A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 162++A43E                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 162++A43E 3A 93 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 162++A441 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 162++A443 32 93 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 163++A446 CD 5D A4                             call    SeekingLogic
 164++A449 C9                                   ret
 165++A44A 3A 9A 81     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 166++A44D                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 166++A44D FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 166++A44F D0          >                        ret	 nc
 167++A450 C3 B1 A1     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 168++A453                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 169++A453 CD BD C7     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 170++A456                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 170++A456 AF          >                        xor     a
 170++A457 32 45 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 171++A45A C3 4A A4                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 172++A45D                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 173++A45D
 174++A45D CD 4C A9     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 175++A460 32 4C A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 176++A463 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 177++A466 32 50 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 178++A469 CD A2 A9     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 179++A46C 32 4F A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 180++A46F 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 181++A472 32 50 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 182++A475 CD 7F A4                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 183++A478 CD A3 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 184++A47B CD D1 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 185++A47E C9                                   ret
 186++A47F
 187++A47F              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 188++A47F 2A 4F A2                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 189++A482 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 190++A483 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 191++A485 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 192++A487 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 193++A488 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 194++A489 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 195++A48B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 195++A48B FE 10       >                        cp     16
 195++A48D D2 99 A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 196++A490                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 196++A490 AF          >                        xor a
 197++A491 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 198++A492 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 199++A495                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 200++A495 32 DC A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 201++A498                                      ENDIF
 202++A498 C9                                   ret
 203++A499 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 204++A49B B4                                   or      h
 205++A49C 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 206++A49F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 207++A49F 32 DC A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 208++A4A2                                      ENDIF
 209++A4A2 C9                                   ret
 210++A4A3
 211++A4A3              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 212++A4A3              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 213++A4A3              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 214++A4A3              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 215++A4A3              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 216++A4A3              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 217++A4A3              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 218++A4A3              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 219++A4A3              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 220++A4A3              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 221++A4A3
 222++A4A3
 223++A4A3
 224++A4A3              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 225++A4A3                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 226++A4A3                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 227++A4A3 CD A8 A9                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 228++A4A6 32 52 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 229++A4A9 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 230++A4AA 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 231++A4AD 32 53 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 232++A4B0 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 233++A4B1 3A 50 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 234++A4B4                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 235++A4B4                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 236++A4B4                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 237++A4B4                                      ;xor $80
 238++A4B4 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 239++A4B5 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 240++A4B6 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 241++A4B8                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 241++A4B8 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 241++A4BA D2 C6 A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 242++A4BD                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 242++A4BD AF          >                        xor a
 243++A4BE B0                                   or      b
 244++A4BF 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 245++A4C2                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++A4C2 32 DA A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 247++A4C5                                      ENDIF
 248++A4C5 C9                                   ret
 249++A4C6 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 250++A4C8 B4                                   or      h
 251++A4C9 A8                                   xor     b
 252++A4CA 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 253++A4CD                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 254++A4CD 32 DA A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 255++A4D0                                      ENDIF
 256++A4D0 C9                                   ret
 257++A4D1
 258++A4D1 2A 4C A2     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 259++A4D4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 260++A4D5 A7                                   and     a
 261++A4D6 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 262++A4D8 ED 5B 4F A2                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 263++A4DC 7D                                   ld      a,l
 264++A4DD                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 264++A4DD FE 16       >                        cp      22
 264++A4DF DA EB A4    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 265++A4E2 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 266++A4E4 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 267++A4E7                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 268++A4E7 32 DE A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 269++A4EA                                      ENDIF
 270++A4EA C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 271++A4EB              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 271++A4EB FE 12       >                        cp      18
 271++A4ED DA F9 A4    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 272++A4F0 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 273++A4F2 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 274++A4F5                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 275++A4F5 32 DE A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 276++A4F8                                      ENDIF
 277++A4F8 C9                                   ret
 278++A4F9              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 278++A4F9 AF          >                        xor a
 279++A4FA 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 280++A4FD                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 281++A4FD 32 DE A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 282++A500                                      ENDIF
 283++A500 C9                                   ret
 284++A501
 285++A501
 286++A501 CD 40 A5     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3b:  call    GetDistance                         ;
 287++A504 7C                                   ld      a,h
 288++A505 A7                                   and     a
 289++A506 06 16                                ld      b,22
 290++A508 20 08                                jr      nz,.NotSlow
 291++A50A 7D           .CloseSlowTest:         ld      a,l
 292++A50B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 30, .NotSlow
 292++A50B FE 1E       >                        cp     30
 292++A50D D2 12 A5    >                        jp		nc,.NotSlow
 293++A510 06 3C                                ld      b,60
 294++A512 2A 4C A2     .NotSlow:               ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)             ; if nosedir is negative (pointing the wrong way)
 295++A515 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; or nosedir < 22 (very far off)
 296++A516 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; do decelleration test
 297++A518 C2 29 A5                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .
 298++A51B 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; .
 299++A51C                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .DecelTest                ; .
 299++A51C B8          >                        cp      b
 299++A51D DA 29 A5    >                        jp		c, .DecelTest
 300++A520 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 301++A522 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 302++A525                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 303++A525 32 DE A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 304++A528                                      ENDIF
 305++A528 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 306++A529 7D           .DecelTest:             ld      a,l                                 ; if abs acelleration > 18
 307++A52A                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 18 ,.Deccelerate             ;    decelerate by 2
 307++A52A FE 12       >                        cp     18
 307++A52C D2 37 A5    >                        jp		nc,.Deccelerate
 308++A52F              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 308++A52F AF          >                        xor a
 309++A530 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 310++A533                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 311++A533 32 DE A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 312++A536                                      ENDIF
 313++A536 C9                                   ret
 314++A537 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 315++A539 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 316++A53C                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 317++A53C 32 DE A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 318++A53F                                      ENDIF
 319++A53F C9                                   ret
 320++A540
 321++A540 2A 89 A2     GetDistance:            ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX)
 322++A543 ED 5B 8D A2                          ld      de,(TacticsVectorY)
 323++A547 ED 4B 91 A2                          ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ)
 324++A54B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 325++A54C E6 7F                                and     $7F
 326++A54E 67                                   ld      h,a
 327++A54F 78                                   ld      a,b
 328++A550 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 329++A552 47                                   ld      b,a
 330++A553 7A                                   ld      a,d
 331++A554 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 332++A556 57                                   ld      d,a
 333++A557 09                                   add     hl,bc
 334++A558 19                                   add     hl,de
 335++A559                                      ShiftHLRight1
 335++A559 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 335++A55B CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 336++A55D                                      ShiftHLRight1
 336++A55D CB 3C       >			   srl h
 336++A55F CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 337++A561 C9                                   ret

  17++A586 01 1B 00                             ld      bc,NewLaunchDataBlockSize

  20++A58D CB 27                                sla     a

  22++A591              .ApplyToX:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatRoofvX     ; e =  ABS (nosev x hi) c = sign
  22++A591 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  22++A592 2A 30 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
  22++A595 7C          >                        ld      a,h

  22++A596 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit

  22++A599 ED 30       >                        mul     de
  22++A59B 7C          >                        ld      a,h

  22++A59C E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit

  23++A5A2 78                                   ld      a,b
  24++A5A3 EE 80                                xor     $80
  25++A5A5 47                                   ld      b,a
  26++A5A6              .AddSpeedToX:           AddSpeedToVert  NewLaunchUBnKX          ; 24 bit maths
  26++A5A6 ED 5B 63 A5 >                        ld      de,(NewLaunchUBnKX+1)
  26++A5AA 3A 62 A5    >                        ld      a,(NewLaunchUBnKX)
  26++A5AD 6F          >                        ld      l,a
  26++A5AE CD 14 01    >                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned               ; DEL = DEL + BCH
  26++A5B1 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  26++A5B2 32 62 A5    >                        ld      (NewLaunchUBnKX),a
  26++A5B5 ED 53 63 A5 >                        ld      (NewLaunchUBnKX+1),de
  27++A5B9              .ApplyToY:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  27++A5B9 FD 5D       >                        ld      e,iyl
  27++A5BB 2A 32 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
  27++A5BE 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  27++A5BF             >                        ClearSignBitA
  27++A5BF E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  27++A5C1 57          >                        ld      d,a
  27++A5C2 ED 30       >                        mul     de
  27++A5C4 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  27++A5C5             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  27++A5C5 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  27++A5C7 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  27++A5C8 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  27++A5C9 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0
  28++A5CB 78                                   ld      a,b
  29++A5CC EE 80                                xor     $80
  30++A5CE 47                                   ld      b,a
  31++A5CF              .AddSpeedToY:           AddSpeedToVert NewLaunchUBnKY           ; 24 bit maths
  31++A5CF ED 5B 66 A5 >                        ld      de,(NewLaunchUBnKY+1)
  31++A5D3 3A 65 A5    >                        ld      a,(NewLaunchUBnKY)
  31++A5D6 6F          >                        ld      l,a
  31++A5D7 CD 14 01    >                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned               ; DEL = DEL + BCH
  31++A5DA 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  31++A5DB 32 65 A5    >                        ld      (NewLaunchUBnKY),a
  31++A5DE ED 53 66 A5 >                        ld      (NewLaunchUBnKY+1),de
  32++A5E2              .ApplyToZ:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  32++A5E2 FD 5D       >                        ld      e,iyl
  32++A5E4 2A 34 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
  32++A5E7 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  32++A5E8             >                        ClearSignBitA
  32++A5E8 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  32++A5EA 57          >                        ld      d,a
  32++A5EB ED 30       >                        mul     de
  32++A5ED 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  32++A5EE             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  32++A5EE E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  32++A5F0 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  32++A5F1 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  32++A5F2 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0
  33++A5F4 78                                   ld      a,b
  34++A5F5 EE 80                                xor     $80
  35++A5F7 47                                   ld      b,a
  36++A5F8              .AddSpeedToZ:           AddSpeedToVert NewLaunchUBnKZ           ; 24 bit maths
  36++A5F8 ED 5B 69 A5 >                        ld      de,(NewLaunchUBnKZ+1)
  36++A5FC 3A 68 A5    >                        ld      a,(NewLaunchUBnKZ)
  36++A5FF 6F          >                        ld      l,a
  36++A600 CD 14 01    >                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned               ; DEL = DEL + BCH
  36++A603 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  36++A604 32 68 A5    >                        ld      (NewLaunchUBnKZ),a
  36++A607 ED 53 69 A5 >                        ld      (NewLaunchUBnKZ+1),de
  37++A60B C9                                   ret
  38++A60C
  39++A60C
  40++A60C
  41++A60C                                      ;DEFINE MISSILEBREAK
  42++A60C              ;.. Thsi version uses new kind logic
  43++A60C              ;... Now the tactics if current ship is the missile, when we enter this SelectedUniverseSlot holds slot of missile
  44++A60C              NormalAI:               IsAIEnabled                             ; check if AI is enabled for ship (say if its had a shut down event it may be disabled)
  44++A60C 21 73 C0    >                        ld      hl, UBnkaiatkecm
  44++A60F CB 7E       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,(hl)
  45++A611 C8                                   ret     z                               ; if z is set then bit was clear so return
  46++A612 CD 75 C6     .GetEnergy:             call    RechargeEnergy                  ; TA13 if enegery <= maxumum value for blueprint then recharge energy by 1
  47++A615                                      IsShipTrader
  47++A615 3A 2E C4    >                        ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  47++A618 E6 01       >                        and     ShipIsTrader
  48++A61A 20 06                                jr      nz, .NotATrader
  49++A61C CD D2 85     .ItsATrader:            call    doRandom
  50++A61F                                      ReturnIfALTNusng 100                    ; 61% chance do nothing
  50++A61F FE 64       >                        cp    100
  50++A621 D8          >                        ret	 c
  51++A622                                      IFDEF DEBUGFORCEHOSTILE
  52++A622 ~                                            call SetShipHostile
  53++A622 ~                                            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  54++A622 ~                                            or      ShipIsBountyHunter
  55++A622 ~                                            ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a
  56++A622                                      ENDIF
  57++A622              .NotATrader:
  58++A622 3A 2E C4     .IsItBountyHunter:      ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  59++A625 E6 02                                and     ShipIsBountyHunter
  60++A627 20 08                                jr      nz, .NotBountyHunter
  61++A629              .CheckFIST:             CallIfMemGTENusng FugitiveInnocentStatus, 40, SetShipHostile ; if our FIST rating >= 40 set ship hostile (bit 2)
  61++A629 3A 5D 80    >                        ld      a,(FugitiveInnocentStatus)
  61++A62C FE 28       >                        cp      40
  61++A62E D4 3A C6    >                        call    nc,SetShipHostile
  62++A631              .NotBountyHunter:
  63++A631              .CheckHostile:          IsShipHostile                           ; if ship is hostile z flag becomes nz
  63++A631 3A 2E C4    >                        ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  63++A634 E6 04       >                        and     ShipIsHostile
  64++A636 20 0B                                jr      nz,.ItsHostile                  ; .
  65++A638              ;.. If we get here its not hostile so will be heading towards planet or sun
  66++A638              ;.. If its locked on to a target (sun or planet) then it will proceed towards that,
  67++A638              ;.. if it reaches the sun it will jump
  68++A638              ;.. If it reaaches the planet it will then move to docking phase
  69++A638              .ItsNotHostile:         IsShipDocking                           ; if docking then do dockign algorithm
  69++A638 3A 2E C4    >                        ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  69++A63B E6 10       >                        and     ShipIsDocking
  70++A63D C2 5E A8                             jp      nz, UnivDocking
  71++A640 C3 E0 A7     .NotDocking:            jp      ShipHeadingToUnivBody
  72++A643                                      ; ret   Above jumps both include implicit returns
  73++A643
  74++A643 3A 2E C4     .ItsHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  75++A646 E6 08        .IsItPirate:            and     ShipIsPirate
  76++A648 20 12                                jr      nz,.NotAPirate
  77++A64A              .IsItInSafeZone:        ;      if we are not in space station safe zone
  78++A64A 3A 2E C4     .InSafeZone:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  79++A64D F6 81                                or      Bit7Only | ShipIsTrader
  80++A64F CD DF A9     .NotSafeZone:           call    SetPlayerAsTarget
  81++A652 CD BA A9                             call    CopyPosToVector
  82++A655                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
  82++A655 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
  83++A659 CD 54 9C                             call    NormalizeTactics
  84++A65C              .NotAPirate:
  85++A65C 3A 7D C0     .SpawnFighter:          ld      a,(UBnKFightersLeft)
  86++A65F A7                                   and     a
  87++A660 28 0C                                jr      z,.NoFighters
  88++A662 CD D2 85     .CanSpawnFighter:       call    doRandom
  89++A665                                      JumpIfALTNusng 200, .NoFighters
  89++A665 FE C8       >                        cp      200
  89++A667 DA 6E A6    >                        jp		c, .NoFighters
  90++A66A                                      ;break
  91++A66A                                      ;SPAWN FIGHTER of Type UBnKFighterShipId at Y - 20 z - 20
  92++A66A 21 7D C0                             ld      hl,UBnKFightersLeft             ;reduced figters left
  93++A66D 35                                   dec     (hl)
  94++A66E                                      ;inherits parent's ai angry
  95++A66E 3A A4 7E     .NoFighters:            ld      a,(RandomSeed3)                 ;if random >= 250
  96++A671 F6 68                                or      104                             ;set a noticable roll
  97++A673 3A 25 C4     .CheckEnergyLevels:     ld      a,(EnergyAddr)
  98++A676 47                                   ld      b,a
  99++A677 3A 77 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 100++A67A CB 38                                srl     b                               ; max energy / 2
 101++A67C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng b,.EnergyOverHalf       ; if ship max energy / 2 < current enerhy
 101++A67C B8          >                        cp     b
 101++A67D D2 9B A6    >                        jp		nc,.EnergyOverHalf
 102++A680 CB 38                                srl     b
 103++A682                                      JumpIfAGTENusng b,.EnergyOverQuater     ; if ship max enery / 4 < current energy
 103++A682 B8          >                        cp     b
 103++A683 D2 9B A6    >                        jp		nc,.EnergyOverQuater
 104++A686 3A 2E C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
 105++A689 E6 80                                and     ShipHasEscapePod
 106++A68B 28 0E                                jr      z, .NoEscapePod
 107++A68D 3A A3 7E                             ld      a,(RandomSeed2)
 108++A690                                      JumpIfALTNusng 230,.NoEscapePod         ;if random >= 230
 108++A690 FE E6       >                        cp      230
 108++A692 DA 9B A6    >                        jp		c, .NoEscapePod
 109++A695 CD B4 C7                             call    UnivClearAI                     ;  disable ship AI hostily and ECM
 110++A698                                      ;ZeroA                                   ;  .
 111++A698 32 79 C0                             ld      (UBnKECMFitted),a               ;  .
 112++A69B              .LaunchEscapePod:       ;break
 113++A69B                                      ;            goto spawn escape pod
 114++A69B              .EnergyOverHalf:
 115++A69B              .EnergyOverQuater:
 116++A69B 3A 7B C0     .NoEscapePod:           ld      a,(UBnKMissilesLeft)            ;      if missiles > 0
 117++A69E 47                                   ld      b,a
 118++A69F                                      JumpIfAIsZero .NoMissileLaunch
 118++A69F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 118++A6A0 CA B6 A6    >                        jp	    z, .NoMissileLaunch
 119++A6A3 3A A4 7E     .MissileLaunchTest:     ld      a,(RandomSeed3)                 ;         if random and 15 > = nbr missiles
 120++A6A6 E6 0F                                and     15
 121++A6A8                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .NoMissileLaunch
 121++A6A8 B8          >                        cp      b
 121++A6A9 DA B6 A6    >                        jp		c, .NoMissileLaunch
 122++A6AC 3A C1 7E                             ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 123++A6AF                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NoMissileLaunch
 123++A6AF A7          >                        and     a
 123++A6B0 C2 B6 A6    >                        jp	    nz,.NoMissileLaunch
 124++A6B3 C3 9D 61                             jp    LaunchEnemyMissile                ; jump out and return if firing missile
 125++A6B6 3A 21 C0     .NoMissileLaunch:       ld      a,(UBnKxhi)
 126++A6B9 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)
 127++A6BC B6                                   or      (hl)
 128++A6BD 2A 27 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)
 129++A6C0 B6                                   or      (hl)
 130++A6C1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 160, .TooFarForLaser   ; if in laser range (all highs order together < 160)
 130++A6C1 FE A0       >                        cp     160
 130++A6C3 D2 EA A6    >                        jp		nc,.TooFarForLaser
 131++A6C6 CD 4C A9                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev
 132++A6C9 47                                   ld      b,a
 133++A6CA 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 134++A6CD                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .TooFarForLaser        ;   if dot product of ship < 160 i.e. > -32
 134++A6CD A7          >                        and     a
 134++A6CE C2 EA A6    >                        jp	    nz,.TooFarForLaser
 135++A6D1 78                                   ld      a,b                            ;    .
 136++A6D2                                      JumpIfALTNusng    32, .DoneLaserShot  ;    .
 136++A6D2 FE 20       >                        cp      32
 136++A6D4 DA E5 A6    >                        jp		c, .DoneLaserShot
 137++A6D7              .FireLaser:             ;break                        ;      do fire laser logic (drain energy, add beam to lines as random line from ship to a random edge of screen)
 138++A6D7 78                                   ld      a,b ;; need to see if b gets corrupted by laser fire
 139++A6D8                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      35, .LaserHitPlayer
 139++A6D8 FE 23       >                        cp     35
 139++A6DA CA E5 A6    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 140++A6DD                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      36, .LaserHitPlayer
 140++A6DD FE 24       >                        cp     36
 140++A6DF CA E5 A6    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 141++A6E2 C3 E5 A6     .LaserMissedPlayer:     jp      .DoneLaserShot
 142++A6E5              .LaserHitPlayer:        ;break ;         do direct hit logic
 143++A6E5 21 66 C0     .DoneLaserShot:         ld      hl,UBnKAccel                   ;      Half attacking ship's accelleration in byte 28 (dec so must be 0 1 or 2)
 144++A6E8 CB 26                                sla     (hl)
 145++A6EA              .TooFarForLaser:
 146++A6EA              .UpdateShip             ;break
 147++A6EA CD 0A A1                             call    CalculateAgression              ; refresh aggression levels
 148++A6ED 3A 27 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzhi)
 149++A6F0                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 3, .ShipFarAway
 149++A6F0 FE 03       >                        cp     3
 149++A6F2 D2 00 A7    >                        jp		nc,.ShipFarAway
 150++A6F5 3A 21 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxhi)
 151++A6F8 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)
 152++A6FB B6                                   or      (hl)
 153++A6FC E6 FE                                and     %11111110
 154++A6FE 28 26                                jr      z,.ShipTurnAway
 155++A700 3A A3 7E     .ShipFarAway:           ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                     ; if random with bit 7 set < ship AI byte 32 flag
 156++A703                                      ;or      %10000000               ; .
 157++A703                                      JumpIfAGTEMemusng UBnKShipAggression, .ShipTurnAway
 157++A703 21 72 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnKShipAggression
 157++A706 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 157++A707 D2 26 A7    >                        jp		nc,.ShipTurnAway
 158++A70A                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 158++A70A 3A 8B A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 158++A70D EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 158++A70F 32 8B A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 159++A712                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 159++A712 3A 8F A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 159++A715 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 159++A717 32 8F A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 160++A71A                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 160++A71A 3A 93 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 160++A71D EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 160++A71F 32 93 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 161++A722 CD 2A A7                             call    ShipSeekingLogic            ;    seek as per missile
 162++A725 C9                                   ret
 163++A726 CD 2A A7     .ShipTurnAway:          call    ShipSeekingLogic            ; move away (ie.. as per missile but dot products not reversed)
 164++A729                                      ;              consider a random roll
 165++A729 C9                                   ret
 166++A72A
 167++A72A CD 4C A9     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 168++A72D 32 4C A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 169++A730 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 170++A733 32 50 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 171++A736 CD A2 A9     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 172++A739 32 4F A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 173++A73C 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 174++A73F 32 50 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 175++A742 CD 4C A7                             call    ShipPitchv3
 176++A745 CD 70 A7                             call    ShipRollv3
 177++A748 CD 9E A7                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 178++A74B C9                                   ret
 179++A74C
 180++A74C 2A 4F A2     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 181++A74F 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 182++A750 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 183++A752 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 184++A754 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 185++A755 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 186++A756 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 187++A758                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 187++A758 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 187++A75A D2 66 A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 188++A75D                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 188++A75D AF          >                        xor a
 189++A75E B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 190++A75F 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 191++A762                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 192++A762 32 DC A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 193++A765                                      ENDIF
 194++A765 C9                                   ret
 195++A766 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 196++A768 B4                                   or      h
 197++A769 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 198++A76C                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 199++A76C 32 DC A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 200++A76F                                      ENDIF
 201++A76F C9                                   ret
 202++A770
 203++A770 CD A8 A9     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 204++A773 32 52 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 205++A776 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 206++A777 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 207++A77A 32 53 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 208++A77D 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 209++A77E 3A 50 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 210++A781 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 211++A782 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 212++A783 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 213++A785                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 213++A785 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 213++A787 D2 93 A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 214++A78A                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 214++A78A AF          >                        xor a
 215++A78B B0                                   or      b
 216++A78C 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 217++A78F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 218++A78F 32 DA A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 219++A792                                      ENDIF
 220++A792 C9                                   ret
 221++A793 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 222++A795 B4                                   or      h
 223++A796 A8                                   xor     b
 224++A797 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 225++A79A                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 226++A79A 32 DA A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 227++A79D                                      ENDIF
 228++A79D C9                                   ret
 229++A79E
 230++A79E 2A 4C A2     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 231++A7A1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 232++A7A2 A7                                   and     a
 233++A7A3 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 234++A7A5 ED 5B 4F A2                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 235++A7A9 7D                                   ld      a,l
 236++A7AA                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 236++A7AA FE 16       >                        cp      22
 236++A7AC DA B8 A7    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 237++A7AF 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 238++A7B1 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 239++A7B4                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 240++A7B4 32 DE A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 241++A7B7                                      ENDIF
 242++A7B7 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 243++A7B8              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 243++A7B8 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 243++A7BA DA C6 A7    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 244++A7BD 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 245++A7BF 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 246++A7C2                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 247++A7C2 32 DE A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 248++A7C5                                      ENDIF
 249++A7C5 C9                                   ret
 250++A7C6              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 250++A7C6 AF          >                        xor a
 251++A7C7 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 252++A7CA                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++A7CA 32 DE A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 254++A7CD                                      ENDIF
 255++A7CD C9                                   ret
 256++A7CE
 257++A7CE              ;-------------------------------------------------------------------
 258++A7CE              ; randomly set tactics to fly towards sun or planet
 259++A7CE              ; updates UBnKHeadingToPlanetOrSun, 1 = planet, 2 = Sun
 260++A7CE CD D2 85     SetTargetBody:          call    doRandom                            ; random number
 261++A7D1 E6 01                                and     $01                                 ; if bit 1 is set then we can load that to planet and exit
 262++A7D3 C2 DC A7                             jp      nz,.SelectPlanet
 263++A7D6 3E 02        .SelectSun:             ld      a,2                                 ; else set it to 2 and mark as Sun
 264++A7D8 32 80 C0                             ld      (UBnKHeadingToPlanetOrSun),a
 265++A7DB C9                                   ret
 266++A7DC 32 80 C0     .SelectPlanet:          ld      (UBnKHeadingToPlanetOrSun),a
 267++A7DF C9                                   ret
 268++A7E0
 269++A7E0              ;-------------------------------------------------------------------
 270++A7E0              ; Sort out target heading for ship
 271++A7E0              ; if its 0 then randomly select sun or planet
 272++A7E0              ; after this work otu target position and course changes requried
 273++A7E0 3A 80 C0     ShipHeadingToUnivBody:  ld      a,(UBnKHeadingToPlanetOrSun)        ; do we have a preference?
 274++A7E3 A7                                   and     a
 275++A7E4 CC CE A7                             call    z,SetTargetBody                     ; no preference so we head randomly towards sun or planet then fall into movement tactics code
 276++A7E7 FE 01                                cp      1
 277++A7E9 C2 25 A8                             jp      nz, UpdateSunTracking               ; if its not 1 then must be sun
 278++A7EC              ;.. Update tracking to planet.......................................
 279++A7EC                          DISPLAY "TODO: Change this from move to planet to move to station as moving to planet is now superfluous"
 280++A7EC CD E6 82     UpdatePlanetTracking:   call    SaveMMU6                            ; save current ship

 291++A809              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem UBnKTargetXPosSgn                ; negate vector so it points opposite direction
 291++A809 3A 50 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnKTargetXPosSgn)
 291++A80C EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 291++A80E 32 50 C0    >                        ld  (UBnKTargetXPosSgn),a
 292++A811                                      FlipSignMem UBnKTargetXPosSgn                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 292++A811 3A 50 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnKTargetXPosSgn)
 292++A814 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit

 325++A860 CD 67 03     UnivSeekingLogic:       call    TacticsDotNosev                     ; TacticsVarResult = nose . Target Vector                           (     ->TAS3)
 326++A863 32 59 C0                             ld      ( UBnKTargetDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 327++A866 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 328++A869 32 5C C0                             ld      ( UBnKTargetDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 329++A86C CD A2 A9     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 330++A86F 32 4F A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 331++A872 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 332++A875 32 5C C0                             ld      ( UBnKTargetDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir

 354++A882              ;;;                        ENDIF

 393++A882              ;;;                        ENDIF

 407++A882              ;;;                        ENDIF

 414++A882              ;;;                        ENDIF

 286+ A882
 287+ A882              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 288+ A882              ; on exit a == new roll
 289+ A882 EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 290+ A884 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 291+ A886 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 292+ A887 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 293+ A889 3A 68 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 294+ A88C C9                                   ret
 295+ A88D
 296+ A88D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 297+ A88F 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 298+ A890 3A 4F A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 299+ A893                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 299+ A893 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 299+ A895 DA A2 A8    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 300+ A898 78                                   ld      a,b
 301+ A899 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 302+ A89B                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 303+ A89B                                     ; ld      a,
 304+ A89B 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 305+ A89D B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 306+ A89E 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 307+ A8A1 C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 308+ A8A2 B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 309+ A8A3 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;
 310+ A8A6 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 311+ A8A7
 312+ A8A7 3A 68 C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 313+ A8AA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 314+ A8AC EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 315+ A8AE F6 05                                or      5
 316+ A8B0 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 317+ A8B3 C9                                   ret
 318+ A8B4
 319+ A8B4 4F                                   ld      c,a
 320+ A8B5 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 321+ A8B7 3A 67 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 322+ A8BA C9                                   ret
 323+ A8BB
 324+ A8BB
 325+ A8BB
 326+ A8BB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 327+ A8BD 47                                   ld      b,a
 328+ A8BE 3A 4F A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 329+ A8C1                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 329+ A8C1 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 329+ A8C3 DA CD A8    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2

 345+ A8DE 21 31 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 346+ A8E1              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 347+ A8E1 11 6D A2     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 348+ A8E4 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 349+ A8E5 47                                   ld      b,a
 350+ A8E6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 351+ A8E8 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 352+ A8E9 13                                   inc     de
 353+ A8EA 78                                   ld      a,b
 354+ A8EB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 355+ A8ED 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 356+ A8EE 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 357+ A8EF 23                                   inc     hl
 358+ A8F0 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 359+ A8F1 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 360+ A8F2 47                                   ld      b,a
 361+ A8F3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 362+ A8F5 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 363+ A8F6 13                                   inc     de
 364+ A8F7 78                                   ld      a,b
 365+ A8F8 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 366+ A8FA 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 367+ A8FB 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 368+ A8FC 23                                   inc     hl
 369+ A8FD 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 370+ A8FE 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 371+ A8FF 47                                   ld      b,a
 372+ A900 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 373+ A902 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 374+ A903 13                                   inc     de
 375+ A904 78                                   ld      a,b
 376+ A905 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 377+ A907 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 378+ A908 C9                                   ret
