 408+ A94F 21 6D A2     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 409+ A952 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 410+ A953 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 411+ A954 3A 89 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 412+ A957 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 413+ A958 ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 414+ A95A 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 415+ A95B 32 AE 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 416+ A95E 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 417+ A95F 3A 8B A2     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 418+ A962 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 419+ A963 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 420+ A964 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 421+ A965 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 422+ A966 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 423+ A967 3A 8D A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 424+ A96A 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 425+ A96B ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 426+ A96D 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 427+ A96E 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 428+ A970 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 429+ A971 3A 8F A2     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 430+ A974 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 431+ A975 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 432+ A976 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 433+ A977 E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 434+ A978 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 435+ A97B 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 436+ A97D 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 437+ A97E CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 438+ A981 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 439+ A982 22 59 03                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 440+ A985 E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 441+ A986 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 442+ A987 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 443+ A988 3A 91 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 444+ A98B 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 445+ A98C ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 446+ A98E 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 447+ A98F 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 448+ A991 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 449+ A992 3A 93 A2     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 450+ A995 AE                                   xor     (hl)
 451+ A996 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 452+ A997 2A 59 03                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 453+ A99A CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 454+ A99D 32 AE 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 455+ A9A0 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 456+ A9A1 C9                                   ret
 457+ A9A2
 458+ A9A2 CD DE A8     XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv: call    CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat
 459+ A9A5 C3 4F A9                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 460+ A9A8
 461+ A9A8 CD D2 A8     XX12EquTacticsDotSidev: call    CopyRotSideToTacticsMat
 462+ A9AB C3 4F A9                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 463+ A9AE
 464+ A9AE 21 20 C0     CopyToTargetVector:     ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 465+ A9B1 11 79 A2                             ld      de,TacticsTargetX
 466+ A9B4 01 09 00                             ld      bc,9
 467+ A9B7 ED B0                                ldir
 468+ A9B9 C9                                   ret
 469+ A9BA
 470+ A9BA              ; Copies 24 bit XYZ Vector to tactics vectors
 471+ A9BA 2A 20 C0     CopyPosToVector:        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 472+ A9BD 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 473+ A9C0                                      ;xor     $80
 474+ A9C0 22 89 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 475+ A9C3 32 8B A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 476+ A9C6
 477+ A9C6 2A 23 C0     .CopyY24Bit:            ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 478+ A9C9 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 479+ A9CC                                      ;xor     $80
 480+ A9CC 22 8D A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 481+ A9CF 32 8F A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 482+ A9D2
 483+ A9D2 2A 26 C0     .CopyZ24Bit:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 484+ A9D5 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 485+ A9D8                                      ;xor     $80
 486+ A9D8 22 91 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 487+ A9DB 32 93 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 488+ A9DE C9                                   ret
 489+ A9DF
 490+ A9DF              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 490+ A9DF AF          >                        xor a
 491+ A9E0 21 79 A2                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 492+ A9E3 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 493+ A9E5 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 494+ A9E6 23                                   inc     hl
 495+ A9E7 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 496+ A9E9 C9                                   ret
 497+ A9EA
 498+ A9EA CD DF A9     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 499+ A9ED CD BA A9                             call    CopyPosToVector
 500+ A9F0                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 501+ A9F0                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2
 502+ A9F0                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetY+2
 503+ A9F0                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetZ+2
 504+ A9F0 C9                                   ret
 505+ A9F1
 506+ A9F1 ED 5B 79 A2  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 507+ A9F5 3A 7B A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 508+ A9F8                                      FlipSignBitA
 508+ A9F8 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 509+ A9FA 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 510+ A9FB 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 511+ A9FE 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 512+ AA01 47                                   ld      b,a
 513+ AA02 CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 514+ AA05 22 89 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 515+ AA08 32 8B A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 516+ AA0B ED 5B 7C A2  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 517+ AA0F 3A 7E A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 518+ AA12                                      FlipSignBitA
 518+ AA12 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 519+ AA14 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 520+ AA15 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 521+ AA18 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 522+ AA1B 47                                   ld      b,a
 523+ AA1C CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 524+ AA1F 22 8D A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 525+ AA22 32 8F A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 526+ AA25 ED 5B 7F A2  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 527+ AA29 3A 81 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 528+ AA2C                                      FlipSignBitA
 528+ AA2C EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 529+ AA2E 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 530+ AA2F 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 531+ AA32 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 532+ AA35 47                                   ld      b,a
 533+ AA36 CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 534+ AA39 22 91 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 535+ AA3C 32 93 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 536+ AA3F C9                                   ret
 537+ AA40
 538+ AA40              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 539+ AA40              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 540+ AA40              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 541+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths BankNormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 542+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 543+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 544+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank.ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 545+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        or      d
 546+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        or      b
 547+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        jr      z,.DoneScaling
 548+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ShiftHLRight1
 549+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ShiftDERight1
 550+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ShiftBCRight1
 551+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        jp      .ScaleLoop
 552+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank.DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 553+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 554+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 555+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 556+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 557+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        mul     de                          ; .
 558+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ex      de,hl                       ; .
 559+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 560+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        mul     de                          ; .
 561+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 562+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 563+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      e,c                         ; .
 564+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        mul     de                          ; .
 565+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 566+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 567+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 568+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 569+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      a,l                         ;
 570+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      iyh,a                       ;
 571+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 572+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 573+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 574+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 575+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 576+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        pop     de
 577+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      a,e
 578+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      d,iyh
 579+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 580+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 581+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        pop     hl
 582+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      a,l
 583+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      d,iyh
 584+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 585+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 586+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ; BODGE FOR NOW
 587+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                       ; BODGE FOR NOW
 588+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 589+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 590+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 591+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 592+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 593+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 594+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 595+ AA40              ; Moved to Maths Bank                        ret

 801+ AA40
 802+ AA40 2A 89 A2     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 803+ AA43 ED 5B 8D A2                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 804+ AA47 ED 4B 91 A2                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 805+ AA4B 3A 8B A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 806+ AA4E FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 807+ AA50 3A 8F A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 808+ AA53 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 809+ AA55 3A 93 A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 810+ AA58 DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 811+ AA5A FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 812+ AA5C FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 813+ AA5E                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 813+ AA5E E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 814+ AA60 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 815+ AA62 FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 816+ AA64 CB 2F                            sra     a
 817+ AA66 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 818+ AA68 CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 819+ AA6A CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 820+ AA6C FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 821+ AA6E CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 822+ AA70 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 823+ AA72 CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 824+ AA74 CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 825+ AA76 DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 826+ AA78 CB 2F                            sra     a
 827+ AA7A DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 828+ AA7C CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 829+ AA7E CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 830+ AA80 C3 5A AA                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 831+ AA83 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 832+ AA84 B2                               or      d
 833+ AA85 B0                               or      b
 834+ AA86                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 834+ AA86 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 835+ AA88 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 836+ AA8A              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 836+ AA8A CB 3C       >			   srl h
 836+ AA8C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 837+ AA8E                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 837+ AA8E CB 3A       >			   srl d
 837+ AA90 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 838+ AA92                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 838+ AA92 CB 38       >			   srl b
 838+ AA94 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 839+ AA96 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 840+ AA97 FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 841+ AA99 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 842+ AA9A 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 843+ AA9B FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 844+ AA9D 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 845+ AA9E 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 846+ AA9F DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 847+ AAA1 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 848+ AAA2 22 99 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 849+ AAA5 22 9D A2                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 850+ AAA8 22 A1 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 851+ AAAB C9                               ret
 852+ AAAC                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 853+ AAAC
# file closed: ./GameEngine/Tactics.asm

  21+ AAAC              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  22+ AAAC              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  23+ AAAC F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  23+ AAB0 DD E5
  24+ AAB2 AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  25+ AAB3 CF                                   rst	    $08
  26+ AAB4 89                                   db	    M_GETSETDRV
  27+ AAB5 32 4A AB                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  28+ AAB8 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  28+ AABC C1 F1
  29+ AABE C9                                   ret

  84+ AACD              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  85+ AACD              ;               zero set  = no data loaded so still error
  86+ AACD              ;   you can use fRefill_map to pull default valuess

 107+ AACD              ; Start up stream of data
 108+ AACD              ; If successful, the call returns with:
 109+ AACD              ; B=protocol: 0=SD/MMC, 1=IDE,  C=data port
 110+ AACD              ; NOTE: On the Next, these values will always be: B=0 C=$EB

 189+ AACD              ;.FileStreamError:       jp      .FileStreamError
 190+ AACD              ;
 191+ AACD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 192+ AACD              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ AACD              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ AACD              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ AACD              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ AACD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ AACD B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ AACE C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ AACF E5                                   push    hl
 200+ AAD0 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ AAD3 CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ AAD4 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ AAD5 E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ AAD6 C9                                   ret
 205+ AAD7
 206+ AAD7              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 207+ AAD7              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ AAD7              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ AAD7              ;			bc  = amount to write
 210+ AAD7              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 211+ AAD7              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ AAD7 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ AAD8 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ AAD9 E5                                   push	hl
 215+ AADA DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 216+ AADD CF                                   rst	    $08
 217+ AADE 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ AADF E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ AAE0 C9                                   ret
 220+ AAE1
 221+ AAE1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 222+ AAE1              ;	Function:	Close open file
 223+ AAE1              ;	In:		a  = handle
 224+ AAE1              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
 225+ AAE1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 226+ AAE1 B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
 227+ AAE2 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 228+ AAE3 CF                                   rst	    $08
 229+ AAE4 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
 230+ AAE5 C9                                   ret

 247+ AAE6
 248+ AAE6              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 249+ AAE6              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 250+ AAE6              ;	In:		a   = file handle
 251+ AAE6              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
 252+ AAE6              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
 253+ AAE6              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
 254+ AAE6              ; *******************************************************************************************************

 256+ AAE9 CF                                   rst	    $08
 257+ AAEA 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK

 259+ AAEE C9                                   ret
 260+ AAEF
 261+ AAEF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 262+ AAEF              ; Init the file system
 263+ AAEF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 264+ AAEF CD AC AA     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
 265+ AAF2 C9                                   ret
 266+ AAF3
 267+ AAF3              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ AAF3              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ AAF3              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ AAF3              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ AAF3              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ AAF3              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ AAF3 CD AC AA     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ AAF6 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ AAF9                                      ; get file size
 276+ AAF9 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ AAFC E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ AAFF 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ AB01 CD BF AA                             call    fOpen
 280+ AB04 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ AB06 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ AB08 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ AB0A DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ AB0D F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ AB0E CD CD AA                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ AB11 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ AB13 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ AB14 CD E1 AA                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ AB17 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ AB19 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ AB1C C9                                   ret
 292+ AB1D              ;
 293+ AB1D              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ AB1D              ;
 295+ AB1D DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ AB1F C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ AB20
 298+ AB20              .error_closing:
 299+ AB20 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ AB21 D1                                   pop	de
 301+ AB22 C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ AB23 C9                                   ret
 303+ AB24
 304+ AB24              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ AB24              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ AB24              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ AB24              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ AB24              ;		    bc = size
 309+ AB24              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ AB24 CD AC AA     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ AB27 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ AB2A E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ AB2D 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ AB2F CD BF AA                             call    fOpen
 315+ AB32 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ AB34 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ AB36 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ AB38 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ AB3B F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ AB3C CD D7 AA                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ AB3F 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ AB41 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ AB42 CD E1 AA                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ AB45 C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ AB46              ;
 326+ AB46              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ AB46              ;
 328+ AB46 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ AB49 C9                                   ret

  19+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCTprint_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCTBoilerTextLoop:
  22+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  25+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  27+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  29+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  31+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT    MMUSelectLayer2
  35+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	call		l1_print_at
  36+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	pop			hl
  37+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	pop			bc
  38+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT	ret
  40+ AEC5
  41+ AEC5
  42+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT print_boiler_text:
  43+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  48+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  50+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  52+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  54+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	push		bc
  58+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			de
  59+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	call		l1_print_at
  60+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			hl
  61+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			bc
  62+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ AEC5              ;:DEFUNCT 	ret
  64+ AEC5
  65+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCTGetFuelLevel:           INCLUDE "Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm"
  66+ AEC5
  67+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCTGetCash:                ld      hl,(Cash)
  68+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT                        ex      de,hl
  69+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT                        ld      ix,(Cash+2)
  70+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT                        ld		iy,txt_cash_amount
  71+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT                        call 	DispDEIXtoIY	; This will write out with 0 termination after last digit
  72+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT.ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal
  73+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT                        ld		(txt_cash_fraction),a
  74+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT.UpdateInteger:         ld		hl,txt_cash_amount+1	; Now was there only 1 digit
  75+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT                        ld		a,(hl)					; if so we leave it alone so its "0.0"
  76+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT                        cp		0
  77+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT                        ret		z
  78+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT                        ld		(IY),0					; Else we erase last digit as it went to fraction
  79+ AEC5              ;;DEFUNCT                        ret
  80+ AEC5
# file closed: ./Menus/common_menu.asm

 622  B104
 623  B104 60 00        IR_COUNT        dw  $0060
 624  B106
 625  B106 00           LAST_DELTA          db  0
 626  B107 00           SavedMMU6           db  0               ; use by interrupt handler only
 627  B108 00           SavedMMU7           db  0               ; use by interrupt handler only
 628  B109              SoundInterrupt      EQU IM2Sound
 629  B109              DanubeInterrupt     EQU IM2PlayDanube
 630  B109              AttractInterrrupt   EQU IM2AttractMode
 631  B109
 632  B109
 633  B109              StartOfInterruptHandler:
 634  B109                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code Ends At", StartOfInterruptHandler
 635  B109
 636  B109                              ; NOTE play then equeue simplifies ligic, more chance slot free
 637  B109                              org $B1B1
 638  B1B1                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Starts at",$
 639  B1B1              ; keeping the handler to a minimal size in order to make best use of
 640  B1B1              ; non pageable memory
 641  B1B1              IM2Routine:             IFDEF INTERRUPT_BLOCKER
 642  B1B1 ~                                            DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Enabled"
 643  B1B1 ~                                            ei
 644  B1B1 ~                                            reti
 645  B1B1                                      ELSE
 646  B1B1                                              DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Disabled"
 647  B1B1                                      ENDIF
 648  B1B1 F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
 648  B1B5 DD E5 FD E5
 649  B1B9 08                                   ex      af,af'
 650  B1BA D9                                   exx
 651  B1BB F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl
 652  B1BF 21 AA 7F                             ld      hl,InterruptCounter
 653  B1C2 34                                   inc     (hl)                        ; cycles each interrupt
 654  B1C3                                      ;break
 655  B1C3 CD D7 B1     IM2SoundHandler:        call    IM2Sound                    ; This is a self modifying code address to change the actual sound vector if we are doing special music e.g. intro or docking
 656  B1C6 E1 D1 C1 F1                          pop    af,,bc,,de,,hl
 657  B1CA 08                                   ex      af,af'
 658  B1CB D9                                   exx
 659  B1CC FD E1 DD E1                          pop     af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
 659  B1D0 E1 D1 C1 F1
 660  B1D4 FB           .IMFinishup:            ei
 661  B1D5 ED 4D                                reti
 662  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Ends at",$
 663  B1D7              EndOfNonBanked:
 664  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code + Interrupt Handler Ends At", EndOfNonBanked
 665  B1D7
 666  B1D7
 667  B1D7              ;SaveMMU6:               MACRO
 668  B1D7              ;                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 669  B1D7              ;                        ld      (SavedMMU6),a
 670  B1D7              ;                        ENDM
 671  B1D7              ;
 672  B1D7              ;RestoreMMU6:            MACRO
 673  B1D7              ;                        ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 674  B1D7              ;                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 675  B1D7              ;                        ENDM
 676  B1D7              ;
 677  B1D7              ;SaveMMU7:               MACRO
 678  B1D7              ;                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 679  B1D7              ;                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 680  B1D7              ;                        ENDM
 681  B1D7              ;
 682  B1D7              ;RestoreMMU7:            MACRO
 683  B1D7              ;                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 684  B1D7              ;                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 685  B1D7              ;                        ENDM
 686  B1D7
 687  B1D7              IM2Sound:               SaveMMU7
 687  B1D7             >                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 687  B1D7 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 687  B1DA 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 687  B1DC ED 79       >            out (c),a
 687  B1DE 04          >            inc b
 687  B1DF ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 687  B1E1 32 08 B1    >                    ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 688  B1E4                                      MMUSelectSound
 688  B1E4 ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
 689  B1E8                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
 690  B1E8                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
 691  B1E8                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
 692  B1E8 CD 00 E0     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    SoundInterruptHandler       ; this does the work
 693  B1EB              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
 693  B1EB 3A 08 B1    >                    ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 693  B1EE ED 92 57    >                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 694  B1F1 C9                                   ret
 695  B1F2
 696  B1F2
 697  B1F2              IM2PlayDanube:          SaveMMU7
 697  B1F2             >                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 697  B1F2 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 697  B1F5 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 697  B1F7 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 697  B1F9 04          >            inc b
 697  B1FA ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 697  B1FC 32 08 B1    >                    ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 698  B1FF                                      MMUSelectSound
 698  B1FF ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
 699  B203                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
 700  B203                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
 701  B203                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
 702  B203 CD 1B E4     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    PlayDanube                  ; this does the work
 703  B206              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
 703  B206 3A 08 B1    >                    ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 703  B209 ED 92 57    >                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 704  B20C C9                                   ret
 705  B20D
 706  B20D              IM2AttractMode:         ;break
 707  B20D                                  IFDEF SKIPATTRACTMUSIC
 708  B20D ~                                    DISPLAY "Attract mode Music disabled"
 709  B20D                                  ELSE
 710  B20D                                      DISPLAY "Attract mode Music enabled"
 711  B20D CD F2 B1                             call    IM2PlayDanube
 712  B210                                  ENDIF
 713  B210                                  IFDEF SKIPATTRACTGRAPHICS
 714  B210 ~                                    DISPLAY "Attract mode graphics disabled"
 715  B210                                  ELSE
 716  B210                                      DISPLAY "Attract mode graphics enabled"
 717  B210                                      SaveMMU6
 717  B210             >                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 717  B210 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 717  B213 3E 56       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 717  B215 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 717  B217 04          >            inc b
 717  B218 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 717  B21A 32 07 B1    >                    ld      (SavedMMU6),a
 718  B21D                                      SaveMMU7
 718  B21D             >                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 718  B21D 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 718  B220 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 718  B222 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 718  B224 04          >            inc b
 718  B225 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 718  B227 32 08 B1    >                    ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 719  B22A                                      ;break
 720  B22A CD 00 79                             call    AttractModeUpdate
 721  B22D                                      RestoreMMU6
 721  B22D 3A 07 B1    >                    ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 721  B230 ED 92 56    >                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 722  B233                                      RestoreMMU7
 722  B233 3A 08 B1    >                    ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 722  B236 ED 92 57    >                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 723  B239                                  ENDIF
 724  B239 C9                                   ret

  33+ C0C2              SRM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C0C2
   2++C0C2              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C0C2 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C0C3 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C0C4 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C0C5 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C0C6 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C0C7 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C0C8 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C0C9 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C0CA 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C0CB E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C0CC EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C0CD 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C0CF C5                                   push		bc
  16++C0D0 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C0D1                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C0D1 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0D5 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0D8 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0D9 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0DA 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0DC C9                                   ret
  23++C0DD
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
  34+ C0DD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  35+ C0DD              SRM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair:
  36+ C0DD ED 4B 4E 80                          ld		bc,(PresentSystemX)				; bc = present system
  37+ C0E1 01 80 60                             ld		bc,src_xy_centre					; must be ordered x y in data
  38+ C0E4                                      MMUSelectSpriteBank
  38+ C0E4 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
  39+ C0E8 CD 65 E1                             call	sprite_local_cursor
  40+ C0EB 3A 89 85                             ld		a,(Fuel)
  41+ C0EE 57                                   ld		d,a
  42+ C0EF 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
  43+ C0F1                                      MMUSelectLayer2
  43+ C0F1 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  44+ C0F5 CD C6 EB                             call	l2_draw_circle
  45+ C0F8 C9                                   ret
  46+ C0F9                                                      DISPLAY "TODO:  move cursor code"
  47+ C0F9              ; TODO MOVE CURSOR CODE
  48+ C0F9              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  49+ C0F9              SRM_draw_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  50+ C0F9 ED 4B 50 80                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  51+ C0FD ED 5B 4E 80                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  52+ C101 0E 80                                ld		c,src_x_centre
  53+ C103 06 60                                ld		b,src_y_centre
  54+ C105                                      MMUSelectSpriteBank
  54+ C105 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
  55+ C109 CD 6D E1                             call	sprite_local_hyper_cursor
  56+ C10C C9                                   ret
  57+ C10D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  58+ C10D 3A 3B 80     src_get_name:           ld      a,(Galaxy)
  59+ C110                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
  59+ C110 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
  60+ C113 ED 4B 50 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
  61+ C117 ED 43 5B E8                          ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc
  62+ C11B CD 64 FC                             call    galaxy_system_under_cursor
  63+ C11E FE 00                                cp      0
  64+ C120 C8                                   ret     z
  65+ C121 CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed
  66+ C124 21 44 90                             ld		hl,name_expanded
  67+ C127 CD 99 8F                             call	CapitaliseString
  68+ C12A 21 44 90                             ld		hl, name_expanded
  69+ C12D 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  70+ C12F C9                                   ret
  71+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  73+ C130 ED 4B 50 80                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  74+ C134 ED 5B 4E 80                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  75+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  76+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  77+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  78+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  79+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  80+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  81+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  82+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  83+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  84+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  85+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  86+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  87+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  88+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  89+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  90+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  91+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  92+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  93+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  94+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  95+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  96+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  97+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  98+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  99+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
 100+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
 101+ C165 C6 60                                add		a,src_y_centre
 102+ C167 47                                   ld		b,a
 103+ C168              .RedrawSprite:          MMUSelectSpriteBank
 103+ C168 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 104+ C16C CD 40 E1                             call	sprite_lhc_move
 105+ C16F CD A1 C1                             call    src_name_current
 106+ C172 C9                                   ret
 107+ C173
 108+ C173 26 08        src_clear_name_area:    ld      h,8
 109+ C175 11 E3 A0                             ld      de,$A000 | COLOUR_TRANSPARENT
 110+ C178 01 0A A8                             ld      bc,$A80A
 111+ C17B E5           .ClearLoop:             push    hl
 112+ C17C D5                                   push    de
 113+ C17D C5                                   push    bc
 114+ C17E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 114+ C17E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 115+ C182 CD 84 E4                             call	l2_draw_horz_line

 119+ C188 04                                   inc     b

 124+ C18D 3A 3B 80     src_system_undercursor: ld      a,(Galaxy)

 143+ C1BA CD CD C1                             call    src_calc_distance
 144+ C1BD 21 1A C0                             ld      hl,src_distance

 146+ C1C3 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 147+ C1C5                                      MMUSelectLayer2

 148+ C1C9 CD BE E3                             call	l2_print_7at
 149+ C1CC C9                                   ret
 150+ C1CD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ C1CD 3A 3B 80     src_calc_distance:      ld      a,(Galaxy)                                      ; Default in 0 distance
 152+ C1D0                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 152+ C1D0 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 153+ C1D3 11 24 C0                             ld      de,src_dist_amount
 154+ C1D6 21 36 C0                             ld      hl,src_default_dist
 155+ C1D9 ED A0                                ldi
 156+ C1DB ED A0                                ldi
 157+ C1DD ED A0                                ldi
 158+ C1DF ED A0                                ldi
 159+ C1E1 ED A0                                ldi
 160+ C1E3 ED 4B 4E 80                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)
 161+ C1E7 ED 43 57 E8                          ld      (GalaxyPresentSystem),bc
 162+ C1EB ED 4B 50 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 163+ C1EF ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 164+ C1F3 CD F7 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance                            ; get distance into HL
 165+ C1F6 DD 2A 70 80                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 166+ C1FA 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
 167+ C1FD FD 21 3B C0                          ld      iy,src_distance_val
 168+ C201 CD 94 9D                             call    DispDEIXtoIY                                    ; use DEIX as distance and write to string at location IY
 169+ C204 FD E5                                push    iy
 170+ C206 E1                                   pop     hl                                              ; hl = iy
 171+ C207 11 3B C0                             ld      de,src_distance_val
 172+ C20A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)				                            ;Push last digit to post decimal
 173+ C20B 32 28 C0                             ld		(src_fraction),a
 174+ C20E 2B                                   dec     hl
 175+ C20F CD BD 9A                             call    compare16HLDE
 176+ C212 38 18                                jr      c,.done_number
 177+ C214 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 178+ C215 32 26 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+2),a
 179+ C218 2B                                   dec     hl
 180+ C219 CD BD 9A                             call    compare16HLDE
 181+ C21C 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 182+ C21E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 183+ C21F 32 25 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount+1),a
 184+ C222 2B                                   dec     hl
 185+ C223 CD BD 9A                             call    compare16HLDE
 186+ C226 38 04                                jr      c,.done_number
 187+ C228 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 188+ C229 32 24 C0                             ld      (src_dist_amount),a
 189+ C22C C9           .done_number:           ret
 190+ C22D
 191+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 192+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 193+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 194+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 195+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 196+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 198+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 199+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 200+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 201+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 202+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 203+ C236 83                                   add     e
 204+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 205+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 206+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 207+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 208+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 209+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 210+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 211+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 212+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 213+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 214+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 215+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 216+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 217+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 218+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 219+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 220+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 221+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 222+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 223+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 223+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 223+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 224+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 225+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 225+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 225+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 226+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 227+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 228+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 228+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 228+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 229+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 230+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 230+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 230+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 231+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 232+ C284 C9                                   ret
 233+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 234+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 236+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 237+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 238+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text
 239+ C292 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 240+ C295 57                                   ld      d,a
 241+ C296 1E 04                                ld      e,4
 242+ C298 ED 30                                mul
 243+ C29A 19                                   add     hl,de
 244+ C29B ED 5B 2D C2                          ld      de,(PosScan1)
 245+ C29F 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 246+ C2A3 23                                   inc     hl
 247+ C2A4 23                                   inc     hl
 248+ C2A5 ED 5B 2F C2                          ld      de,(PosScan2)
 249+ C2A9 73 23 72 2B                          ld      (hl),de
 250+ C2AD 21 C1 C0                             ld      hl,src_buffer_size
 251+ C2B0 34                                   inc     (hl)
 252+ C2B1 AF                                   xor     a
 253+ C2B2 C9                                   ret
 254+ C2B3
 255+ C2B3 CD 58 86     src_label_ssytem:       call	copy_system_to_working
 256+ C2B6 3A 3B 80                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 257+ C2B9                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 257+ C2B9 ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 258+ C2BC CD 82 F6                             call	GetDigramWorkingSeed

 272+ C2D9 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; String must have a terminator to work

 275+ C2DF C5                                   push    bc

 277+ C2E3 C1                                   pop     bc
 278+ C2E4 FE 00                                cp      0
 279+ C2E6 28 19                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 280+ C2E8 78                                   ld      a,b
 281+ C2E9 C6 08                                add     8
 282+ C2EB 47                                   ld      b,a
 283+ C2EC C5                                   push    bc
 284+ C2ED CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 285+ C2F0 C1                                   pop     bc
 286+ C2F1 FE 00                                cp      0
 287+ C2F3 28 0C                                jr      z,.OKToPrint
 288+ C2F5 78                                   ld      a,b

 290+ C2F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 291+ C2F9 C5                                   push    bc
 292+ C2FA CD 31 C2                             call    FreeSlotCheck           ; attempt down 8 pixels attemps
 293+ C2FD C1                                   pop     bc
 294+ C2FE FE 00                                cp      0
 295+ C300 C0                                   ret     nz

 367+ C38F 3A 4F 80     SRCcalcLocaldy:         ld		a,(PresentSystemY)

 422+ C412             >                            MMUSelectSpriteBank
 422+ C412 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 422+ C416 CD 85 E7    >                            call    sprite_cls_cursors
 423+ C419 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 424+ C41B 32 B9 7F                             ld      (MenuIdMax),a
 425+ C41E                                      CopyPresentSystemToTarget               ; for short range we always start at present and cusor on present
 425+ C41E 2A 4E 80    >                        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 425+ C421 22 50 80    >                        ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 426+ C424 01 01 01     SRCDrawbox:             ld		bc,$0101
 427+ C427 11 FD BE                             ld		de,$BEFD
 428+ C42A 3E C0                                ld		a,$C0
 429+ C42C                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 429+ C42C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 430+ C430 CD F9 E3                             call	l2_draw_box
 431+ C433 01 01 0A                             ld		bc,$0A01
 432+ C436 11 C0 FE                             ld		de,$FEC0
 433+ C439                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 433+ C439 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 434+ C43D CD 84 E4                             call	l2_draw_horz_line
 435+ C440 3E 0C        SRCStaticText:          ld		a,short_range_header
 436+ C442 CD BF 8F                             call	expandTokenToString
 437+ C445 06 01                                ld		b,1
 438+ C447 21 10 C0                             ld		hl,short_range_boiler_text
 439+ C44A CD C2 C0                             call	SRM_print_boiler_text
 440+ C44D CD 25 86     SRCSetUpChart:          call	copy_galaxy_to_system
 441+ C450 CD 65 C3                             call	plot_local_stars
 442+ C453 CD DD C0     .CircleandCrosshair:    call	SRM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair
 443+ C456 CD F9 C0                             call	SRM_draw_hyperspace_cross_hair
 444+ C459 C9                                   ret
 445+ C45A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 446+ C45A 3A B7 81     local_chart_cursors:    ld     a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 447+ C45D                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 447+ C45D A7          >                        and     a
 447+ C45E C8          >                        ret     z
 448+ C45F 17                                   rla
 449+ C460 DC 78 C4                             call   c,src_UpPressed
 450+ C463 17                                   rla
 451+ C464 DC 95 C4                             call   c,src_DownPressed
 452+ C467 17                                   rla
 453+ C468 DC B4 C4                             call   c,src_LeftPressed
 454+ C46B 17                                   rla
 455+ C46C DC D1 C4                             call   c,src_RightPressed
 456+ C46F 17                                   rla
 457+ C470 DC F0 C4                             call   c,src_HomePressed
 458+ C473 17                                   rla
 459+ C474 DC FA C4                             call   c,src_RecenterPressed
 460+ C477 C9                                   ret
 461+ C478              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 462+ C478 3A 51 80     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetSystemY)
 463+ C47B                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 463+ C47B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 463+ C47C CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 464+ C47F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 465+ C480 3A 4F 80                             ld      a,(PresentSystemY)
 466+ C483 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 467+ C484 FA 8C C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 468+ C487                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 468+ C487 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 468+ C489 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 469+ C48C 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 470+ C48D 3D                                   dec     a
 471+ C48E 32 51 80                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 472+ C491 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 473+ C494 C9                                   ret
 474+ C495              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 475+ C495 3A 4F 80     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(PresentSystemY)
 476+ C498 47                                   ld      b,a
 477+ C499 3A 51 80                             ld      a,(TargetSystemY)
 478+ C49C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 479+ C49D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 128,src_BoundsLimit
 479+ C49D FE 80       >                        cp     128
 479+ C49F CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 480+ C4A2 90                                   sub     b
 481+ C4A3 FA AB C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 482+ C4A6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit
 482+ C4A6 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 482+ C4A8 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 483+ C4AB 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 484+ C4AC 3C                                   inc    a
 485+ C4AD 32 51 80                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 486+ C4B0 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 487+ C4B3 C9                                   ret
 488+ C4B4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 489+ C4B4 3A 50 80     src_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(TargetSystemX)           ; we can't move left if target is zero
 490+ C4B7                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 490+ C4B7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 490+ C4B8 CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 491+ C4BB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 492+ C4BC 3A 4E 80                             ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 493+ C4BF 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 494+ C4C0 FA C8 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 495+ C4C3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 495+ C4C3 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 495+ C4C5 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 496+ C4C8 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 497+ C4C9 3D                                   dec     a
 498+ C4CA 32 50 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 499+ C4CD CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 500+ C4D0 C9                                   ret
 501+ C4D1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 502+ C4D1 3A 4E 80     src_RightPressed:       ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 503+ C4D4 47                                   ld      b,a
 504+ C4D5 3A 50 80                             ld      a,(TargetSystemX)
 505+ C4D8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 506+ C4D9                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 506+ C4D9 FE FF       >                        cp     255
 506+ C4DB CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 507+ C4DE 90                                   sub     b
 508+ C4DF FA E7 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 509+ C4E2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit
 509+ C4E2 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 509+ C4E4 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 510+ C4E7 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 511+ C4E8 3C                                   inc    a
 512+ C4E9 32 50 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 513+ C4EC CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 514+ C4EF C9                                   ret
 515+ C4F0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 516+ C4F0 2A 4E 80     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 517+ C4F3 22 50 80                             ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 518+ C4F6 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 519+ C4F9 C9                                   ret
 520+ C4FA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 521+ C4FA 3A 3B 80     src_RecenterPressed:    ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 522+ C4FD                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 522+ C4FD ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 523+ C500 ED 4B 50 80                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 524+ C504 CD 70 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 525+ C507 ED 43 50 80                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 526+ C50B CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 527+ C50E C9                                   ret
 528+ C50F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 529+ C50F AF           src_BoundsLimit:        xor     a
 530+ C510 C9                                   ret

  28+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C08F 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C090 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C091 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C092 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C093 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C094 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C095 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C096 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C097 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C098 EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C099 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C09B C5                                   push		bc
  16++C09C D1                                   pop			de
  17++C09D                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0A1 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0A4 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0A5 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0A6 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0A8 C9                                   ret
  23++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 182+ C25B C9                                   ret
