 790  E297                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/l2_flip_buffers.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_flip_buffers.asm
   1+ E297              l2_flip_buffers:        GetNextReg LAYER2_RAM_PAGE_REGISTER
   1+ E297 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
   1+ E29A 3E 12       >            ld a,LAYER2_RAM_PAGE_REGISTER
   1+ E29C ED 79       >            out (c),a
   1+ E29E 04          >            inc b
   1+ E29F ED 78       >            in a,(c)
   2+ E2A1 57                                   ld      d,a
   3+ E2A2                                      GetNextReg LAYER2_RAM_SHADOW_REGISTER
   3+ E2A2 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
   3+ E2A5 3E 13       >            ld a,LAYER2_RAM_SHADOW_REGISTER
   3+ E2A7 ED 79       >            out (c),a
   3+ E2A9 04          >            inc b
   3+ E2AA ED 78       >            in a,(c)
   4+ E2AC 5F                                   ld      e,a
   5+ E2AD ED 92 12                             nextreg LAYER2_RAM_PAGE_REGISTER, a
   6+ E2B0 7A                                   ld      a,d
   7+ E2B1 ED 92 13                             nextreg LAYER2_RAM_SHADOW_REGISTER, a
   8+ E2B4 C9                                   ret
   9+ E2B5
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_flip_buffers.asm
 791  E2B5                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_pixel.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_pixel.asm
   1+ E2B5
   2+ E2B5 DF           line_gfx_colour db $DF
   3+ E2B6
   4+ E2B6              l2_plot_macro:          MACRO
   5+ E2B6 ~                                    ld      a,b
   6+ E2B6 ~                                    JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
   7+ E2B6 ~                                    ld      l,c
   8+ E2B6 ~                                    call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
   9+ E2B6 ~                                    ld      h,a
  10+ E2B6 ~                                    ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
  11+ E2B6 ~                                    ld      (hl),a
  12+ E2B6 ~            .NoPlot:
  13+ E2B6                                      ENDM
  14+ E2B6
  15+ E2B6
  16+ E2B6              ; ">l2_plot_pixel b= row number, c = column number, a = pixel col"
  17+ E2B6 F5           l2_plot_pixel:          push    af
  18+ E2B7 78                                   ld      a,b
  19+ E2B8              l2_pp_row_valid:        JumpIfAGTENusng ScreenHeight,l2_pp_dont_plot
  19+ E2B8 FE C0       >                        cp     ScreenHeight
  19+ E2BA D2 C8 E2    >                        jp		nc,l2_pp_dont_plot
  20+ E2BD C5                                   push    bc								; bank select destroys bc so need to save it
  21+ E2BE                                  ;	ld      a,b
  22+ E2BE CD 68 E0                             call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  23+ E2C1 C1                                   pop     bc
  24+ E2C2 47                                   ld      b,a
  25+ E2C3 60                                   ld      h,b								; hl now holds ram address after bank select
  26+ E2C4 69                                   ld      l,c
  27+ E2C5 F1                                   pop     af								; a = colour to plott
  28+ E2C6 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  29+ E2C7 C9                                   ret
  30+ E2C8 F1           l2_pp_dont_plot:        pop     af
  31+ E2C9 C9                                   ret
  32+ E2CA
  33+ E2CA              ; ">l2_plot_pixel d= row number, hl = column number, e = pixel col"
  34+ E2CA 7C           l2_plot_pixel_320:      ld      a,h
  35+ E2CB FE 01                                cp      1                               ; if < 256, definite OK
  36+ E2CD 20 05                                jr      nz,.DoneCheck
  37+ E2CF 7D                                   ld      a,l
  38+ E2D0 E6 C0                                and     %11000000                       ; if its 7 or 6 set then > 319
  39+ E2D2 20 06                                jr      nz,.DontPlot
  40+ E2D4 CD C2 E0     .DoneCheck:             call    asm_l2_320_col_bank_select      ; adjust hl for column > h
  41+ E2D7 6A                                   ld      l,d                             ; as they are horizontal now
  42+ E2D8 7B                                   ld      a,e
  43+ E2D9 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  44+ E2DA C9           .DontPlot:              ret
  45+ E2DB
  46+ E2DB CD C2 E0     l2_plot_pixel_320_no_check:   call    asm_l2_320_col_bank_select      ; adjust hl for column > h
  47+ E2DE 6A                                   ld      l,d                             ; as they are horizontal now
  48+ E2DF 7B                                   ld      a,e
  49+ E2E0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ E2E1 C9                                   ret
  51+ E2E2
  52+ E2E2              ; y aixs bounds check must have been done before calling this
  53+ E2E2 F5           l2_plot_pixel_no_check: push    af
  54+ E2E3 C5                                   push    bc								; bank select destroys bc so need to save it
  55+ E2E4 78                                   ld      a,b                             ; determine target bank
  56+ E2E5 CD 68 E0                             call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  57+ E2E8 C1                                   pop     bc
  58+ E2E9 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; b now adjusted for bank, c = column
  59+ E2EA 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                           ; hl now holds ram address after bank select
  60+ E2EC F1                                   pop     af								; a = colour to plott
  61+ E2ED 77                                   ld      (hl),a                          ; poke to ram
  62+ E2EE C9                                   ret
  63+ E2EF
  64+ E2EF              ; ">l2_plot_pixel_no_bank b= row number, c = column number, a = pixel col"
  65+ E2EF              ; This version assues pixel is in the same bank as previously plotted ones. optimised for horizontal lines
  66+ E2EF E5           l2_plot_pixel_no_bank:  push 	hl
  67+ E2F0 60                                   ld 		h,b								; hl now holds ram address after bank select
  68+ E2F1 69                                   ld 		l,c
  69+ E2F2 77                                   ld 		(hl),a
  70+ E2F3 E1                                   pop		hl
  71+ E2F4 C9                                   ret
  72+ E2F5
  73+ E2F5              ; ">l2_plot_pixel_no_bank d= row number, h = column number, a = pixel col"
  74+ E2F5              ; This version assues pixel is in the same bank as previously plotted ones. optimised for horizontal lines
  75+ E2F5              l2_plot_pixel_320_no_bank:
  76+ E2F5 6A                                   ld 		l,d
  77+ E2F6 77                                   ld 		(hl),a
  78+ E2F7 C9                                   ret
  79+ E2F8              ; The more simpler h col l row is just ld (hl),a so no need for a function
  80+ E2F8
  81+ E2F8
  82+ E2F8 F5           ShipPixel:              push    af
  83+ E2F9 78                                   ld      a,b
  84+ E2FA FE 7F                                cp      127
  85+ E2FC D0                                   ret     nc
  86+ E2FD F1                                   pop     af
  87+ E2FE 18 E2                                jr      l2_plot_pixel_no_check
  88+ E300                                      ;***Implicit ret due to jr
  89+ E300
  90+ E300              ; in bc = yx iyl = colour
  91+ E300 78           DebrisPixel:            ld      a,b
  92+ E301 FE 7F                                cp      127
  93+ E303 D0                                   ret     nc
  94+ E304 FD 7D                                ld      a, iyl
  95+ E306 18 DA                                jr      l2_plot_pixel_no_check
  96+ E308                                      ;***Implicit ret due to jr
  97+ E308
  98+ E308 F5           l2_plot_pixel_y_test:   push	af
  99+ E309 78                                   ld		a,b
 100+ E30A FE C0                                cp		192
 101+ E30C 30 03                                jr		nc,.clearup
 102+ E30E F1                                   pop		af
 103+ E30F 18 A5                                jr		l2_plot_pixel
 104+ E311 F1           .clearup:               pop		af
 105+ E312 C9                                   ret

 792  E313                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/layer2_print_character.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/layer2_print_character.asm
   1+ E313
   2+ E313              ; "l2_print_chr_at, bc = col,row, d= character, e = colour"
   3+ E313              ; "Need a version that also prints absence of character"
   4+ E313 7A           l2_print_chr_at:        ld		a,d
   5+ E314 FE 20                                cp		32
   6+ E316 38 3F                                jr		c,.InvalidCharacter		; Must be between 32 and 127
   7+ E318 FE 7F                                cp		127
   8+ E31A 30 3B                                jr		nc,.InvalidCharacter
   9+ E31C 26 00        .ValidCharater:         ld		h,0
  10+ E31E 6A                                   ld		l,d
  11+ E31F 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 2
  12+ E320 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 4
  13+ E321 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 8 to get byte address
  14+ E322 ED 34 00 3C                          add		hl,charactersetaddr			; hl = address of rom char
  15+ E326 04                                   inc		b							; start + 1 pixel x and y as we only print 7x7
  16+ E327 23                                   inc		hl							; skip first byte
  17+ E328 16 07                                ld		d,7
  18+ E32A D5           .PrintCharLoop:         push	de
  19+ E32B 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  20+ E32C FE 00                                cp		0
  21+ E32E 28 21                                jr		z,.NextRowNoBCPop
  22+ E330 C5           .PrintARow:             push	bc							; save row col
  23+ E331 16 07                                ld		d,7							; d is loop row number now
  24+ E333 0C           .PrintPixelLoop:	    inc		c							; we start at col 1 not 0 so can move inc here
  25+ E334 CB 27        .PrintTheRow:           sla		a							; scroll char 1 pixel as we read from bit 7
  26+ E336 F5                                   push	af							; save character byte
  27+ E337 CB 7F                                bit		7,a							; If left most pixel set then plot
  28+ E339 20 04                                jr		nz,.PixelToPrint
  29+ E33B 3E E3        .NoPixelToPrint:        ld		a,$E3
  30+ E33D 18 01                                jr		.HaveSetPixelColour
  31+ E33F 7B           .PixelToPrint:          ld		a,e							; Get Colour
  32+ E340 E5           .HaveSetPixelColour		push	hl
  33+ E341              ;	push	bc						; at the moment we don't do paging on first plot so need to preserve BC
  34+ E341 F5           .BankOnFirstOnly:       push	af
  35+ E342 7A                                   ld		a,d
  36+ E343 FE 07                                cp		7
  37+ E345 28 11                                jr		z,.PlotWithBank
  38+ E347 F1           .PlotNoBank:            pop		af
  39+ E348 60                                   ld 		h,b								; hl now holds ram address after bank select
  40+ E349 69                                   ld 		l,c
  41+ E34A 77                                   ld 		(hl),a
  42+ E34B              .IterateLoop:	        ;	pop		bc
  43+ E34B E1                                   pop		hl
  44+ E34C F1                                   pop		af							; a= current byte shifted
  45+ E34D 15                                   dec		d						 	; do dec after inc as we amy
  46+ E34E 20 E3                                jr		nz,.PrintPixelLoop
  47+ E350 C1           .NextRow:               pop		bc							; Current Col Row
  48+ E351 D1           .NextRowNoBCPop:	    pop		de							; d= row loop
  49+ E352 04                                   inc		b							; Down 1 row
  50+ E353 23                                   inc		hl							; Next character byte
  51+ E354 15                                   dec		d							; 1 done now
  52+ E355 20 D3                                jr		nz,.PrintCharLoop
  53+ E357 C9           .InvalidCharacter:      ret
  54+ E358 F1           .PlotWithBank:          pop		af
  55+ E359 CD B6 E2                             call	l2_plot_pixel				; This will shift bc to poke row
  56+ E35C 18 ED                                jr		.IterateLoop
  57+ E35E
  58+ E35E              ; "l2_print_at bc= colrow, hl = addr of message, e = colour"
  59+ E35E              ; "No error trapping, if there is no null is will just cycle on the line"
  60+ E35E 7E           l2_print_at:            ld	a,(hl)							; Return if empty string
  61+ E35F FE 00                                cp	0
  62+ E361 C8                                   ret	z
  63+ E362 E5                                   push	hl
  64+ E363 D5                                   push	de
  65+ E364 C5                                   push	bc
  66+ E365 57                                   ld		d,a							; bc = pos, de = char and colour
  67+ E366 CD 13 E3                             call 	l2_print_chr_at
  68+ E369 C1                                   pop		bc
  69+ E36A D1                                   pop		de
  70+ E36B E1                                   pop		hl
  71+ E36C 08           .Move8Pixlestoright:	ex		af,af'
  72+ E36D 79                                   ld		a,c
  73+ E36E C6 08                                add		8
  74+ E370 4F                                   ld		c,a
  75+ E371 08                                   ex		af,af'
  76+ E372 23                                   inc		hl
  77+ E373 18 E9                                jr		l2_print_at					; Just loop until 0 found
  78+ E375
  79+ E375
  80+ E375              ; "l2_print_chr_at, bc = col,row, d= character, e = colour"
  81+ E375              ; "Need a version that also prints absence of character"
  82+ E375              ; removed blank line optimisation as we need spaces printed
  83+ E375 7A           l2_print_7chr_at:       ld		a,d
  84+ E376 FE 1F                                cp		31
  85+ E378 38 3D                                jr		c,.InvalidCharacter		; Must be between 32 and 127
  86+ E37A FE 7F                                cp		127
  87+ E37C 30 39                                jr		nc,.InvalidCharacter
  88+ E37E 26 00        .ValidCharater:         ld		h,0
  89+ E380 6A                                   ld		l,d
  90+ E381 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 2
  91+ E382 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 4
  92+ E383 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 8 to get byte address
  93+ E384 ED 34 00 3C                          add		hl,charactersetaddr			; hl = address of rom char
  94+ E388 04                                   inc		b							; start + 1 pixel x and y as we only print 7x7
  95+ E389 23                                   inc		hl							; skip first byte
  96+ E38A 16 07                                ld		d,7
  97+ E38C D5           .PrintCharLoop:         push	de
  98+ E38D 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  99+ E38E                                      ;cp		0
 100+ E38E                                      ;jr		z,.NextRowNoBCPop
 101+ E38E C5           .PrintARow:             push	bc							; save row col
 102+ E38F 16 06                                ld		d,6							; d is loop row number now
 103+ E391 0C           .PrintPixelLoop:        inc		c							; we start at col 1 not 0 so can move inc here
 104+ E392 28 1C                                jr		z,.NextRow
 105+ E394 CB 27                                sla		a							; scroll char 1 pixel as we read from bit 7
 106+ E396 F5                                   push	af							; save character byte
 107+ E397 CB 7F                                bit		7,a							; If left most pixel set then plot
 108+ E399 20 04                                jr		nz,.PixelToPrint
 109+ E39B 3E E3        .NoPixelToPrint:        ld		a,$E3
 110+ E39D 18 01                                jr		.HaveSetPixelColour
 111+ E39F 7B           .PixelToPrint:          ld		a,e							; Get Colour
 112+ E3A0 E5           .HaveSetPixelColour		push	hl
 113+ E3A1                                      ;	push	bc							; at the moment we don't do paging on first plot so need to preserve BC
 114+ E3A1 F5           .BankOnFirstOnly:       push	af
 115+ E3A2 7A                                   ld		a,d
 116+ E3A3 FE 06                                cp		6
 117+ E3A5 28 11                                jr		z,.PlotWithBank
 118+ E3A7 F1           .PlotNoBank:            pop		af
 119+ E3A8 60                                   ld 		h,b								; hl now holds ram address after bank select
 120+ E3A9 69                                   ld 		l,c
 121+ E3AA 77                                   ld 		(hl),a
 122+ E3AB              .IterateLoop:	        ;	pop		bc
 123+ E3AB E1                                   pop		hl
 124+ E3AC F1                                   pop		af							; a= current byte shifted
 125+ E3AD 15                                   dec		d						 	; do dec after inc as we amy
 126+ E3AE 20 E1                                jr		nz,.PrintPixelLoop
 127+ E3B0 C1           .NextRow:               pop		bc							; Current Col Row
 128+ E3B1 D1           .NextRowNoBCPop:	    pop		de							; d= row loop
 129+ E3B2 04                                   inc		b							; Down 1 row
 130+ E3B3 23                                   inc		hl							; Next character byte
 131+ E3B4 15                                   dec		d							; 1 done now
 132+ E3B5 20 D5                                jr		nz,.PrintCharLoop
 133+ E3B7 C9           .InvalidCharacter:      ret
 134+ E3B8 F1           .PlotWithBank:          pop		af
 135+ E3B9 CD B6 E2                             call	l2_plot_pixel				; This will shift bc to poke row
 136+ E3BC 18 ED                                jr		.IterateLoop
 137+ E3BE
 138+ E3BE              ; "l2_print_7at bc= colrow, hl = addr of message, e = colour"
 139+ E3BE              ; "No error trapping, if there is no null is will just cycle on the line"
 140+ E3BE 7E           l2_print_7at:           ld	a,(hl)							; Return if empty string
 141+ E3BF FE 00                                cp	0
 142+ E3C1 C8                                   ret	z
 143+ E3C2 E5                                   push	hl
 144+ E3C3 D5                                   push	de
 145+ E3C4 C5                                   push	bc
 146+ E3C5 57                                   ld		d,a							; bc = pos, de = char and colour
 147+ E3C6 CD 75 E3                             call 	l2_print_7chr_at
 148+ E3C9 C1                                   pop		bc
 149+ E3CA D1                                   pop		de
 150+ E3CB E1                                   pop		hl
 151+ E3CC 08           .Move7Pixlestoright:	ex		af,af'
 152+ E3CD 79                                   ld		a,c
 153+ E3CE C6 07                                add		7
 154+ E3D0 4F                                   ld		c,a
 155+ E3D1 08                                   ex		af,af'
 156+ E3D2 23                                   inc		hl
 157+ E3D3 18 E9                                jr		l2_print_7at					; Just loop until 0 found
 158+ E3D5

   1+ E3E9              ; "l2_draw_thick_box bc=rowcol, de=heightwidth h=color"
   2+ E3E9              ; TODO DMA Optimise
   3+ E3E9                              DISPLAY "TODO: dma optimise"
   4+ E3E9 C5 D5 E5     l2_draw_fill_box:       push    bc,,de,,hl
   5+ E3EC 53                                   ld      d,e
   6+ E3ED 5C                                   ld      e,h
   7+ E3EE CD 84 E4                             call    l2_draw_horz_line           ; "bc = left side row,col, d = length, e = color"
   8+ E3F1 E1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,hl
   9+ E3F4 04                                   inc     b
  10+ E3F5 15                                   dec     d
  11+ E3F6 C8                                   ret     z
  12+ E3F7 18 F0                                jr      l2_draw_fill_box
  13+ E3F9
  14+ E3F9              ; "l2_draw_box bc=rowcol, de=heightwidth a=color"
  15+ E3F9 C5 D5 F5     l2_draw_box:            push	bc,,de,,af
  16+ E3FC 53                                   ld		d,e
  17+ E3FD 5F                                   ld		e,a
  18+ E3FE 14                                   inc		d
  19+ E3FF CD 84 E4                             call	l2_draw_horz_line
  20+ E402 F1 D1 C1                             pop		bc,,de,,af
  21+ E405 C5 D5 F5     .bottomhorzline:	    push	bc,,de,,af
  22+ E408 67                                   ld		h,a							;save color whilst b = row + height
  23+ E409 78                                   ld		a,b
  24+ E40A 82                                   add		a,d
  25+ E40B 47                                   ld		b,a
  26+ E40C 53                                   ld		d,e							; d = width
  27+ E40D 14                                   inc		d							; Extra pixel for width
  28+ E40E 5C                                   ld		e,h							; e = colour
  29+ E40F CD 84 E4                             call	l2_draw_horz_line
  30+ E412 F1 D1 C1                             pop		bc,,de,,af
  31+ E415 C5 D5 F5     .leftvertline:          push	bc,,de,,af
  32+ E418 04                                   inc		b							; save 2 pixles
  33+ E419 15                                   dec		d
  34+ E41A 5F                                   ld		e,a							; e = color
  35+ E41B CD EF E4                             call	l2_draw_vert_line
  36+ E41E F1 D1 C1                             pop		bc,,de,,af
  37+ E421 04           .rightvertline:         inc		b							; save 2 pixles
  38+ E422 15                                   dec		d
  39+ E423 67                                   ld		h,a							;save color whilst c = col + width
  40+ E424 79                                   ld		a,c
  41+ E425 83                                   add		a,e
  42+ E426 4F                                   ld		c,a
  43+ E427 5C                                   ld		e,h							; e = color
  44+ E428 CD EF E4                             call	l2_draw_vert_line
  45+ E42B C9                                   ret
  46+ E42C

 794  E44D                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/asm_l2_plot_horizontal.asm"

   1+ E44D
   2+ E44D              ;; NOTE DMA is little endian
   3+ E44D 00           l2_horz_pixel           DB 0
   4+ E44E
   5+ E44E 83 C3 C7 CB  l2_horz_line            DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   5+ E452 7D
   6+ E453 4D E4        l2_horz_colr            DW l2_horz_pixel
   7+ E455 00           l2_horz_lenlo           DB 0
   8+ E456 00           l2_horz_lenhi           DB 0
   9+ E457 24 10 AD                             DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY, DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY, DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
  10+ E45A 00 00        l2_horz_target          DB $00, $00
  11+ E45C CF 87                                DB DMA_LOAD, DMA_ENABLE
  12+ E45E              l2_horz_cmd_len	        EQU $ - l2_horz_line
  13+ E45E              ; "l2_draw_horz_dma"
  14+ E45E              ; "plot at bc for length d colour e using dma, assumes bank already selected"
  15+ E45E 7B           l2_draw_horz_dma:       ld		a,e                                               ; T=4      ;
  16+ E45F 32 4D E4                             ld		(l2_horz_pixel),a                                 ; T=13     ;
  17+ E462 5A                                   ld      e,d ; saved 3 t states ld		a,d                                               ; T=4      ; e=d   4
  18+ E463 16 00                                ld      d,0; saved 3 t states ld 		(l2_horz_lenlo),a                                 ; T=13     ; d = 0  7
  19+ E465 ED 53 55 E4                          ld      (l2_horz_lenlo),de; saved 3 t states xor 	a                                                 ; T=4      ; t 20  31
  20+ E469                                      ; saved 3 t states ld ld 		(l2_horz_lenhi),a                                 ; T=13     ;
  21+ E469                                    ; saved 4 t states  ld		h,b                           ;          ;
  22+ E469                                    ; saved 4 t states  ld		l,c                           ;          ;
  23+ E469 ED 43 5A E4                          ld      (l2_horz_target),bc ; saved 4 t states  was , hl  ; T=20     ;
  24+ E46D 21 4E E4     .write_dma:             ld 		hl, l2_horz_line                                  ;          ;
  25+ E470 06 10                                ld 		b, l2_horz_cmd_len                                ;
  26+ E472 0E 6B                                ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT                            ;
  27+ E474 ED B3                                otir                                                      ;
  28+ E476 C9                                   ret
  29+ E477
  30+ E477              ; "bc = left side row,col, d = length, e = color"
  31+ E477 D5           l2_draw_horz_dma_bank:  push 	de							; save length and colour
  32+ E478 C5                                   push 	bc							; save row col
  33+ E479 78                                   ld   	a,b
  34+ E47A CD 68 E0                             call 	asm_l2_row_bank_select		; now we have the correct bank, its a horizontal line so bank will not shift
  35+ E47D C1                                   pop  	bc
  36+ E47E 47                                   ld	 	b,a	       					; fixed row by the call we can go straight into HL with row col
  37+ E47F D1                                   pop  	de							; get length back
  38+ E480 CD 5E E4                             call    l2_draw_horz_dma
  39+ E483 C9                                   ret
  40+ E484
  41+ E484              ; "l2_draw_horz_line"
  42+ E484              ; "bc = left side row,col, d = length, e = color"
  43+ E484              ; "optimisation if above min pix is will use dma call SCREEN_HOZ_MIN_PIX not implemented yet"
  44+ E484 7A           l2_draw_horz_line:      ld		a,d
  45+ E485 FE 00                                cp 		0							; if its zero length then just return
  46+ E487 C8           .zerolengthexit:        ret		z
  47+ E488 FE 01        .isitlen1:              cp 		1
  48+ E48A CA AC E4                             jp 		z,.l2_draw_horz_line_1
  49+ E48D FE 0A        .longenoughtfordma:     cp  10
  50+ E48F C3 77 E4                             jp  l2_draw_horz_dma_bank
  51+ E492 D5 C5        .plottableline:         push 	de,,bc  					; save length and colour an d row col
  52+ E494 78                                   ld   	a,b
  53+ E495 CD 68 E0                             call 	asm_l2_row_bank_select		; now we have the correct bank, its a horizontal line so bank will not shift
  54+ E498 C1                                   pop  	bc
  55+ E499 67                                   ld	 	h,a	       					; fixed row by the call we can go straight into HL with row col
  56+ E49A 69                                   ld   	l,c
  57+ E49B D1                                   pop  	de							; get length back
  58+ E49C 79           .cliptest:              ld	 	a,c							; get column + length
  59+ E49D 42                                   ld  	b,d  						; speculate that we don't clip by pre-loading b with length
  60+ E49E 82                                   add  	a,d
  61+ E49F 30 06                                jr   	nc, .l2_draw_horz_plot_loop	; if carry is set c+d > 255
  62+ E4A1 3E FF        .clipat255:             ld   	a,$FF
  63+ E4A3 91                                   sub  	c							; a holds clipped length
  64+ E4A4 47                                   ld 		b, a 						; so now hl holds poke address  b = clipped length e = colour
  65+ E4A5 18 00                                jr		.l2_draw_horz_plot_loop
  66+ E4A7 73           .l2_draw_horz_plot_loop:ld (hl),e							; loop poking hl with e for b pixels
  67+ E4A8 23                                   inc hl
  68+ E4A9 10 FC                                djnz .l2_draw_horz_plot_loop
  69+ E4AB C9                                   ret
  70+ E4AC 7B           .l2_draw_horz_line_1:   ld		a,e
  71+ E4AD                                      l2_plot_macro; jp		l2_plot_pixel				; hijack return
  71+ E4AD 78          >                        ld      a,b
  71+ E4AE             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
  71+ E4AE FE C0       >                        cp     192
  71+ E4B0 D2 BC E4    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
  71+ E4B3 69          >                        ld      l,c
  71+ E4B4 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  71+ E4B7 67          >                        ld      h,a
  71+ E4B8 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
  71+ E4BB 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
  71+ E4BC             >.NoPlot:
  72+ E4BC C9                                   ret
  73+ E4BD
  74+ E4BD
  75+ E4BD              ; "l2_draw_horz_line_to"
  76+ E4BD              ; "bc = left side row,col, d right pixel, e = color"
  77+ E4BD 7A           l2_draw_horz_line_to:   ld 		a,d
  78+ E4BE B9                                   cp 		c
  79+ E4BF 30 04                                jr		nc, .noswap
  80+ E4C1 28 07                                jr      z, .singlepixel
  81+ E4C3 51           .swap:                  ld		d,c
  82+ E4C4 4F                                   ld		c,a
  83+ E4C5 7A           .noswap:                ld		a,d
  84+ E4C6 91                                   sub		c
  85+ E4C7              ;                        dec		a							; so now its length not offset
  86+ E4C7 57                                   ld		d,a
  87+ E4C8 18 BA                                jr 		l2_draw_horz_line			; hijack routine and return statements
  88+ E4CA 7B           .singlepixel:           ld		a,e
  89+ E4CB                                      l2_plot_macro; jp		l2_plot_pixel				; hijack return
  89+ E4CB 78          >                        ld      a,b
  89+ E4CC             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
  89+ E4CC FE C0       >                        cp     192
  89+ E4CE D2 DA E4    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
  89+ E4D1 69          >                        ld      l,c
  89+ E4D2 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
  89+ E4D5 67          >                        ld      h,a
  89+ E4D6 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
  89+ E4D9 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
  89+ E4DA             >.NoPlot:
  90+ E4DA C9                                   ret
