 893+ E852
 894+ E852
 895+ E852
 896+ E852              ;;//	ld		(l2linecolor),a   			; could do an ex but it will be needed multiple times between many uses of a reg
 897+ E852              ;;//.catchLoop:
 898+ E852              ;;//	jp .catchLoop
 899+ E852              ;;//.continue:
 900+ E852              ;;//    ld      A,D
 901+ E852              ;;//    sub     H
 902+ E852              ;;//    jr      NC,.DXpositive    ;delta_x > 0
 903+ E852              ;;//.DXNegative:
 904+ E852              ;;//    neg
 905+ E852              ;;//.DXPositive:
 906+ E852              ;;//    ld      B,A              ;B <- |delta_x|
 907+ E852              ;;//    ld      A,E
 908+ E852              ;;//    sub     L
 909+ E852              ;;//    jr      NC,.DYpositive    ;delta_y > 0
 910+ E852              ;;//.DYNegative:
 911+ E852              ;;//    neg
 912+ E852              ;;//.DYPositive:
 913+ E852              ;;//    sub     B               ;|delta_y|
 914+ E852              ;;//	push	af
 915+ E852              ;;//	jr		c,.DeltaX
 916+ E852              ;;//.DeltaY
 917+ E852              ;;//	ld      A,H             			;if |delta_x| < |delta_y| then
 918+ E852              ;;//    ld      H,L             			;then values x and y are swapped
 919+ E852              ;;//    ld      L,A             			;so the loop will always be performed on the
 920+ E852              ;;//    ld      A,D             			;x value. A flag must be set to
 921+ E852              ;;//    ld      D,E             			;remind that data must be drawn (y,x)
 922+ E852              ;;//    ld      E,A             			;instead of (x,y)
 923+ E852              ;;//.DeltaX:
 924+ E852              ;;//	ld		a,d
 925+ E852              ;;//	sub		h
 926+ E852              ;;//	jr		nc,.TestDY					; x1 < x2
 927+ E852              ;;//.TestDX:
 928+ E852              ;;//	ex		de,hl
 929+ E852              ;;//.TestDY:
 930+ E852              ;;//	ld		a,e
 931+ E852              ;;//	sub		l
 932+ E852              ;;//    ld      A,$01
 933+ E852              ;;//    jr      NC,.StoreA
 934+ E852              ;;//    neg                     ;y1 > y2 : in case2 the 'y' variable
 935+ E852              ;;//.StoreA:
 936+ E852              ;;//        ld      (l2way),A
 937+ E852              ;;//.InitLine:
 938+ E852              ;;//        ld      B,H
 939+ E852              ;;//        ld      C,L
 940+ E852              ;;//        ld      A,E
 941+ E852              ;;//        sub     L
 942+ E852              ;;//        jr      NC,.EndInit
 943+ E852              ;;//        ld      A,L
 944+ E852              ;;//        ld      L,E
 945+ E852              ;;//        ld      E,A
 946+ E852              ;;//.EndInit:
 947+ E852              ;;//        ld      A,E
 948+ E852              ;;//        sub     L
 949+ E852              ;;//        rla
 950+ E852              ;;//        ld      L,A             ;value to add in case1 (d < 0)
 951+ E852              ;;//        add     A,H
 952+ E852              ;;//        sub     D
 953+ E852              ;;//        ld      E,A             ;'d' variable is initialised
 954+ E852              ;;//        add     A,H
 955+ E852              ;;//        sub     D
 956+ E852              ;;//        ld      H,A             ;value to add in case2 (d >= 0)
 957+ E852              ;;//.Loop:
 958+ E852              ;;//        ld      A,B
 959+ E852              ;;//        sub     D
 960+ E852              ;;//        jr      NC,.EndLine       ;the line is completely drawn.
 961+ E852              ;;//        pop     AF
 962+ E852              ;;//        bit     7,A
 963+ E852              ;;//        push    AF
 964+ E852              ;;//        push    AF
 965+ E852              ;;//        push    BC
 966+ E852              ;;//        jr      Z,.DrawPoint
 967+ E852              ;;//        ld      A,B
 968+ E852              ;;//        ld      B,C
 969+ E852              ;;//        ld      C,A
 970+ E852              ;;//.DrawPoint:
 971+ E852              ;;//		push	hl
 972+ E852              ;;//		pushbcdeaf
 973+ E852              ;;//		ld		b,e
 974+ E852              ;;//		ld		c,d
 975+ E852              ;;//	ld 		a,(l2linecolor)
 976+ E852              ;;//	call	l2_plot_pixel
 977+ E852              ;;//		popafdebc
 978+ E852              ;;//		pop		hl
 979+ E852              ;;//        pop     BC
 980+ E852              ;;//        pop     AF
 981+ E852              ;;//.TestD:
 982+ E852              ;;//        bit     7,E
 983+ E852              ;;//        jr      NZ,.Case1
 984+ E852              ;;//.Case2:                          ;d >= 0
 985+ E852              ;;//        ld      A,E
 986+ E852              ;;//        add     A,H
 987+ E852              ;;//        ld      E,A
 988+ E852              ;;//        ld      A,(l2way)
 989+ E852              ;;//        add     A,C
 990+ E852              ;;//        ld      C,A
 991+ E852              ;;//        jr      .EndLoop
 992+ E852              ;;//.Case1:                          ;d < 0
 993+ E852              ;;//        ld      A,E
 994+ E852              ;;//        add     A,L
 995+ E852              ;;//        ld      E,A
 996+ E852              ;;//.EndLoop:
 997+ E852              ;;//        inc     B
 998+ E852              ;;//        jr      .Loop
 999+ E852              ;;//.EndLine:
1000+ E852              ;;//        pop     AF              ;MUST NOT BE REMOVED
1001+ E852              ;;//        pop     HL              ;can be removed
1002+ E852              ;;//        pop     DE              ;can be removed
1003+ E852              ;;//        ret
1004+ E852
1005+ E852              ;;	ld		(.l2yadjust),a
1006+ E852              ;;	call	calcdeltax:
1007+ E852              ;;	ld		(.l2xadjust),a
1008+ E852              ;;.calcfraction:							; err(or fraction) = dx+dy;
1009+ E852              ;;	push	hl
1010+ E852              ;;	push	de
1011+ E852              ;;	ld		hl,(l2deltaX)
1012+ E852              ;;	ld		de,(l2deltaY)
1013+ E852              ;;	add		hl,de
1014+ E852              ;;	ld		(l2fraction),hl
1015+ E852              ;;	pop		de
1016+ E852              ;;	pop		hl
1017+ E852              ;;.mainloop:
1018+ E852              ;;	push	bc
1019+ E852              ;;	push	de
1020+ E852              ;;	ld 		a,(l2linecolor)
1021+ E852              ;;	call	l2_plot_pixel
1022+ E852              ;;	pop		de
1023+ E852              ;;	pop		bc
1024+ E852              ;;.arewefinishedtest
1025+ E852              ;;	ld		a,b
1026+ E852              ;;	cp		d
1027+ E852              ;;	jr		nz,.notthereyet
1028+ E852              ;;	ld		a,c
1029+ E852              ;;	cp		e
1030+ E852              ;;	ret		z
1031+ E852              ;;.notthereyet:
1032+ E852              ;;	push	de
1033+ E852              ;;	call	l2_e2fractionby2			; e2 = 2*err;
1034+ E852              ;;	pop		de
1035+ E852              ;;.e2dytest:								; if (e2 >= dy) /* e_xy+e_x > 0 */  then S and P/V are the same
1036+ E852              ;;	push	de							; so if m & pe  or p & po calc (m = sign set p = 0)
1037+ E852              ;;	ld		de,(l2deltaY)				;    if m & po  or p & pe skip  (pe = pv set po = pv 0)
1038+ E852              ;;	or		a							;
1039+ E852              ;;	sbc		hl,de						;
1040+ E852              ;;	pop		de
1041+ E852              ;;	jr		z,  .dodycalc				; if equal then calc
1042+ E852              ;;	jp		p,	.dodycalc				; sign clear to H>D even with negtives
1043+ E852              ;;	jr		.skipdycalc         		; sign = 0     so  skip as pe
1044+ E852              ;;.dodycalc:
1045+ E852              ;;	ld		hl,(l2fraction)
1046+ E852              ;;	push	de
1047+ E852              ;;	ld		de,(l2deltaY)
1048+ E852              ;;	add		hl,de
1049+ E852              ;;	ld		(l2fraction),de
1050+ E852              ;;	pop		de
1051+ E852              ;;.l2yadjust:
1052+ E852              ;;	nop
1053+ E852              ;;.skipdycalc:
1054+ E852              ;;.e2dxtest:								;  if (e2 <= dx) /* e_xy+e_y < 0 */ then S and P/V are different.
1055+ E852              ;;	ld		hl,(l2e2)
1056+ E852              ;;	push	de							;
1057+ E852              ;;	ld		de,(l2deltaX)				;
1058+ E852              ;;	or		a							; clear carry flag
1059+ E852              ;;	sbc		hl,de						; hl = hl - de is if de > hl will get pv and signed different?
1060+ E852              ;;	pop		de
1061+ E852              ;;	jr		z,.dodxcalc					; e2 == dx so do calc
1062+ E852              ;;	jp		m,.dodxcalc					; was sign bit set
1063+ E852              ;;	jr		.skipdxcalc         	    ; diff so skip ; pvclear = po        pvset = pe
1064+ E852              ;;.dodxcalc:
1065+ E852              ;;	ld		hl,(l2fraction)
1066+ E852              ;;	push	de
1067+ E852              ;;	ld		de,(l2deltaX)
1068+ E852              ;;	add		hl,de
1069+ E852              ;;	ld		(l2fraction),de
1070+ E852              ;;	pop		de
1071+ E852              ;;.l2xadjust:
1072+ E852              ;;	nop
1073+ E852              ;;.skipdxcalc:
1074+ E852              ;;	jr 		.mainloop

1076+ E852
1077+ E852              ;;/l2_draw_diagonalold:
1078+ E852              ;;/MESSAGE ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color)"
1079+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2linecolor),a   			; could do an ex but it will be needed multiple times between many uses of a reg
1080+ E852              ;;/.sortycoords:
1081+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,b							; Sort to Y0 is always > y1 so we don't have to deal with step y and only step x
1082+ E852              ;;/	cp		d
1083+ E852              ;;/	jr		nc, .nocoordswap
1084+ E852              ;;/.swapcoords:
1085+ E852              ;;/	ex		de,hl						; save de to hl ! effective code line 98 after macros
1086+ E852              ;;/	lddebc
1087+ E852              ;;/	ldbchl
1088+ E852              ;;/.nocoordswap:
1089+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,d							; l2_dy = -ABS(l2_vy1 - l2_vy0)
1090+ E852              ;;/	sub		b							; we have already sorted  so y1 > y0
1091+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaY),a
1092+ E852              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
1093+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaYn),a				; DEBUG
1094+ E852              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
1095+ E852              ;;/.deltaxequABSx0Minusx1:						; we need to set l2dx to abs x1-x0 and set
1096+ E852              ;;/    ld		a,c
1097+ E852              ;;/	cp		e
1098+ E852              ;;/	jr		c, .x1GTx0
1099+ E852              ;;/.x1LTx0
1100+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,c
1101+ E852              ;;/	sub		e
1102+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaX),a				; just 8 bit for now should it be 16?
1103+ E852              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
1104+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaXn),a				; DEBUG
1105+ E852              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
1106+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,l2incbstep
1107+ E852              ;;/	jr		.setlayershift0
1108+ E852              ;;/.x1GTx0:
1109+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,e
1110+ E852              ;;/	sub		c
1111+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaX),a					; just 8 bit for now should it be 16?
1112+ E852              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
1113+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaXn),a				; DEBUG
1114+ E852              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
1115+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,l2decbstep
1116+ E852              ;;/.setlayershift0:
1117+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,0
1118+ E852              ;;/	pushbcde
1119+ E852              ;;/	call	asm_l2_bank_n_select		; l2_layer_shift = 0 and bank 0 selected
1120+ E852              ;;/	popdebc
1121+ E852              ;;/; so now we have set inc or dec instruction, l2dy, l2dx and on bank 0,
1122+ E852              ;;/.dymuliplyby2:
1123+ E852              ;;/	ld		a, (l2deltaY)				; dy *= 2
1124+ E852              ;;/	call	l2_signed_mul2a
1125+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaYsq),a
1126+ E852              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
1127+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaYsqn),a				; DEBUG
1128+ E852              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
1129+ E852              ;;/.dxmuliplyby2:
1130+ E852              ;;/	ld		a, (l2deltaX)				; dx *= 2
1131+ E852              ;;/	call	l2_signed_mul2a
1132+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaXsq),a
1133+ E852              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
1134+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2deltaXsqn),a				; DEBUG
1135+ E852              ;;/	neg									; DEBUG
1136+ E852              ;;/.plotfirstpixel:
1137+ E852              ;;/	pushbcde
1138+ E852              ;;/	ld a,(l2linecolor)
1139+ E852              ;;/	call	l2_plot_pixel
1140+ E852              ;;/	popdebc
1141+ E852              ;;/.mainloop:								; if (l2_dx > l2_dy) signed
1142+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,(l2deltaX)				;If A < N, then S and P/V are different.
1143+ E852              ;;/	ld		hl,l2deltaY					;A >= N, then S and P/V are the same
1144+ E852              ;;/	cp		(hl)
1145+ E852              ;;/	jp		m,	.signset
1146+ E852              ;;/.signclear:
1147+ E852              ;;/	jp		pe,	.dxLTEdybranch
1148+ E852              ;;/	jr		.dxGTdybranch
1149+ E852              ;;/.signset:
1150+ E852              ;;/	jp		po,	.dxLTEdybranch
1151+ E852              ;;/.dxGTdybranch:
1152+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,(l2deltaYsq)
1153+ E852              ;;/	ld		hl,l2deltaX
1154+ E852              ;;/	sub		(hl)
1155+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a				; faction = dy - 1/2 dx
1156+ E852              ;;/.BranchAwhile							; while (l2_vx0 != l2_vx1)
1157+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,c
1158+ E852              ;;/	cp		e
1159+ E852              ;;/	ret		z							; if x0 = x1 then done
1160+ E852              ;;/.BranchAtestfraction:					; if (l2_fraction >= 0)
1161+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,(l2fraction)
1162+ E852              ;;/	TEST	$80
1163+ E852              ;;/	jr		nz,.BranchAskipYstep
1164+ E852              ;;/	inc		b							; 		++l2_vy0;
1165+ E852              ;;/	ld		hl,l2deltaXsq
1166+ E852              ;;/	sub		(hl)						; 		l2_fraction -= l2_dx;
1167+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a
1168+ E852              ;;/.BranchAskipYstep:
1169+ E852              ;;/.l2stepx1:
1170+ E852              ;;/	inc		b							; this is self modifying code point 1 l2_vx0 += l2_stepx
1171+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,(l2fraction)				; l2_fraction += l2_dy can optimise later as a already has this?
1172+ E852              ;;/	ld		hl,l2deltaYsq
1173+ E852              ;;/	add		a,(hl)
1174+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a
1175+ E852              ;;/.BranchAplotBCColA:						; l2_plot_pixel(l2_vx0,l2_vy0,color);
1176+ E852              ;;/	pushbcde
1177+ E852              ;;/	ld a,(l2linecolor)
1178+ E852              ;;/	call	l2_plot_pixel
1179+ E852              ;;/	popdebc
1180+ E852              ;;/.BranchAloop:
1181+ E852              ;;/	jr		.BranchAwhile
1182+ E852              ;;/.dxLTEdybranch:
1183+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,(l2deltaXsq)				; l2_fraction = l2_dx - (l2_dy >> 1);
1184+ E852              ;;/	ld		hl, l2deltaY
1185+ E852              ;;/	sub		(hl)
1186+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a				; faction = dy - 1/2 d
1187+ E852              ;;/.BranchBwhile:							; while (l2_vy0 != l2_vy1)
1188+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,b
1189+ E852              ;;/	cp		d
1190+ E852              ;;/	ret		z							; if x0 = x1 then done
1191+ E852              ;;/.BranchBtestfraction:					; if (l2_fraction >= 0)
1192+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,(l2fraction)
1193+ E852              ;;/	TEST	$80
1194+ E852              ;;/	jr		nz,.BranchBskipYstep
1195+ E852              ;;/.l2stepx2
1196+ E852              ;;/	inc		b							; l2_vx0 += l2_stepx; this is self modifying code point 2
1197+ E852              ;;/	ld		a,(l2fraction)				; l2_fraction -= l2_dy
1198+ E852              ;;/	ld		hl,l2deltaYsq
1199+ E852              ;;/	sub		(hl)
1200+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a
1201+ E852              ;;/.BranchBskipYstep:
1202+ E852              ;;/	ld		hl, l2deltaYsq
1203+ E852              ;;/	add		a,(hl)
1204+ E852              ;;/	ld		(l2fraction),a
1205+ E852              ;;/	inc		b							; ++l2_vy0;

1208+ E852              ;;/	ld a,(l2linecolor)
1209+ E852              ;;/	call	l2_plot_pixel
1210+ E852              ;;/	popdebc
1211+ E852              ;;/.BranchBloop:
1212+ E852              ;;/	jr		.BranchBwhile

# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_diagonal.asm
 797  E852                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/int_bren_save.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/int_bren_save.asm
   1+ E852              OPCODE_IncHL            EQU $23
   2+ E852              OPCODE_DecHL            EQU $2B
   3+ E852              OPCODE_IncHLIndirect    EQU $34
   4+ E852              OPCODE_DecHLIndirect    EQU $35
   5+ E852              OPCODE_IncDE            EQU $13
   6+ E852              OPCODE_DecDE            EQU $1B
   7+ E852              OPCODE_JpNCnn           EQU $D2
   8+ E852              OPCODE_JpCnn            EQU $DA
   9+ E852              LOWEST_SAVE             EQU 0
  10+ E852              HIGHEST_SAVE            EQU 1
  11+ E852
  12+ E852              SetIncrement:           MACRO   Location
  13+ E852 ~                                    ld      a,OPCODE_IncDE
  14+ E852 ~                                    ld      (Location),a
  15+ E852                                      ENDM
  16+ E852              SetDecrement:           MACRO   Location
  17+ E852 ~                                    ld      a,OPCODE_DecDE
  18+ E852 ~                                    ld      (Location),a
  19+ E852                                      ENDM
  20+ E852
  21+ E852              ; So next optimisation
  22+ E852              ; we know that we start from row y0 to row Y0
  23+ E852              ; so we can just reference that row range and zero it out rather than the whole
  24+ E852              ; data set
  25+ E852 00           l2_fillValue            DB 0
  26+ E853
  27+ E853 83 C3 C7 CB  l2_fill_line            DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
  27+ E857 7D
  28+ E858 52 E8        l2_fill_colr            DW l2_fillValue
  29+ E85A FF           l2_fill_lenlo           DB 255
  30+ E85B 00           l2_fill_lenhi           DB 0
  31+ E85C 24 10 AD                             DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY, DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY, DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
  32+ E85F 00 00        l2_fill_target          DB $00, $00
  33+ E861 CF 87                                DB DMA_LOAD, DMA_ENABLE
  34+ E863              l2_bren_cmd_len	        EQU $ - l2_fill_line
  35+ E863
  36+ E863 32 52 E8     l2_fill_dma:            ld		(l2_fillValue),a                                 ; T=13     ;
  37+ E866 22 5F E8                             ld      (l2_fill_target),hl
  38+ E869 21 53 E8     .write_dma:             ld 		hl, l2_fill_line                                  ;          ;
  39+ E86C 06 10                                ld 		b, l2_bren_cmd_len                                ;
  40+ E86E 0E 6B                                ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT                            ;
  41+ E870 ED B3                                otir                                                      ;
  42+ E872 C9                                   ret
  43+ E873
  44+ E873              ; to find a point Y1 along a line X0Y0 to X2Y2
  45+ E873              ; DX = X2-X0, DY = Y2-Y0, D = DX/DY, X1 = X0+ ((Y1-Y0)*DX)
  46+ E873              ; will need 16.8 24 bit maths for DX DY unless we scale down and do a muliplier up
  47+ E873              ; so we could do DX = X2-X0, scale to 8.8  ... Note this will fail for extrmem near vertical or horizontal angles
  48+ E873              ;                DY = Y2-Y0, scale to 8.8  ... could we use an octlet lookup table?
  49+ E873              ;                D  = DX/DY which would give us an 8.2 proportion
  50+ E873              ; a look up table would not work for calc of DX DY but we could use a log table and anti log to simplify to add/subtract
  51+ E873              ; need a version of this that counts down to a trigger Y axis + 1, ideallign using DX DY if possible
  52+ E873              ; We may be able to use the flat top/flat botttom and pick up a calculated value 0nce it hits Y2?
  53+ E873              ; Yes logirithm table will work, need to build as a decimal set optimised
  54+ E873              ; logically if the ship is too close it will always be too close to render so we can exclude
  55+ E873              ; excessivley large values for X and Y as they will either be too far off side or span the whole screen
  56+ E873              ; and just flood fill
  57+ E873              ; Thsi means we can do log maths for jsut 0 to 1024
  58+ E873              ; 9/11 we assume that large values will either flood fill or be straight lines
  59+ E873              ; so we allow a range of -256 to + 512 ,i.e. off screen by a whole additional screen
  60+ E873              ; then divide becomes 16 bit div 16 bit to yeild an 8.8 result. This can then be used to work out the new position
  61+ E873              ; so                    DE = DX (Ignoring signs for now)
  62+ E873              ;                       HL = DY
  63+ E873              ; we need L2_DX, L2_DY output is HL
  64+ E873              ; After workign out in excel Formulas are:
  65+ E873              ; incomming X0, Y0, Y1, DX , DY
  66+ E873              ; dY2 = Y1-Y0
  67+ E873              ; dXHi = DX/DY*256
  68+ E873              ; dxRemainder = DX-dXHi
  69+ E873              ; dXRemainder = TRUNC((dxRemainder)/DY)*256
  70+ E873              ; Integer component = dY2 * dXHi /256
  71+ E873              ; Adj     component = DY2 * dXRemainder /256
  72+ E873              ; total = Integer + Adj + X0
  73+ E873
  74+ E873 00 00        l2_X0                   DW 0
  75+ E875 00 00        l2_Y0                   DW 0
  76+ E877 00 00        l2_X1                   DW 0
  77+ E879 00 00        l2_Y1                   DW 0
  78+ E87B 00 00        ld_YMid                 DW 0
  79+ E87D 00 00        l2_DX                   DW 0
  80+ E87F 00 00        l2_DY                   DW 0
  81+ E881 00 00        l2_Error                DW 0
  82+ E883 00 00        l2_E2                   DW 0
  83+ E885 00 00        l2_dY2                  DW 0
  84+ E887 00 00        ld_dxHi                 DW 0
  85+ E889 00 00        l2_dxRemainder          DW 0
  86+ E88B 00 00        l2_dxRemainder2         DW 0
  87+ E88D 00 00        l2_dXRemainderAdj       DW 0
  88+ E88F 00 00        l2_integer              DW 0
  89+ E891 00 00        l2_integer2             DW 0
  90+ E893
  91+ E893 2A 7D E8     ScaleDXDY:              ld      hl,(l2_DX)
  92+ E896 ED 5B 7F E8                          ld      de,(l2_DY)
  93+ E89A 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
  94+ E89B B2                                   or      d
  95+ E89C 28 0B                                jr      z,.ScaleDone
  96+ E89E                                      ShiftHLRight1
  96+ E89E CB 3C       >			   srl h
  96+ E8A0 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  97+ E8A2                                      ShiftDERight1
  97+ E8A2 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  97+ E8A4 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  98+ E8A6 C3 9A E8                             jp      .ScaleLoop
  99+ E8A9 22 7D E8     .ScaleDone:             ld      (l2_DX),hl
 100+ E8AC ED 53 7F E8                          ld      (l2_DY),de
 101+ E8B0 C9                                   ret
 102+ E8B1
 103+ E8B1 2A 77 E8     HLEquMidX:              ld      hl,(l2_X1)
 104+ E8B4 ED 5B 73 E8                          ld      de,(l2_X0)
 105+ E8B8                                      ClearCarryFlag
 105+ E8B8 B7          >                        or a
 106+ E8B9 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 107+ E8BB 22 7D E8                             ld      (l2_DX),hl
 108+ E8BE 2A 79 E8                             ld      hl,(l2_Y1)
 109+ E8C1 ED 5B 75 E8                          ld      de,(l2_Y0)
 110+ E8C5                                      ClearCarryFlag
 110+ E8C5 B7          >                        or a
 111+ E8C6 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ E8C8 22 7F E8                             ld      (l2_DY),hl
 113+ E8CB                                      ;break
 114+ E8CB CD 93 E8                             call    ScaleDXDY
 115+ E8CE 2A 7B E8                             ld      hl,(ld_YMid)
 116+ E8D1                                      ClearCarryFlag
 116+ E8D1 B7          >                        or a
 117+ E8D2 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 118+ E8D4 22 85 E8                             ld      (l2_dY2),hl
 119+ E8D7 ED 4B 7D E8                          ld      bc,(l2_DX)          ; dXHi(DE)= DX/DY*256
 120+ E8DB ED 5B 7F E8                          ld      de,(l2_DY)          ; .
 121+ E8DF DD 62 DD 6B                          ld      ix,de               ; .
 122+ E8E3 E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl               ; .
 123+ E8E6              ;                       BC = DX/DY as 8.8           ; .
 124+ E8E6 CD B5 97                             call    BC_Div_DE; DEequDEDivBC; DE is the result HL is the remainder
 125+ E8E9 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; if DE is 8 bit only
 126+ E8EA A7                                   and     a                   ; .
 127+ E8EB 28 06                                jr      z,.LT255            ; goto LT255
 128+ E8ED 01 FF FF                             ld      bc,$FFFF            ; else set BC to $FFFF
 129+ E8F0 C3 2A E9                             jp      .DoneCalc           ; .
 130+ E8F3 ED 43 87 E8  .LT255:                 ld      (ld_dxHi),bc        ;
 131+ E8F7 22 89 E8                             ld      (l2_dxRemainder),hl ; dxRemainder = DX-dXHi
 132+ E8FA              .CalcIntegerComponent:  ;break
 133+ E8FA 2A 85 E8                             ld      hl,(l2_dY2)         ; Integer component = dY2 * dXHi /256
 134+ E8FD ED 5B 87 E8                          ld      de,(ld_dxHi)        ; .
 135+ E901 CD 31 92                             call    DEHLequDEmulHL      ; .
 136+ E904 ED 53 8F E8                          ld      (l2_integer),de     ; .
 137+ E908 22 91 E8                             ld      (l2_integer2),hl    ; .
 138+ E90B ED 4B 89 E8  .CalcRemainderFraction: ld      bc,(l2_dxRemainder) ; dXRemainder = TRUNC((dxRemainder)/DY)*256
 139+ E90F ED 5B 7F E8                          ld      de,(l2_DY)          ; .
 140+ E913 CD B5 97                             call    BC_Div_DE           ; BC, remainder in HL
 141+ E916 ED 43 8D E8                          ld      (l2_dXRemainderAdj),bc
 142+ E91A 22 8B E8                             ld      (l2_dxRemainder2),hl
 143+ E91D 2A 85 E8     .CalcAdjustment:        ld      hl,(l2_dY2)         ; Adj component = DY2 * dXRemainder /256
 144+ E920 50 59                                ld      de,bc               ;
 145+ E922 CD 31 92                             call    DEHLequDEmulHL      ;
 146+ E925 2A 8F E8                             ld      hl,(l2_integer)
 147+ E928 19                                   add     hl,de
 148+ E929 C9                                   ret
 149+ E92A
 150+ E92A
 151+ E92A              ;                       HL = (DE * B) /256
 152+ E92A C5           .DoneCalc:              push    bc
 153+ E92B 58                                   ld      e,b
 154+ E92C DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 155+ E92F CD 1C 92                             call AHLequHLmulE
 156+ E932 6C                                   ld l,h
 157+ E933 67                                   ld h,a
 158+ E934 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 159+ E937              ;                       DE = (DE * C) /256          ld e,c call AHLequHLmulE,ld l,h, ld h,a
 160+ E937 C1                                   pop     bc
 161+ E938 59                                   ld      e,c
 162+ E939 FD E5 E1                             ld      hl,iy
 163+ E93C CD 1C 92                             call AHLequHLmulE
 164+ E93F 6C                                   ld l,h
 165+ E940 67                                   ld h,a
 166+ E941              ;                       HL + = DE
 167+ E941 DD 54 DD 5D                          ld      de,ix
 168+ E945 19                                   add     hl,de
 169+ E946              ;                       HL + + X0
 170+ E946 ED 5B 73 E8                          ld      de,(l2_X0)
 171+ E94A 19                                   add     hl,de
 172+ E94B C9                                   ret
 173+ E94C

 177+ E94C              ;; Need optimisation for vertical line and horizonal
 178+ E94C              int_bren_save_Array1Low:
 179+ E94C 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 180+ E94E 21 74 E5                             ld      hl,l2targetArray1   ; L2targetArray2 Population
 181+ E951 CD 63 E8                             call    l2_fill_dma
 182+ E954 3E DA                                ld      a,OPCODE_JpCnn
 183+ E956 21 74 E5                             ld      hl,l2targetArray1   ; L2targetArray2 Population
 184+ E959 C3 87 E9                             jp      int_bren_save_Array ;
 185+ E95C              int_bren_save_Array1High:
 186+ E95C                                      ZeroA
 186+ E95C AF          >                        xor a
 187+ E95D 21 74 E5                             ld      hl,l2targetArray1   ; L2targetArray2 Population
 188+ E960 CD 63 E8                             call    l2_fill_dma
 189+ E963 3E D2                                ld      a,OPCODE_JpNCnn
 190+ E965 21 74 E5                             ld      hl,l2targetArray1   ; L2targetArray2 Population
 191+ E968 C3 87 E9                             jp      int_bren_save_Array ;
 192+ E96B              int_bren_save_Array2Low:
 193+ E96B 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 194+ E96D 21 74 E6                             ld      hl,l2targetArray2   ; L2targetArray2 Population
 195+ E970 CD 63 E8                             call    l2_fill_dma
 196+ E973 3E DA                                ld      a,OPCODE_JpCnn
 197+ E975 21 74 E6                             ld      hl,l2targetArray2   ; L2targetArray2 Population
 198+ E978 C3 87 E9                             jp      int_bren_save_Array ;
 199+ E97B              int_bren_save_Array2High:
 200+ E97B                                      ZeroA
 200+ E97B AF          >                        xor a
 201+ E97C 21 74 E6                             ld      hl,l2targetArray2   ; L2targetArray2 Population
 202+ E97F CD 63 E8                             call    l2_fill_dma
 203+ E982 21 74 E6                             ld      hl,l2targetArray2   ; L2targetArray2 Population
 204+ E985 3E D2                                ld      a,OPCODE_JpNCnn
 205+ E987              ; Uses HL DE
 206+ E987              ; Note this works out the last position for each point, not any intermediate
 207+ E987              ; so we need a version that plots lowest for left line & highest for right line
 208+ E987 22 13 EA     int_bren_save_Array:    ld      (.TargetArrayAddr+2),hl
 209+ E98A 32 24 EA                             ld      (.TargetJump),a
 210+ E98D 2A 77 E8                             ld      hl,(l2_X1)          ; if X0 < X1
 211+ E990 ED 5B 73 E8                          ld      de,(l2_X0)          ; calculate SX DX
 212+ E994              ; --- dx = abs(x1 - x0) & set up SX
 213+ E994                                      ClearCarryFlag              ;
 213+ E994 B7          >                        or a
 214+ E995 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
 215+ E997 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                 ;
 216+ E999 28 0E                                jr      z,.DXPositive       ;
 217+ E99B              .DXNegative:            NegHL                       ;
 217+ E99B AF          >                    xor a
 217+ E99C 95          >                    sub l
 217+ E99D 6F          >                    ld l,a
 217+ E99E 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 217+ E99F 94          >                    sub h
 217+ E9A0 67          >                    ld h,a
 218+ E9A1                                      SetDecrement .UpdateX0Operation
 218+ E9A1 3E 1B       >                        ld      a,OPCODE_DecDE
 218+ E9A3 32 74 EA    >                        ld      (.UpdateX0Operation),a
 219+ E9A6 C3 AE E9                             jp      .DoneCalcDx         ;
 220+ E9A9              .DXPositive:            SetIncrement .UpdateX0Operation
 220+ E9A9 3E 13       >                        ld      a,OPCODE_IncDE
 220+ E9AB 32 74 EA    >                        ld      (.UpdateX0Operation),a
 221+ E9AE 22 7D E8     .DoneCalcDx:            ld      (l2_DX),hl          ;
 222+ E9B1 ED 5B 73 E8                          ld      de,(l2_X0)          ; fetch in X0 so we can exx
 223+ E9B5 ED 4B 77 E8                          ld      bc,(l2_X1)          ; and also X1
 224+ E9B9 D9                                   exx                         ; ++now hl' = DX, DE'=X0, BC' = X1
 225+ E9BA              ; --- dy = -abs(y1 - y0) & set up SY
 226+ E9BA 2A 79 E8     .CalcDY:                ld      hl,(l2_Y1)          ; If Y1 < Y1
 227+ E9BD ED 5B 75 E8                          ld      de,(l2_Y0)          ; calculate SY DY
 228+ E9C1                                      ClearCarryFlag              ;
 228+ E9C1 B7          >                        or a
 229+ E9C2 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
 230+ E9C4 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                 ;
 231+ E9C6 28 08                                jr      z,.DYPositive       ;
 232+ E9C8              .DYNegative:            SetDecrement .UpdateY0Operation
 232+ E9C8 3E 1B       >                        ld      a,OPCODE_DecDE
 232+ E9CA 32 AB EA    >                        ld      (.UpdateY0Operation),a
 233+ E9CD C3 AE E9                             jp      .DoneCalcDx         ;
 234+ E9D0              .DYPositive:            NegHL                       ;
 234+ E9D0 AF          >                    xor a
 234+ E9D1 95          >                    sub l
 234+ E9D2 6F          >                    ld l,a
 234+ E9D3 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 234+ E9D4 94          >                    sub h
 234+ E9D5 67          >                    ld h,a
 235+ E9D6                                      SetIncrement .UpdateY0Operation
 235+ E9D6 3E 13       >                        ld      a,OPCODE_IncDE
 235+ E9D8 32 AB EA    >                        ld      (.UpdateY0Operation),a
 236+ E9DB 22 7F E8     .DoneCalcDy:            ld      (l2_DY),hl
 237+ E9DE ED 5B 75 E8                          ld      de,(l2_Y0)          ; fetch in X0
 238+ E9E2 ED 4B 79 E8                          ld      bc,(l2_Y1)          ; now hl = DY, DE=Y0, BC = Y1
 239+ E9E6              ; ---   error = dx + dy >> at this point hl' = DX, DE'=X0, BC' = X1 and hl = DY, DE=Y0, BC = Y1
 240+ E9E6 E5 FD E1     .CalcError:             ld      iy,hl               ; fetch DY into IY
 241+ E9E9 D9                                   exx                         ; ++now looking at DX data set and DY in alternate
 242+ E9EA EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; quickly flip over de and to support add instruction
 243+ E9EB FD 19                                add     iy,de               ; we have set up IY as L2_Error
 244+ E9ED EB                                   ex      de,hl
 245+ E9EE FD 22 81 E8                          ld      (l2_Error),iy
 246+ E9F2              ; --- While True        >> at this point we are looing at DX and need to consider state at iteration loop
 247+ E9F2 D9           .CalcLoop:              exx                         ; ++now looking at DY data set and DX in alternate
 248+ E9F3                                      ;ld      hl,(l2_X0)         ; get X0 and Y0
 249+ E9F3              ; --- PLOT X0, Y0       >> now looking at DY data set and DX in alternate
 250+ E9F3              .CheckYRange:           ;ld      de,(l2_Y0)
 251+ E9F3 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; if Y0 > 127
 252+ E9F4 A7                                   and     a                   ; or Y0 is negative
 253+ E9F5 20 35                                jr      nz,.YOutOfRange     ; then we can skip the plot
 254+ E9F7 7B                                   ld      a,e                 ;
 255+ E9F8 E6 80                                and     $80                 ;
 256+ E9FA 20 30                                jr      nz,.YOutOfRange     ;
 257+ E9FC D9           .CheckXRange:           exx                         ; ++now looking at DX data set and DY in alternate
 258+ E9FD 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; if X0 is negative
 259+ E9FE A7                                   and     a
 260+ E9FF 28 0E                                jr      z,.XOKToPlot
 261+ EA01 E6 80                                and     $80
 262+ EA03 28 05                                jr      z,.NotXNegative
 263+ EA05 3E 00        .XNegative:             ld      a,0                 ; if X0 <0 > 255 then clamp it
 264+ EA07 C3 10 EA                             jp      .ClipXDone          ;
 265+ EA0A 3E FF        .NotXNegative:          ld      a,255               ;
 266+ EA0C C3 10 EA                             jp      .ClipXDone          ;
 267+ EA0F 7B           .XOKToPlot:             ld      a,e                 ; no clip therefore we can just use X0 as is
 268+ EA10 D9           .ClipXDone:             exx                         ; ++now looking at DY data set and DX in alternate
 269+ EA11 DD 21 74 E5  .TargetArrayAddr:       ld      ix,l2targetArray1   ; later this will be self modifying
 270+ EA15 08                                   ex      af,af'
 271+ EA16 7B                                   ld      a,e
 272+ EA17 32 22 EA                             ld      (.TargetRead+2),a   ; Write Y0 offset to IX offset
 273+ EA1A 32 2A EA                             ld      (.TargetWrite+2),a  ; Write Y0 offset to IX offset
 274+ EA1D 08                                   ex      af,af'
 275+ EA1E C5                                   push    bc
 276+ EA1F 47                                   ld      b,a
 277+ EA20 DD 7E 00     .TargetRead:            ld      a,(IX+0)
 278+ EA23 B8                                   cp      b
 279+ EA24 DA 2B EA     .TargetJump:            jp      c,.SkipWrite
 280+ EA27 78                                   ld      a,b
 281+ EA28 DD 77 00     .TargetWrite:           ld      (IX+0),a            ; directly updates l2targetArray1
 282+ EA2B C1           .SkipWrite:             pop     bc
 283+ EA2C              ; --- if x0 == x1 && y0 == y1 break
 284+ EA2C              .YOutOfRange: ; At this point we have either plotted or its outside array range
 285+ EA2C D9                                   exx                         ; ++now looking at DX data set and DY in alternate
 286+ EA2D              ;                        ld      bc,(l2_X1)
 287+ EA2D              .CheckEndXY:            cpDEEquBC .CheckEndXYOK     ; de will equal X0 still by here
 287+ EA2D 7A          >                        ld      a,d
 287+ EA2E B8          >                        cp      b
 287+ EA2F C2 37 EA    >                        jp      nz, .CheckEndXYOK
 287+ EA32 7B          >                        ld      a,e
 287+ EA33 B9          >                        cp      c
 287+ EA34             >.NoTheSame:
 288+ EA34 C2 41 EA                             jp      nz,.x0x1Differ
 289+ EA37 D9           .CheckEndXYOK:          exx                         ; ++ in this branch in this branchnow looking at DY data set and DX in alternate
 290+ EA38              ;                        ld      bc,(l2_Y1)
 291+ EA38                                      cpDEEquBC  .x0x1Differ      ; de will equal Y0 still by here
 291+ EA38 7A          >                        ld      a,d
 291+ EA39 B8          >                        cp      b
 291+ EA3A C2 41 EA    >                        jp      nz, .x0x1Differ
 291+ EA3D 7B          >                        ld      a,e
 291+ EA3E B9          >                        cp      c
 291+ EA3F             >.NoTheSame:
 292+ EA3F D9                                   exx                         ; ++ in this branch now looking at DX data set and DY in alternate
 293+ EA40 C8                                   ret     z                   ; if they are both the same we are done
 294+ EA41              .x0x1Differ:                                        ; by this point we could be looking at DX on all branches
 295+ EA41              ; --- e2 = 2 * error
 296+ EA41 D9           .SetError2:             exx                         ; ++now looking at DY data set and DX in alternate
 297+ EA42 E5 D5                                push    hl,,de              ; save HL
 298+ EA44 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; de = DY; could futher optimise to check DY>E2 and reduce instruction count
 299+ EA45 FD E5 E1                             ld      hl,iy;(l2_Error)       ; e2 = 2 * error
 300+ EA48 29                                   add     hl,hl               ; .
 301+ EA49 22 83 E8                             ld      (l2_E2),hl          ; .
 302+ EA4C                                      ; before here we are looking at DY
 303+ EA4C              ; --- if e2 >= dy
 304+ EA4C CD BD 9A     .CheckE2gteDY:          call    compare16HLDE       ; .
 305+ EA4F D1 E1                                pop     hl,,de              ; before jumps get HL back
 306+ EA51 EA 5A EA                             jp      pe, .E2DyParitySet  ; Jump looking at DY
 307+ EA54 FA 76 EA                             jp      m,  .E2ltDY         ; Jump looking at DY to get here overflow clear, so if m is set then HL<DE
 308+ EA57 C3 5D EA                             jp      .E2gteDY            ; Jump looking at DY
 309+ EA5A              .E2DyParitySet:         ; entering here looking at DY
 310+ EA5A F2 76 EA                             jp      p,  .E2ltDY         ; Jump looking at DY if pe is set, then if sign is clear HL<DE
 311+ EA5D              ; --- if x0 == x1 break
 312+ EA5D D9           .E2gteDY:               exx                         ; ++ in this branch now looking at DX data set and DY in alternate
 313+ EA5E                                      cpDEEquBC .ErrorUpdateDY    ;      if x0 == x1 break
 313+ EA5E 7A          >                        ld      a,d
 313+ EA5F B8          >                        cp      b
 313+ EA60 C2 66 EA    >                        jp      nz, .ErrorUpdateDY
 313+ EA63 7B          >                        ld      a,e
 313+ EA64 B9          >                        cp      c
 313+ EA65             >.NoTheSame:
 314+ EA65 C8                                   ret     z                   ;      .
 315+ EA66              ; --- error = error + dy
 316+ EA66 D9           .ErrorUpdateDY:         exx                         ; if we get here we are looking at DY data set and DX in alternate
 317+ EA67 E5 D5                                push    hl,,de              ; save HL
 318+ EA69 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; de = DY
 319+ EA6A FD E5 E1                             ld      hl,iy;(l2_Error)       ;      error = error + dy
 320+ EA6D 19                                   add     hl,de               ;      .
 321+ EA6E E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl;(l2_Error),hl       ;      .
 322+ EA71 D1 E1                                pop     hl,,de
 323+ EA73              ; --- x0 = x0 + sx
 324+ EA73 D9           .UpdateX0:              exx                         ; now back looking at DX data set and DY in alternate
 325+ EA74 00           .UpdateX0Operation:     nop                         ;      x0 = x0 +/- sx
 326+ EA75 D9                                   exx                         ; correction on this brach so we are looking at DY
 327+ EA76              .E2ltDY:                ; entering here, looking at DY in all branches
 328+ EA76              ; --- if e2 <= dx
 329+ EA76 D9           .CheckE2lteDX:          exx                         ; we want to look at DX
 330+ EA77 E5 D5                                push    hl,,de
 331+ EA79 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; de = l2_DX
 332+ EA7A 2A 83 E8                             ld      hl,(l2_E2)          ; if e2 <= dx
 333+ EA7D              ;                        ld      de,(l2_DX)          ; as we can't do skip on e2>dx
 334+ EA7D CD BD 9A                             call    compare16HLDE       ; we will jump based on e2 <= dx
 335+ EA80 D1 E1                                pop     hl,,de              ; recover saved HL DE
 336+ EA82 CA 94 EA                             jp      z, .E2lteDX         ; Jump looking at DX
 337+ EA85 EA 8E EA                             jp      pe, .E2DxParitySet  ; Jump looking at DX
 338+ EA88 FA 94 EA                             jp      m,  .E2lteDX        ; Jump looking at DX : to get here overflow clear, so if m is set then HL<DE
 339+ EA8B C3 AD EA                             jp      .E2gteDx            ; Jump looking at DX
 340+ EA8E F2 94 EA     .E2DxParitySet:         jp      p,  .E2lteDX        ; Jump looking at DX
 341+ EA91 C3 AD EA                             jp      .E2gteDx            ; Jump looking at DX
 342+ EA94              ; ---  if y0 == y1 break
 343+ EA94              .E2lteDX:               ; Entry looking at DX
 344+ EA94 D9                                   exx                         ;      in branch looking at DY
 345+ EA95                                      cpDEEquBC .ErrorUpdateDX    ;      .
 345+ EA95 7A          >                        ld      a,d
 345+ EA96 B8          >                        cp      b
 345+ EA97 C2 9E EA    >                        jp      nz, .ErrorUpdateDX
 345+ EA9A 7B          >                        ld      a,e
 345+ EA9B B9          >                        cp      c
 345+ EA9C             >.NoTheSame:
 346+ EA9C D9                                   exx                         ;      in branch looking at DX
 347+ EA9D C8                                   ret     z                   ;      .
 348+ EA9E              ; --- error = error + dx
 349+ EA9E              .ErrorUpdateDX:         ; at this point will be looking at DX
 350+ EA9E E5 D5                                push    hl,,de
 351+ EAA0 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ;      de = DY
 352+ EAA1 FD E5 E1                             ld      hl,iy;(l2_Error)       ;      error = error + dx
 353+ EAA4 19                                   add     hl,de               ;      .
 354+ EAA5 E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl;(l2_Error),hl       ;      .
 355+ EAA8 D1 E1                                pop     hl,,de
 356+ EAAA              ; --- y0 = y0 + sy
 357+ EAAA D9           .UpdateY0:              exx                         ;      in this branch we are looking at DY
 358+ EAAB 00           .UpdateY0Operation:     nop                         ;      y0 = y0 + sy
 359+ EAAC D9                                   exx                         ;      in this branch we are looking at
 360+ EAAD              ; --- Loop
 361+ EAAD              .E2gteDx:               ; at this point will be looking at DX again
 362+ EAAD C3 F2 E9                             jp      .CalcLoop           ; repeat until we have a return
 363+ EAB0
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/int_bren_save.asm

  95+ EBC6              ;;;;+                            if  XX13 <> 0 goto BL5
  96+ EBC6              ;;;;+                                                                (BL7)
  97+ EBC6              ;;;;+                        Copy data for K6(3210) into K5(3210) for next call (K5(10) = x  K5(32) = y)
  98+ EBC6              ;;;;+                        CNT = CNT + STP

 100+ EBC6              ;ENDIF
 101+ EBC6
 102+ EBC6              ; ix = x Position, iy = y position, d = radius in Leading sign magnitude
 103+ EBC6
 104+ EBC6              ;EliteCheckOnSM:     ld
 105+ EBC6              ;; ix = x Position, iy = y position, d = radius in 2's compliment
 106+ EBC6              ;;EliteCheckOn2c:
 107+ EBC6              ;;.CheckXOffLeft:     ld      hl,ix               ; if x position + radius is < 0 then its off screen
 108+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      c,d                 ; use c as a temporary holding
 109+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      d,0                 ;
 110+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      e,c                 ;
 111+ EBC6              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag              ;
 112+ EBC6              ;;                    adc     hl,de               ;
 113+ EBC6              ;;                    jp      m, .NotOnScreen     ;
 114+ EBC6              ;;.CheckXOffRight:    ld      hl,ix               ; if x position - radius > 255 then its off screen
 115+ EBC6              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag              ;
 116+ EBC6              ;;                    sbc     hl,de               ;
 117+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,h                 ;
 118+ EBC6              ;;                    and     a
 119+ EBC6              ;;                    jp      nz,.NotOnScreen
 120+ EBC6              ;;.CheckXOffLeft:     ld      hl,iy               ; if y position + radius is < 0 then its off screen
 121+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      c,d                 ; use c as a temporary holding
 122+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      d,0                 ;
 123+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      e,c                 ;
 124+ EBC6              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag              ;
 125+ EBC6              ;;                    adc     hl,de               ;
 126+ EBC6              ;;                    jp      m, .NotOnScreen     ;
 127+ EBC6              ;;.CheckXOffRight:    ld      hl,iy               ; if y position - radius > 255 then its off screen
 128+ EBC6              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag              ; if y position - radius > 127 then also off screen
 129+ EBC6              ;;                    sbc     hl,de               ;
 130+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,h                 ;
 131+ EBC6              ;;                    and     a                   ;
 132+ EBC6              ;;                    jp      nz,.NotOnScreen     ;
 133+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,l                 ;
 134+ EBC6              ;;                    and     $80                 ;
 135+ EBC6              ;;                    jp      nz,.NotOnScreen     ;
 136+ EBC6              ;;.OnScreen:          ClearCarryFlag
 137+ EBC6              ;;                    ret
 138+ EBC6              ;;.NotOnScreen:       SetCarryFlag
 139+ EBC6              ;;                    ret
 140+ EBC6
 141+ EBC6
 142+ EBC6              ;;CircleRadius        DB      0
 143+ EBC6              ;;CircleStep          DB      0
 144+ EBC6              ;;CircleFlag          DB      0
 145+ EBC6              ;;CircleCounter       DB      0
 146+ EBC6              ;;; EliteCircle, uses lines as per original elite
 147+ EBC6              ;;; ix = x Position, iy = y position, d = radius, e = colour x and y are 2's compliment not leading sign
 148+ EBC6              ;;EliteCircle:        push    de                      ; save radius
 149+ EBC6              ;;                    call    EliteCheckOn2c          ; if its off screen carry will be set to
 150+ EBC6              ;;                    ret     c                       ;
 151+ EBC6              ;;                    pop     de                      ; set X (or in our case circle radius) to radius
 152+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,d                     ;
 153+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      (CircleRadius),a        ;
 154+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      d,8
 155+ EBC6              ;;                    JumpIfALTNusng  d,.DoneRadius   ; If the radius < 8, skip to PL89
 156+ EBC6              ;;                    srl     d                       ; Halve d so d = 4
 157+ EBC6              ;;                    JumpifALTNusng  60,.DoneRadius  ; If the radius < 60, skip to PL89
 158+ EBC6              ;;                    srl     d                       ; Halve d so d = 2
 159+ EBC6              ;;.DoneRadius:        ld      a,d                     ; Now store value in d into step
 160+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      (CircleStep),a
 161+ EBC6              ;;; ix = x Position, iy = y position, CircleRadius = radius, CircleStep = step value based on radius, must be on screen
 162+ EBC6              ;;EliteCircle2:       ld      a,$FF                   ; set flag for first plot
 163+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      (CircleFlag),a
 164+ EBC6              ;;                    inc     a                       ; set counter to 0 (goes to 64)
 165+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      (CircleCounter),a
 166+ EBC6              ;;.CircleLoop:        ld      a,(CircleCounter)       ; Set A = CNT
 167+ EBC6              ;;
 168+ EBC6              ;; JSR FMLTU2             \ Call FMLTU2 to calculate:
 169+ EBC6              ;;                        \
 170+ EBC6              ;;                        \   A = K * sin(A)
 171+ EBC6              ;;                        \     = K * sin(CNT)
 172+ EBC6              ;;
 173+ EBC6              ;; LDX #0                 \ Set T = 0, so we have the following:
 174+ EBC6              ;; STX T                  \
 175+ EBC6              ;;                        \   (T A) = K * sin(CNT)
 176+ EBC6              ;;                        \
 177+ EBC6              ;;                        \ which is the x-coordinate of the circle for this count
 178+ EBC6              ;;
 179+ EBC6              ;; LDX CNT                \ If CNT < 33 then jump to PL37, as this is the right
 180+ EBC6              ;; CPX #33                \ half of the circle and the sign of the x-coordinate is
 181+ EBC6              ;; BCC PL37               \ correct
 182+ EBC6              ;;
 183+ EBC6              ;; EOR #%11111111         \ This is the left half of the circle, so we want to
 184+ EBC6              ;; ADC #0                 \ flip the sign of the x-coordinate in (T A) using two's
 185+ EBC6              ;; TAX                    \ complement, so we start with the low byte and store it
 186+ EBC6              ;;                        \ in X (the ADC adds 1 as we know the C flag is set)
 187+ EBC6              ;;
 188+ EBC6              ;; LDA #&FF               \ And then we flip the high byte in T
 189+ EBC6              ;; ADC #0
 190+ EBC6              ;; STA T
 191+ EBC6              ;;
 192+ EBC6              ;; TXA                    \ Finally, we restore the low byte from X, so we have
 193+ EBC6              ;;                        \ now negated the x-coordinate in (T A)
 194+ EBC6              ;;
 195+ EBC6              ;; CLC                    \ Clear the C flag so we can do some more addition below
 196+ EBC6              ;;
 197+ EBC6              ;;.PL37
 198+ EBC6              ;;
 199+ EBC6              ;; ADC K3                 \ We now calculate the following:
 200+ EBC6              ;; STA K6                 \
 201+ EBC6              ;;                        \   K6(1 0) = (T A) + K3(1 0)
 202+ EBC6              ;;                        \
 203+ EBC6              ;;                        \ to add the coordinates of the centre to our circle
 204+ EBC6              ;;                        \ point, starting with the low bytes
 205+ EBC6              ;;
 206+ EBC6              ;; LDA K3+1               \ And then doing the high bytes, so we now have:
 207+ EBC6              ;; ADC T                  \
 208+ EBC6              ;; STA K6+1               \   K6(1 0) = K * sin(CNT) + K3(1 0)
 209+ EBC6              ;;                        \
 210+ EBC6              ;;                        \ which is the result we want for the x-coordinate
 211+ EBC6              ;;
 212+ EBC6              ;; LDA CNT                \ Set A = CNT + 16
 213+ EBC6              ;; CLC
 214+ EBC6              ;; ADC #16
 215+ EBC6              ;;
 216+ EBC6              ;; JSR FMLTU2             \ Call FMLTU2 to calculate:
 217+ EBC6              ;;                        \
 218+ EBC6              ;;                        \   A = K * sin(A)
 219+ EBC6              ;;                        \     = K * sin(CNT + 16)
 220+ EBC6              ;;                        \     = K * cos(CNT)
 221+ EBC6              ;;
 222+ EBC6              ;; TAX                    \ Set X = A
 223+ EBC6              ;;                        \       = K * cos(CNT)
 224+ EBC6              ;;
 225+ EBC6              ;; LDA #0                 \ Set T = 0, so we have the following:
 226+ EBC6              ;; STA T                  \
 227+ EBC6              ;;                        \   (T X) = K * cos(CNT)
 228+ EBC6              ;;                        \
 229+ EBC6              ;;                        \ which is the y-coordinate of the circle for this count
 230+ EBC6              ;;
 231+ EBC6              ;; LDA CNT                \ Set A = (CNT + 15) mod 64
 232+ EBC6              ;; ADC #15
 233+ EBC6              ;; AND #63
 234+ EBC6              ;;
 235+ EBC6              ;; CMP #33                \ If A < 33 (i.e. CNT is 0-16 or 48-64) then jump to
 236+ EBC6              ;; BCC PL38               \ PL38, as this is the bottom half of the circle and the
 237+ EBC6              ;;                        \ sign of the y-coordinate is correct
 238+ EBC6              ;;
 239+ EBC6              ;; TXA                    \ This is the top half of the circle, so we want to
 240+ EBC6              ;; EOR #%11111111         \ flip the sign of the y-coordinate in (T X) using two's
 241+ EBC6              ;; ADC #0                 \ complement, so we start with the low byte in X (the
 242+ EBC6              ;; TAX                    \ ADC adds 1 as we know the C flag is set)
 243+ EBC6              ;;
 244+ EBC6              ;; LDA #&FF               \ And then we flip the high byte in T, so we have
 245+ EBC6              ;; ADC #0                 \ now negated the y-coordinate in (T X)
 246+ EBC6              ;; STA T
 247+ EBC6              ;;
 248+ EBC6              ;; CLC                    \ Clear the C flag so we can do some more addition below
 249+ EBC6              ;;
 250+ EBC6              ;;.PL38
 251+ EBC6              ;;
 252+ EBC6              ;; JSR BLINE              \ Call BLINE to draw this segment, which also increases
 253+ EBC6              ;;                        \ CNT by STP, the step size
 254+ EBC6              ;;
 255+ EBC6              ;; CMP #65                \ If CNT >= 65 then skip the next instruction
 256+ EBC6              ;; BCS P%+5
 257+ EBC6              ;;
 258+ EBC6              ;; JMP PLL3               \ Jump back for the next segment
 259+ EBC6              ;;
 260+ EBC6              ;; CLC                    \ Clear the C flag to indicate success
 261+ EBC6              ;;
 262+ EBC6              ;; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 263+ EBC6              ;;; ">L2_draw_circle16 bit" ix = x Position, iy = y position, d = radius, e = colour
 264+ EBC6              ;;; draw using minium squared algorithm
 265+ EBC6              ;;;
 266+ EBC6              ;;CircleCurrentX      DB      0
 267+ EBC6              ;;CircleCurrentY      DB      0
 268+ EBC6              ;;CircleCurrentError  DW      0
 269+ EBC6              ;;l2_draw_circle16bit:ld
 270+ EBC6              ;;.ConvertIXto2sC
 271+ EBC6              ;;.ConvertIYto2sC
 272+ EBC6              ;;.ZeroCurrentError
 273+ EBC6              ;;.SetCurrentXRadius:
 274+ EBC6              ;;.ZeroCurrentY
 275+ EBC6              ;;.DrawPixels:
 276+ EBC6              ;;
 277+ EBC6              ;;                    MMUSelectLayer2
 278+ EBC6              ;;.PlotLoop:
 279+ EBC6              ;;.Plot1:
 280+ EBC6              ;;
 281+ EBC6              ;;.Plot2:
 282+ EBC6              ;;
 283+ EBC6              ;;.Plot3:
 284+ EBC6              ;;
 285+ EBC6              ;;.Plot3:
 286+ EBC6              ;;
 287+ EBC6              ;;.Plot5:
 288+ EBC6              ;;
 289+ EBC6              ;;.Plot6:
 290+ EBC6              ;;
 291+ EBC6              ;;.Plot7:
 292+ EBC6              ;;
 293+ EBC6              ;;.Plot8:
 294+ EBC6              ;;
 295+ EBC6              ;;
 296+ EBC6              ;;
 297+ EBC6              ;;
 298+ EBC6              ;;
 299+ EBC6              ;;
 300+ EBC6              ;;
 301+ EBC6              ;;
 302+ EBC6              ;;
 303+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,(CurrentX)    ; if x <= y then break loop
 304+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      hl,CurrentY     ; .
 305+ EBC6              ;;                    cp      (hl)            ; .
 306+ EBC6              ;;                    ret     z               ; . X = Y
 307+ EBC6              ;;                    ret     c               ; . X < Y
 308+ EBC6              ;;.UpdateError:       ld      a,(CurrentY)    ; e += 2*y + 1
 309+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      e,a
 310+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      d,0
 311+ EBC6              ;;                    ShiftDELeft1
 312+ EBC6              ;;                    inc     de
 313+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      hl,(CircleCurrentError)
 314+ EBC6              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag
 315+ EBC6              ;;                    adc     hl,de
 316+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      (CircleCurrentError),hl
 317+ EBC6              ;;.NextCurrentY:      ld      hl,CircleCurrentY
 318+ EBC6              ;;                    inc     (hl)
 319+ EBC6              ;;.CheckEgtX:         ld      hl,(CircleCurrentError)
 320+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,(CircleCurrentX)
 321+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      d,0
 322+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      e,0
 323+ EBC6              ;;                    cpHLDE
 324+ EBC6              ;;                    jp      z,.AdjustError
 325+ EBC6              ;;                    jp      nc,.PlotLoop
 326+ EBC6              ;;.AdjustError:       ld      a,(CircleCurrentX)
 327+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      d,0
 328+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      e,a
 329+ EBC6              ;;                    ShiftDELeft1
 330+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      hl,(CircleCurrentError)
 331+ EBC6              ;;                    inc     hl
 332+ EBC6              ;;                    ClearCarryFlag
 333+ EBC6              ;;                    sbc     hl,de
 334+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,e
 335+ EBC6              ;;                    dec     a
 336+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      (CircleCurrentX),a
 337+ EBC6              ;;                    jp      .PlotLoop
 338+ EBC6              ;;;plot pixel at x = de y = bc
 339+ EBC6              ;;.PlotPixelBCDE:     ld		a,0                     ; This was originally indirect, where as it neeed to be value
 340+ EBC6              ;;                    push	de,,bc,,hl
 341+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,d                     ; if d is not zero then it must be -ve or > 255 to skip
 342+ EBC6              ;;                    and     a                       ;
 343+ EBC6              ;;                    ret     nz                      ;
 344+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,b                     ; if b is not zero then it must be -ve or > 255 to skip
 345+ EBC6              ;;                    and     a
 346+ EBC6              ;;                    ret     nz
 347+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,c                     ; but also check if y > 127 and if so skip
 348+ EBC6              ;;                    and     $80
 349+ EBC6              ;;                    ret     nz
 350+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,c                     ; so we can now plot
 351+ EBC6              ;;                    call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 352+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      h,a
 353+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      l,e
 354+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 355+ EBC6              ;;                    ld      (hl),a
 356+ EBC6              ;;                    pop		de,,bc,,hl
 357+ EBC6              ;;                    ret
 358+ EBC6              ;;
 359+ EBC6
 360+ EBC6              ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 361+ EBC6              ; ">l2_draw_circle BC = center row col, d = radius, e = colour"
 362+ EBC6 7B           l2_draw_circle:     ld		a,e
 363+ EBC7 32 6D EC                         ld		(.PlotPixel+1),a
 364+ EBCA 7A                               ld		a,d								; get radius
 365+ EBCB A7                               and		a
 366+ EBCC C8                               ret		z
 367+ EBCD FE 01                            cp		1
 368+ EBCF CA 84 EC                         jp		z,CircleSinglepixel
 369+ EBD2 ED 43 FC EB                      ld		(.Plot1+1),bc	        ; save origin into cXcY reg in code
 370+ EBD6 DD 67                            ld		ixh,a			        ; ixh =  x = raidus
 371+ EBD8 DD 2E 00                         ld		ixl,0			        ; iyh =  y = 0
 372+ EBDB 26 00        .calcd:	            ld		h,0
 373+ EBDD 6F                               ld		l,a
 374+ EBDE 29                               add		hl,hl			        ; hl = r * 2
 375+ EBDF EB                               ex		de,hl			        ; de = r * 2
 376+ EBE0 21 03 00                         ld		hl,3
 377+ EBE3 A7                               and		a
 378+ EBE4 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de			        ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
 379+ EBE6 44                               ld		b,h
 380+ EBE7 4D                               ld		c,l				        ; bc = 3 - (r * 2)
 381+ EBE8 21 01 00     .calcdelta:         ld		hl,1
 382+ EBEB 16 00                            ld		d,0
 383+ EBED DD 5D                            ld		e,ixl
 384+ EBEF A7                               and		a
 385+ EBF0 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de
 386+ EBF2 11 01 00     .Setde1:            ld		de,1
 387+ EBF5 DD 7C        .CircleLoop:        ld		a,ixh
 388+ EBF7 DD BD                            cp		ixl
 389+ EBF9 D8                               ret		c
 390+ EBFA D9           .ProcessLoop:	    exx
 391+ EBFB 11 00 00     .Plot1:             ld		de,0                    ; de = cXcY
 392+ EBFE 7B                               ld		a,e                     ; c = cY + error
 393+ EBFF DD 85                            add		a,ixl                   ;
 394+ EC01 4F                               ld		c,a                     ;
 395+ EC02 7A                               ld		a,d                     ; b = xY+radius
 396+ EC03 DD 84                            add		a,ixh                   ;
 397+ EC05 47                               ld		b,a                     ;
 398+ EC06 CD 6C EC                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CX+X,CY+Y
 399+ EC09 7B           .Plot2:             ld 		a,e
 400+ EC0A DD 95                            sub 	ixl
 401+ EC0C 4F                               ld 		c,a
 402+ EC0D 7A                               ld 		a,d
 403+ EC0E DD 84                            add 	a,ixh
 404+ EC10 47                               ld		b,a
 405+ EC11 CD 6C EC                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CX-X,CY+Y
 406+ EC14 7B           .Plot3:             ld 		a,e
 407+ EC15 DD 85                            add		a,ixl
 408+ EC17 4F                               ld 		c,a
 409+ EC18 7A                               ld 		a,d
 410+ EC19 DD 94                            sub 	ixh
 411+ EC1B 47                               ld 		b,a
 412+ EC1C CD 6C EC                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CX+X,CY-Y
 413+ EC1F 7B           .Plot4:             ld 		a,e
 414+ EC20 DD 95                            sub 	ixl
 415+ EC22 4F                               ld 		c,a
 416+ EC23 7A                               ld 		a,d
 417+ EC24 DD 94                            sub 	ixh
 418+ EC26 47                               ld 		b,a
 419+ EC27 CD 6C EC                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CX-X,CY-Y
 420+ EC2A 7A           .Plot5:	            ld 		a,d
 421+ EC2B DD 85                            add 	a,ixl
 422+ EC2D 47                               ld 		b,a
 423+ EC2E 7B                               ld 		a,e
 424+ EC2F DD 84                            add 	a,ixh
 425+ EC31 4F                               ld 		c,a
 426+ EC32 CD 6C EC                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CY+X,CX+Y
 427+ EC35 7A           .Plot6:	            ld 		a,d
 428+ EC36 DD 95                            sub 	ixl
 429+ EC38 47                               ld 		b,a
 430+ EC39 7B                               ld 		a,e
 431+ EC3A DD 84                            add 	a,ixh
 432+ EC3C 4F                               ld 		c,a
 433+ EC3D CD 6C EC                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CY-X,CX+Y
 434+ EC40 7A           .Plot7:	            ld 		a,d
 435+ EC41 DD 85                            add 	a,ixl
 436+ EC43 47                               ld 		b,a
 437+ EC44 7B                               ld 		a,e
 438+ EC45 DD 94                            sub 	ixh
 439+ EC47 4F                               ld 		c,a
 440+ EC48 CD 6C EC                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CY+X,CX-Y
 441+ EC4B 7A           .Plot8:	            ld 		a,d
 442+ EC4C DD 95                            sub 	ixl
 443+ EC4E 47                               ld		b,a
 444+ EC4F 7B                               ld 		a,e
 445+ EC50 DD 94                            sub 	ixh
 446+ EC52 4F                               ld 		c,a
 447+ EC53 CD 6C EC                         call	.PlotPixel			    ;CY-X,CX-Y
 448+ EC56 D9                               exx
 449+ EC57 CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	bit     7,h				        ; Check for Hl<=0
 450+ EC59 28 03                            jr z,   .draw_circle_1
 451+ EC5B 19                               add hl,de			            ; Delta=Delta+D1
 452+ EC5C 18 05                            jr      .draw_circle_2		;
 453+ EC5E 09           .draw_circle_1:		add     hl,bc			        ; Delta=Delta+D2
 454+ EC5F 03                               inc     bc
 455+ EC60 03                               inc     bc				        ; D2=D2+2
 456+ EC61 DD 25                            dec     ixh				        ; Y=Y-1
 457+ EC63 03           .draw_circle_2:		inc bc				            ; D2=D2+2
 458+ EC64 03                               inc bc
 459+ EC65 13                               inc de				            ; D1=D1+2
 460+ EC66 13                               inc de
 461+ EC67 DD 2C                            inc ixl				            ; X=X+1
 462+ EC69 C3 F5 EB                         jp      .CircleLoop
 463+ EC6C 3E 00        .PlotPixel:         ld		a,0                     ; This was originally indirect, where as it neeed to be value
 464+ EC6E D5 C5 E5                         push	de,,bc,,hl
 465+ EC71                                  l2_plot_macro; call 	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
 465+ EC71 78          >                        ld      a,b
 465+ EC72             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 465+ EC72 FE C0       >                        cp     192
 465+ EC74 D2 80 EC    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 465+ EC77 69          >                        ld      l,c
 465+ EC78 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 465+ EC7B 67          >                        ld      h,a
 465+ EC7C 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 465+ EC7F 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 465+ EC80             >.NoPlot:
 466+ EC80 E1 C1 D1                         pop		de,,bc,,hl
 467+ EC83 C9                               ret
 468+ EC84 7B           CircleSinglepixel:  ld		a,e
 469+ EC85                                  l2_plot_macro; call	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
 469+ EC85 78          >                        ld      a,b
 469+ EC86             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 469+ EC86 FE C0       >                        cp     192
 469+ EC88 D2 94 EC    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 469+ EC8B 69          >                        ld      l,c
 469+ EC8C CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 469+ EC8F 67          >                        ld      h,a
 469+ EC90 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 469+ EC93 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 469+ EC94             >.NoPlot:
 470+ EC94 C9                               ret
 471+ EC95
 472+ EC95              CalcNewPointMacro:  MACRO reg1, oper, reg2
 473+ EC95 ~                                ClearCarryFlag
 474+ EC95 ~                                ld      b,0
 475+ EC95 ~                                ld      c,reg2
 476+ EC95 ~                                oper    hl,bc
 477+ EC95                                  ENDM
 478+ EC95
 479+ EC95              ; ">l2_draw_clipped_circle HL = Center X 2's c, DE = Center Y 2's , c = radius, b = colour"
 480+ EC95              l2_draw_clipped_circle:
 481+ EC95 78                               ld      a,b                     ; save Colour
 482+ EC96 32 C7 ED                         ld		(.PlotColour+1),a
 483+ EC99 79                               ld		a,c								; get radius
 484+ EC9A                                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 484+ EC9A A7          >                        and     a
 484+ EC9B C8          >                        ret     z
 485+ EC9C                                  JumpIfAEqNusng  1, .circleSinglepixel
 485+ EC9C FE 01       >                        cp     1
 485+ EC9E CA E1 ED    >                        jp      z,.circleSinglepixel
 486+ ECA1 ED 53 CE EC                      ld		(.Plot1Y+1),de					; save origin into DE and HL
 487+ ECA5 22 D1 EC                         ld      (.Plot1X+1),hl                  ; .
 488+ ECA8                                  DISPLAY "TODO : IXH and IXL need to be 16 bit and in IX and IY"
 489+ ECA8 DD 67                            ld		ixh,a							; ixh = x = raidus
 490+ ECAA DD 2E 00                         ld		ixl,0						    ; ixl = y = error
 491+ ECAD 26 00        .calcd:	            ld		h,0                             ; hl = radius
 492+ ECAF 6F                               ld		l,a                             ; raidius is still in a at this point
 493+ ECB0 29                               add		hl,hl							; hl = r * 2
 494+ ECB1 EB                               ex		de,hl							; de = r * 2
 495+ ECB2 21 03 00                         ld		hl,3                            ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
 496+ ECB5                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 496+ ECB5 B7          >                        or a
 497+ ECB6 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de							; .
 498+ ECB8 44 4D                            ld      bc,hl                           ; bc = 3 - (r * 2)
 499+ ECBA 21 01 00     .calcdelta:         ld		hl,1                            ; hl = 1
 500+ ECBD 16 00                            ld		d,0                             ; de = ixl (error)
 501+ ECBF DD 5D                            ld		e,ixl                           ;
 502+ ECC1                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 502+ ECC1 B7          >                        or a
 503+ ECC2 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de                           ; hl = 1 - error
 504+ ECC4 11 01 00     .Setde1:            ld		de,1                            ; de = 1
 505+ ECC7              .CircleLoop:        ReturnIfRegLTNusng ixh, ixl             ; if radius > ixl counter
 505+ ECC7 DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
 505+ ECC9 DD BD       >                        cp      ixl
 505+ ECCB D8          >                        ret	    c
 506+ ECCC D9           .ProcessLoop:	    exx                                     ; save all bc,de,hl registers
 507+ ECCD              ;--- CX+X,CY+Y ---------------------------------------------;
 508+ ECCD 11 00 00     .Plot1Y:            ld		de,0                            ; this is Y coord
 509+ ECD0 21 00 00     .Plot1X:            ld      hl,0                            ; this is x coord
 510+ ECD3 E5 D5                            push    hl,,de
 511+ ECD5                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixh          ;
 511+ ECD5             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 511+ ECD5 B7          >                        or a
 511+ ECD6 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 511+ ECD8 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 511+ ECDA ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 512+ ECDC EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; de = x coord calculated, hl =y center Y
 513+ ECDD                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixl          ;
 513+ ECDD             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 513+ ECDD B7          >                        or a
 513+ ECDE 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 513+ ECE0 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 513+ ECE2 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 514+ ECE4 CD BC ED                         call	.PlotPixel	            		; CX+X,CY+Y using DE = x and hl = y *** Note if we order plot 1 to 8 we can selectivley jump past many on elimiation check
 515+ ECE7 D1 E1        .Plot1Done:         pop     hl,,de                          ; get de (y) and hl (x) back but reversed as the next plot expected the to be reversed from the ex de,hl above  + 0
 516+ ECE9              ;--- CX+X,CY-Y ---------------------------------------------;
 517+ ECE9 E5 D5        .Plot2:             push    hl,,de                          ; e.g  do all CX + X first, so plot1, plot3 and just one check for cx + x off screen
 518+ ECEB                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixh          ;
 518+ ECEB             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 518+ ECEB B7          >                        or a
 518+ ECEC 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 518+ ECEE DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 518+ ECF0 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 519+ ECF2                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot2Done        ;
 519+ ECF2 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 519+ ECF3 A7          >                        and     a
 519+ ECF4 C2 02 ED    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot2Done
 520+ ECF7 EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; de = calculated x
 521+ ECF8                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ;
 521+ ECF8             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 521+ ECF8 B7          >                        or a
 521+ ECF9 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 521+ ECFB DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 521+ ECFD ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 522+ ECFF CD BC ED                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CX-X,CY+Y
 523+ ED02 D1 E1        .Plot2Done:         pop     hl,,de
 524+ ED04              ;--- CX-X,CY-Y ---------------------------------------------; bollocksC
 525+ ED04 E5 D5        .Plot3:             push    hl,,de
 526+ ED06                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ;
