 526+ ED06             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 526+ ED06 B7          >                        or a
 526+ ED07 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 526+ ED09 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 526+ ED0B ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 527+ ED0D                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot3Done        ;
 527+ ED0D 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 527+ ED0E A7          >                        and     a
 527+ ED0F C2 1D ED    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot3Done
 528+ ED12 EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; de = calculated x
 529+ ED13                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ;
 529+ ED13             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 529+ ED13 B7          >                        or a
 529+ ED14 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 529+ ED16 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 529+ ED18 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 530+ ED1A CD BC ED                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CX+X,CY-Y
 531+ ED1D D1 E1        .Plot3Done:         pop     hl,,de
 532+ ED1F              ;--- CX-X,CY+Y ---------------------------------------------; bollocks
 533+ ED1F E5 D5        .Plot4:             push    hl,,de
 534+ ED21                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ;
 534+ ED21             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 534+ ED21 B7          >                        or a
 534+ ED22 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 534+ ED24 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 534+ ED26 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 535+ ED28                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot4Done
 535+ ED28 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 535+ ED29 A7          >                        and     a
 535+ ED2A C2 38 ED    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot4Done
 536+ ED2D EB                               ex      de,hl
 537+ ED2E                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixl          ;
 537+ ED2E             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 537+ ED2E B7          >                        or a
 537+ ED2F 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 537+ ED31 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 537+ ED33 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 538+ ED35 CD BC ED                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CX-X,CY-Y
 539+ ED38 D1 E1        .Plot4Done:         pop     hl,,de
 540+ ED3A              ;--- CX+Y,CY+X ---------------------------------------------; bollocks
 541+ ED3A E5 D5        .Plot5:             push    hl,,de
 542+ ED3C                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixl          ;
 542+ ED3C             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 542+ ED3C B7          >                        or a
 542+ ED3D 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 542+ ED3F DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 542+ ED41 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 543+ ED43                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot5Done
 543+ ED43 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 543+ ED44 A7          >                        and     a
 543+ ED45 C2 53 ED    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot5Done
 544+ ED48 EB                               ex      de,hl
 545+ ED49                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixh          ;
 545+ ED49             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 545+ ED49 B7          >                        or a
 545+ ED4A 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 545+ ED4C DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 545+ ED4E ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 546+ ED50 CD BC ED                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ;CY+X,CX+Y
 547+ ED53 D1 E1        .Plot5Done:         pop     hl,,de
 548+ ED55              ;--- CX+Y,CX-X ---------------------------------------------;bollocks
 549+ ED55 E5 D5        .Plot6:             push    hl,,de
 550+ ED57                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixl          ;
 550+ ED57             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 550+ ED57 B7          >                        or a
 550+ ED58 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 550+ ED5A DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 550+ ED5C ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 551+ ED5E                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot6Done
 551+ ED5E 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 551+ ED5F A7          >                        and     a
 551+ ED60 C2 6E ED    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot6Done
 552+ ED63 EB                               ex      de,hl
 553+ ED64                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ;
 553+ ED64             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 553+ ED64 B7          >                        or a
 553+ ED65 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 553+ ED67 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 553+ ED69 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 554+ ED6B CD BC ED                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CY-X,CX+Y
 555+ ED6E D1 E1        .Plot6Done:         pop     hl,,de
 556+ ED70              ;--- CX-Y,CY-X ---------------------------------------------;bollocksC
 557+ ED70 E5 D5        .Plot7:             push    hl,,de
 558+ ED72                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ;
 558+ ED72             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 558+ ED72 B7          >                        or a
 558+ ED73 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 558+ ED75 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 558+ ED77 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 559+ ED79                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot7Done
 559+ ED79 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 559+ ED7A A7          >                        and     a
 559+ ED7B C2 89 ED    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot7Done
 560+ ED7E EB                               ex      de,hl
 561+ ED7F                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ;
 561+ ED7F             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 561+ ED7F B7          >                        or a
 561+ ED80 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 561+ ED82 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 561+ ED84 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 562+ ED86 CD BC ED                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CY+X,CX-Y
 563+ ED89 D1 E1        .Plot7Done:         pop     hl,,de
 564+ ED8B              ;--- CX-Y,CY+X ---------------------------------------------; bollocks
 565+ ED8B E5 D5        .Plot8:             push    hl,,de
 566+ ED8D                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ;
 566+ ED8D             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 566+ ED8D B7          >                        or a
 566+ ED8E 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 566+ ED90 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 566+ ED92 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 567+ ED94                                  JumpIfRegIsNotZero  h,.Plot8Done
 567+ ED94 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 567+ ED95 A7          >                        and     a
 567+ ED96 C2 A4 ED    >                        jp	    nz,.Plot8Done
 568+ ED99 EB                               ex      de,hl
 569+ ED9A                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixh          ;
 569+ ED9A             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 569+ ED9A B7          >                        or a
 569+ ED9B 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 569+ ED9D DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 569+ ED9F ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 570+ EDA1 CD BC ED                         call	.PlotPixel	                    ; CY-X,CX-Y
 571+ EDA4 D1 E1        .Plot8Done:         pop     hl,,de
 572+ EDA6 D9           .PlotDone:          exx
 573+ EDA7 CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	bit     7,h				; Check for Hl<=0
 574+ EDA9 28 03                            jr z,   .draw_circle_1
 575+ EDAB 19                               add hl,de			; Delta=Delta+D1
 576+ EDAC 18 05                            jr      .draw_circle_2		;
 577+ EDAE 09           .draw_circle_1:		add     hl,bc			; Delta=Delta+D2
 578+ EDAF 03                               inc     bc
 579+ EDB0 03                               inc     bc				; D2=D2+2
 580+ EDB1 DD 25                            dec     ixh				; Y=Y-1
 581+ EDB3 03           .draw_circle_2:		inc     bc				; D2=D2+2
 582+ EDB4 03                               inc     bc
 583+ EDB5 13                               inc     de				; D1=D1+2
 584+ EDB6 13                               inc     de
 585+ EDB7 DD 2C                            inc     ixl				; X=X+1
 586+ EDB9 C3 C7 EC                         jp      .CircleLoop
 587+ EDBC 7A           .PlotPixel:         ld      a,d             ; filter x> 256 or negative
 588+ EDBD A7                               and     a
 589+ EDBE C0                               ret     nz
 590+ EDBF 7C                               ld      a,h             ; filter y > 256 or negative
 591+ EDC0 A7                               and     a
 592+ EDC1 C0                               ret     nz
 593+ EDC2 7D                               ld      a,l             ; filter y > 127
 594+ EDC3 E6 80                            and     $80
 595+ EDC5 C0                               ret     nz
 596+ EDC6 3E 00        .PlotColour:        ld		a,0             ; This was originally indirect, where as it neeed to be value
 597+ EDC8 D5 C5 E5                         push	de,,bc,,hl
 598+ EDCB 45                               ld      b,l             ; At this point de = x and hl = y
 599+ EDCC 4B                               ld      c,e
 600+ EDCD                                  l2_plot_macro; call 	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
 600+ EDCD 78          >                        ld      a,b
 600+ EDCE             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 600+ EDCE FE C0       >                        cp     192
 600+ EDD0 D2 DC ED    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 600+ EDD3 69          >                        ld      l,c
 600+ EDD4 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 600+ EDD7 67          >                        ld      h,a
 600+ EDD8 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 600+ EDDB 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 600+ EDDC             >.NoPlot:
 601+ EDDC E1 C1 D1                         pop		de,,bc,,hl
 602+ EDDF                                  ClearCarryFlag
 602+ EDDF B7          >                        or a
 603+ EDE0 C9                               ret
 604+ EDE1 7C           .circleSinglepixel: ld      a,h             ; as its 1 pixel if h or d are non zero then its off screen
 605+ EDE2 B2                               or      d
 606+ EDE3 C0                               ret     nz
 607+ EDE4 CB 7B                            bit     7,e             ; and if Y is > 127 then off screen , bit is 8 states like ld a,e and a
 608+ EDE6 C0                               ret     nz
 609+ EDE7 78                               ld      a,b             ; a = colour
 610+ EDE8 43                               ld      b,e             ; b = y
 611+ EDE9 4D                               ld      c,l             ; c = x
 612+ EDEA CD B6 E2                         call    l2_plot_pixel
 613+ EDED C9                               ret
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_circle.asm
 802  EDEE                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_circle_fill.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_circle_fill.asm
   1+ EDEE
   2+ EDEE 00           l2_circle_dblx		DB 0
   3+ EDEF 00           l2_circle_dbly		DB 0
   4+ EDF0
   5+ EDF0              ; ">l2_draw_circle_fill BC = center row col, d = radius, e = colour"
   6+ EDF0              ; Note this code currently does not process BC
   7+ EDF0 7B           l2_draw_circle_fill:    ld		a,e
   8+ EDF1 32 87 EE                             ld		(.LineColour+1),a
   9+ EDF4 7A                                   ld		a,d								; get radius
  10+ EDF5 A7                                   and		a
  11+ EDF6 C8                                   ret		z
  12+ EDF7 FE 01                                cp		1
  13+ EDF9 CA 84 EC                             jp		z,CircleSinglepixel
  14+ EDFC ED 43 26 EE                          ld		(.Line1+1),bc					; save origin into DE reg in code
  15+ EE00 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a							; ixh = raidus (x)
  16+ EE02 DD 2E 00                             ld		ixl,0							; ihy = y
  17+ EE05 26 00        .calcd:	                ld		h,0
  18+ EE07 6F                                   ld		l,a
  19+ EE08 29                                   add		hl,hl							; hl = r * 2
  20+ EE09 EB                                   ex		de,hl							; de = r * 2
  21+ EE0A 21 03 00                             ld		hl,3
  22+ EE0D A7                                   and		a
  23+ EE0E ED 52                                sbc		hl,de							; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
  24+ EE10 44                                   ld		b,h
  25+ EE11 4D                                   ld		c,l								; bc = 3 - (r * 2)
  26+ EE12 21 01 00     .calcdelta              ld		hl,1
  27+ EE15 16 00                                ld		d,0
  28+ EE17 DD 5D                                ld		e,ixl
  29+ EE19 A7                                   and		a
  30+ EE1A ED 52                                sbc		hl,de
  31+ EE1C 11 01 00     .Setde1	                ld		de,1
  32+ EE1F DD 7C        .CircleLoop:            ld		a,ixh
  33+ EE21 DD BD                                cp		ixl
  34+ EE23 D8                                   ret		c
  35+ EE24 D9           .ProcessLoop:	        exx
  36+ EE25 11 00 00     .Line1:                 ld		de,0
  37+ EE28 7B                                   ld 		a,e
  38+ EE29 DD 95                                sub 	ixl
  39+ EE2B 4F                                   ld 		c,a
  40+ EE2C 7A                                   ld 		a,d
  41+ EE2D DD 84                                add 	a,ixh
  42+ EE2F 47                                   ld		b,a
  43+ EE30                                                  DISPLAY "TODO: add double x calc"
  44+ EE30                                      ;; TODO ADD DOUBLE X CALC
  45+ EE30 D5                                   push	de
  46+ EE31 DD 55                                ld		d,ixl
  47+ EE33 CB 22                                sla		d
  48+ EE35 CD 82 EE                             call	.PlotLine			;CX-X,CY+Y
  49+ EE38 D1                                   pop		de
  50+ EE39 7B           .Line2:                 ld 		a,e
  51+ EE3A DD 95                                sub		ixl
  52+ EE3C 4F                                   ld 		c,a
  53+ EE3D 7A                                   ld 		a,d
  54+ EE3E DD 94                                sub 	ixh
  55+ EE40 47                                   ld 		b,a
  56+ EE41                                      ;; TODO ADD DOUBLE X CALC
  57+ EE41 D5                                   push	de
  58+ EE42 DD 55                                ld		d,ixl
  59+ EE44 CB 22                                sla		d
  60+ EE46 CD 82 EE                             call	.PlotLine			;CX-X,CY-Y
  61+ EE49 D1                                   pop		de
  62+ EE4A 7B           .Line3:	                ld 		a,e
  63+ EE4B DD 94                                sub		ixh
  64+ EE4D 4F                                   ld 		c,a
  65+ EE4E 7A                                   ld 		a,d
  66+ EE4F DD 85                                add 	a,ixl
  67+ EE51 47                                   ld 		b,a
  68+ EE52                                      ;; TODO ADD DOUBLE Y CALC
  69+ EE52 D5                                   push	de
  70+ EE53 DD 54                                ld		d,ixh
  71+ EE55 CB 22                                sla		d
  72+ EE57 CD 82 EE                             call	.PlotLine			;CX-Y,CY+x
  73+ EE5A D1                                   pop		de
  74+ EE5B 7B           .Line4:	                ld 		a,e
  75+ EE5C DD 94                                sub		ixh
  76+ EE5E 4F                                   ld 		c,a
  77+ EE5F 7A                                   ld 		a,d
  78+ EE60 DD 95                                sub 	ixl
  79+ EE62 47                                   ld 		b,a
  80+ EE63                                      ;; TODO ADD DOUBLE Y CALC
  81+ EE63 D5                                   push	de
  82+ EE64 DD 54                                ld		d,ixh
  83+ EE66 CB 22                                sla		d
  84+ EE68 CD 82 EE                             call	.PlotLine			;CX-Y,CY+x
  85+ EE6B D1                                   pop		de
  86+ EE6C D9                                   exx
  87+ EE6D CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	    bit 7,h				; Check for Hl<=0
  88+ EE6F 28 03                                jr z,.draw_circle_1
  89+ EE71 19                                   add hl,de			; Delta=Delta+D1
  90+ EE72 18 05                                jr .draw_circle_2		;
  91+ EE74 09           .draw_circle_1:		    add hl,bc			; Delta=Delta+D2
  92+ EE75 03                                   inc bc
  93+ EE76 03                                   inc bc				; D2=D2+2
  94+ EE77 DD 25                                dec ixh				; Y=Y-1
  95+ EE79 03           .draw_circle_2:		    inc bc				; D2=D2+2
  96+ EE7A 03                                   inc bc
  97+ EE7B 13                                   inc de				; D1=D1+2
  98+ EE7C 13                                   inc de
  99+ EE7D DD 2C                                inc ixl				; X=X+1
 100+ EE7F C3 1F EE                             jp .CircleLoop
 101+ EE82 D5 C5 E5 F5  .PlotLine:              push	de,,bc,,hl,,af
 102+ EE86 3E 00        .LineColour:	        ld		a,0         ; circle colur
 103+ EE88 5F                                   ld      e,a
 104+ EE89 CD 84 E4                             call 	l2_draw_horz_line
 105+ EE8C F1 E1 C1 D1                          pop     de,,bc,,hl,,af
 106+ EE90 C9                                   ret
 107+ EE91
 108+ EE91              ; ">l2_draw_clipped_circle HL = Center X 2's c, DE = Center Y 2's , c = radius, b = colour"
 109+ EE91              l2_draw_clipped_circle_filled:
 110+ EE91 78                               ld      a,b                             ; save Colour
 111+ EE92 32 8C EF                         ld		(.PlotColour+1),a
 112+ EE95 79                               ld		a,c								; get radius
 113+ EE96                                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 113+ EE96 A7          >                        and     a
 113+ EE97 C8          >                        ret     z
 114+ EE98                                  JumpIfAEqNusng  1, .circleSinglepixel
 114+ EE98 FE 01       >                        cp     1
 114+ EE9A CA 92 EF    >                        jp      z,.circleSinglepixel
 115+ EE9D ED 53 CA EE                      ld		(.Plot1Y+1),de					; save origin into DE and HL
 116+ EEA1 22 CD EE                         ld      (.Plot1X+1),hl                  ; .
 117+ EEA4                                  DISPLAY "TODO : IXH and IXL need to be 16 bit and in IX and IY"
 118+ EEA4 DD 67                            ld		ixh,a							; ixh = x = raidus
 119+ EEA6 DD 2E 00                         ld		ixl,0						    ; ixl = y = error
 120+ EEA9 26 00        .calcd:	            ld		h,0                             ; hl = radius
 121+ EEAB 6F                               ld		l,a                             ; raidius is still in a at this point
 122+ EEAC 29                               add		hl,hl							; hl = r * 2
 123+ EEAD EB                               ex		de,hl							; de = r * 2
 124+ EEAE 21 03 00                         ld		hl,3                            ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
 125+ EEB1                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 125+ EEB1 B7          >                        or a
 126+ EEB2 ED 52                            sbc		hl,de							; .
 127+ EEB4 44 4D                            ld      bc,hl                           ; bc = 3 - (r * 2)
 128+ EEB6 21 01 00     .calcdelta:         ld		hl,1                            ; hl = 1
 129+ EEB9 16 00                            ld		d,0                             ; de = ixl (error)
 130+ EEBB DD 5D                            ld		e,ixl                           ;
 131+ EEBD                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 131+ EEBD B7          >                        or a
 132+ EEBE ED 52                            sbc		hl,de                           ; hl = 1 - error
 133+ EEC0 11 01 00     .Setde1:            ld		de,1                            ; de = 1
 134+ EEC3              .CircleLoop:        ReturnIfRegLTNusng ixh, ixl             ; if radius > ixl counter
 134+ EEC3 DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
 134+ EEC5 DD BD       >                        cp      ixl
 134+ EEC7 D8          >                        ret	    c
 135+ EEC8 D9           .ProcessLoop:	    exx                                     ; save all bc,de,hl registers
 136+ EEC9              ; For line drawing we can go from left to right in a single call
 137+ EEC9              ;--- from CX-X to CX+X, CY+Y -------------------------------;
 138+ EEC9 11 00 00     .Plot1Y:            ld		de,0                            ; this is Y coord
 139+ EECC 21 00 00     .Plot1X:            ld      hl,0                            ; this is x coord
 140+ EECF E5 D5        .Plot1:             push    hl,,de                          ; push X then Y  on top Stack+2
 141+ EED1                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ; hl = CX - X
 141+ EED1             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 141+ EED1 B7          >                        or a
 141+ EED2 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 141+ EED4 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 141+ EED6 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 142+ EED8 EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; de = CX - X
 143+ EED9 ED 53 FD EE                      ld      (.LoadDEXStart1+1),de           ; save it for Plot 2 as well
 144+ EEDD                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixl          ; hl = CY + Y
 144+ EEDD             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 144+ EEDD B7          >                        or a
 144+ EEDE 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 144+ EEE0 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 144+ EEE2 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 145+ EEE4 06 00                            ld      b,0                             ; Now we have calculated D is bc
 146+ EEE6 DD 4C                            ld      c,ixh                           ;
 147+ EEE8                                  ShiftBCLeft1                            ;
 147+ EEE8 CB 21       >			   sla c
 147+ EEEA CB 10       >			   rl  b
 148+ EEEC ED 43 00 EF                      ld      (.LoadBCLength1+1),bc            ; self modifying to optimise laod on line 2
 149+ EEF0 CD 51 EF                         call	.PlotLine               		; de = start X, hl= Y line, bc = length
 150+ EEF3 E1           .Plot1Done:         pop     hl                              ; Stack+1 get cy from stack into hl to save an ex as we have pre calculated x positions
 151+ EEF4              ;--- from CX-X to CX+X, CY-Y -------------------------------;
 152+ EEF4 E5           .Plot2:             push    hl                              ; Stack+2 put cy back on stack so it holds cy stack already holds cx
 153+ EEF5                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ; now we have CY-Y in hl
 153+ EEF5             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 153+ EEF5 B7          >                        or a
 153+ EEF6 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 153+ EEF8 DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 153+ EEFA ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 154+ EEFC 11 00 00     .LoadDEXStart1:     ld      de,0                            ; de is loaded from above via self modiying code with start X
 155+ EEFF 01 00 00     .LoadBCLength1:     ld      bc,0                            ; bc is loaded from above via self modifying code with length
 156+ EF02 CD 51 EF                         call	.PlotLine                       ;
 157+ EF05 D1 E1        .Plot2Done:         pop     hl,,de                          ; Stack+0 now hl = cx, de = cy
 158+ EF07              ;--- from CX-Y to CX+Y, CY+X -------------------------------;
 159+ EF07 D5           .Plot3:             push    de                              ; Stack + 1 we need cy for final plot calculation
 160+ EF08                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixl          ; hl = CX - Y
 160+ EF08             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 160+ EF08 B7          >                        or a
 160+ EF09 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 160+ EF0B DD 4D       >                    ld      c,ixl
 160+ EF0D ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 161+ EF0F EB                               ex      de,hl                           ; de = CX - Y
 162+ EF10 ED 53 33 EF                      ld      (.LoadDEXStart2+1),de             ; save it for Plot 2 as well
 163+ EF14                                  CalcNewPointMacro hl, adc, ixh          ; hl = CY + X
 163+ EF14             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 163+ EF14 B7          >                        or a
 163+ EF15 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 163+ EF17 DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 163+ EF19 ED 4A       >                    adc    hl,bc
 164+ EF1B 06 00                            ld      b,0                             ; Now we have calculated D is bc
 165+ EF1D DD 4D                            ld      c,ixl                           ;
 166+ EF1F                                  ShiftBCLeft1                            ;
 166+ EF1F CB 21       >			   sla c
 166+ EF21 CB 10       >			   rl  b
 167+ EF23 ED 43 36 EF                      ld      (.LoadBCLength2+1),bc            ; self modifying to optimise laod on line 2
 168+ EF27 CD 51 EF                         call	.PlotLine               		; de = start X, hl= Y line, bc = length
 169+ EF2A E1           .Plot3Done:         pop     hl                              ; Stack + 0 get cy from stack into hl to save an ex as we have pre calculated x positions
 170+ EF2B              ;--- from CX-X to CX+X, CY-Y -------------------------------;
 171+ EF2B              .Plot4a:            CalcNewPointMacro hl, sbc, ixh          ; now we have CY-X in hl
 171+ EF2B             >                    ClearCarryFlag
 171+ EF2B B7          >                        or a
 171+ EF2C 06 00       >                    ld      b,0
 171+ EF2E DD 4C       >                    ld      c,ixh
 171+ EF30 ED 42       >                    sbc    hl,bc
 172+ EF32 11 00 00     .LoadDEXStart2:     ld      de,0                            ; de is loaded from above via self modiying code with start X
 173+ EF35 01 00 00     .LoadBCLength2:     ld      bc,0                            ; bc is loaded from above via self modifying code with length
 174+ EF38 CD 51 EF                         call	.PlotLine                       ;
 175+ EF3B D9           .PlotDone:          exx                                     ; get back data from alternate registers
 176+ EF3C CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	bit     7,h			                  	; Check for Hl<=0
 177+ EF3E 28 03                            jr z,   .draw_circle_1
 178+ EF40 19                               add hl,de			                    ; Delta=Delta+D1
 179+ EF41 18 05                            jr      .draw_circle_2		            ;
 180+ EF43 09           .draw_circle_1:		add     hl,bc		                    ; Delta=Delta+D2
 181+ EF44 03                               inc     bc
 182+ EF45 03                               inc     bc			                    ; D2=D2+2
 183+ EF46 DD 25                            dec     ixh			                    ; Y=Y-1
 184+ EF48 03           .draw_circle_2:		inc     bc			                    ; D2=D2+2
 185+ EF49 03                               inc     bc
 186+ EF4A 13                               inc     de			                    ; D1=D1+2
 187+ EF4B 13                               inc     de
 188+ EF4C DD 2C                            inc     ixl			                    ; X=X+1
 189+ EF4E C3 C3 EE                         jp      .CircleLoop
 190+ EF51              ;-- PERFORM THE LINE DRAW ----------------------------------;
 191+ EF51              ; comes in with de = left x , hl = y, bc = length
 192+ EF51              ; Note bc must be +ve < 32768
 193+ EF51              .PlotLine:
 194+ EF51 7C           .IsYOnScreen:       ld      a,h                             ; if y > 255 or < 0 then no line to draw
 195+ EF52 A7                               and     a                               ;
 196+ EF53 C0                               ret     nz                              ;
 197+ EF54 7D                               ld      a,l                             ;
 198+ EF55 A7                               and     a                               ;
 199+ EF56 F8                               ret     m                               ; if m set then y must be > 127
 200+ EF57              ;-- now check X coordinate, if X < 256 then skip x position clip
 201+ EF57 7A           .IsXOffRight:       ld      a,d                             ; if x >255
 202+ EF58 A7                               and     a
 203+ EF59 28 19                            jr      z,.NoLeftClip                   ; if high is not set then no X clip
 204+ EF5B              ;-- if X > 255 then off screen so just skip line
 205+ EF5B F0           .LeftClip:          ret     p                               ; if its > 255 then no line
 206+ EF5C              ;-- if its off the left then add distance, if this is < 0 then off screen skip
 207+ EF5C E5           .IsTotallyOffLeft:  push    hl                              ; if X pos + length <0 then no line
 208+ EF5D 62 6B                            ld      hl,de                           ; .
 209+ EF5F                                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 209+ EF5F B7          >                        or a
 210+ EF60              ;    but also this calculation gives us the line length if x is clipped to 90
 211+ EF60 ED 4A                            adc     hl,bc                           ; .
 212+ EF62 44 4D                            ld      bc,hl                           ; save the result in HL as this is also line length from hl = 0
 213+ EF64 E1                               pop     hl                              ; .
 214+ EF65 F8                               ret     m                               ; if x + distance < 0 then off screen skip
 215+ EF66              ;-- now as its on screen but clipped x < 0 we can just draw a line from 0 to x+d, maxed at x+d = 255
 216+ EF66 11 00 00     .ClippedSpanX:      ld      de,0                            ; if off left X = 0, bc already calcualted above in ADC
 217+ EF69 78                               ld      a,b                             ; if bc < 255 then good
 218+ EF6A A7                               and     a
 219+ EF6B CA 88 EF                         jp      z,.NoPopPlotColour              ;
 220+ EF6E 01 FF 00                         ld      bc,255                          ; max length
 221+ EF71 C3 88 EF                         jp      .NoPopPlotColour                ; we can now just draw
 222+ EF74              ;-- No left side clipping needed so we just need to work out if x + d > 255
 223+ EF74 E5           .NoLeftClip:        push    hl                              ; STACK+1 if corrected x + length < 256 then
 224+ EF75 62 6B                            ld      hl,de                           ; just plot
 225+ EF77 09                               add     hl,bc
 226+ EF78 7C                               ld      a,h
 227+ EF79 B7                               or      a
 228+ EF7A E1                               pop     hl
 229+ EF7B CA 88 EF                         jp      z,.NoPopPlotColour
 230+ EF7E              ;-- x + d > 255 so we plot from x to distance 255 - x
 231+ EF7E E5           .LengthClip:        push    hl
 232+ EF7F 21 FF 00                         ld      hl,255
 233+ EF82                                  ClearCarryFlag
 233+ EF82 B7          >                        or a
 234+ EF83 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de                           ; now hl = corrected length
 235+ EF85 44 4D                            ld      bc,hl
 236+ EF87              ;-- This entry point is if there is hl on the stack
 237+ EF87 E1           .PopHLPlotColour:   pop     hl
 238+ EF88 51           .NoPopPlotColour:   ld      d,c             ; d = length
 239+ EF89 4B                               ld      c,e             ; c = start X
 240+ EF8A 45                               ld      b,l             ; b = row Y
 241+ EF8B 1E 00        .PlotColour:        ld		e,0             ; This was originally indirect, where as it neeed to be value
 242+ EF8D CD 77 E4                         call    l2_draw_horz_dma_bank
 243+ EF90                                  ClearCarryFlag
 243+ EF90 B7          >                        or a
 244+ EF91 C9                               ret
 245+ EF92 7C           .circleSinglepixel: ld      a,h             ; as its 1 pixel if h or d are non zero then its off screen
 246+ EF93 B2                               or      d
 247+ EF94 C0                               ret     nz
 248+ EF95 CB 7B                            bit     7,e             ; and if Y is > 127 then off screen , bit is 8 states like ld a,e and a
 249+ EF97 C0                               ret     nz
 250+ EF98 78                               ld      a,b             ; a = colour
 251+ EF99 43                               ld      b,e             ; b = y
 252+ EF9A 4D                               ld      c,l             ; c = x
 253+ EF9B CD B6 E2                         call    l2_plot_pixel
 254+ EF9E C9                               ret
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/layer2_plot_circle_fill.asm
 803  EF9F                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/BBCEliteDirectMappingLL118.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/BBCEliteDirectMappingLL118.asm
   1+ EF9F                              IFDEF DEBUG_LL122_DIRECT
   2+ EF9F ~                                    ; (Y X) = (S R) * Q
   3+ EF9F ~                                    ; yxregpair = (20 * 140)/256 = 16d 10h
   4+ EF9F ~            Debug_LL122_6502:       ld      hl, 20
   4+ EF9F ~             ld      (SRvarPair),hl
   5+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,  140
   5+ EF9F ~             ld      (Qvar),a
   6+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL122_6502  ; -10                               >> PASS
   7+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
   8+ EF9F ~                                    ; yxregpair = 20 * 140 = 17d 11h
   9+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl, 20
   9+ EF9F ~             ld      (SRvarPair),hl
  10+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,  230
  10+ EF9F ~             ld      (Qvar),a
  11+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL122_6502  ; -17                               >> PASS
  12+ EF9F ~                                    ret
  13+ EF9F                              ENDIF
  14+ EF9F
  15+ EF9F              ;--  The following calculates: (Y X) = (S R) / Q using the same shift-and-subtract algorithm that's documented in TIS2
  16+ EF9F
  17+ EF9F                              IFDEF DEBUG_LL121_DIRECT
  18+ EF9F ~                                    ; (Y X) = (S R) / Q
  19+ EF9F ~                                    ; yxregpair = 20 / 140 = 20*256 / 140 = 36d, 24h
  20+ EF9F ~            Debug_LL121_6502:       ld      hl, 20
  20+ EF9F ~             ld      (SRvarPair),hl
  21+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,  140
  21+ EF9F ~             ld      (Qvar),a
  22+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL121_6502  ; -36                               >> PASS
  23+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
  24+ EF9F ~                                    ; yxregpair =  20 / 140 = 20*256 / 230 = 22d, 11h
  25+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl, 20
  25+ EF9F ~             ld      (SRvarPair),hl
  26+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,  230
  26+ EF9F ~             ld      (Qvar),a
  27+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL121_6502  ; -22                               >> PASS
  28+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
  29+ EF9F ~                                    ret
  30+ EF9F                              ENDIF
  31+ EF9F
  32+ EF9F                              IFDEF DEBUG_LL129_DIRECT
  33+ EF9F ~            Debug_LL129_6502:       ld      hl,-20
  33+ EF9F ~             ld     (SRvarPair),hl
  34+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a, 0
  34+ EF9F ~             ld     (XX12p3),a
  35+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a, 10
  35+ EF9F ~             ld     (XX12p2),a
  36+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL129_6502  ; expect q = 10, a = $FF SR = 20    >> PASS
  37+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
  38+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,20
  38+ EF9F ~             ld     (SRvarPair),hl
  39+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a, 0
  39+ EF9F ~             ld     (XX12p3),a
  40+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a, 40
  40+ EF9F ~             ld     (XX12p2),a
  41+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL129_6502  ; expect q = 40, a = 00 SR = 20     >> PASS
  42+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
  43+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,40
  43+ EF9F ~             ld     (SRvarPair),hl
  44+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a, $FF
  44+ EF9F ~             ld     (XX12p3),a
  45+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a, 40
  45+ EF9F ~             ld     (XX12p2),a
  46+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL129_6502  ; expect q = 40, a = $FF SR = 40    >> PASS
  47+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
  48+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,-40
  48+ EF9F ~             ld     (SRvarPair),hl
  49+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a, $FF
  49+ EF9F ~             ld     (XX12p3),a
  50+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a, 40
  50+ EF9F ~             ld     (XX12p2),a
  51+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL129_6502  ; expect q = 40, a = 00 SR = 40     >> PASS
  52+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
  53+ EF9F ~                                    ret
  54+ EF9F                              ENDIF
  55+ EF9F
  56+ EF9F                              IFDEF DEBUG_LL120_DIRECT
  57+ EF9F ~            Debug_LL120_6502:       ld      a,0
  57+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE 0 so calcualte YX = S X1lo * XX12+2
  58+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,20
  58+ EF9F ~             ld a,h
  58+ EF9F ~              ld (Svar),a
  58+ EF9F ~              ld a,l
  58+ EF9F ~              ld (XX1510),a  ; S x1lo = 20
  59+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,140
  59+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2  140, gradient 0.546875
  60+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,0
  60+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; SLOPE DIRECTION so -ve result
  61+ EF9F ~                                    ; post LL129 Q = 140 a = 00  SR YX = (20 * 140) /256 * -1 = -10
  62+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL120_6502  ; Expect mulitply so (Y X) -10      >> PASS
  63+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
  64+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,0
  64+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE 0 so calcualte YX = S X1lo * XX12+2
  65+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,20
  65+ EF9F ~             ld a,h
  65+ EF9F ~              ld (Svar),a
  65+ EF9F ~              ld a,l
  65+ EF9F ~              ld (XX1510),a  ; S x1lo = 20
  66+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,140
  66+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2 140, gradient 0.546875
  67+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$FF
  67+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; sLOPE DIRECTION so +ve result
  68+ EF9F ~                                    ; post LL129 Q = 140 a = FF  SR = 20  YX = (20 * 140) /256 = 10
  69+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL120_6502  ; Expect / so (Y X)10                   >> PASS
  70+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
  71+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$FF
  71+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE <> 0 so calcualte YX = S X1lo / XX12+2
  72+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,20
  72+ EF9F ~             ld a,h
  72+ EF9F ~              ld (Svar),a
  72+ EF9F ~              ld a,l
  72+ EF9F ~              ld (XX1510),a  ; S x1lo = 20
  73+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,140
  73+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2 140, gradient 0.546875
  74+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$00
  74+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; sLOPE DIRECTION  so -ve result
  75+ EF9F ~                                    ; post LL129 Q = 140 a = 00  SR = 20  YX = (20 *256 / 140) = -36
  76+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL120_6502  ; Expect / so (Y X)-36
  77+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$FF
  77+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE <> 0 so calcualte YX = S X1lo / XX12+2
  78+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,20
  78+ EF9F ~             ld a,h
  78+ EF9F ~              ld (Svar),a
  78+ EF9F ~              ld a,l
  78+ EF9F ~              ld (XX1510),a  ; S x1lo = 20
  79+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,140
  79+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2 140, gradient 0.546875
  80+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$FF
  80+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; sLOPE DIRECTION  so +ve result
  81+ EF9F ~                                    ; post LL129 Q = 140 a = 00 SR = 20 YX = (20 *256 / 140) = 36
  82+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL120_6502  ; Expect / so (Y X)  36                   >> PASS
  83+ EF9F ~                                    ret
  84+ EF9F                              ENDIF
  85+ EF9F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  86+ EF9F              ;-- Calculate the following:
  87+ EF9F              ;--         * If T = 0, this is a shallow slope, so calculate (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2
  88+ EF9F              ;--         * If T <> 0, this is a steep slope, so calculate (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2
  89+ EF9F              ;--             giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
  90+ EF9F                              IFDEF DEBUG_LL123_DIRECT
  91+ EF9F ~            Debug_LL123_6502:       ld      a,$00
  91+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE 0 (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2
  92+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,20
  92+ EF9F ~             ld      (SRvarPair),hl
  93+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,140
  93+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2 gradient 0.546875
  94+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,0
  94+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; sLOPE DIRECTION
  95+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL123_6502  ; Expect * so (Y X)-36 = (20 / 140 ) * 256 * -1 PASS
  96+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
  97+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$00
  97+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE 0 (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2
  98+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,20
  98+ EF9F ~             ld      (SRvarPair),hl
  99+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,140
  99+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2 gradient 0.546875
 100+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$FF
 100+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; sLOPE DIRECTION
 101+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL123_6502  ; Expect * so (Y X)36 = (20 / 140 ) * 256  PASS
 102+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 103+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$FF
 103+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE <> 0 (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2
 104+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,20
 104+ EF9F ~             ld      (SRvarPair),hl
 105+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,140
 105+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2 gradient 0.546875
 106+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$00
 106+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; sLOPE DIRECTION
 107+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL123_6502  ; Expect / so (Y X)-10 (20 * 140 ) / 256 * -1 PASS
 108+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$FF
 108+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE <> 0 (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2
 109+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,20
 109+ EF9F ~             ld      (SRvarPair),hl
 110+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,140
 110+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2 gradient 0.546875
 111+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$FF
 111+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; sLOPE DIRECTION
 112+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL123_6502  ; Expect / so (Y X) 10 (20 * 140 ) / 256  PASS
 113+ EF9F ~                                    ret
 114+ EF9F                              ENDIF
 115+ EF9F
 116+ EF9F                              IFDEF DEBUG_LL118_DIRECT
 117+ EF9F ~            Debug_LL118_6502:       ld      a,$FF
 117+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE FF so steep
 118+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,-20
 118+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX1510),hl               ; x1 = -20
 119+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,-20
 119+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX1532),hl               ; y1 = -20
 120+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,120
 120+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2 = 120 (120/256) = 0.46875
 121+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,0
 121+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; Slope Direction so TL to BR
 122+ EF9F ~                                    ; -20, -20 steep TL>BR, gradient 120/256: Dir -1 so
 123+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL118_6502  ; Expect * so x = 0 y =  -20 + (-20/(120/256)) = 22, x1 = 0 so stop there PASS
 124+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 125+ EF9F ~
 126+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$FF
 126+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE FF so steep
 127+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,-30
 127+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX1510),hl               ; x1 = -20
 128+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,-20
 128+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX1532),hl               ; y1 = -20
 129+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,60
 129+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2 = 120 (120/256) = 0.46875
 130+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,0
 130+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; Slope Direction so TL to BR
 131+ EF9F ~                                    ; -20, -20 steep TL>BR, gradient 120/256: Dir -1 so
 132+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL118_6502  ; Expect * so 108,0  PASS (fixed carry flag issue in LL121 and re-tested LL121)
 133+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 134+ EF9F ~
 135+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$0
 135+ EF9F ~             ld      (Tvar),a                  ; SLOPE FF so steep
 136+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,-20
 136+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX1510),hl               ; x1 = -20
 137+ EF9F ~                                    ld      hl,-20
 137+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX1532),hl               ; y1 = -20
 138+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,60
 138+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p2),a                ; XX12+2 = 120 (120/256) = 0.46875
 139+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,0
 139+ EF9F ~             ld      (XX12p3),a                ; Slope Direction so TL to BR
 140+ EF9F ~                                    ; -20, -20 steep TL>BR, gradient 120/256: Dir -1 so
 141+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL118_6502  ; Expect * so 108,0  PASS (fixed carry flag issue in LL121 and re-tested LL121)
 142+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 143+ EF9F ~                                    ret
 144+ EF9F ~
 145+ EF9F                              ENDIF
 146+ EF9F
 147+ EF9F                              IFDEF DEBUG_LL28_6502
 148+ EF9F ~            Debug_LL28_6502:        ld      a,27
 148+ EF9F ~             ld     (Qvar),a
 149+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,76
 150+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL28_6502   ; Expect $FF carry
 151+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 152+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,76
 152+ EF9F ~             ld     (Qvar),a
 153+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,27        ; Expect 2
 154+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL28_6502
 155+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 156+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,200
 156+ EF9F ~             ld     (Qvar),a
 157+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,50
 158+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL28_6502   ; Expect 4
 159+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 160+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,97
 160+ EF9F ~             ld     (Qvar),a
 161+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,76
 162+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL28_6502   ; Expect 1
 163+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 164+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$20
 164+ EF9F ~             ld     (Qvar),a
 165+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$10
 166+ EF9F ~                                    call    LL28_6502   ; Expect 1
 167+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 168+ EF9F ~                                    ld      d,27
 169+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,76
 170+ EF9F ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivD
 171+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 172+ EF9F ~                                    ld      d,76
 173+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,27
 174+ EF9F ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivD
 175+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 176+ EF9F ~                                    ld      d,200
 177+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,50
 178+ EF9F ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivD
 179+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 180+ EF9F ~                                    ld      d,$20
 181+ EF9F ~                                    ld      a,$10
 182+ EF9F ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivD
 183+ EF9F ~                                    ;break
 184+ EF9F ~                                    ret
 185+ EF9F                              ENDIF
 186+ EF9F
 187+ EF9F
 188+ EF9F                              IFDEF DEBUG_LL145_6502
 189+ EF9F ~            Debug_LL145_6502:       ; ld  a,1      : ld  (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
 190+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$0116 : ld  (UbnkLineArray),hl
 191+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$004B : ld  (UbnkLineArray+2),hl
 192+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$00F8 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+4),hl
 193+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$002F : ld  (UbnkLineArray+6),hl
 194+ EF9F ~                                    ; call    DrawLinesLateClipping : ;break
 195+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  a,1      : ld  (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
 196+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$0033 : ld  (UbnkLineArray),hl
 197+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$0016 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+2),hl
 198+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$001D : ld  (UbnkLineArray+4),hl
 199+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$FFBE : ld  (UbnkLineArray+6),hl
 200+ EF9F ~                                    ; call    DrawLinesLateClipping : ;break
 201+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  a,1      : ld  (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
 202+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$0055 : ld  (UbnkLineArray),hl
 203+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$FF83 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+2),hl
 204+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$0033 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+4),hl
 205+ EF9F ~                                    ; ld  hl,$0016 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+6),hl
 206+ EF9F ~                                    ; call    DrawLinesLateClipping :  ;break
 207+ EF9F ~
 208+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  a,1      : ld  (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
 209+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$00B3 : ld  (UbnkLineArray),hl
 210+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$0054 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+2),hl
 211+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$005d : ld  (UbnkLineArray+4),hl
 212+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$ffd5 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+6),hl
 213+ EF9F ~                                    ;call    DrawLinesLateClipping :  ;break
 214+ EF9F ~                                    ;
 215+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  a,1      : ld  (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
 216+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$005d : ld  (UbnkLineArray),hl
 217+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$ffd5 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+2),hl
 218+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$00b9 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+4),hl
 219+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$0028 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+6),hl
 220+ EF9F ~                                    ;call    DrawLinesLateClipping :  ;break
 221+ EF9F ~
 222+ EF9F ~                                    ld  a,1
 222+ EF9F ~              ld  (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
 223+ EF9F ~                                    ld  hl,$ffc7
 223+ EF9F ~              ld  (UbnkLineArray),hl
 224+ EF9F ~                                    ld  hl,$001a
 224+ EF9F ~              ld  (UbnkLineArray+2),hl
 225+ EF9F ~                                    ld  hl,$005d
 225+ EF9F ~              ld  (UbnkLineArray+4),hl
 226+ EF9F ~                                    ld  hl,$ffd5
 226+ EF9F ~              ld  (UbnkLineArray+6),hl
 227+ EF9F ~                                    call    DrawLinesLateClipping
 227+ EF9F ~               ;break
 228+ EF9F ~
 229+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  a,1      : ld  (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
 230+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$0089 : ld  (UbnkLineArray),hl
 231+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$00e2 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+2),hl
 232+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$fff3 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+4),hl
 233+ EF9F ~                                    ;ld  hl,$00b9 : ld  (UbnkLineArray+6),hl
 234+ EF9F ~                                    ;call    DrawLinesLateClipping :  ;break
 235+ EF9F ~
 236+ EF9F ~                                    ret
 237+ EF9F                              ENDIF
 238+ EF9F                      DEFINE DEBUG_6502_LINE_CLIPPING
 239+ EF9F                      IFDEF DEBUG_6502_LINE_CLIPPING
 240+ EF9F
 241+ EF9F 00           xX13        DB 0
 242+ EFA0 00 00        XX1510      DW 0    ; x1 as a 16-bit coordinate (x1_hi x1_lo)
 243+ EFA2 00 00        XX1532      DW 0    ; y1 as a 16-bit coordinate (y1_hi y1_lo)
 244+ EFA4 00 00        XX1554      DW 0    ; x2
 245+ EFA6              XX1554p1    EQU XX1554+1
 246+ EFA6 00 00        XX1576      DW 0    ; y2
 247+ EFA8              XX1210      EQU XX1576
 248+ EFA8              XX12p1      EQU XX1210+1
 249+ EFA8              XX15X1lo    EQU XX1510
 250+ EFA8              XX15X1hi    EQU XX1510+1
 251+ EFA8              XX15Y1lo    EQU XX1532
 252+ EFA8              XX15Y1hi    EQU XX1532+1
 253+ EFA8              XX15X2lo    EQU XX1554
 254+ EFA8              XX15X2hi    EQU XX1554+1
 255+ EFA8              XX15Y2lo    EQU XX1210
 256+ EFA8              XX15Y2hi    EQU XX1210+1
 257+ EFA8
 258+ EFA8 00           XX12p2      DB 0    ; The line's gradient * 256 (so 1.0 = 256)
 259+ EFA9 00           XX12p3      DB 0    ; The direction of slope ; + LT to BR; - TR to BL
 260+ EFAA 00           XX12p4      DB 0
 261+ EFAB 00           XX12p5      DB 0
 262+ EFAC              Delta_x     EQU XX12p2
 263+ EFAC              Delta_y     EQU XX12p4
 264+ EFAC 00           Tvar        DB 0    ; The gradient of slope ; 0 if it's a shallow slope (DX > DY) ; &FF if it's a steep slope (DY > DX)
 265+ EFAD                                  ; Returns:  XX15        m         x1 as an 8-bit coordinate XX15+2               y1 as an 8-bit coordinate
 266+ EFAD 00           Qvar        DB 0
 267+ EFAE 00           Rvar        DB 0    ; general purpose for calcs  Paired with S must be done this way round for SUBHeightFromY1 etc to work
 268+ EFAF 00           Svar        DB 0    ; sign variable
 269+ EFB0              SRvarPair   EQU Rvar
 270+ EFB0 00           Xreg        DB 0
 271+ EFB1 00           Yreg        DB 0
 272+ EFB2              YXregPair   EQU Xreg
 273+ EFB2
 274+ EFB2              ;-- Name: LL28 Calculate R = 256 * A / Q
 275+ EFB2              ;-- LL28+4              Skips the A >= Q check and always returns with C flag cleared, so this can be called if we know the division will work
 276+ EFB2              ;-- LL31                Skips the A >= Q check and does not set the R counter, so this can be used for jumping straight into the division loop if R is already set to 254 and we know the division will work
 277+ EFB2              ;   Reg mapping 6502  Z80
 278+ EFB2              ;               a     a
 279+ EFB2              ;               b     x
 280+ EFB2              ;               c     q
 281+ EFB2              ;               d     r
 282+ EFB2              ;
 283+ EFB2 21 AD EF     LL28_6502:          ld      hl,Qvar                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
 284+ EFB5 4E                               ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
 285+ EFB6 B9                               cp      c
 286+ EFB7                                  FlipCarryFlag
 286+ EFB7 3F          >                        ccf
 287+ EFB8 DA E0 EF                         jp      c, LL2_6502             ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
 288+ EFBB 06 FE                            ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
 289+ EFBD CB 27        LL31_6502:          sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
 290+ EFBF DA D4 EF                         jp      c,LL29_6502             ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
 291+ EFC2                                  FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
 291+ EFC2 3F          >                        ccf
 292+ EFC3                                  JumpIfALTNusng c, LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
 292+ EFC3 B9          >                        cp      c
 292+ EFC4 DA C9 EF    >                        jp		c, LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
 293+ EFC7                                                                  ; BCC P%+4
 294+ EFC7 91                               sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 295+ EFC8                                  ClearCarryFlag
 295+ EFC8 B7          >                        or a
 296+ EFC9              LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:  FlipCarryFlag
 296+ EFC9 3F          >                        ccf
 297+ EFCA CB 10                            rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
 298+ EFCC DA BD EF                         jp      c, LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
 299+ EFCF 78                               ld      a,b
 300+ EFD0 32 AE EF                         ld      (Rvar),a
 301+ EFD3 C9                               ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
 302+ EFD4 91           LL29_6502:          sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 303+ EFD5                                  SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 303+ EFD5 37          >                        scf
 304+ EFD6 CB 10                            rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
 305+ EFD8 DA BD EF                         jp      c, LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
 306+ EFDB 78                               ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
 307+ EFDC 32 AE EF                         ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
 308+ EFDF C9                               ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
 309+ EFE0 3E FF        LL2_6502:           ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
 310+ EFE2 32 AE EF                         ld      (Rvar),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
 311+ EFE5                                  SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
 311+ EFE5 37          >                        scf
 312+ EFE6 C9                               ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 313+ EFE7
 314+ EFE7 3A B0 EF     ADDXRegtoY1:        ld      a,(Xreg)                ; Set y1 = y1 + (Y X)
 315+ EFEA 4F                               ld      c,a
 316+ EFEB 06 00                            ld      b,0
 317+ EFED 2A A2 EF                         ld      hl,(XX1532)
 318+ EFF0                                  ClearCarryFlag
 318+ EFF0 B7          >                        or a
 319+ EFF1 ED 4A                            adc     hl,bc
 320+ EFF3 22 A2 EF                         ld      (XX1532),hl
 321+ EFF6 C9                               ret
 322+ EFF7
 323+ EFF7 ED 4B B0 EF  ADDYXRegtoY1:       ld      bc,(YXregPair)          ; Set y1 = y1 + (Y X)
 324+ EFFB 2A A2 EF                         ld      hl,(XX1532)
 325+ EFFE                                  ClearCarryFlag
 325+ EFFE B7          >                        or a
 326+ EFFF ED 4A                            adc     hl,bc
 327+ F001 22 A2 EF                         ld      (XX1532),hl
 328+ F004 C9                               ret
 329+ F005
 330+ F005 ED 4B B0 EF  ADDYXRegtoX1:       ld      bc,(YXregPair)          ; Set x1 = x1 + (Y X)
 331+ F009 2A A0 EF                         ld      hl,(XX1510)
 332+ F00C                                  ClearCarryFlag
 332+ F00C B7          >                        or a
 333+ F00D ED 4A                            adc     hl,bc
 334+ F00F 22 A0 EF                         ld      (XX1510),hl
 335+ F012 C9                               ret
 336+ F013
 337+ F013 2A A2 EF     SUBBCFromY1:        ld      hl,(XX1532)             ; Set (S R) = (y1_hi y1_lo) - BC where BC can be say screen height
 338+ F016                                  ClearCarryFlag
 338+ F016 B7          >                        or a
 339+ F017 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
 340+ F019 22 AE EF                         ld      (SRvarPair),hl
 341+ F01C C9                               ret
 342+ F01D
 343+ F01D 2A B0 EF     AddSRToYX:          ld      hl,(YXregPair)
 344+ F020 ED 5B AE EF                      ld      de,(SRvarPair)
 345+ F024                                  ClearCarryFlag
 345+ F024 B7          >                        or a
 346+ F025 ED 5A                            adc     hl,de
 347+ F027 22 B0 EF                         ld      (YXregPair),hl
 348+ F02A C9                               ret
 349+ F02B
 350+ F02B
 351+ F02B
 352+ F02B 7C           ClampX:             ld      a,h
 353+ F02C A7                               and     a
 354+ F02D 7D                               ld      a,l
 355+ F02E C8                               ret     z
 356+ F02F F2 34 F0                         jp      p,.Max255
 357+ F032              .Min0:              ZeroA
 357+ F032 AF          >                        xor a
 358+ F033 C9                               ret
 359+ F034 3E FF        .Max255:            ld      a,$FF
 360+ F036 C9                               ret
 361+ F037
 362+ F037 7C           ClampY:             ld      a,h
 363+ F038 A7                               and     a
 364+ F039 CA 44 F0                         jp      z,.ClampYlo
 365+ F03C F2 41 F0                         jp      p,.Max127
 366+ F03F              .Min0:              ZeroA
 366+ F03F AF          >                        xor a
 367+ F040 C9                               ret
 368+ F041 3E 7F        .Max127:            ld      a,127
 369+ F043 C9                               ret
 370+ F044 7D           .ClampYlo:          ld      a,l
 371+ F045 A7                               and     a
 372+ F046 F0                               ret     p
 373+ F047 3E 7F                            ld      a,127
 374+ F049 C9                               ret
 375+ F04A
 376+ F04A              ;-- Rountes to code:
 377+ F04A              ;-- LL118
 378+ F04A              ;-- LL120   Done
 379+ F04A              ;-- LL129   Done
 380+ F04A              ;-- LL123   Done
 381+ F04A                              ; NOTE DOES ABS ONLY
 382+ F04A
 383+ F04A
 384+ F04A                              ;--- LL118 Move along a point until on screen
 385+ F04A              ; In XX1510 x1 as a 16-bit coordinate (x1_hi x1_lo)
 386+ F04A              ;    XX1532 y1 as a 16-bit coordinate (y1_hi y1_lo)
 387+ F04A              ;    XX12p2 The line's gradient * 256 (so 1.0 = 256)
 388+ F04A              ;    XX12p3 The direction of slope: * Positive = top left to bottom right * Negative (bit 7 set) = top right to bottom left
 389+ F04A              ;    T      The gradient of slope:* 0 if it's a shallow slope * &FF if it's a steep slope
 390+ F04A              ;  Out  XX150               x1 as an 8-bit coordinate
 391+ F04A              ;       XX152               y1 as an 8-bit coordinate
 392+ F04A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 393+ F04A
 394+ F04A
 395+ F04A              ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 396+ F04A              ;--  Calculate the following:
 397+ F04A              ;--   * If T = 0, this is a shallow slope, so calculate (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2
 398+ F04A              ;--   * If T <> 0, this is a steep slope, so calculate (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2
 399+ F04A              ;-- giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
 400+ F04A              ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 401+ F04A 3A A0 EF     LL120_6502:         ld      a,(XX1510)              ;LDA XX15               \ Set R = x1_lo
 402+ F04D 32 AE EF                         ld      (Rvar),a                ;STA R
 403+ F050 CD FC F0                         call    LL129_6502              ;JSR LL129              \ Call LL129 to do the following:  Q = XX12+2 = line gradient, A = S EOR XX12+3 = S EOR slope direction  (S R) = |S R|
 404+ F053 F5                               push    af                      ;PHA                    \ Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 405+ F054              ; DONT NEED PLUS MESSES UP FLAGS                    push    af                      ;LDX T                  \ If T is non-zero, then it's a steep slope, so jump
 406+ F054 3A AC EF                         ld      a,(Tvar)                ; .
 407+ F057 32 B0 EF                         ld      (Xreg),a                ;. REDUNDANT REMOVE IN OPTIMISATION
 408+ F05A A7                               and     a                       ;BNE LL121              \ down to LL121 to calculate this instead (Y X) = (S R) / Q
 409+ F05B              ; DONT NEED PLUS MESSES UP FLAGS                    pop     af                      ;.                      (recover teh saved A before the cp)
 410+ F05B 20 48                            jr      nz,LL121_6502           ;.
 411+ F05D              ;..   (Y X) = (S R) * Q - must be ABS, sign determined by opposite of the sign of the value on top of stack
 412+ F05D              LL122_6502:         ZeroA                           ;LDA #0                 \ Set A = 0
 412+ F05D AF          >                        xor a
 413+ F05E                          IFDEF DEBUG_LL122_DIRECT
 414+ F05E ~                                DISPLAY "DIRECT CALL TO LL122 so dummy push a to stack with 0"
 415+ F05E ~                                push    af
 416+ F05E                          ENDIF
 417+ F05E 32 B0 EF                         ld      (Xreg),a                ;TAX                    \ Set (Y X) = 0 so we can start building the answer here
 418+ F061 32 B1 EF                         ld      (Yreg),a                ;TAY
 419+ F064 21 AF EF                         ld      hl,Svar
 420+ F067 ED 4B AE EF                      ld      bc,(SRvarPair)          ;LSR S                  \ Shift (S R) to the right, so we extract bit 0 of (S R)
 421+ F06B                                  ShiftBCRight1                   ;ROR R                  \ into the C flag
 421+ F06B CB 38       >			   srl b
 421+ F06D CB 19       >			   rr  c
 422+ F06F ED 43 AE EF                      ld      (SRvarPair),bc
 423+ F073 21 AD EF                         ld      hl, Qvar                ;ASL Q                  \ Shift Q to the left, catching bit 7 in the C flag
 424+ F076 CB 26                            sla     (hl)                    ;.
 425+ F078 30 03                            jr      nc, LL126_6502          ;BCC LL126              \ If C (i.e. the next bit from Q) is clear, do not do
 426+ F07A                                                                  ;                         the addition for this bit of Q, and instead skip to LL126 to just do the shifts
 427+ F07A CD 1D F0     LL125_6502:         call    AddSRToYX               ;TXA                    \ Set (Y X) = (Y X) + (S R)  starting with the low bytes And then doing the high bytes
 428+ F07D ED 4B AE EF  LL126_6502:         ld      bc,(SRvarPair)          ;LSR S                  \ Shift (S R) to the right
 429+ F081                                  ShiftBCRight1                   ;ROR R
 429+ F081 CB 38       >			   srl b
 429+ F083 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 430+ F085 ED 43 AE EF                      ld      (SRvarPair),bc          ;.
 431+ F089 21 AD EF                         ld      hl, Qvar                ;ASL Q                  \ Shift Q to the left, catching bit 7 in the C flag
 432+ F08C CB 26                            sla     (hl)                    ;.
 433+ F08E 38 EA                            jr      c,LL125_6502            ;BCS LL125              \ If C (i.e. the next bit from Q) is set, loop back to LL125 to do the addition for this bit of Q
 434+ F090 20 EB                            jr      nz,LL126_6502           ;BNE LL126              \ If Q has not yet run out of set bits, loop back to LL126 to do the "shift" part of shift-and-add until we have done additions for all the set bits in Q, to give us our multiplication result
 435+ F092 F1                               pop     af                      ;PLA                    \ Restore A, which we calculated above, from the stack
 436+ F093 A7                               and     a                       ;BPL LL133              \ If A is positive jump to LL133 to negate (Y X) and
 437+ F094 F2 ED F0                         jp      p,LL133_6502            ;.
 438+ F097              ;.. return from the subroutine using a tail call
 439+ F097 C9                               ret                             ;RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 440+ F098
 441+ F098              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 442+ F098              ;-- Calculate the following:
 443+ F098              ;--         * If T = 0, this is a shallow slope, so calculate (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2 (does not use X1lo but directly SR)
 444+ F098              ;--         * If T <> 0, this is a steep slope, so calculate (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2  (does not use X1lo but directly SR)
 445+ F098              ;--             giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
 446+ F098 CD FC F0     LL123_6502:         call    LL129_6502              ;JSR LL129              \ Call LL129 to do the following   Q = XX12+2   = line gradient
 447+ F09B F5                               push    af                      ;PHA                    \ Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 448+ F09C              ; DONT NEED PLUS MESSES UP FLAGS                    push    af                      ;LDX T                  \ If T is non-zero, then it's a steep slope, so jump up
 449+ F09C 3A AC EF                         ld      a,(Tvar)                ; .
 450+ F09F 32 B0 EF                         ld      (Xreg),a                ;BNE LL122              \ to LL122 to calculate this instead:
 451+ F0A2 A7                               and     a                       ;.
 452+ F0A3              ;  DONT NEED PLUS MESSES UP FLAGS                    pop     af                      ;.
 453+ F0A3 20 B8                            jr      nz,LL122_6502           ;.
 454+ F0A5              ;--  The following calculates: (Y X) = (S R) / Q using the same shift-and-subtract algorithm that's documented in TIS2
 455+ F0A5 3E FF        LL121_6502:         ld      a,$FF                   ;LDA #%11111111         \ Set Y = %11111111
 456+ F0A7 32 B1 EF                         ld      (Yreg),a                ;TAY
 457+ F0AA CB 27                            sla     a                       ;ASL A                  \ Set X = %11111110
 458+ F0AC 32 B0 EF                         ld      (Xreg),a                ;TAX
 459+ F0AF              ;--  This sets (Y X) = %1111111111111110, so we can rotate through 15 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then getting a 0 on the 16th iteration... and we can also use it to catch our result bits into bit 0 each time
 460+ F0AF ED 4B AE EF  LL130_6502:         ld      bc,(SRvarPair)          ;ASL R                  \ Shift (S R) to the left
 461+ F0B3                                  ShiftBCLeft1                    ;.
 461+ F0B3 CB 21       >			   sla c
 461+ F0B5 CB 10       >			   rl  b
 462+ F0B7 ED 43 AE EF                      ld      (SRvarPair),bc          ;ROL S
 463+ F0BB 3A AF EF                         ld      a,(Svar)                ;LDA S                  \ Set A = S
 464+ F0BE 38 07                            jr      c, LL131_6502           ;BCS LL131              \ If bit 7 of S was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
 465+ F0C0 21 AD EF                         ld      hl,Qvar                 ;CMP Q                  \ If A < Q (i.e. S < Q), skip the following subtractions
 466+ F0C3 BE                               cp      (hl)
 467+ F0C4                                  FlipCarryFlag                   ; note flip carry flag here to simulate 6502 operation
 467+ F0C4 3F          >                        ccf
 468+ F0C5 30 12                            jr      nc,LL132A_6502          ;BCC LL132  (NOTE Carry flag reversed in Z80 for CP)
 469+ F0C7              LL131_6502:         FlipCarryFlag                   ;flip carry to make it act like a 6502 borrow
 469+ F0C7 3F          >                        ccf
 470+ F0C8 9E                               sbc     (hl)                    ;SBC Q                  \ A >= Q (i.e. S >= Q) so set:
 471+ F0C9 32 AF EF                         ld      (Svar),a                ;STA S
 472+ F0CC 3A AE EF                         ld      a,(Rvar)                ;LDA R                  \ And then doing the high bytes
 473+ F0CF                                  ClearCarryFlag                  ;\   S = (A R) - Q  = (S R) - Q starting with the low bytes (we know the C flag is set so the subtraction will be correct)
 473+ F0CF B7          >                        or a
 474+ F0D0 DE 00                            sbc     0                       ;SBC #0
 475+ F0D2 32 AE EF                         ld      (Rvar),a                ;STA R
 476+ F0D5                                  SetCarryFlag                    ;SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in (Y X)
 476+ F0D5 37          >                        scf
 477+ F0D6 C3 DA F0                         jp      LL132_6502              ;added so that we can do a 6502 style carry above
 478+ F0D9 00           LL132A_6502:        nop; FlipCarryFlag
 479+ F0DA ED 4B B0 EF  LL132_6502:         ld      bc,(YXregPair)          ; Rotate the counter in (Y X) to the left, and catch the
 480+ F0DE                                  RollBCLeft1                     ; ROL A                  \ result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't
 480+ F0DE CB 11       >               rl  c
 480+ F0E0 CB 10       >               rl  b
 481+ F0E2 ED 43 B0 EF                      ld      (YXregPair),bc          ; TAX                    \ do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
