 402+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileIncInstuction     ;             .
 403+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.ErrorNegative:         add     hl,bc                   ;        else error += delta y step
 404+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;             back to main regsters
 405+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.WhileIncInstuction:    inc     bc                      ;       x_pos += sign_x (doneas self modifying to inc or dec)
 406+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop
 407+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................;--- Delta X < DeltaY ----------------------------------;
 408+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;--- ELSE ----------------------------------------------;
 409+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;--- DX < DY -------------------------------------------;
 410+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................;--- Delta X < DeltaY ----------------------------------;
 411+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       error = delta x_step - delta y
 412+ F5D4              ;-*-*-L2DeltaXltDeltaY:       ErrorEquStepMinusDelta delta_x_step, delta_y
 413+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       set exit false
 414+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        SetExitFalse                    ; set exit = false
 415+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       if x1 < xmin && y pos > 127 then exit early
 416+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.IsY1TL0:               ld      hl,(x1Work)             ; if x1 < clip xmin
 417+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(clip_xmin)          ; .
 418+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        call    CompareHLDESigned               ; .
 419+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jp      z, .X1gteClipMin        ; .
 420+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jp      c, .X1ltClipMin         ; and y_pos > 127
 421+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(y1Work)             ;
 422+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.X1gteClipMin:          ReturnIfHLGT127                 ;    then return
 423+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       if y1 work < 0
 424+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.X1ltClipMin:           IsAxisLT0 (y1Work)              ; if y1 < 0             ;
 425+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.Y1IsNotLT0           ; .
 426+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       ... temp = delta x step * (-y1)
 427+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.Y1IsLT0:               ld      hl,(y1Work)             ;    temp = (0 - y1) * delta_x_step;
 428+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                        ;    . (0 - y1 also equals negate HL)
 429+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ;    .
 430+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ;    .
 431+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        call    mulHLbyDE2sc            ;    .
 432+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (linetemp),hl           ;    .
 433+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       ... msd = floor_divq (temp, delta y step)
 434+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;    msd = floor_divq (temp, delta_y_step);
 435+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       ... rem calculation now done in floor macro above into de
 436+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        FloorHLdivDETarget msd          ;    .
 437+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (rem),de                ;    As DE = reminder we can do rem = temp % delta_y_step; for free
 438+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       ... xpos = xpos + msd
 439+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ex      hl,de                   ;    x pos += msd (move msd to de)
 440+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;    .            (pull in x1temp and add de)
 441+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;    .
 442+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),hl              ;    .            (store result in x_pos)
 443+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       ... if xpos > xmax
 444+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.IsXposGTClipXMax:      ld      de,(clip_xmax)          ;    if x_pos > clip_xmax then return
 445+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 446+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       ...    or (pos = xmax && rem >= delta y) then return
 447+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.XPosLTEXMax          ;    .
 448+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ret     nc                      ;    .
 449+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.XPosLTEXMax:           ld      de,(clip_xmin)          ;    if x_pos == clip_xmin
 450+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 451+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.XneClipMax          ;    and rem >= deltay
 452+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(rem)                ;    .
 453+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y)            ;    .
 454+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 455+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ret     c                       ;    then return
 456+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       ... save rem and set y pos to 0
 457+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;    save rem
 458+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,0                    ;    y_pos = 0
 459+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       ... error = error + rem
 460+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos),hl              ;    error += rem
 461+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;    .
 462+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;    .
 463+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (error),hl              ;    .
 464+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       ... if rem >= delta y
 465+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ex      de,hl                   ;    if (rem >= delta_y)
 466+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y)            ;    .
 467+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;    .
 468+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.RemGTEDeltaY         ;    .
 469+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jr      nc,.RemGTEDeltaY        ;    .
 470+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;                       ... ... x pos = x pos + 1
 471+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,x_pos                ;       ++x_pos
 472+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        inc     (hl)                    ;       .
 473+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;       error += delta_y_step
 474+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_y_step)       ;       .
 475+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,de                   ;       .
 476+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (error),hl              ;       .
 477+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.RemGTEDeltaY:
 478+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.Y1IsNotLT0:
 479+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.XneClipMax:            ld      hl,(y2Work)             ;  y_pos_end = y2
 480+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (y_pos_end),hl          ;  .
 481+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,127                  ;  y_pos_end = (y_pos_end < 127)?y_pos_end+1:128
 482+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        call      CompareHLDESigned               ;  .
 483+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jr      nc,.YPosEndlt127        ;  .
 484+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,128                  ;  .
 485+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jp      .DoneXneClipMax         ;  .
 486+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.YPosEndlt127:          inc     hl                      ;  .
 487+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.DoneXneClipMax:        ld      (y_pos_end),hl          ;  .
 488+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                                                        ; if sign_x == -1
 489+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.Y2LTE127:              IsMemNegative8JumpFalse sign_x, .SignXNotNegative
 490+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.SignXNegative:         ld      hl,(x_pos)              ;    x_pos = -x_pos
 491+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        NegHL                        ;    .
 492+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (x_pos),hl              ;    .
 493+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(y2Work)             ;    x_pos_end = -x_pos_end
 494+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.SignXNotNegative:      ld      hl,(delta_y_step)       ; delta_y_step -= delta_x_step
 495+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ; .
 496+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ClearCarryFlag                  ; .
 497+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,de                   ; .
 498+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(delta_x_step)       ; .
 499+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;..................................................................................................................................
 500+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;--- Dx < Dy Longest while loop ------------------------;
 501+ F5D4              ;-*-*-L2DxLTDy:               ld      hl,(y_pos)              ;       starty=y_pos
 502+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (starty),hl             ;       .
 503+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;--- Version where longest issaved ---------------------;
 504+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.LoadAlternateRegs:     ld      bc,(y_pos)              ;       we already have IY so just need xpos and end
 505+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(y_pos_end)
 506+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      iy,(x_pos)
 507+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,ix                   ;    load hl as target array
 508+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,c                     ;    by this point y pos must be 8 bit
 509+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,a                    ;    So we are setting up hl as targetArray pointer
 510+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        add     hl,a
 511+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;       switch to alternate registers
 512+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      hl,(error)              ;       load up stepping into alternate registers
 513+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      de,(delta_x_step)       ;       and error
 514+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      bc,(delta_y_step)       ;
 515+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;       and then switch back to main registers
 516+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,(sign_x)              ;       if Sign x is -1
 517+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        and     $80                     ;       .
 518+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jr      z,.SetWhileInc          ;       .
 519+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.SetWhileDec:           ld      a,InstrDECIY
 520+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (.WhileIncInstuction+1),a; set self modifying to dec and 2 byte instruction
 521+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop:             ;       .
 522+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.SetWhileInc:           ld      a,InstrINCIY
 523+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (.WhileIncInstuction+1),a; else set to inc
 524+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;--- Update Loop ---------------------------------------;
 525+ F5D4              ;-*-*-; In loop hl  = target array pointer bc = x_pos,       de = x_pos_end, (we don't need to reatin Y_pos)
 526+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;         hl' = error                bc'= delta_y_step de'=delta_x_step
 527+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;- we coudl optimise by setting bc to y_pos_end - y_pos +1 and just doing djnz
 528+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.WhileLoop:             call    CompareBCDESigned       ;      while y_pos != y_pos_end
 529+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ret     z                       ;      .
 530+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,iyl
 531+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        call    L2_plotAtRowLColA       ; targetArray[y_pos] = x_pos
 532+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        inc     hl
 533+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,iyh
 534+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      (hl),a
 535+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        inc     hl
 536+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        exx                             ;        if error >= 0
 537+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        bit     7,h                     ;        .
 538+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jr      nz,.ErrorNegative       ;        .
 539+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.WhileIncInstuction:    inc     iy                      ;             x_pos += sign_x (doneas self modifying to inc or dec)
 540+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.ErrorPositive:         ClearCarryFlag                  ;             error -= delta_y_step
 541+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        sbc     hl,bc                   ;             .
 542+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jp      .LoopEnd                ;             .
 543+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.ErrorNegative:         add     hl,de                   ;        else error += delta x step
 544+ F5D4              ;-*-*-.LoopEnd:               exx                             ;             back to main regsters
 545+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        inc     bc                      ;        ++y_pos
 546+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        jp      .WhileLoop
 547+ F5D4              ;-*-*-
 548+ F5D4              ;-*-*-
 549+ F5D4              ;-*-*-;---------------------------------
 550+ F5D4              ;-*-*-L2_plotAtRowLColC:      ld      a,c
 551+ F5D4              ;-*-*-L2_plotAtRowLColA:      push    bc,,de,,hl,,af
 552+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ex      af,af'
 553+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        push    af
 554+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ex      af,af'
 555+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      b,l
 556+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      c,a
 557+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ld      a,$FF                   ; white for now
 558+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        call    l2_plot_pixel
 559+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        pop     af
 560+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ex      af,af'
 561+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        pop     bc,,de,,hl,,af
 562+ F5D4              ;-*-*-                        ret
 563+ F5D4              ;-*-*-
 564+ F5D4
 565+ F5D4 00 00        x1                      dw 0
 566+ F5D6 00 00        y1                      dw 0
 567+ F5D8 00 00        x2                      dw 0
 568+ F5DA 00 00        y2                      dw 0
 569+ F5DC 00 00        savex1                  dw 0
 570+ F5DE 00 00        savey1                  dw 0
 571+ F5E0 00 00        savex2                  dw 0
 572+ F5E2 00 00        savey2                  dw 0
 573+ F5E4 00 00        temp                    dw 0
 574+ F5E6 00           longest:                DB 0
 575+ F5E7 00 00        x1Work:                 DW 0
 576+ F5E9 00 00        y1Work:                 DW 0
 577+ F5EB 00 00        x2Work:                 DW 0
 578+ F5ED 00 00        y2Work:                 DW 0
 579+ F5EF 00 00        x_pos:                  DW 0
 580+ F5F1 00 00        y_pos:                  DW 0
 581+ F5F3 00 00        x_pos_end:              DW 0
 582+ F5F5 00 00        y_pos_end:              DW 0
 583+ F5F7 00 00        clip_xmax:              DW 0
 584+ F5F9 00 00        clip_xmin:              DW 0
 585+ F5FB 00 00        sign_x                  DW 0
 586+ F5FD 00           sign_y                  DB 0
 587+ F5FE 00 00        delta_x                 DW 0
 588+ F600 00 00        delta_y                 DW 0
 589+ F602 00 00        delta_y_x               DW 0 ; holds the compressed version for elite line draw
 590+ F604 00 00        delta_x_step            DW 0
 591+ F606 00 00        delta_y_step            DW 0
 592+ F608 00 00        linetemp                DW 0
 593+ F60A 00 00        gradient                DW 0
 594+ F60C 00 00        tSlope                  DW 0
 595+ F60E 00 00        msd                     DW 0
 596+ F610 00 00        error                   DW 0
 597+ F612 00           set_exit                DB 0
 598+ F613 00 00        rem                     DW 0
 599+ F615              InstrDECBC              equ $0B
 600+ F615              InstrINCBC              equ $03
 601+ F615              InstrDECIY              equ $2B
 602+ F615              InstrINCIY              equ $23
 603+ F615
 604+ F615              MACROAequBMinusC16:     MACRO   pA, pB, pC
 605+ F615 ~                                    ld      hl,(pB)                         ;       error = delta_y_step - delta_x;
 606+ F615 ~                                    ld      de,(pC)                         ; .
 607+ F615 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 608+ F615 ~                                    sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 609+ F615 ~                                    ld      (pA),hl
 610+ F615                                      ENDM
 611+ F615              ;--- Swaps point 1 and point 2 around (i.e x1 y1 <--> x2 y2)
 612+ F615 2A D6 F5     SwapCoords:             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       then swap point 1 and point 2
 613+ F618 ED 5B DA F5                          ld      de,(y2)                         ;       .
 614+ F61C ED 53 D6 F5                          ld      (y1),de                         ;       .
 615+ F620 22 DA F5                             ld      (y2),hl                         ;       .
 616+ F623 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       .
 617+ F626 ED 5B D8 F5                          ld      de,(x2)                         ;       .
 618+ F62A ED 53 D4 F5                          ld      (x1),de                         ;       .
 619+ F62E 22 D8 F5                             ld      (x2),hl                         ;       .
 620+ F631 C9                                   ret
 621+ F632
 622+ F632                      ; DEFINE SPLITLINE 1
 623+ F632
 624+ F632                      DEFINE CLIPPED_LINEX 1
 625+ F632                      DEFINE SPLITORLINEX  1
 626+ F632                      IFDEF SPLITLINE
 626+ F632 ~
 627+ F632 ~            l2_draw_clipped_line:
 628+ F632                      ENDIF
 629+ F632                      IFDEF CLIPPED_LINEX
 629+ F632
 630+ F632              l2_draw_clipped_lineX:
 631+ F632                      ENDIF
 632+ F632                      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
 633+ F632 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 > y2)
 634+ F635 ED 5B DA F5                          ld      de,(y2)                         ; .
 635+ F639 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
 636+ F63C DA 42 F6                             jp      c,.NoSwapCoords
 637+ F63F CD 15 F6     .SwapCoords:            call    SwapCoords
 638+ F642              .NoSwapCoords:
 639+ F642 ED 5B D6 F5  .CalcDX:                ld      de,(y1)                         ; Calculate |dy|
 640+ F646 2A DA F5                             ld      hl,(y2)                         ; .
 641+ F649                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 641+ F649 B7          >                        or a
 642+ F64A ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 643+ F64C E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl                           ; iy = |dy|
 644+ F64F ED 5B D4 F5  .CalcDy:                ld      de,(x1)                         ; Calculate |dx|
 645+ F653 2A D8 F5                             ld      hl,(x2)                         ; .
 646+ F656 06 00                                ld      b,0                             ; assume x1 < x2 and assume no negate needed
 647+ F658 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;
 648+ F65B D2 60 F6                             jp      nc,.DxNoSwap                     ;
 649+ F65E EB           .DxSwap:                ex      de,hl                           ; swap just x over
 650+ F65F 04                                   inc     b                               ; and flag that we had to do it
 651+ F660              .DxNoSwap:              ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 651+ F660 B7          >                        or a
 652+ F661 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;
 653+ F663 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl                           ; ix = |dx|
 654+ F666 DD 7C        .CheckForHuge:          ld      a,ixh                           ; if either dx or dy > 255 then split line
 655+ F668 FD B4                                or      iyh                             ; .
 656+ F66A C2 7E F6                             jp      nz, .BreakNeeded                ; .
 657+ F66D DD 7D        .ChecktGT180:           ld      a,ixl
 658+ F66F FE B4                                cp      180
 659+ F671 D2 7E F6                             jp      nc,.BreakNeeded
 660+ F674 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 661+ F676 FE B4                                cp      180
 662+ F678 D2 7E F6                             jp      nc,.BreakNeeded
 663+ F67B C3 E2 F6                             jp      .noBreakNeeded
 664+ F67E              .BreakNeeded:           ldCopy2Byte y1, savey1                  ;       savey1 = y1                     create savey1 (y1) to savey2 (y break)
 664+ F67E 2A D6 F5    >                        ld       hl,(y1)
 664+ F681 22 DE F5    >                        ld       (savey1),hl
 665+ F684                                      ShiftIYRight1                           ;       savey2 = y1 + (work_dy/2)
 665+ F684 FD 7C       >			   ld 	a,iyh
 665+ F686 CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 665+ F688 FD 67       >			   ld	iyh,a
 665+ F68A FD 7D       >			   ld 	a,iyl
 665+ F68C 1F          >			   rra
 665+ F68D FD 6F       >			   ld	iyl,a
 666+ F68F 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       .
 667+ F692                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;       .
 667+ F692 B7          >                        or a
 668+ F693 FD 54 FD 5D                          ld      de,iy
 669+ F697 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;       .
 670+ F699 22 E2 F5                             ld      (savey2),hl                     ;       .
 671+ F69C 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       y1     = savey2, y2 untouched   create y1 (break) to y2
 672+ F69F 05                                   dec     b                               ;       if b was 1 then decb would set z flag so we know that x1 > x2
 673+ F6A0 C2 A6 F6                             jp      nz,.X1gtX2
 674+ F6A3 CD 15 F6     .X1lteX2:               call    SwapCoords
 675+ F6A6              .X1gtX2:                ldCopy2Byte x1, savex1                  ;       savex1 = x1                     create savex1 (x1) to savex2 (x break)
 675+ F6A6 2A D4 F5    >                        ld       hl,(x1)
 675+ F6A9 22 DC F5    >                        ld       (savex1),hl
 676+ F6AC                                      ShiftIXRight1                           ;       savex2 = x1 + (work_dx/2)
 676+ F6AC DD 7C       >			   ld 	a,ixh
 676+ F6AE CB 3F       >			   srl 	a
 676+ F6B0 DD 67       >			   ld	ixh,a
 676+ F6B2 DD 7D       >			   ld 	a,ixl
 676+ F6B4 1F          >			   rra
 676+ F6B5 DD 6F       >			   ld	ixl,a
 677+ F6B7 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       .
 678+ F6BA                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;       .
 678+ F6BA B7          >                        or a
 679+ F6BB DD 54 DD 5D                          ld      de,ix
 680+ F6BF ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;       .
 681+ F6C1 22 E0 F5                             ld      (savex2),hl                     ;       .
 682+ F6C4 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       x1     = savex1, x2 untouched  create x1 (break to x2)
 683+ F6C7                      ENDIF
 684+ F6C7                      IFDEF SPLITLINE
 685+ F6C7 ~                                    call    l2_draw_short_line              ;       drawshortLine
 686+ F6C7                      ENDIF
 687+ F6C7                      IFDEF CLIPPED_LINEX
 688+ F6C7 CD E2 F6                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line
 689+ F6CA                      ENDIF
 690+ F6CA                      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
 691+ F6CA                                      ldCopyWord savex1,x1
 691+ F6CA             >                        ldCopy2Byte savex1, x1
 691+ F6CA 2A DC F5    >                        ld       hl,(savex1)
 691+ F6CD 22 D4 F5    >                        ld       (x1),hl
 692+ F6D0                                      ldCopyWord savey1,y1
 692+ F6D0             >                        ldCopy2Byte savey1, y1
 692+ F6D0 2A DE F5    >                        ld       hl,(savey1)
 692+ F6D3 22 D6 F5    >                        ld       (y1),hl
 693+ F6D6                                      ldCopyWord savex2,x2
 693+ F6D6             >                        ldCopy2Byte savex2, x2
 693+ F6D6 2A E0 F5    >                        ld       hl,(savex2)
 693+ F6D9 22 D8 F5    >                        ld       (x2),hl
 694+ F6DC                                      ldCopyWord savey2,y2
 694+ F6DC             >                        ldCopy2Byte savey2, y2
 694+ F6DC 2A E2 F5    >                        ld       hl,(savey2)
 694+ F6DF 22 DA F5    >                        ld       (y2),hl
 695+ F6E2              .noBreakNeeded:         // Falls straight into l2_draw_short_line
 696+ F6E2                      ENDIF
 697+ F6E2                      IFDEF SPLITLINE
 697+ F6E2 ~
 698+ F6E2 ~            l2_draw_short_line:     ; check out of bounds
 699+ F6E2                      ENDIF
 700+ F6E2                      IFDEF CLIPPED_LINEX
 701+ F6E2              l2_draw_clipped_line:
 702+ F6E2                      ENDIF
 703+ F6E2                      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
 704+ F6E2 2A D4 F5     CheckForOnScreen:       ld      hl,(x1)
 705+ F6E5 ED 5B D8 F5                          ld      de,(x2)
 706+ F6E9 CB 7C        .X1X2NegativeCheck:     bit     7,h                             ; if they are both negative then bail out
 707+ F6EB 28 03                                jr      z,.X1X2NotNegative
 708+ F6ED CB 7A                                bit     7,d
 709+ F6EF C0           .X1X2IsNegative:        ret     nz
 710+ F6F0 7C           .X1X2NotNegative:       ld      a,h                             ; if they are both not negative then if one is negative that is good
 711+ F6F1 AA                                   xor     d
 712+ F6F2 FA FD F6                             jp      m,.X1X2SpanScreen
 713+ F6F5 7C           .X1X2BothPositive:      ld      a,h                             ; if x1 or x2 high is zero then at least one pixel is on screen
 714+ F6F6 A7                                   and     a
 715+ F6F7 CA FD F6                             jp      z,.X1X2SpanScreen
 716+ F6FA 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ; if x1 was > 255 then if x2 > 255 bail out
 717+ F6FB A7                                   and     a
 718+ F6FC C0                                   ret     nz
 719+ F6FD 2A D6 F5     .X1X2SpanScreen:        ld      hl,(y1)
 720+ F700 ED 5B DA F5                          ld      de,(y2)
 721+ F704 CB 7C        .Y1Y2NegativeCheck:     bit     7,h                             ; if they are both negative then bail out
 722+ F706 28 03                                jr      z,.Y1Y2NotNegative
 723+ F708 CB 7A                                bit     7,d
 724+ F70A C0           .Y1Y2IsNegative:        ret     nz
 725+ F70B 7C           .Y1Y2NotNegative:       ld      a,h                             ; if they are both not negative then if one is negative that is good
 726+ F70C AA                                   xor     d
 727+ F70D FA 1F F7                             jp      m,.Y1Y2SpanScreen
 728+ F710 01 80 00     .Y1Y2BothPositive:      ld      bc,128                          ; if they are both positive and at least one is < 128 then carry on
 729+ F713 CD C3 9A                             call    CompareHLBC
 730+ F716 38 07                                jr      c,.Y1Y2SpanScreen
 731+ F718 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ; save y1 into de
 732+ F719 CD C3 9A                             call    CompareHLBC
 733+ F71C 38 01                                jr      c,.Y1Y2SpanScreen
 734+ F71E C9                                   ret
 735+ F71F              .Y1Y2SpanScreen:
 736+ F71F CD A6 9A     CheckForHorizontal:     call    CompareHLDESame                 ; de = saved y1 , hl = y2
 737+ F722 CA 4E F5                             jp      z, l2_drawVertClip
 738+ F725 2A D4 F5     CheckForVertical:       ld      hl,(x1)
 739+ F728 ED 5B D8 F5                          ld      de,(x2)
 740+ F72C CD A6 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame
 741+ F72F CA 7F F5                             jp      z, l2_drawHorzClip
 742+ F732                                      ; Need horizontal and vertical optimisation code in at thispoint
 743+ F732 2A D6 F5     CheckForSwap:           ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 > y2)
 744+ F735 ED 5B DA F5                          ld      de,(y2)                         ; .
 745+ F739 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
 746+ F73C DA 42 F7                             jp      c,.NoSwapCoords
 747+ F73F CD 15 F6     .SwapCoords:            call    SwapCoords
 748+ F742                                      ; Default in sign and clip ranges, sign 16 bit for now
 749+ F742 21 00 00     .NoSwapCoords:          ld      hl,0                            ; clip_xmin = 0;
 750+ F745 22 F9 F5                             ld      (clip_xmin),hl                  ; .
 751+ F748 2E FF                                ld      l,255                           ; clip xmax = 255;
 752+ F74A 22 F7 F5                             ld      (clip_xmax),hl                  ; .
 753+ F74D 21 01 00                             ld      hl,1                            ; sign_x = 1
 754+ F750 22 FB F5                             ld      (sign_x),hl                     ; .
 755+ F753                                      ; if moving right to left then swap signs and clip
 756+ F753 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; if x1 > x2
 757+ F756 ED 5B D8 F5                          ld      de,(x2)                         ; .
 758+ F75A CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
 759+ F75D 38 2C                                jr      c,.X1tlX2                       ; .
 760+ F75F 21 FF FF     .X1gteX2:               ld      hl, -1                          ;        sign_x = 01
 761+ F762 22 FB F5                             ld      (sign_x),hl                     ;        .
 762+ F765 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;        x1 = -x1;
 763+ F768                                      macronegate16hl                         ;        .
 763+ F768 AF          >					xor 	a
 763+ F769 95          >					sub 	l
 763+ F76A 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 763+ F76B 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 763+ F76C 94          >					sub 	h
 763+ F76D 67          >					ld 		h,a
 764+ F76E 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;        .
 765+ F771 ED 5B D8 F5                          ld      de,(x2)                         ;        x2 = -x2;
 766+ F775                                      macronegate16de                         ;        .
 766+ F775 AF          >					xor 	a
 766+ F776 93          >                    sub 	e
 766+ F777 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 766+ F778 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 766+ F779 92          >                    sub 	d
 766+ F77A 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 767+ F77B ED 53 D8 F5                          ld      (x2),de                         ;        .
 768+ F77F 21 01 FF                             ld      hl,-255                         ;        clip_xmin =-255;
 769+ F782 22 F9 F5                             ld      (clip_xmin),hl                  ;        .
 770+ F785 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;        clip_xmax = 0;
 771+ F788 22 F7 F5                             ld      (clip_xmax),hl                  ;        .
 772+ F78B              .X1tlX2:                                                        ;
 773+ F78B                                      ; calculate deltas
 774+ F78B 2A D8 F5     .DxEquX2MinusX1:        ld      hl,(x2)                         ; delta_x = x2 - x1;
 775+ F78E ED 5B D4 F5                          ld      de,(x1)                         ; .
 776+ F792                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 776+ F792 B7          >                        or a
 777+ F793 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 778+ F795 22 FE F5                             ld      (delta_x),hl                    ; .
 779+ F798 2A DA F5     .DyEquY2MinusY1:        ld      hl,(y2)                         ; delta_y = y2 - y1;
 780+ F79B ED 5B D6 F5                          ld      de,(y1)                         ; .
 781+ F79F                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
 781+ F79F B7          >                        or a
 782+ F7A0 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
 783+ F7A2 22 00 F6                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; .
 784+ F7A5 ED 5B FE F5  .ScaleDeltaXY:          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ; we already have delta y but x could be negative
 785+ F7A9 06 00                                ld      b,0
 786+ F7AB CB 7A                                bit     7,d
 787+ F7AD CA B7 F7                             jp      z,.DeltaYABSDone                ; de = | de |, b = 1 to denote negative needs resetting
 788+ F7B0 04                                   inc     b
 789+ F7B1                                      macronegate16de
 789+ F7B1 AF          >					xor 	a
 789+ F7B2 93          >                    sub 	e
 789+ F7B3 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 789+ F7B4 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 789+ F7B5 92          >                    sub 	d
 789+ F7B6 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 790+ F7B7              .DeltaYABSDone:
 791+ F7B7 ~            /*.ScaleHighLoop:         ld      a,d
 792+ F7B7 ~                                    or      h
 793+ F7B7 ~                                    jr      z,.HighScaleDone
 794+ F7B7 ~                                    ShiftDERight1
 795+ F7B7 ~                                    ShiftHLRight1
 796+ F7B7 ~                                    jp      .ScaleHighLoop
 797+ F7B7 ~            .HighScaleDone:
 798+ F7B7 ~            .LowScaleLoop:          ld      a,e
 799+ F7B7 ~                                    or      l
 800+ F7B7 ~                                    and     $80
 801+ F7B7 ~                                    jr      z,.LowScaleDone
 802+ F7B7 ~                                    ShiftDERight1
 803+ F7B7 ~                                    ShiftHLRight1
 804+ F7B7 ~                                    jp      .LowScaleLoop
 805+ F7B7 ~            .LowScaleDone:          bit     0,b
 806+ F7B7 ~                                    jr      z,.DeltaDone
 807+ F7B7 ~            .SortDXSign:            macronegate16de
 808+ F7B7 ~            .DeltaDone:             ld      (delta_x),de
 809+ F7B7 ~                                    ld      (delta_y),hl*/
 810+ F7B7 2A FE F5     .DeltaXStepCalc:        ld     hl, (delta_x)
 811+ F7BA                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; delta_x_step = 2 * delta_x;
 811+ F7BA B7          >                        or a
 812+ F7BB ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ; .
 813+ F7BD 22 04 F6                             ld      (delta_x_step),hl               ; .
 814+ F7C0 2A 00 F6     .DeltaYStepCalc:        ld     hl, (delta_y)
 815+ F7C3                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; delta_y_step = 2 * delta_y;
 815+ F7C3 B7          >                        or a
 816+ F7C4 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ; .
 817+ F7C6 22 06 F6                             ld      (delta_y_step),hl               ; .
 818+ F7C9 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x_pos = x1;
 819+ F7CC 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ; .
 820+ F7CF ED 5B D6 F5                          ld      de,(y1)                         ; y_pos = y1;
 821+ F7D3 ED 53 F1 F5                          ld      (y_pos),de                      ; .
 822+ F7D7                                      ; check if we are workign on dx or dy
 823+ F7D7 2A FE F5     .CompareDxDy:           ld      hl,(delta_x)                    ; if (delta_x >= delta_y)
 824+ F7DA ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)
 825+ F7DE CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn
 826+ F7E1 DA 28 FA                             jp      c, LineDrawDxLTDy
 827+ F7E4              ;.......................DxGteDy branch.............................................................................................
 828+ F7E4 2A 06 F6     LineDrawDxGteDy:        ld      hl,(delta_y_step)               ;       error = delta_y_step - delta_x;
 829+ F7E7 ED 5B FE F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;       .
 830+ F7EB                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;       .
 830+ F7EB B7          >                        or a
 831+ F7EC ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;       .
 832+ F7EE 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;       .
 833+ F7F1                                      ZeroA                                   ;       set exit false (0 == false)
 833+ F7F1 AF          >                        xor a
 834+ F7F2 32 12 F6                             ld      (set_exit),a                    ;       .
 835+ F7F5                                      ; clipping of negative y1
 836+ F7F5 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       if (y1 < 0)
 837+ F7F8 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;       .
 838+ F7FA CA 92 F8                             jp      z,.y1GTE0                       ;       .
 839+ F7FD 2A D6 F5     .y1LT0:                 ld      hl,(y1)                         ;           temp = (2 * (0 - y1) - 1) * delta_x;
 840+ F800                                      macronegate16hl                         ;               hl = |y1|
 840+ F800 AF          >					xor 	a
 840+ F801 95          >					sub 	l
 840+ F802 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 840+ F803 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 840+ F804 94          >					sub 	h
 840+ F805 67          >					ld 		h,a
 841+ F806                                      ClearCarryFlag
 841+ F806 B7          >                        or a
 842+ F807 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ;               hl = (2 * |y1|)
 843+ F809 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;               hl = (2 * |y1| - 1)
 844+ F80A ED 5B FE F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;               hl = hl * delta_x
 845+ F80E CD C8 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
 846+ F811 22 E4 F5                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;               save to temp
 847+ F814 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ;            msd = temp / delta_y_step
 848+ F816 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
 849+ F81A CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
 850+ F81D ED 43 0E F6                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
 851+ F821 2A EF F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;            x_pos += msd
 852+ F824                                      ClearCarryFlag
 852+ F824 B7          >                        or a
 853+ F825 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;            .
 854+ F827 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;            .
 855+ F82A ED 5B F7 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;            if (x_pos >= clip_xmax)
 856+ F82E CD A6 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;            .
 857+ F831 CA 38 F8                             jp      z,.xposLTEClipxmax              ;            .
 858+ F834 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;            .
 859+ F837 D0                                   ret     nc                              ;               return
 860+ F838 2A EF F5     .xposLTEClipxmax:       ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;            if (x_pos >= clip_xmin)
 861+ F83B ED 5B F9 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;            .
 862+ F83F CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;            .
 863+ F842 DA 92 F8                             jp      c,.xposLTxmin                   ;            .
 864+ F845 2A 0E F6     .xposGTExmin:           ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               rem = temp - (msd * delta_y_step) (its really IY from floor_divq)
 865+ F848 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   de = msd * delta_y_step
 866+ F84C CD C8 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
 867+ F84F EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
 868+ F850 2A E4 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;                   hl = temp - de
 869+ F853                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 869+ F853 B7          >                        or a
 870+ F854 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 871+ F856 22 13 F6                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;                   .
 872+ F859 11 00 00                             ld      de,0                            ;               y_pos = 0
 873+ F85C ED 53 F1 F5                          ld      (y_pos),de                      ;               .
 874+ F860 ED 5B 13 F6                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               error -= rem + delta_x
 875+ F864                                      ClearCarryFlag
 875+ F864 B7          >                        or a
 876+ F865 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   de = rem+delta_x
 877+ F867 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
 878+ F868 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   hl = error - de
 879+ F86B                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 879+ F86B B7          >                        or a
 880+ F86C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 881+ F86E 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                   write to error
 882+ F871 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem > 0)
 883+ F874 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
 884+ F875 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
 885+ F876 CA 8D F8                             jp      z,.remLte0                      ;               .
 886+ F879 2A EF F5     .remGT0:                ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;                   x_pos += 1;
 887+ F87C 23                                   inc     hl                              ;                   .
 888+ F87D 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;                   .
 889+ F880 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_y_step;
 890+ F883 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   .
 891+ F887                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 891+ F887 B7          >                        or a
 892+ F888 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 893+ F88A 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                   .
 894+ F88D 3E 01        .remLte0:               ld      a,1                             ;               set exit = true
 895+ F88F 32 12 F6                             ld      (set_exit),a                    ;               .
 896+ F892              .xposLTxmin:
 897+ F892 3A 12 F6     .y1GTE0:                ld      a,(set_exit)                    ;           if (!set_exit && x1 < clip_xmin)
 898+ F895 A7                                   and     a                               ;           .
 899+ F896 C2 26 F9                             jp      nz,.exit_false                  ;           .   Exit if set_exit is true
 900+ F899 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;           .
 901+ F89C ED 5B F9 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;           .   Exit if x1 > xmin
 902+ F8A0 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 903+ F8A3 D2 26 F9                             jp      nc,.exit_false                  ;           .
 904+ F8A6 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               temp = delta_y_step * (clip_xmin - x1)
 905+ F8A7 ED 5B D4 F5                          ld      de,(x1)                         ;                   (clip_xmin - x1) (already have clip_xmin in de)
 906+ F8AB                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 906+ F8AB B7          >                        or a
 907+ F8AC ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 908+ F8AE ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   hl = delta_y_step * (clip_xmin - x1)
 909+ F8B2 CD C8 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
 910+ F8B5 22 E4 F5                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;                   .
 911+ F8B8 44 4D        .msdEQtempDIVdxstep:    ld      bc,hl                           ;               msd = temp / delta_x_step
 912+ F8BA ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                  BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
 913+ F8BE CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;                  .
 914+ F8C1 ED 43 0E F6                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;                  .
 915+ F8C5 E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl                           ;                  save BC%DE into HL (temp % delta x step0
 916+ F8C8 2A F1 F5     .yposPlusmsd:           ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;               y_pos += msd
 917+ F8CB                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   bc already is msd
 917+ F8CB B7          >                        or a
 918+ F8CC ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;                   hl += bc
 919+ F8CE 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;                   .
 920+ F8D1 FD E5 E1                             ld      hl,iy                           ;               rem = temp % delta_x_step (which is in IY)
 921+ F8D4 22 13 F6                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;               .
 922+ F8D7 2A F1 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;           if ((y_pos > 127) || (y_pos == 127 && rem >= delta_x))
 923+ F8DA 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
 924+ F8DD CD A6 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .    if y_pos != clipxmax skip the abort test
 925+ F8E0 20 0B                                jr      nz,.YPosNotClipymax             ;           .
 926+ F8E2 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           .    if rem < delta_y  skip the abort test
 927+ F8E5 ED 5B FE F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;           .
 928+ F8E9 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 929+ F8EC D8                                   ret     c                               ;           .
 930+ F8ED EB           .YPosNotClipymax:       ex      de,hl                           ;           .    swap over xpos and max to compare xpos > xmax
 931+ F8EE CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .    if xpos > clipxmax then return (i.e clipxmax - xpos had a carry)
 932+ F8F1 D8                                   ret     c
 933+ F8F2 2A F9 F5     .yposLT127:             ld      hl,(clip_xmin)                  ;               x_pos = clip_xmin;
 934+ F8F5 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;               .
 935+ F8F8 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               error += rem
 936+ F8FB ED 5B 13 F6                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               .
 937+ F8FF                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 937+ F8FF B7          >                        or a
 938+ F900 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;               .
 939+ F902 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;               .
 940+ F905 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem >= delta_x)
 941+ F908 ED 5B FE F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;               .
 942+ F90C CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;               .
 943+ F90F DA 26 F9                             jp      c,.remLTDeltaX                  ;               .
 944+ F912 2A F1 F5     .remGTEDeltaX:          ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   y_pos++
 945+ F915 23                                   inc     hl
 946+ F916 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl
 947+ F919 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                    error -= delta_x_step;
 948+ F91C ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                    .
 949+ F920                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                    .
 949+ F920 B7          >                        or a
 950+ F921 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                    .
 951+ F923 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                    .
 952+ F926              .remLTDeltaX:
 953+ F926 2A D8 F5     .exit_false:            ld      hl,(x2)                         ;           x_pos_end = x2;
 954+ F929 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
 955+ F92C 2A DA F5                             ld      hl,(y2)                         ;           if (y2 > 127)
 956+ F92F 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
 957+ F932 CD A6 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .   if y2 is zero fails check
 958+ F935 CA 8C F9                             jp      z,.y2LTE127                     ;           .
 959+ F938 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .   if y2 < 127 then there is carry so fails check
 960+ F93B DA 8C F9                             jp      c,.y2LTE127                      ;           .
 961+ F93E 21 7F 00     .y2GT127:               ld      hl,127                          ;               temp = delta_x_step * (127 - y1) + delta_x;
 962+ F941 ED 5B D6 F5                          ld      de,(y1)                         ;                   hl = 127-y1
 963+ F945                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
 963+ F945 B7          >                        or a
 964+ F946 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 965+ F948 ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   hl = delta_x_step * (127-y1)
 966+ F94C CD C8 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
 967+ F94F ED 5B FE F5                          ld      de,(delta_x)                    ;                   hl += delta_x
 968+ F953                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
 968+ F953 B7          >                        or a
 969+ F954 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
 970+ F956 22 E4 F5                             ld      (temp),hl
 971+ F959 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 972+ F95B ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               msd = temp / delta y step
 973+ F95F CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
 974+ F962 ED 43 0E F6                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
 975+ F966 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;               x_pos_end = x1 + msd;
 976+ F969                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 976+ F969 B7          >                        or a
 977+ F96A ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;               .
 978+ F96C 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
 979+ F96F 2A 0E F6                             ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               if ((temp - msd * delta_y_step) == 0) --x_pos_end
 980+ F972 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               .
 981+ F976 CD C8 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
 982+ F979 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               .
 983+ F97A 2A E4 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;               .
 984+ F97D                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
 984+ F97D B7          >                        or a
 985+ F97E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
 986+ F980 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
 987+ F981 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
 988+ F982 C2 8C F9                             jp      nz,.NotTheSame                  ;               .
 989+ F985 2A F3 F5     .IsTheSame:             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;                   --x_pos_end
 990+ F988 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;                   .
 991+ F989 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;                   .
 992+ F98C              .NotTheSame:
 993+ F98C 2A F3 F5     .y2LTE127:              ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;           x_pos_end = min (x_pos_end,clip_xmax) + 1
 994+ F98F ED 5B F7 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
 995+ F993 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
 996+ F996 D2 A3 F9                             jp      nc,.xposgtexmax                 ;           .
 997+ F999 2A F3 F5     .xposltxmax:            ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;           .
 998+ F99C 23                                   inc     hl                              ;               x_pos_end+1
 999+ F99D 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
1000+ F9A0 C3 A8 F9                             jp      .DoneXposAdjust                 ;               .
1001+ F9A3 13           .xposgtexmax:           inc     de                              ;               else
1002+ F9A4 ED 53 F3 F5                          ld      (x_pos_end),de                  ;               clip_xmax+1
1003+ F9A8 3A FB F5     .DoneXposAdjust:        ld      a,(sign_x)                      ;           if (sign_x == -1)
1004+ F9AB 3C                                   inc     a
1005+ F9AC C2 C7 F9                             jp      nz,.SignNotMinus1
1006+ F9AF 2A EF F5     .SignEquMinus1:         ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               x_pos = -x_pos;
1007+ F9B2                                      macronegate16hl
1007+ F9B2 AF          >					xor 	a
1007+ F9B3 95          >					sub 	l
1007+ F9B4 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1007+ F9B5 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1007+ F9B6 94          >					sub 	h
1007+ F9B7 67          >					ld 		h,a
1008+ F9B8 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1009+ F9BB 2A F3 F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;               x_pos_end = -x_pos_end;
1010+ F9BE                                      macronegate16hl
1010+ F9BE AF          >					xor 	a
1010+ F9BF 95          >					sub 	l
1010+ F9C0 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1010+ F9C1 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1010+ F9C2 94          >					sub 	h
1010+ F9C3 67          >					ld 		h,a
1011+ F9C4 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl
1012+ F9C7              .y2LTE27:
1013+ F9C7              .SignNotMinus1:
1014+ F9C7 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;        delta_x_step -= delta_y_step;
1015+ F9CB 2A 04 F6                             ld      hl,(delta_x_step)               ;        .
1016+ F9CE                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;        .
1016+ F9CE B7          >                        or a
1017+ F9CF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;        .
1018+ F9D1 22 04 F6                             ld      (delta_x_step),hl               ;        .
1019+ F9D4 2A EF F5     .PlottingLoop:          ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;        while (x_pos != x_pos_end)
1020+ F9D7 ED 5B F3 F5                          ld      de,(x_pos_end)                  ;        .
1021+ F9DB CD A6 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;        .
1022+ F9DE C8                                   ret     z                               ;        .
1023+ F9DF 2A EF F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               drawpixel at xpos, ypos, Colour
1024+ F9E2 4D                                   ld      c,l                             ;               .
1025+ F9E3 2A F1 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;               .
1026+ F9E6 45                                   ld      b,l                             ;               .
1027+ F9E7 3E BF                                ld      a,$BF                           ;               .
1028+ F9E9 CD B6 E2     .PlotPixel:             call    l2_plot_pixel                   ;               .
1029+ F9EC 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               if (error >= 0)
1030+ F9EF CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;               .
1031+ F9F1 C2 0B FA                             jp      nz,.errorLT0                    ;               .
1032+ F9F4 2A F1 F5     .errorGTE0:             ld	    hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   ++y_pos;
1033+ F9F7 23                                   inc	    hl                              ;                   .
1034+ F9F8 22 F1 F5                             ld	    (y_pos),hl                      ;                   .
1035+ F9FB 2A 10 F6                             ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error -= delta_x_step;
1036+ F9FE ED 5B 04 F6                          ld	    de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   .
1037+ FA02                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1037+ FA02 B7          >                        or a
1038+ FA03 ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de                           ;                   .
1039+ FA05 22 10 F6                             ld	    (error),hl                      ;                   .
1040+ FA08 C3 18 FA                             jp      .DoneErrorAdjust                ;                   .
1041+ FA0B 2A 10 F6     .errorLT0:              ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_y_step;
1042+ FA0E ED 5B 06 F6                          ld	    de,(delta_y_step)
1043+ FA12                                      ClearCarryFlag
1043+ FA12 B7          >                        or a
1044+ FA13 ED 5A                                adc	    hl,de
1045+ FA15 22 10 F6                             ld	    (error),hl
1046+ FA18 ED 5B FB F5  .DoneErrorAdjust:       ld      de,(sign_x)
1047+ FA1C 2A EF F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)
1048+ FA1F                                      ClearCarryFlag
1048+ FA1F B7          >                        or a
1049+ FA20 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1050+ FA22 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1051+ FA25 C3 D4 F9                             jp      .PlottingLoop
1052+ FA28              ;.......................DxGltDy branch.............................................................................................
1053+ FA28              LineDrawDxLTDy:         ;ret
1054+ FA28 2A 04 F6                             ld      hl,(delta_x_step)               ;       error = delta_x_step - delta_y;
1055+ FA2B ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)
1056+ FA2F                                      ClearCarryFlag
1056+ FA2F B7          >                        or a
1057+ FA30 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1058+ FA32 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl
1059+ FA35                                      ZeroA                                   ;        set exit false (0 == false)
1059+ FA35 AF          >                        xor a
1060+ FA36 32 12 F6                             ld      (set_exit),a
1061+ FA39 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;        if (x1 < clip_xmin)
1062+ FA3C ED 5B F9 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;        .
1063+ FA40 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;        .
1064+ FA43 D2 D7 FA                             jp      nc,.x1GTEClipXmin               ;        .
1065+ FA46 ED 5B D4 F5  .x1LTClipXmin:          ld      de,(x1)                         ;           temp = (2 * (cllp_xmin - x1) - 1) * delta_y;
1066+ FA4A 2A F9 F5                             ld      hl,(clip_xmin)                  ;               hl = clip_xmin - x1
1067+ FA4D                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1067+ FA4D B7          >                        or a
1068+ FA4E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
1069+ FA50                                      ClearCarryFlag
1069+ FA50 B7          >                        or a
1070+ FA51 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl                           ;               hl = (2* hl)
1071+ FA53 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;               hl = (2 *  hl - 1)
1072+ FA54 ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;               hl = hl  * delta_y
1073+ FA58 CD C8 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
1074+ FA5B 22 E4 F5                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;               .
1075+ FA5E 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ;            msd = temp / delta_x_step
1076+ FA60 ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
1077+ FA64 CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1078+ FA67 ED 43 0E F6                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1079+ FA6B 2A F1 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;            y_pos += msd
1080+ FA6E                                      ClearCarryFlag
1080+ FA6E B7          >                        or a
1081+ FA6F ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;            .
1082+ FA71 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;            .
1083+ FA74 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;            if (y_pos >= 127)
1084+ FA77 CD A6 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;            .
1085+ FA7A CA 81 FA                             jp      z,.yposGT127                    ;            .
1086+ FA7D CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;            .
1087+ FA80 D0                                   ret     nc                              ;               return
1088+ FA81 2A F1 F5     .yposGT127:             ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;            if (y_pos >= 0)
1089+ FA84 CB 7C                                bit     7,h
1090+ FA86 C2 D7 FA                             jp      nz,.yposLT0
1091+ FA89 2A 0E F6     .yposGT0:               ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               rem = temp - (msd * delta_x_step)
1092+ FA8C ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;                   de = msd * delta_x_step
1093+ FA90 CD C8 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
1094+ FA93 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
1095+ FA94 2A E4 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;                   hl = temp - de
1096+ FA97                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1096+ FA97 B7          >                        or a
1097+ FA98 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1098+ FA9A 22 13 F6                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;                   .
1099+ FA9D ED 5B F9 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmin)                  ;               x_pos = clip_xmin
1100+ FAA1 ED 53 EF F5                          ld      (x_pos),de                      ;               .
1101+ FAA5 ED 5B 13 F6                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;               error -= rem + delta_y
1102+ FAA9                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1102+ FAA9 B7          >                        or a
1103+ FAAA ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   de = rem+delta_x
1104+ FAAC EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;                   .
1105+ FAAD 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   hl = error - de
1106+ FAB0                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1106+ FAB0 B7          >                        or a
1107+ FAB1 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1108+ FAB3 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                   .
1109+ FAB6 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;               if (rem > 0)
1110+ FAB9 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
1111+ FABA B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
1112+ FABB CA D2 FA                             jp      z,.remLte0                      ;               .
1113+ FABE 2A F1 F5     .remGT0:                ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;                   y_pos += 1;
1114+ FAC1 23                                   inc     hl
1115+ FAC2 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl
1116+ FAC5 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_x_step;
1117+ FAC8 ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)
1118+ FACC                                      ClearCarryFlag
1118+ FACC B7          >                        or a
1119+ FACD ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1120+ FACF 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl
1121+ FAD2 3E 01        .remLte0:               ld      a,1                             ;               set exit = true
1122+ FAD4 32 12 F6                             ld      (set_exit),a                    ;               .
1123+ FAD7
1124+ FAD7              .yposLT0:
1125+ FAD7 3A 12 F6     .x1GTEClipXmin:         ld      a,(set_exit)                    ;        if (!set_exit && y1 < 0)
1126+ FADA A7                                   and     a                               ;        .
1127+ FADB C2 65 FB                             jp      nz,.exit_false                  ;        .  if exit is 1 then its true so exit branch
1128+ FADE 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;        .  if y1 is positive (including 0) then exit branch
1129+ FAE1 CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ;        .
1130+ FAE3 CA 65 FB                             jp      z,.exit_false                   ;        .
1131+ FAE6 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;           temp = delta_x_step * (0 - y1)
1132+ FAE9                                      macronegate16hl                         ;           .
1132+ FAE9 AF          >					xor 	a
1132+ FAEA 95          >					sub 	l
1132+ FAEB 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1132+ FAEC 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1132+ FAED 94          >					sub 	h
1132+ FAEE 67          >					ld 		h,a
1133+ FAEF ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;           .       hl = delta_x_step * (- y1)
1134+ FAF3 CD C8 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;           .
1135+ FAF6 22 E4 F5                             ld      (temp),hl                       ;           .
1136+ FAF9 44 4D        .msdEQtempDIVdxstep:    ld      bc,hl                           ;           msd = temp / delta_y_step
1137+ FAFB ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;               BC = BC / DE, HL = BC % DE
1138+ FAFF CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1139+ FB02 ED 43 0E F6                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1140+ FB06 E5 FD E1                             ld      iy,hl                           ;               same remainders (which is also mod result)
1141+ FB09 22 13 F6                             ld      (rem),hl                        ;           rem = temp % delta_y_step (swapped from being after x_pos += msd)
1142+ FB0C 2A EF F5     .yposPlusmsd:           ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;           x_pos += msd
1143+ FB0F                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;           .   bc already is msd
1143+ FB0F B7          >                        or a
1144+ FB10 ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;           .   hl += bc
1145+ FB12 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl                      ;           .
1146+ FB15 2A EF F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;           if ((x_pos > clip_xmax) || (x_pos == clip_xmax && rem >= delta_y))
1147+ FB18 ED 5B F7 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
1148+ FB1C CD A6 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .    if xpos != clipxmax skip the abort test
1149+ FB1F 20 0B                                jr      nz,.XPosNotClipxmax             ;           .
1150+ FB21 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           .    if rem < delta_y  skip the abort test
1151+ FB24 ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;           .
1152+ FB28 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1153+ FB2B D8                                   ret     c                               ;           .
1154+ FB2C EB           .XPosNotClipxmax:       ex      de,hl                           ;           .    swap over xpos and max to compare xpos > xmax
1155+ FB2D CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .    if xpos > clipxmax then return (i.e clipxmax - xpos had a carry)
1156+ FB30 D8                                   ret     c
1157+ FB31 21 00 00     .xposLT127:             ld      hl,0                            ;           y_pos = 0;
1158+ FB34 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl                      ;           .
1159+ FB37 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;           error += rem
1160+ FB3A ED 5B 13 F6                          ld      de,(rem)                        ;           .
1161+ FB3E                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;           .
1161+ FB3E B7          >                        or a
1162+ FB3F ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;           .
1163+ FB41 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;           .
1164+ FB44 2A 13 F6                             ld      hl,(rem)                        ;           if (rem >= delta_y)
1165+ FB47 ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;           .
1166+ FB4B CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1167+ FB4E DA 65 FB                             jp      c,.remLTDeltaY                  ;           .
1168+ FB51 2A EF F5     .remGTEDeltaY:          ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;                x_pos++
1169+ FB54 23                                   inc     hl
1170+ FB55 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1171+ FB58 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;                error -= delta_y_step;
1172+ FB5B ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                .
1173+ FB5F                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                .
1173+ FB5F B7          >                        or a
1174+ FB60 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;                .
1175+ FB62 22 10 F6                             ld      (error),hl                      ;                .
1176+ FB65              .remLTDeltaY:
1177+ FB65 2A DA F5     .exit_false:            ld      hl,(y2)                         ;           y_pos_end = y2;
1178+ FB68 22 F5 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
1179+ FB6B 2A D8 F5                             ld      hl,(x2)                         ;           if (x2 > clip_xmax)
1180+ FB6E ED 5B F7 F5                          ld      de,(clip_xmax)                  ;           .
1181+ FB72 CD A6 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame                 ;           .
1182+ FB75 CA CC FB                             jp      z,.x2LTEclipxmax                ;           .
