1183+ FB78 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1184+ FB7B DA CC FB                             jp      c,.x2LTEclipxmax                ;           .
1185+ FB7E 2A F7 F5     .x2GTclipxmax:          ld      hl,(clip_xmax)                  ;               temp = delta_y_step * (clip_xmax - x1) + delta_y;
1186+ FB81 ED 5B D4 F5                          ld      de,(x1)                         ;                   hl = 127-y1
1187+ FB85                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
1187+ FB85 B7          >                        or a
1188+ FB86 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1189+ FB88 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y_step)               ;                   hl = delta_x_step * (clip_xmax - x1)
1190+ FB8C CD C8 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;                   .
1191+ FB8F ED 5B 00 F6                          ld      de,(delta_y)                    ;                   hl += delta_y
1192+ FB93                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;                   .
1192+ FB93 B7          >                        or a
1193+ FB94 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                           ;                   .
1194+ FB96 22 E4 F5                             ld      (temp),hl
1195+ FB99 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
1196+ FB9B ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               msd = temp / delta x step
1197+ FB9F CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;               .
1198+ FBA2 ED 43 0E F6                          ld      (msd),bc                        ;               .
1199+ FBA6 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;               y_pos_end = y1 + msd;
1200+ FBA9                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1200+ FBA9 B7          >                        or a
1201+ FBAA ED 4A                                adc     hl,bc                           ;               .
1202+ FBAC 22 F5 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;               .
1203+ FBAF 2A 0E F6                             ld      hl,(msd)                        ;               if ((temp - msd * delta_x_step) == 0) --y_pos_end
1204+ FBB2 ED 5B 04 F6                          ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;               .
1205+ FBB6 CD C8 92                             call    mulHLbyDE2sc                    ;               .
1206+ FBB9 EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ;               .
1207+ FBBA 2A E4 F5                             ld      hl,(temp)                       ;               .
1208+ FBBD                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;               .
1208+ FBBD B7          >                        or a
1209+ FBBE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;               .
1210+ FBC0 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;               .
1211+ FBC1 B5                                   or      l                               ;               .
1212+ FBC2 C2 CC FB                             jp      nz,.NotTheSame                  ;               .
1213+ FBC5 2A F5 F5     .IsTheSame:             ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;                   --x_pos_end
1214+ FBC8 2B                                   dec     hl                              ;                   .
1215+ FBC9 22 F5 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;                   .
1216+ FBCC              .NotTheSame:
1217+ FBCC 2A F5 F5     .x2LTEclipxmax:         ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;           y_pos_end = min(y_pos_end, clip_ymax) + 1
1218+ FBCF 11 7F 00                             ld      de,127                          ;           .
1219+ FBD2 CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ;           .
1220+ FBD5 D2 E2 FB                             jp      nc,.yposgteymax                 ;           .
1221+ FBD8 2A F5 F5     .yposltymax:            ld      hl,(y_pos_end)                  ;           .
1222+ FBDB 23                                   inc     hl                              ;           .
1223+ FBDC 22 F5 F5                             ld      (y_pos_end),hl                  ;           .
1224+ FBDF C3 E7 FB                             jp      .DoneYposAdjust                 ;           .
1225+ FBE2 13           .yposgteymax:           inc     de                              ;           .
1226+ FBE3 ED 53 F5 F5                          ld      (y_pos_end),de                  ;           .
1227+ FBE7 3A FB F5     .DoneYposAdjust:        ld      a,(sign_x)                      ;           if (sign_x == -1)
1228+ FBEA 3C                                   inc     a
1229+ FBEB C2 06 FC                             jp      nz,.SignNotMinus1
1230+ FBEE 2A EF F5     .SignEquMinus1:         ld      hl,(x_pos)                      ;               x_pos = -x_pos;
1231+ FBF1                                      macronegate16hl
1231+ FBF1 AF          >					xor 	a
1231+ FBF2 95          >					sub 	l
1231+ FBF3 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1231+ FBF4 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1231+ FBF5 94          >					sub 	h
1231+ FBF6 67          >					ld 		h,a
1232+ FBF7 22 EF F5                             ld      (x_pos),hl
1233+ FBFA 2A F3 F5                             ld      hl,(x_pos_end)                  ;               x_pos_end = -x_pos_end;
1234+ FBFD                                      macronegate16hl
1234+ FBFD AF          >					xor 	a
1234+ FBFE 95          >					sub 	l
1234+ FBFF 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1234+ FC00 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1234+ FC01 94          >					sub 	h
1234+ FC02 67          >					ld 		h,a
1235+ FC03 22 F3 F5                             ld      (x_pos_end),hl
1236+ FC06 ED 5B 04 F6  .SignNotMinus1:         ld      de,(delta_x_step)               ;        delta_y_step -= delta_x_step;
1237+ FC0A 2A 06 F6                             ld      hl,(delta_y_step)               ;        .
1238+ FC0D                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;        .
1238+ FC0D B7          >                        or a
1239+ FC0E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ;        .
1240+ FC10 22 06 F6                             ld      (delta_y_step),hl               ;        .
1241+ FC13 2A F1 F5     .PlottingLoop:          ld      hl,(y_pos)                      ;        while (y_pos != y_pos_end)
1242+ FC16 ED 5B F5 F5                          ld      de,(y_pos_end)
1243+ FC1A CD A6 9A                             call    CompareHLDESame
1244+ FC1D C8                                   ret     z
1245+ FC1E 2A EF F5     .PlotPixel:             ld      hl,(x_pos)
1246+ FC21 4D                                   ld      c,l
1247+ FC22 2A F1 F5                             ld      hl,(y_pos)
1248+ FC25 45                                   ld      b,l
1249+ FC26 3E BF                                ld      a,$BF
1250+ FC28 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel                   ;               drawpixel at xpos, ypos, Colour
1251+ FC2B 2A 10 F6                             ld      hl,(error)                      ;               if (error >= 0)
1252+ FC2E CB 7C                                bit     7,h
1253+ FC30 C2 50 FC                             jp      nz,.errorLT0
1254+ FC33 2A EF F5     .errorGTE0:             ld	    hl,(x_pos)                      ;                   ++x_pos
1255+ FC36 ED 5B FB F5                          ld      de,(sign_x)
1256+ FC3A                                      ClearCarryFlag
1256+ FC3A B7          >                        or a
1257+ FC3B ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
1258+ FC3D 22 EF F5                             ld	    (x_pos),hl
1259+ FC40 2A 10 F6                             ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error -= delta_y_step;
1260+ FC43 ED 5B 06 F6                          ld	    de,(delta_y_step)
1261+ FC47                                      ClearCarryFlag
1261+ FC47 B7          >                        or a
1262+ FC48 ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de
1263+ FC4A 22 10 F6                             ld	    (error),hl
1264+ FC4D C3 5D FC                             jp      .DoneErrorAdjust
1265+ FC50 2A 10 F6     .errorLT0:              ld	    hl,(error)                      ;                   error += delta_x_step;
1266+ FC53 ED 5B 04 F6                          ld	    de,(delta_x_step)
1267+ FC57                                      ClearCarryFlag
1267+ FC57 B7          >                        or a
1268+ FC58 ED 5A                                adc	    hl,de
1269+ FC5A 22 10 F6                             ld	    (error),hl
1270+ FC5D 2A F1 F5     .DoneErrorAdjust:       ld      hl,(y_pos)
1271+ FC60 23                                   inc     hl
1272+ FC61 22 F1 F5                             ld      (y_pos),hl
1273+ FC64 C3 13 FC                             jp      .PlottingLoop
1274+ FC67                      ENDIF
1275+ FC67
1276+ FC67
1277+ FC67 21 D4 F5     l2_draw_6502_line:      ld      hl,x1                           ; copy from currnet position to 6502 variables
1278+ FC6A 11 A0 EF                             ld      de,XX1510
1279+ FC6D 01 08 00                             ld      bc,4*2
1280+ FC70 ED B0                                ldir
1281+ FC72 CD 90 F1                             call    LL145_6502                      ; perform 6502 version
1282+ FC75 D8                                   ret     c                               ; returns if carry is set as its a no draw
1283+ FC76 21 00 00     .CopyBackResults:       ld      hl,0                            ; Clear out high bytes
1284+ FC79 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl
1285+ FC7C 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl
1286+ FC7F 22 D8 F5                             ld      (x2),hl
1287+ FC82 22 DA F5                             ld      (y2),hl
1288+ FC85 3A A0 EF                             ld      a,(XX1510)                      ; write low bytes with actual values to plot from XX1510
1289+ FC88 32 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),a
1290+ FC8B 4F                                   ld      c,a
1291+ FC8C 3A A1 EF                             ld      a,(XX1510+1)
1292+ FC8F 32 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),a
1293+ FC92 47                                   ld      b,a
1294+ FC93 3A A2 EF                             ld      a,(XX1510+2)
1295+ FC96 32 D8 F5                             ld      (x2),a
1296+ FC99 5F                                   ld      e,a
1297+ FC9A 3A A3 EF                             ld      a,(XX1510+3)
1298+ FC9D 32 DA F5                             ld      (y2),a
1299+ FCA0 57                                   ld      d,a
1300+ FCA1 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
1301+ FCA3                                      ClearCarryFlag
1301+ FCA3 B7          >                        or a
1302+ FCA4 C9                                   ret
1303+ FCA5                                 ;     call    l2_draw_clipped_line
1304+ FCA5              ;                        call    l2_draw_diagonal                ; ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color) Thsi version performs a pre sort based on y axis"
1305+ FCA5              ;................................................................
1306+ FCA5 00 00        result                  dw      0
1307+ FCA7              ;    swap = 0;
1308+ FCA7              ;    if (y1 > y2)
1309+ FCA7              ;    draws line from x1,y1 to x2,y2 memory locations in colour held in a
1310+ FCA7 2A D6 F5     l2_draw_elite_line:     ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 > y2)
1311+ FCAA ED 5B DA F5                          ld      de,(y2)                         ; .
1312+ FCAE CD 8F 9A                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
1313+ FCB1 DA B7 FC                             jp      c,.NoSwapCoords                 ;
1314+ FCB4              ;        swapp1p2();
1315+ FCB4 CD 15 F6     .SwapCoords:            call    SwapCoords                      ;       swap them so y1 <= y2
1316+ FCB7 2A D4 F5     .NoSwapCoords:          ld      hl,(x1)                         ; hl = x1
1317+ FCBA ED 5B D8 F5                          ld      de,(x2)                         ; de = x2
1318+ FCBE ED 4B D6 F5                          ld      bc,(y1)                         ; bc = y1
1319+ FCC2 DD 2A DA F5                          ld      ix,(y2)                         ; ix = y2
1320+ FCC6              .CheckForVertical:
1321+ FCC6              .CheckForHorizontal:
1322+ FCC6 FD 26 80                             ld      iyh,128                         ; iyh = xx13 = 128
1323+ FCC9              ;    xx13 = 128;
1324+ FCC9              ;    if (x2 >= 0 && x2 <= 255 && y2 >= 0 && y2 <= 127)
1325+ FCC9 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ; if (x2 >= 0 && x2 <= 255 && y2 >= 0 && y2 <= 127)
1326+ FCCA DD B4                                or      ixh                             ; .  [if x2 and y2 > 255 goto point2clip]
1327+ FCCC 20 09                                jr      nz,.Point2Clip                  ; .  .
1328+ FCCE DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl                           ; .  [if y2 low > 127 goto point2clip]
1329+ FCD0 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ; .  .
1330+ FCD2 20 03                                jr      nz,.Point2Clip                  ; .  .
1331+ FCD4              ;        xx13 = 0;
1332+ FCD4 FD 26 00     .Point2NoClip:          ld      iyh,0                           ;       iyh = xx13 = 0
1333+ FCD7              ;    if (x1 >= 0 && x1 <= 255 && y1 >= 0 && y1 <= 127)
1334+ FCD7 7C           .Point2Clip:            ld      a,h                             ; if (x1 >= 0 && x1 <= 255 && y1 >= 0 && y1 <= 127)
1335+ FCD8 B0                                   or      b                               ; . [ if x1 or y1 > 255 goto clip needed]
1336+ FCD9 C2 EA FC                             jp      nz,.ClipNeeded                  ; .
1337+ FCDC CB 79                                bit     7,c                             ; . [ if y1 low > 127 goto clip needed]
1338+ FCDE C2 EA FC                             jp      nz,.ClipNeeded                  ; .
1339+ FCE1              ;        if (xx13 != 0)
1340+ FCE1 FD 7C        .ClipPoint1:            ld      a,iyh                           ;       if (xx13 = 0)
1341+ FCE3 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1342+ FCE4 CA E1 FD                             jp      z,.ClipComplete                 ;               clipping not needed so treat as done an ddraw the line
1343+ FCE7 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64                          ;       else xx13 = 64 (xx13 /2 but if xx13 is 0 it never hits here so can just set to 64)
1344+ FCEA              ;.......................LL138
1345+ FCEA FD 7C        .ClipNeeded:            ld      a,iyh                           ; if (xx13 == 128)
1346+ FCEC CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ; . [ jump if bit 7 is not set so <> 128]
1347+ FCEE CA 27 FD                             jp      z,.xx13Not128                   ; .
1348+ FCF1 7C           .xx13Is128:             ld      a,h                             ;       if (x1 < 0 && x2 < 0)
1349+ FCF2 A2                                   and     d                               ;       . [ x1 and x2 high bits 7 are both set then its off to the left]
1350+ FCF3 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1351+ FCF4 78                                   ld      a,b                             ;       if (y1 < 0 && y2 < 0)
1352+ FCF5 DD A4                                and     ixh                             ;       . [ y1 and y2 high bits 7 are both set then its off the top]
1353+ FCF7 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1354+ FCF8 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;       if (x1 > 255  && x2 > 255)
1355+ FCF9 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       . [test if x1 is negative and if so skip]
1356+ FCFB C2 0A FD                             jp      nz,.x1x2LessThan256             ;       .
1357+ FCFE A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if x1 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1358+ FCFF CA 0A FD                             jp      z,.x1x2LessThan256              ;       .
1359+ FD02 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ;       . [test if x2 is negative]
1360+ FD03 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       .
1361+ FD05 C2 0A FD                             jp      nz,.x1x2LessThan256             ;       . < can simplify with with an xor test to detect if opposite signs first >
1362+ FD08 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if x2 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1363+ FD09 C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               return
1364+ FD0A 78           .x1x2LessThan256:       ld      a,b                             ;       if (y1 > 127  && y2 > 127)
1365+ FD0B CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       . [test if y1 is negative]
1366+ FD0D C2 27 FD                             jp      nz,.y1y2LessThan128             ;       .
1367+ FD10 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y1 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1368+ FD11 CA 27 FD                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1369+ FD14 CB 79                                bit     7,c                             ;       . [ if y1 low bit 7 is set then its > 127]
1370+ FD16 CA 27 FD                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1371+ FD19 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh                           ;       . [test if y2 is negative]
1372+ FD1B A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1373+ FD1C FA 27 FD                             jp      m,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1374+ FD1F A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y2 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1375+ FD20 CA 27 FD                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1376+ FD23 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl                           ;       .
1377+ FD25 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y2 low bit 7 is set then its > 127]
1378+ FD26 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1379+ FD27              ;.......................LL115
1380+ FD27              .xx13Not128:                        // check right point
1381+ FD27 EB           .y1y2LessThan128:       ex      de,hl                           ; delta_x = x2 - x1;
1382+ FD28                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1382+ FD28 B7          >                        or a
1383+ FD29 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1384+ FD2B 22 FE F5                             ld      (delta_x),hl                    ; redundant as its in DE TODO OPTIMISE
1385+ FD2E EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ; de = delta_x for next bit
1386+ FD2F DD E5 E1     .DyEquY2MinusY1:        ld      hl,ix                           ; delta_y = y2 - y1;
1387+ FD32                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1387+ FD32 B7          >                        or a
1388+ FD33 ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc                           ; .
1389+ FD35 22 00 F6                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; . [ so now de = dx and hl = dy]
1390+ FD38 FD 2E 80                             ld      iyl,128                         ; assuming sign is iyl is positive dx dy
1391+ FD3B CB 7A        .SignDeltaXY:           bit     7,d                             ; if delta x is negative (delta y will always be positive)
1392+ FD3D CA 49 FD                             jp      z,.DeltaXPositive               ; .
1393+ FD40 FD 2E 00     .DeltaXNegative:        ld      iyl,0                           ;       so we set sign to 0
1394+ FD43                                      macronegate16de                         ;       and set delta x to |delta x|
1394+ FD43 AF          >					xor 	a
1394+ FD44 93          >                    sub 	e
1394+ FD45 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1394+ FD46 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1394+ FD47 92          >                    sub 	d
1394+ FD48 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1395+ FD49 ED 53 FE F5  .DeltaXPositive:        ld      (delta_x),de                    ;       .
1396+ FD4D              ;.......................Scale down DY and DY to 7 bit
1397+ FD4D 7C           .ScaleDXDY:             ld      a,h                             ; scale down so that dx and dx are < 256
1398+ FD4E B2                                   or      d                               ; .
1399+ FD4F CA 5D FD                             jp      z,.ScaleDXDYHighDone            ; .
1400+ FD52                                      ShiftDERight1                           ; .
1400+ FD52 CB 3A       >			   srl d
1400+ FD54 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
1401+ FD56                                      ShiftHLRight1                           ; .
1401+ FD56 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1401+ FD58 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1402+ FD5A C3 4D FD                             jp      .ScaleDXDY                      ; .
1403+ FD5D 7B           .ScaleDXDYHighDone:     ld      a,e                             ; because of signed maths we will scale down to 7 bits to be safe
1404+ FD5E B5                                   or      l                               ; .
1405+ FD5F F2 6A FD                             jp      p,.LowScaleDone                 ; .
1406+ FD62                                      ShiftDERight1                           ; .
1406+ FD62 CB 3A       >			   srl d
1406+ FD64 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
1407+ FD66                                      ShiftHLRight1                           ; .
1407+ FD66 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1407+ FD68 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1408+ FD6A              ;.......................Work out slope and gradient - later on we will work with deltax beign abs
1409+ FD6A ED 53 FE F5  .LowScaleDone:          ld      (delta_x),de                    ; save adjusted dx and dy back
1410+ FD6E 22 00 F6                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; .
1411+ FD71 55                                   ld      d,l                             ; now d = dy e = dx
1412+ FD72 ED 53 02 F6                          ld      (delta_y_x),de                  ; save for diagnostics
1413+ FD76              .SetUpTSlope:           ZeroA                                   ; Initialise tSlope to 0
1413+ FD76 AF          >                        xor a
1414+ FD77 32 0C F6                             ld      (tSlope),a                      ; .
1415+ FD7A 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; a = dx
1416+ FD7B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .deltaxGTEdeltaY     ; if dx < dy
1416+ FD7B BA          >                        cp     d
1416+ FD7C D2 8F FD    >                        jp		nc,.deltaxGTEdeltaY
1417+ FD7F 43           .deltaXLTdeltaY:        ld      b,e                             ;       bc = dx $00
1418+ FD80 0E 00                                ld      c,0                             ;       .
1419+ FD82 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = $00 dy
1420+ FD83 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1421+ FD85 CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;       bc = bc / de  (dx * 256 / dy)
1422+ FD88 ED 43 0A F6                          ld      (gradient),bc                   ;       in reality this is 8 bit little endian
1423+ FD8C C3 A0 FD                             jp      .donedxdycheck                  ;       .
1424+ FD8F                                                                              ; else
1425+ FD8F 42           .deltaxGTEdeltaY:       ld      b,d                             ;       bc = dy << 0
1426+ FD90 0E 00                                ld      c,0                             ;       .
1427+ FD92 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       de = 0dx
1428+ FD94 CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;       bc = bc / de (dy * 256 / dx)
1429+ FD97 ED 43 0A F6                          ld      (gradient),bc                   ;       in reality this is 8 bit little endian
1430+ FD9B 3E FF                                ld      a,255                           ;       set tslope to -1
1431+ FD9D 32 0C F6                             ld      (tSlope),a                      ;       .
1432+ FDA0              .donedxdycheck:                 // CHECK CORRECT POINT
1433+ FDA0              ;.......................Clipping point 1
1434+ FDA0                                      ;break
1435+ FDA0 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                           ; if xx13 = 0 or xx13 = 128 (values can be 0, 128, 64 later we can optimise to see if its <> 64)
1436+ FDA2 A7                                   and     a                               ; . [xx13 = 0  enter the block]
1437+ FDA3 CA A9 FD                             jp      z,.xx13is0or128                 ; .
1438+ FDA6 F2 CA FD                             jp      p,.xx13not0or128                ; . [xx13 <> 128 then skip block]
1439+ FDA9 CD E7 FD     .xx13is0or128:          call    ClipLL118Elite                  ;       clip point 1
1440+ FDAC FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                           ;       if xx13 <> 0
1441+ FDAE A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1442+ FDAF CA C6 FD                             jp      z,.ImmediateDraw                ;       .
1443+ FDB2 3A D5 F5                             ld      a,(x1+1)                        ;               if (if (x1 <0 || x1 > 255 || y1 <0 || y1 > 127)) return
1444+ FDB5 A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1445+ FDB6 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [x1 high is negative then return]
1446+ FDB7 C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               . [if x1 high is not zero, x1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1447+ FDB8 3A D7 F5                             ld      a,(y1+1)                        ;               . [a = x1 high]
1448+ FDBB A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1449+ FDBC F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [if y1 negative return]
1450+ FDBD C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               . [if y1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1451+ FDBE 3A D6 F5                             ld      a,(y1)                          ;               . [a = y1 low]
1452+ FDC1 A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1453+ FDC2 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [if y1 > 127 then low byte would appear as negative in bit 7]
1454+ FDC3 C3 CA FD                             jp      .SkipCheckP1OnScreen            ;               else goto SkipCheckP1OnScreen
1455+ FDC6              .ImmediateDraw:         IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
1456+ FDC6 CD E2 F6                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line            ;        else if we get here we only needed to clip one point so draw the line
1457+ FDC9                                      ENDIF
1458+ FDC9 C9                                   ret                                     ;             and we are done
1459+ FDCA              .xx13not0or128:
1460+ FDCA CD 15 F6     .SkipCheckP1OnScreen:   call    SwapCoords                      ; swap point 1 and point 2 so we can now process P2
1461+ FDCD CD E7 FD                             call    ClipLL118Elite                  ; clip P2
1462+ FDD0 3A D5 F5                             ld      a,(x1+1)                        ; if (x1 <0 || x1 > 255 || y1 <0 || y1 > 127) return
1463+ FDD3 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1464+ FDD4 F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if x1 negative return]
1465+ FDD5 C0                                   ret     nz                              ; . [if x1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1466+ FDD6 3A D7 F5                             ld      a,(y1+1)                        ; . [a = y1 high]
1467+ FDD9 A7                                   and     a                               ;
1468+ FDDA F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if y1 negative return]
1469+ FDDB C0                                   ret     nz                              ; . [if y1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1470+ FDDC 3A D6 F5                             ld      a,(y1)                          ; . [a = y1 low]
1471+ FDDF A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1472+ FDE0 F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if y1 low > 127 then low byte would appear as negative in bit 7]
1473+ FDE1              .ClipComplete:
1474+ FDE1              .xx13is0or128Draw:      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
1475+ FDE1 CD E2 F6                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line            ; if we get here we only needed to clip one point/have done all slipping needed
1476+ FDE4                                      ENDIF
1477+ FDE4 C9                                   ret
1478+ FDE5              ;................................................................
1479+ FDE5 00 00        ClipSign                dw      0
1480+ FDE7              ClipLL118Elite:        ;break
1481+ FDE7 2A D4 F5     .checkX1IsNegative      ld      hl,(x1)                         ; if x1 is negative
1482+ FDEA CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ; .
1483+ FDEC CA 0B FE                             jp      z,.x1GTE0                       ; .
1484+ FDEF 3E FF        .x1LT0:                 ld      a,255                           ;       clip sign = -1
1485+ FDF1 32 E5 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;       .
1486+ FDF4 CD 73 FE                             call    CalcLL120                       ;       calc ll120
1487+ FDF7 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;       x1 = 0
1488+ FDFA 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       .
1489+ FDFD 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       y1 = y1 + result
1490+ FE00 ED 5B A5 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;       . [and save in hl for optimisation processing y1]
1491+ FE04 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;       .
1492+ FE05 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       .
1493+ FE08 C3 28 FE                             jp      .checkY1IsNegative              ;       .
1494+ FE0B 7C           .x1GTE0:                ld      a,h                             ; else
1495+ FE0C A7                                   and     a                               ;       if x1 > 255
1496+ FE0D CA 28 FE                             jp      z,.checkY1IsNegative            ;       .
1497+ FE10                                      ZeroA                                   ;               sign must be 0 for postive adjustment
1497+ FE10 AF          >                        xor a
1498+ FE11 32 E5 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;               .
1499+ FE14 CD 73 FE                             call    CalcLL120                       ;               Calc LL120
1500+ FE17 21 FF 00                             ld      hl,255                          ;               x1 = 255
1501+ FE1A 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;               .
1502+ FE1D 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;               y1 = y1 + result
1503+ FE20 ED 5B A5 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;               . [and save in hl for optimisation processing y1]
1504+ FE24 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;               .
1505+ FE25 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;               .
1506+ FE28                                                                              ; end if
1507+ FE28 2A D6 F5     .checkY1IsNegative:     ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 <0) [if we don;t need to clip x1 then we need to load hl with y1 as it never got loaded]
1508+ FE2B CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ; .
1509+ FE2D CA 49 FE                             jp      z,.checkY1LT128                 ; .
1510+ FE30 3E FF                                ld      a,255                           ;       set sign to -1 for calc
1511+ FE32 32 E5 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;       .
1512+ FE35 CD C0 FE                             call    CalcLL123                       ;       calc LL123
1513+ FE38 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       x1 = x1 + result
1514+ FE3B ED 5B A5 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;       .
1515+ FE3F 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;       .
1516+ FE40 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       .
1517+ FE43 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;       y1 = 0
1518+ FE46 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       .
1519+ FE49 7C           .checkY1LT128:          ld      a,h                             ; finished if y < 128
1520+ FE4A A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1521+ FE4B C2 51 FE                             jp      nz,.mopUpY1                     ; . [jump to mop up if y1 high <> 0, wehave already dealt with negatvies so don't need to consider that]
1522+ FE4E 7D                                   ld      a,l                             ; . [now check y1 low and return if y1 low > 127]
1523+ FE4F A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1524+ FE50 F0                                   ret     p                               ; . [ if y1 low was positive then we are done as it means y1 < 128]
1525+ FE51 11 80 00     .mopUpY1:               ld      de,128                          ; y1 = y1 - 128
1526+ FE54                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1526+ FE54 B7          >                        or a
1527+ FE55 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1528+ FE57 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ; .
1529+ FE5A                                      ZeroA                                   ; set clip sign to 0
1529+ FE5A AF          >                        xor a
1530+ FE5B 32 E5 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ; to get to here if y1 < 0, y is set to 0, if its < 128 then it never reaches here, so y1 must be > 128 to get here
1531+ FE5E CD C0 FE                             call    CalcLL123                       ; calc LL123
1532+ FE61 2A D4 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x1 = x1 + result
1533+ FE64 ED 5B A5 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ; .
1534+ FE68 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; .
1535+ FE69 22 D4 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ; .
1536+ FE6C 21 7F 00                             ld      hl,127                          ; y1 = 127
1537+ FE6F 22 D6 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ; .
1538+ FE72 C9                                   ret
1539+ FE73
1540+ FE73 2A D4 F5     CalcLL120:              ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x1= |x1|
1541+ FE76                                      macroAbsHL                              ; .
1541+ FE76 CB 7C       >                    bit     7,h
1541+ FE78 CA 81 FE    >                    jp      z,.alreadyABS
1541+ FE7B AF          >					xor 	a
1541+ FE7C 95          >					sub 	l
1541+ FE7D 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1541+ FE7E 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1541+ FE7F 94          >					sub 	h
1541+ FE80 67          >					ld 		h,a
1541+ FE81             >.alreadyABS:
1542+ FE81 3A 0C F6                             ld      a,(tSlope)                      ; if (tslope == 0)
1543+ FE84 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1544+ FE85 C2 A4 FE                             jp      nz,.tSlopeNonZero               ; .
1545+ FE88 55           .tSlopeZero:            ld      d,l                             ;       d = x1 & 255
1546+ FE89 3A 0A F6                             ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       e = gradient
1547+ FE8C 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ;
1548+ FE8D ED 30                                mul     de                              ;       de = x1 & 255 * gradient
1549+ FE8F 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = x1 * gradient /256
1550+ FE90 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1551+ FE92 3A E5 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1552+ FE95 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1553+ FE96 CA 9F FE                             jp      z,.tSlopeZeroDone               ;       .
1554+ FE99              .tSlopeZeroNegate:      macronegate16de                         ;               result = - result
1554+ FE99 AF          >					xor 	a
1554+ FE9A 93          >                    sub 	e
1554+ FE9B 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1554+ FE9C 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1554+ FE9D 92          >                    sub 	d
1554+ FE9E 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1555+ FE9F ED 53 A5 FC  .tSlopeZeroDone:        ld      (result),de                     ;
1556+ FEA3 C9                                   ret                                     ;
1557+ FEA4              .tSlopeNonZero:         ;ld      a,(gradient)                    ; else  c = gradient
1558+ FEA4                                      ;ld      c,a                             ;       .
1559+ FEA4                                      ;ld      a,l                             ;       a = x1 & 255
1560+ FEA4                                      ;call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC             ;       bc = a * 256/c
1561+ FEA4
1562+ FEA4 ED 5B 0A F6                          ld      de,(gradient)                   ; BC = BC / DE
1563+ FEA8 45                                   ld      b,l
1564+ FEA9 0E 00                                ld      c,0
1565+ FEAB                                      ;; CORRECTED TO LADO INTO B ld      bc,hl                           ; HL = BC % DE
1566+ FEAB CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ
1567+ FEAE
1568+ FEAE 3A E5 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1569+ FEB1 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1570+ FEB2 CA BB FE                             jp      z,.tSlopeNonZeroDone            ;       .
1571+ FEB5              .tSlopeNonZeroNegate:   macronegate16bc                         ;               result = - result
1571+ FEB5 AF          >					xor 	a
1571+ FEB6 91          >                    sub 	c
1571+ FEB7 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
1571+ FEB8 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1571+ FEB9 90          >                    sub 	b
1571+ FEBA 47          >                    ld 		b,a
1572+ FEBB ED 43 A5 FC  .tSlopeNonZeroDone:     ld      (result),bc
1573+ FEBF C9                                   ret
1574+ FEC0              ;.......................LL123
1575+ FEC0              CalcLL123:              ;break
1576+ FEC0 2A D6 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ; hl = |y1|
1577+ FEC3                                      macroAbsHL                              ; .
1577+ FEC3 CB 7C       >                    bit     7,h
1577+ FEC5 CA CE FE    >                    jp      z,.alreadyABS
1577+ FEC8 AF          >					xor 	a
1577+ FEC9 95          >					sub 	l
1577+ FECA 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1577+ FECB 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1577+ FECC 94          >					sub 	h
1577+ FECD 67          >					ld 		h,a
1577+ FECE             >.alreadyABS:
1578+ FECE 3A 0C F6                             ld      a,(tSlope)                      ; if tSlope = 0
1579+ FED1 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1580+ FED2 C2 F0 FE                             jp      nz,.tSlopeNonZero               ; .
1581+ FED5              .tSlopeZero:           ; ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       c = gradient
1582+ FED5              ;                        ld      c,a                             ;       .
1583+ FED5              ;                        ld      a,l                             ;       hl = y1 (which is now abs and < 256)
1584+ FED5              ;                        call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC             ;       bc = A * 256 / c
1585+ FED5 ED 5B 0A F6                          ld      de,(gradient)                   ; BC = BC / DE
1586+ FED9 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ; HL = BC % DE
1587+ FEDB CD 5A 98                             call    Floor_DivQ
1588+ FEDE 3A E5 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1589+ FEE1 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1590+ FEE2 CA EB FE                             jp      z, .tSlopeZeroDone              ;       .
1591+ FEE5              .tSlopeZeroNegate:      macronegate16bc                         ;               result = -result
1591+ FEE5 AF          >					xor 	a
1591+ FEE6 91          >                    sub 	c
1591+ FEE7 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
1591+ FEE8 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1591+ FEE9 90          >                    sub 	b
1591+ FEEA 47          >                    ld 		b,a
1592+ FEEB ED 43 A5 FC  .tSlopeZeroDone:        ld      (result),bc                     ;       . save result in either case
1593+ FEEF C9                                   ret                                     ;       .
1594+ FEF0 55           .tSlopeNonZero:         ld      d,l                             ; else  d = |y1| low
1595+ FEF1 3A 0A F6                             ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       e = gradient
1596+ FEF4 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ;       .
1597+ FEF5 ED 30                                mul     de                              ;       de = l * gradient
1598+ FEF7 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = l * gradient /256
1599+ FEF8 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1600+ FEFA 3A E5 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1601+ FEFD A7                                   and     a                               ;
1602+ FEFE CA 07 FF                             jp      z,.tSlopeNonZeroDone            ;
1603+ FF01              .tSlopeNonZeroNegate:   macronegate16de                         ;               result = -result
1603+ FF01 AF          >					xor 	a
1603+ FF02 93          >                    sub 	e
1603+ FF03 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1603+ FF04 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1603+ FF05 92          >                    sub 	d
1603+ FF06 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1604+ FF07 ED 53 A5 FC  .tSlopeNonZeroDone:     ld      (result),de                     ;       . save result in either case
1605+ FF0B C9                                   ret                                     ;       .
1606+ FF0C
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_any_line.asm
 805  FF0C              ;    INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm"
 806  FF0C                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm
   1+ FF0C              ; ******************************************************************************
   2+ FF0C              ;
   3+ FF0C              ;	Draw a pixel line from (x0,y0) defined in (COORDS) - the current plot
   4+ FF0C              ;	coordinate, to the relative distance points (x0+x,y0+y).
   5+ FF0C              ;
   6+ FF0C              ;	Design & programming by Gunther Strube,	Copyright (C) InterLogic 1995
   7+ FF0C              ;
   8+ FF0C              ;	The (COORDS+0)	pointer contains the current y coordinate, (COORDS+1) the
   9+ FF0C              ;	current x coordinate. The main program should reset the (COORDS) variables
  10+ FF0C              ;	before using line drawing.
  11+ FF0C              ;
  12+ FF0C              ;	The routine checks the range of specified coordinates which is the
  13+ FF0C              ;	boundaries of the graphics area (256x64	pixels).
  14+ FF0C              ;	If a boundary error occurs the routine exits automatically.	This may be
  15+ FF0C              ;	useful if you are trying to draw a line longer than allowed. Only the
  16+ FF0C              ;	visible part will be drawn.
  17+ FF0C              ;
  18+ FF0C              ;	The hardware graphics memory is organized as (0,0) in the top left corner.
  19+ FF0C              ;
  20+ FF0C              ;	The plot routine is	defined by an address pointer	in IX.
  21+ FF0C              ;
  22+ FF0C              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
  23+ FF0C              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
  24+ FF0C              ;		IX =	pointer to plot routine that uses HL = (x,y)	of plot coordinate.
  25+ FF0C              ;
  26+ FF0C              ;	OUT:	None.
  27+ FF0C              ;
  28+ FF0C              ;	Registers	used	by routine:
  29+ FF0C              ;		   N	:	B, loop counter
  30+ FF0C              ;		   i	:	line	balance variable
  31+ FF0C              ;		   x	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  32+ FF0C              ;		   y	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  33+ FF0C              ;	  (x0,y0)	:	(h,l)
  34+ FF0C              ;	  direc_x	:	d, horisontal step increment
  35+ FF0C              ;	  direc_y	:	e, vertical step increment
  36+ FF0C              ;		 ddx	:	b, horisontal step increment
  37+ FF0C              ;		 ddy	:	c, vertical step increment
  38+ FF0C              ;
  39+ FF0C              ;		DE, A work registers.
  40+ FF0C              ;
  41+ FF0C              ; The algorithm in pseudo-code:
  42+ FF0C              ;
  43+ FF0C              ;	direc_x =	SGN x: direc_y	= SGN y
  44+ FF0C              ;	x = ABS x: y =	ABS y
  45+ FF0C              ;
  46+ FF0C              ;	if x	>= y
  47+ FF0C              ;		if x+y=0 then return
  48+ FF0C              ;		H = x
  49+ FF0C              ;		L = y
  50+ FF0C              ;		ddx = direc_x
  51+ FF0C              ;		ddy = 0
  52+ FF0C              ;	else
  53+ FF0C              ;		H = y
  54+ FF0C              ;		L = x
  55+ FF0C              ;		ddx = 0
  56+ FF0C              ;		ddy = direc_y
  57+ FF0C              ;	endif
  58+ FF0C              ;
  59+ FF0C              ;	B = H
  60+ FF0C              ;	i = INT(B/2)
  61+ FF0C              ;	FOR N=B TO 1 STEP -1
  62+ FF0C              ;		i = i + L
  63+ FF0C              ;		if i	< H
  64+ FF0C              ;			ix =	ddx
  65+ FF0C              ;			iy =	ddy
  66+ FF0C              ;		else
  67+ FF0C              ;			i = i - H
  68+ FF0C              ;			ix =	direc_x
  69+ FF0C              ;			iy =	direc_y
  70+ FF0C              ;		endif
  71+ FF0C              ;		x0 =	x0 +	ix
  72+ FF0C              ;		y0 =	y0 +	iy
  73+ FF0C              ;		plot	(x0,y0)
  74+ FF0C              ;	NEXT	N
  75+ FF0C              ;
  76+ FF0C              ;
  77+ FF0C              ;	Registers	changed after return:
  78+ FF0C              ;		..BCDEHL/IXIY/af......	same
  79+ FF0C              ;		AF....../..../..bcdehl	different
  80+ FF0C              ;
  81+ FF0C 00 00        line_gfx_coords         dw  0
  82+ FF0E
  83+ FF0E              LineHLtoDE:
  84+ FF0E 7C           TestMaxY:               ld	a,h ; were h = y or l = y?
  85+ FF0F FE C0                                cp	192
  86+ FF11 30 26                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y0	coordinate out	of range
  87+ FF13 7A                                   ld	a,d
  88+ FF14 FE C0                                cp	192
  89+ FF16 30 21                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y1	coordinate out	of range
  90+ FF18 22 0C FF                             ld	(line_gfx_coords),hl		; the starting	point is now default
  91+ FF1B E5                                   push	hl
  92+ FF1C D5                                   push	de
  93+ FF1D 6C                                   ld	l,h				; L = x0
  94+ FF1E 62                                   ld	h,d				; H = x1
  95+ FF1F 7C           distanceX:		        ld	a,h
  96+ FF20 95                                   sub	l
  97+ FF21 6F                                   ld	l,a
  98+ FF22 26 00                                ld	h,0
  99+ FF24 30 02                                jr	nc, distanceXDone
 100+ FF26 26 FF                                ld	h,-1
 101+ FF28 D1           distanceXDone:          pop	de
 102+ FF29 E3                                   ex	(sp),hl			; L = y0
 103+ FF2A 63                                   ld	h,e				; H = y1
 104+ FF2B 7C           distanceY:		        ld	a,h
 105+ FF2C 95                                   sub	l
 106+ FF2D 6F                                   ld	l,a
 107+ FF2E 26 00                                ld	h,0
 108+ FF30 30 02                                jr	nc, distanceYDone
 109+ FF32 26 FF                                ld	h,-1
 110+ FF34 D1           distanceYDone:          pop	de
 111+ FF35 EB                                   ex	de,hl			; h.dist.	= HL, v.dist. = DE
 112+ FF36 CD 3A FF                             call	DrawLineRelative			; draw line...
 113+ FF39 C9           exit_line:              ret
 114+ FF3A
 115+ FF3A              ; ***************************************************************************
 116+ FF3A              ;
 117+ FF3A              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
 118+ FF3A              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
 119+ FF3A              ;
 120+ FF3A              ; OUT: h - l distance in	HL
 121+ FF3A              ;
 122+ FF3A
 123+ FF3A D5           DrawLineRelative:       push	de
 124+ FF3B E5                                   push	hl
 125+ FF3C D9                                   exx
 126+ FF3D E1                                   pop	hl					; get relative	horisontal movement
 127+ FF3E CD B5 FF                             call	sgn
 128+ FF41 57                                   ld	d,a					; direc_x	= SGN(x) installed d = +/-1 for horizontal update
 129+ FF42 CD C2 FF                             call	absValue
 130+ FF45 45                                   ld	b,l					; x = ABS(x)
 131+ FF46 E1           DrawLineGetVertRelative:pop	hl					; get relative	vertical movement
 132+ FF47 CD B5 FF                             call	sgn
 133+ FF4A 5F                                   ld	e,a					; direc_y	= SGN(y) installed  = +/-1 for vertical update
 134+ FF4B CD C2 FF                             call	absValue
 135+ FF4E 4D                                   ld	c,l					; y = ABS(y) so now bc = dxdy
 136+ FF4F              ; so by here BC = dx dy HL in increment/decrement x y
 137+ FF4F C5                                   push	bc
 138+ FF50 D9                                   exx
 139+ FF51 E1                                   pop	hl					; H = absolute	x dist., L = absolute y distance
 140+ FF52 7C                                   ld	a,h
 141+ FF53 BD                                   cp	l
 142+ FF54 38 0A                                jr	c, x_smaller_y		; if	x >=	y
 143+ FF56 B4           areXandYZero:           or	h					;	if x+y = 0
 144+ FF57 28 5B                                jr	z, exit_draw		;		return
 145+ FF59 D9           y_lessorequal_x:        exx						;	else
 146+ FF5A 42                                   ld	b,d					;		ddx = direc_x
 147+ FF5B 0E 00                                ld	c,0					;		ddy = 0
 148+ FF5D D9                                   exx
 149+ FF5E 18 08                                jr	init_drawloop		; else
 150+ FF60 7C           x_smaller_y:	        ld	a,h
 151+ FF61 65                                   ld	h,l					;	H = y
 152+ FF62 6F                                   ld	l,a					;	L = x
 153+ FF63 D9                                   exx
 154+ FF64 06 00                                ld	b,0					;	ddx = 0
 155+ FF66 4B                                   ld	c,e					;	ddy = direc_y
 156+ FF67 D9                                   exx
 157+ FF68 44           init_drawloop:	        ld	b,h
 158+ FF69 4C                                   ld	c,h					; B = H
 159+ FF6A CB 39                                srl	c					; i = INT(B/2)
 160+ FF6C              										; FOR N=B	TO 1	STEP	-1
 161+ FF6C 79           drawloop:		        ld	a,c
 162+ FF6D 85                                   add	a,l
 163+ FF6E 38 09                                jr	c, i_greater		;	i + L > 255  (i > H)
 164+ FF70 BC                                   cp	h
 165+ FF71 30 06                                jr	nc, i_greater		;	if i	< H
 166+ FF73 4F                                   ld	c,a					;		i = i + L
 167+ FF74 D9                                   exx
 168+ FF75 C5                                   push	bc				;		ix =	ddx:	iy =	ddy
 169+ FF76 D9                                   exx
 170+ FF77 18 05                                jr	check_plot			;	else
 171+ FF79 94           i_greater:		        sub	h					;		i = i - H
 172+ FF7A 4F                                   ld	c,a
 173+ FF7B D9                                   exx
 174+ FF7C D5                                   push	de				;		ix =	direc_x: iy = direc_y
 175+ FF7D D9                                   exx						;	endif
 176+ FF7E E3           check_plot:		        ex	(sp),hl				;	preserve H,L distances on stack
 177+ FF7F EB                                   ex	de,hl				;	D,E = ix,	iy
 178+ FF80 2A 0C FF                             ld	hl,(line_gfx_coords)
 179+ FF83 7D                                   ld	a,l
 180+ FF84 83                                   add	a,e					;
 181+ FF85 6F                                   ld	l,a					;	y0 =	y0 +	iy (y0 is	checked by plot)
 182+ FF86 7A                                   ld	a,d
 183+ FF87 3C                                   inc	a
 184+ FF88 84                                   add	a,h
 185+ FF89 38 04                                jr	c, check_range		;	check out	of range
 186+ FF8B 28 26                                jr	z, range_error		;	Fz=1	& Fc=0 denotes	x0 <	0
 187+ FF8D 18 02                                jr	plot_point
 188+ FF8F 20 22        check_range:            jr	nz, range_error	;	Fz=0	& Fc=1 denotes	x0 >	255
 189+ FF91
 190+ FF91 3D           plot_point:             dec	a
 191+ FF92 C5                                   push	bc
 192+ FF93 F5                                   push	af
 193+ FF94 47                                   ld	    b,a					;	x0 =	x0 +	ix
 194+ FF95 4D                                   ld		c,l
 195+ FF96 3A B5 E2                             ld		a,(line_gfx_colour)
 196+ FF99 ED 43 0C FF                          ld      (line_gfx_coords),bc
 197+ FF9D                                      l2_plot_macro; call	l2_plot_pixel:
 197+ FF9D 78          >                        ld      a,b
 197+ FF9E             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 197+ FF9E FE C0       >                        cp     192
 197+ FFA0 D2 AC FF    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 197+ FFA3 69          >                        ld      l,c
 197+ FFA4 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 197+ FFA7 67          >                        ld      h,a
 197+ FFA8 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 197+ FFAB 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 197+ FFAC             >.NoPlot:
 198+ FFAC F1                                   pop		af
 199+ FFAD C1                                   pop		bc
 200+ FFAE E1           plot_RET:		        pop	hl					;	restore H,L distances...
 201+ FFAF 10 BB                                djnz	drawloop		; NEXT N
 202+ FFB1 18 01                                jr	exit_draw
 203+ FFB3
 204+ FFB3 E1           range_error:	        pop	hl					; remove H,L distances...
 205+ FFB4 C9           exit_draw:		        ret
 206+ FFB5
 207+ FFB5
 208+ FFB5              ; ******************************************************************************
 209+ FFB5              ;
 210+ FFB5              ;	SGN (Signum value) of 16	bit signed integer.
 211+ FFB5              ;
 212+ FFB5              ;	IN:		HL =	integer
 213+ FFB5              ;	OUT:		A = result: 0,1,-1 (if zero, positive, negative)
 214+ FFB5              ;
 215+ FFB5              ;	Registers	changed after return:
 216+ FFB5              ;	..BCDEHL/IXIY	same
 217+ FFB5              ;	AF....../....	different
 218+ FFB5              ;
 219+ FFB5 7C           sgn:				    ld	a,h
 220+ FFB6 B5                                   or	l
 221+ FFB7 C8                                   ret	z				; integer	is zero, return 0...
 222+ FFB8 CB 7C                                bit	7,h
 223+ FFBA 20 03                                jr	nz, negative_int
 224+ FFBC 3E 01                                ld	a,1
 225+ FFBE C9                                   ret
 226+ FFBF 3E FF        negative_int:		    ld	a,-1
 227+ FFC1 C9                                   ret
 228+ FFC2
 229+ FFC2
 230+ FFC2              ; ******************************************************************************
 231+ FFC2              ;
 232+ FFC2              ;	ABS (Absolute value) of 16 bit signed integer.
 233+ FFC2              ;
 234+ FFC2              ;	IN:		HL =	integer
 235+ FFC2              ;	OUT:		HL =	converted	integer
 236+ FFC2              ;
 237+ FFC2              ;	Registers	changed after return:
 238+ FFC2              ;	A.BCDE../IXIY	same
 239+ FFC2              ;	.F....HL/....	different
 240+ FFC2              ;
 241+ FFC2 CB 7C        absValue:			    bit	7,h
 242+ FFC4 C8                                   ret	z				; integer	is positive...
 243+ FFC5 D5                                   push	de
 244+ FFC6 EB                                   ex	de,hl
 245+ FFC7 21 00 00                             ld	hl,0
 246+ FFCA BF                                   cp	a				; Fc	= 0,	may not be used...
 247+ FFCB ED 52                                sbc	hl,de			; convert	negative integer
 248+ FFCD D1                                   pop	de
 249+ FFCE C9                                   ret
 250+ FFCF
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm

 816  E0BA                  INCLUDE "./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm
   1+ E0BA              ; "l1 print char a = character, de = Ypixel Xchar of print"
   2+ E0BA D5 E5        l1_print_char:          push	de,,hl
   3+ E0BC ED 94                                pixelad								; hl = address of de
   4+ E0BE E5                                   push	hl							; save hl for loop
   5+ E0BF 26 00                                ld		h,0
   6+ E0C1 6F                                   ld		l,a
   7+ E0C2 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 2
   8+ E0C3 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 4
   9+ E0C4 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 8 to get byte address
  10+ E0C5 ED 34 00 3C                          add		hl,charactersetaddr			; hl = address of rom char
  11+ E0C9 EB                                   ex		de,hl						; save address into de
  12+ E0CA E1                                   pop		hl							; get back hl for loop
  13+ E0CB 06 08                                ld		b,8							; do 8 rows
  14+ E0CD 1A           .PrintCharLoop:         ld		a,(de)						; row byte
  15+ E0CE 13                                   inc		de							; next byte
  16+ E0CF 77                                   ld		(hl),a						; poke to screen
  17+ E0D0 ED 93                                pixeldn								; Down 1 row
  18+ E0D2 10 F9                                djnz	.PrintCharLoop				; loop for 8 bytes
  19+ E0D4 E1 D1                                pop		de,,hl					    ; restore hl
  20+ E0D6 C9                                   ret
  21+ E0D7
  22+ E0D7              ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
  23+ E0D7              ; now skips ascii code < 32 but moves on cursor by 1 char
  24+ E0D7              l1_print_at:
  25+ E0D7 7E           .PrintLoop:             ld		a,(hl)
  26+ E0D8 FE 00                                cp		0
  27+ E0DA C8                                   ret		z
  28+ E0DB                                      CallIfAGTENusng " ", l1_print_char
  28+ E0DB FE 20       >                        cp      " "
  28+ E0DD D4 BA E0    >                        call	nc,l1_print_char
  29+ E0E0 23                                   inc		hl							; move 1 message character right
  30+ E0E1 7B                                   ld		a,e
  31+ E0E2 C6 08                                add		a,8
  32+ E0E4 5F                                   ld		e,a							; move 1 screen character right
  33+ E0E5 18 F0                                jr		.PrintLoop
  34+ E0E7                                                      DISPLAY "TODO: looks liek rogue popde"
  35+ E0E7              .Clearstackandfinish:   ;pop		de                      ; TODO LOOOKS TO BE A ROGUE POPDE
  36+ E0E7 C9                                   ret
  37+ E0E8
  38+ E0E8              ;l1_print_at_wrap:
  39+ E0E8              ;; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
  40+ E0E8              ;	ld      iyh,e
  41+ E0E8              ;.PrintLoop:
  42+ E0E8              ;	ld		a,(hl)
  43+ E0E8              ;	cp		0
  44+ E0E8              ;	ret		z
  45+ E0E8              ;.CountWordCharLen
  46+ E0E8              ;; Need to change to word wrap, so it will loop through string as before
  47+ E0E8              ;; but read up until a null or space, take the character count * 8 for pixels
  48+ E0E8              ;; if that is > 238 then force a premature line wrap
  49+ E0E8              ;
  50+ E0E8              ;
  51+ E0E8              ;    push    iy
  52+ E0E8              ;    call	l1_print_char
  53+ E0E8              ;    pop     iy
  54+ E0E8              ;	inc		hl							; move 1 message character right
  55+ E0E8              ;	ld		a,e
  56+ E0E8              ;    cp      238
  57+ E0E8              ;    jr      nc,.NextLine
  58+ E0E8              ;	add		a,8
  59+ E0E8              ;	ld		e,a							; move 1 screen character right
  60+ E0E8              ;	jr		.PrintLoop
  61+ E0E8              ;.Clearstackandfinish:
  62+ E0E8              ;	pop		de
  63+ E0E8              ;	ret
  64+ E0E8              ;.NextLine:
  65+ E0E8              ;    ld      a,(hl)
  66+ E0E8              ;    cp      " "
  67+ E0E8              ;    ld      e,iyh
  68+ E0E8              ;    ld      a,d
  69+ E0E8              ;    add     a,8
  70+ E0E8              ;    ld      d,a
  71+ E0E8              ;    jr		.PrintLoop
  72+ E0E8
  73+ E0E8              ; Counts next word at hl, uses e and forces a wrap if it would over flow puts value in c
  74+ E0E8 E5           L1LenWordAtHL:          push    hl
  75+ E0E9 D5                                   push    de
  76+ E0EA 7E           .CountLoop:             ld      a,(hl)
  77+ E0EB FE 00                                cp      0
  78+ E0ED 28 0F                                jr      z,.CountDone
  79+ E0EF FE 20                                cp      32
  80+ E0F1 28 0B                                jr      z,.CountDone
  81+ E0F3 7B                                   ld      a,e
  82+ E0F4 C6 08                                add     a,8
  83+ E0F6 5F                                   ld      e,a
  84+ E0F7 FE EE                                cp      238
  85+ E0F9 30 07                                jr      nc,.TooLong
  86+ E0FB 23                                   inc     hl
  87+ E0FC 18 EC                                jr      .CountLoop
  88+ E0FE D1           .CountDone:             pop     de
  89+ E0FF E1                                   pop     hl
  90+ E100 AF                                   xor     a
  91+ E101 C9                                   ret
  92+ E102 D1           .TooLong                pop     de
  93+ E103 E1                                   pop     hl
  94+ E104 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  95+ E106 C9                                   ret
  96+ E107
  97+ E107 7E           L1PrintWordAtHL:        ld      a,(hl)
  98+ E108 FE 00                                cp      0
  99+ E10A C8                                   ret     z
 100+ E10B FE 20                                cp      32
 101+ E10D 28 0F                                jr      z,.ItsASpace
 102+ E10F FD E5                                push    iy
 103+ E111 CD BA E0                             call	l1_print_char
 104+ E114 FD E1                                pop     iy
 105+ E116 7B                                   ld      a,e
 106+ E117 C6 08                                add     a,8
 107+ E119 5F                                   ld      e,a
 108+ E11A 23                                   inc     hl
 109+ E11B C3 07 E1                             jp      L1PrintWordAtHL
 110+ E11E 23           .ItsASpace:             inc     hl      ;  Just a bodge for now
 111+ E11F 7B                                   ld      a,e
 112+ E120 C6 08                                add     a,8
 113+ E122 5F                                   ld      e,a
 114+ E123 C9                                   ret
 115+ E124
 116+ E124
 117+ E124              ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
 118+ E124              ; Now has full word level wrapping
 119+ E124 FD 63        l1_print_at_wrap:       ld      iyh,e
 120+ E126 7E           .PrintLoop:             ld		a,(hl)
 121+ E127 FE 00                                cp		0
 122+ E129 C8                                   ret		z
 123+ E12A CD E8 E0     .CountWordCharLen:      call    L1LenWordAtHL
 124+ E12D FE FF                                cp      $FF
 125+ E12F 28 06                                jr      z,.WrapNextLine
 126+ E131 CD 07 E1     .NotTooLong:            call    L1PrintWordAtHL
 127+ E134              ; Need to change to word wrap, so it will loop through string as before
 128+ E134              ; but read up until a null or space, take the character count * 8 for pixels
 129+ E134              ; if that is > 238 then force a premature line wrap
 130+ E134 18 F0                                jr		.PrintLoop
 131+ E136              .Clearstackandfinish:   ;op		de
 132+ E136 C9                                   ret
 133+ E137              .WrapNextLine:
 134+ E137 FD 5C        .NextLine:              ld      e,iyh
 135+ E139 7A                                   ld      a,d
 136+ E13A C6 08                                add     a,8
 137+ E13C 57                                   ld      d,a
 138+ E13D 18 E7                                jr		.PrintLoop
 139+ E13F
