 228+ C652 AF                                   xor     a
 229+ C653 CD 28 7E                             call    memfill_dma
 230+ C656 C9                                   ret
 231+ C657              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 232+ C657 21 20 C0     ResetUbnkPosition:      ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 233+ C65A 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 234+ C65C AF                                   xor     a
 235+ C65D 77           .zeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 236+ C65E 23                                   inc     hl
 237+ C65F 10 FC                                djnz    .zeroLoop
 238+ C661 C9                                   ret
 239+ C662              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 240+ C662 DD 01        FireECM:                break
 241+ C664 3E 80                                ld      a,ECMCounterMax                 ; set ECM time
 242+ C666 32 78 C0                             ld      (UBnKECMCountDown),a            ;
 243+ C669 3A C1 7E                             ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 244+ C66C                                      ReturnIfALTNusng ECMCounterMax
 244+ C66C FE 80       >                        cp    ECMCounterMax
 244+ C66E D8          >                        ret	 c
 245+ C66F 3E 80                                ld      a,ECMCounterMax
 246+ C671 32 C1 7E                             ld      (ECMCountDown),a
 247+ C674 C9                                   ret
 248+ C675              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 249+ C675 3A 77 C0     RechargeEnergy:         ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 250+ C678                                      ReturnIfAGTEMemusng EnergyAddr
 250+ C678 21 25 C4    >                        ld      hl,EnergyAddr
 250+ C67B BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 250+ C67C D0          >                        ret	    nc
 251+ C67D                              DISPLAY "TODO: Add recharge rate logic for ship types"
 252+ C67D 3C                                   inc     a
 253+ C67E 32 77 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 254+ C681 C9                                   ret
 255+ C682              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 256+ C682              ; A ship normally needs enough energy to fire ECM but if its shot then
 257+ C682              ; it may be too low, in which case the ECM does a saftey shutdown and returns 1 energy
 258+ C682              ; plus a 50% chance it will blow the ECM up
 259+ C682 3A 78 C0     UpdateECM:              ld      a,(UBnKECMCountDown)
 260+ C685                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 260+ C685 A7          >                        and     a
 260+ C686 C8          >                        ret     z
 261+ C687 3D                                   dec     a
 262+ C688 32 78 C0                             ld      (UBnKECMCountDown),a
 263+ C68B 21 77 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKEnergy
 264+ C68E 35                                   dec     (hl)
 265+ C68F F0                                   ret     p
 266+ C690 CD BD C7     .ExhaustedEnergy:       call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; if it ran out of energy it was as it was also shot or collided as it checks in advance. Main ECM loop will continue as a compromise as multiple ships can fire ECM simultaneously
 267+ C693 C9                                   ret
 268+ C694              ;-- This takes an Axis and subtracts 1, handles leading sign and boundary of 0 going negative
 269+ C694              JumpOffSet:             MACRO   Axis
 270+ C694 ~                                    ld      hl,(Axis)
 271+ C694 ~                                    ld      a,h
 272+ C694 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 273+ C694 ~                                    jr      nz,.NegativeAxis
 274+ C694 ~            .PositiveAxis:          dec     l
 275+ C694 ~                                    jp      m,.MovingNegative
 276+ C694 ~                                    jp      .Done
 277+ C694 ~            .NegativeAxis:          inc     l                               ; negative means increment the z
 278+ C694 ~                                    jp      .Done
 279+ C694 ~            .MovingNegative:        ld      hl,$8001                        ; -1
 280+ C694 ~            .Done                   ld      (Axis),hl
 281+ C694                                      ENDM
 282+ C694              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 283+ C694              WarpOffset:             JumpOffSet  UBnKzhi                     ; we will simplify on just moving Z
 283+ C694 2A 27 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)
 283+ C697 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 283+ C698 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 283+ C69A 20 07       >                        jr      nz,.NegativeAxis
 283+ C69C 2D          >.PositiveAxis:          dec     l
 283+ C69D FA A7 C6    >                        jp      m,.MovingNegative
 283+ C6A0 C3 AA C6    >                        jp      .Done
 283+ C6A3 2C          >.NegativeAxis:          inc     l                               ; negative means increment the z
 283+ C6A4 C3 AA C6    >                        jp      .Done
 283+ C6A7 21 01 80    >.MovingNegative:        ld      hl,$8001                        ; -1
 283+ C6AA 22 27 C0    >.Done                   ld      (UBnKzhi),hl
 284+ C6AD C9                                   ret
 285+ C6AE              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 286+ C6AE 44           WarpUnivByHL:           ld      b,h
 287+ C6AF 4D                                   ld      c,l
 288+ C6B0 26 00                                ld      h,0
 289+ C6B2 ED 5B 27 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKzhi)
 290+ C6B6 3A 26 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzlo)
 291+ C6B9 6F                                   ld      l,a
 292+ C6BA                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 292+ C6BA ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 292+ C6BE CD 10 01       call  SubBCHfromDELsigned
 293+ C6C1 ED 53 27 C0                          ld      (UBnKzhi),de
 294+ C6C5 7D                                   ld      a,l
 295+ C6C6 32 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),a
 296+ C6C9 C9                                   ret
 297+ C6CA              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 298+ C6CA              ; update ship speed and pitch based on adjustments from AI Tactics
 299+ C6CA 3A 66 C0     UpdateSpeedAndPitch:    ld      a,(UBnKAccel)                   ; only apply non zero accelleration
 300+ C6CD                                      JumpIfAIsZero .SkipAccelleration
 300+ C6CD A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 300+ C6CE CA EC C6    >                        jp	    z, .SkipAccelleration
 301+ C6D1 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; b = accelleration in 2's c
 302+ C6D2 3A 65 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSpeed)                   ; a = speed + accelleration
 303+ C6D5                                      ClearCarryFlag
 303+ C6D5 B7          >                        or a
 304+ C6D6 88                                   adc     a,b
 305+ C6D7                                      JumpIfPositive  .DoneAccelleration      ; if speed < 0
 305+ C6D7 F2 DB C6    >                        jp		p, .DoneAccelleration
 306+ C6DA              .SpeedNegative:         ZeroA                                   ;    then speed = 0
 306+ C6DA AF          >                        xor a
 307+ C6DB 47           .DoneAccelleration:     ld      b,a                             ; if speed > speed limit
 308+ C6DC 3A 26 C4                             ld      a,(SpeedAddr)                   ;    speed = limit
 309+ C6DF                                      JumpIfAGTENusng b, .SpeedInLimits       ; .
 309+ C6DF B8          >                        cp     b
 309+ C6E0 D2 E4 C6    >                        jp		nc,.SpeedInLimits
 310+ C6E3 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 311+ C6E4 78           .SpeedInLimits:         ld      a,b                             ; .
 312+ C6E5 32 65 C0                             ld      (UBnKSpeed),a                   ; .
 313+ C6E8                                      ZeroA                                   ; acclleration = 0
 313+ C6E8 AF          >                        xor a
 314+ C6E9 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                   ; for next AI update
 315+ C6EC              .SkipAccelleration:     ; handle roll and pitch rates
 316+ C6EC C9                                   ret
 317+ C6ED              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 318+ C6ED 21 62 A5     UnivSetEnemyMissile:    ld      hl,NewLaunchUBnKX               ; Copy launch ship matrix
 319+ C6F0 11 20 C0                             ld      de,UBnKxlo                      ;
 320+ C6F3 01 1B 00                             ld      bc,NewLaunchDataBlockSize       ; positon + 3 rows of 3 bytes
 321+ C6F6 ED B0                                ldir                                    ;
 322+ C6F8 3E 03        .SetUpSpeed:            ld      a,3                             ; set accelleration
 323+ C6FA 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                   ;
 324+ C6FD                                      ZeroA
 324+ C6FD AF          >                        xor a
 325+ C6FE 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 326+ C701 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 327+ C704 3E 03                                ld      a,3                             ; these are max roll and pitch rates for later
 328+ C706 32 69 C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT),a
 329+ C709 3C                                   inc     a
 330+ C70A 32 6A C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT2),a
 331+ C70D 3E 16                                ld      a,22
 332+ C70F 32 6C C0                             ld      (UBnKCNT2),a
 333+ C712                                      MaxUnivSpeed                            ; and immediatley full speed (for now at least) TODO
 333+ C712 3E 1F       >                        ld      a,31
 333+ C714 32 65 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 334+ C717                                      SetMemFalse UBnKMissleHitToProcess
 334+ C717 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 334+ C719 32 45 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 335+ C71C CD 7F C7                             call    UnivSetAIOnly
 336+ C71F CD 3A C6                             call    SetShipHostile
 337+ C722 3E 96        .SetupPayload:          ld      a,150
 338+ C724 32 3D C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileBlastDamage),a
 339+ C727 32 3F C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileDetonateDamage),a
 340+ C72A 3E 05                                ld      a,5
 341+ C72C 32 3C C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileBlastRange),a
 342+ C72F 32 3E C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileDetonateRange),a
 343+ C732 C9                                   ret
 344+ C733              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 345+ C733              ; This sets the position of the current ship if its a player launched missile
 346+ C733 CD FF CA     UnivSetPlayerMissile:   call    InitialisePlayerMissileOrientation  ; Copy in Player  facing
 347+ C736 CD 57 C6                             call    ResetUbnkPosition               ; home position
 348+ C739 3E 05                                ld      a,MissileDropHeight             ; the missile launches from underneath
 349+ C73B 32 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),a                     ; so its -ve drop height
 350+ C73E                                      IFDEF DEBUGMISSILELAUNCH
 351+ C73E ~                                        ld      a,$20       ; DEBUG
 352+ C73E ~                                        ld      (UBnKzlo),a
 353+ C73E                                      ENDIF
 354+ C73E 3E 80                                ld      a,$80                           ;
 355+ C740 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                    ;
 356+ C743 3E 03                                ld      a,3                             ; set accelleration
 357+ C745 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                   ;
 358+ C748                                      ZeroA
 358+ C748 AF          >                        xor a
 359+ C749 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 360+ C74C 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 361+ C74F 3E 03                                ld      a,3                             ; these are max roll and pitch rates for later
 362+ C751 32 69 C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT),a
 363+ C754 3C                                   inc     a
 364+ C755 32 6A C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT2),a
 365+ C758 3E 16                                ld      a,22
 366+ C75A 32 6C C0                             ld      (UBnKCNT2),a
 367+ C75D                                      MaxUnivSpeed                            ; and immediatley full speed (for now at least) TODO
 367+ C75D 3E 1F       >                        ld      a,31
 367+ C75F 32 65 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 368+ C762                                      SetMemFalse UBnKMissleHitToProcess
 368+ C762 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 368+ C764 32 45 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 369+ C767 CD 7F C7                             call    UnivSetAIOnly
 370+ C76A CD 43 C6                             call    ClearShipHostile                ; its a player missile
 371+ C76D C9                                   ret
 372+ C76E              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 373+ C76E              ; this applies blast damage to ship
 374+ C76E 3A C3 80     ShipMissileBlast:       ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastDamage)
 375+ C771 47                                   ld      b,a
 376+ C772 3A 77 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)                   ; Reduce Energy
 377+ C775 90                                   sub     b
 378+ C776 C3 BD C7                             jp      UnivExplodeShip
 379+ C779 18 42                                jr      UnivExplodeShip
 380+ C77B 32 77 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 381+ C77E C9                                   ret
 382+ C77F              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 383+ C77F              ; this applies AI flag and resets all other bits
 384+ C77F 3E 80        UnivSetAIOnly:          ld      a,ShipAIEnabled
 385+ C781 32 73 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 386+ C784 C9                                   ret
 387+ C785              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 388+ C785              ; Sets visibile and not a dot
 389+ C785 3A 73 C0     UnivVisible:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                ;  disable ship AI hostily and ECM
 390+ C788 F6 40                                or      ShipIsVisible
 391+ C78A 32 73 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ;  .
 392+ C78D C9                                   ret
 393+ C78E              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 394+ C78E              ; Sets invisibile
 395+ C78E              UnivInvisible:          ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm  , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr ; Assume its hidden
 395+ C78E 21 73 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
 395+ C791 CB B6       >                        res     ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,(hl)
 396+ C793 C9                                   ret
 397+ C794              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 398+ C794              ; Clears ship killed bit to acknowled its happened
 399+ C794 21 73 C0     UnivAcknowledExploding: ld      hl, UBnkaiatkecm
 400+ C797 CB A6                                res     ShipKilledBitNbr,(hl)
 401+ C799 C9                                   ret
 402+ C79A              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 403+ C79A              ; Clears ship exploding bit
 404+ C79A 21 73 C0     UnivFinishedExplosion:  ld      hl, UBnkaiatkecm
 405+ C79D CB AE                                res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
 406+ C79F C9                                   ret
 407+ C7A0              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 408+ C7A0              ; Sets visibile and not a dot
 409+ C7A0 3A 73 C0     UnivVisibleNonDot:      ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                ;  disable ship AI hostily and ECM
 410+ C7A3 F6 40                                or      ShipIsVisible
 411+ C7A5 E6 F7                                and     ShipIsNotDot
 412+ C7A7 32 73 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ;  .
 413+ C7AA C9                                   ret
 414+ C7AB              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 415+ C7AB              ; Sets visibile and  a dot
 416+ C7AB 3A 73 C0     UnivVisibleDot:         ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                ;  disable ship AI hostily and ECM
 417+ C7AE F6 48                                or      ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot
 418+ C7B0 32 73 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ;  .
 419+ C7B3 C9                                   ret
 420+ C7B4              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 421+ C7B4              ; Removes AI Bit from ship
 422+ C7B4 3A 73 C0     UnivClearAI:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                ;  disable ship AI hostily and ECM
 423+ C7B7 E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled                  ;  .
 424+ C7B9 32 73 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ;  .
 425+ C7BC C9                                   ret
 426+ C7BD
 427+ C7BD              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 428+ C7BD              ; This sets the ship as a shower of explosiondwd, flags as killed and removes AI
 429+ C7BD DD 01        UnivExplodeShip:        break
 430+ C7BF 3A 73 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
 431+ C7C2 F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled      ; Set Exlpoding flag and mark as just been killed
 432+ C7C4 E6 7F                                and     Bit7Clear                       ; Remove AI
 433+ C7C6 32 73 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 434+ C7C9 AF                                   xor     a
 435+ C7CA 32 77 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 436+ C7CD                                      ;TODO
 437+ C7CD C9                                   ret
 438+ C7CE              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 439+ C7CE CD A2 C9     UnivSetDemoPostion:     call    UnivSetSpawnPosition
 440+ C7D1 3E 81                                ld      a,%10000001                     ; AI Enabled has 1 missile
 441+ C7D3 32 73 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ; set hostinle, no AI, has ECM
 442+ C7D6 32 2E C4                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a             ; initialise new bits logic
 443+ C7D9 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 444+ C7DB 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 445+ C7DE 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; set roll to maxi on station
 446+ C7E1                                      ZeroA
 446+ C7E1 AF          >                        xor a
 447+ C7E2 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 448+ C7E5 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 449+ C7E8 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 450+ C7EB 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 451+ C7EE 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 452+ C7F1 22 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 453+ C7F4 3A 2D C4                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 454+ C7F7 21 B0 05                             ld      hl,$05B0                            ; so its a negative distance behind
 455+ C7FA                                      JumpIfANENusng ShipTypeStation, .SkipFurther
 455+ C7FA FE 02       >                        cp     ShipTypeStation
 455+ C7FC C2 03 C8    >                        jp      nz,.SkipFurther
 456+ C7FF 3E 05                                ld      a,5
 457+ C801 84                                   add     h
 458+ C802 67                                   ld      h,a
 459+ C803 22 26 C0     .SkipFurther            ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 460+ C806 C9                                   ret
 461+ C807              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 462+ C807              CopyPlanetGlobaltoSpaceStation:
 463+ C807 21 74 80                             ld      hl,ParentPlanetX
 464+ C80A 11 20 C0                             ld      de,UBnKxlo
 465+ C80D 01 09 00                             ld      bc,3*3
 466+ C810 ED B0                                ldir
 467+ C812 C9                                   ret
 468+ C813              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 469+ C813              CopySpaceStationtoPlanetGlobal:
 470+ C813 21 20 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 471+ C816 11 74 80                             ld      de,ParentPlanetX
 472+ C819 01 09 00                             ld      bc,3*3
 473+ C81C ED B0                                ldir
 474+ C81E C9                                   ret
 475+ C81F              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 476+ C81F              ; This group of routines copy the global variables to local universe
 477+ C81F              ; so we can a) track what is going on for debugging and b) encapsulate data
 478+ C81F              CopyParentPlanettoUnivTarget:
 479+ C81F 21 74 80                             ld      hl,ParentPlanetX                ; Copy the interface data to Univ (interface may be scapped later to just use Planet X Pos
 480+ C822 C3 34 C8                             jp      copyHlToTargetXPos
 481+ C825              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 482+ C825 21 7D 80     CopyPlanettoUnivTarget: ld      hl,PlanetXPos                   ; Copy planet position to local target data
 483+ C828 C3 34 C8                             jp      copyHlToTargetXPos
 484+ C82B              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 485+ C82B 21 92 80     CopySpaceStationtoUniv: ld      hl,StationXPos                  ; Copy sun position to local target data
 486+ C82E C3 34 C8                             jp      copyHlToTargetXPos
 487+ C831              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 488+ C831 21 89 80     CopySuntoUniv:          ld      hl,SunXPos                      ; the Sun routine as teh last one can just fall into copyHL
 489+ C834              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 490+ C834              ; -- General purpose copy 9 bytes from HL to UBnKTarget block
 491+ C834              ; -- done here so that optimisation can be applied later
 492+ C834 11 47 C0     copyHlToTargetXPos:     ld      de,UBnKTargetXPos
 493+ C837 01 09 00                             ld      bc,3*3
 494+ C83A ED B0                                ldir
 495+ C83C C9                                   ret
 496+ C83D              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 497+ C83D              ; generate space station type based on seed values
 498+ C83D              ; returns space station type in a
 499+ C83D 3A 69 80     UnivSelSpaceStationType:ld      a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 500+ C840 2A 6A 80                             ld      hl,(DisplayGovernment)          ; h = TekLevel, l = Government
 501+ C843 ED 5B 6C 80                          ld      de,(DisplayPopulation)          ; d = productivity e = Population
 502+ C847                                      ; so its economdy + government - TekLevel + productivity - population %00000001
 503+ C847 85                                   add     a,l
 504+ C848 9C                                   sbc     a,h
 505+ C849 82                                   add     a,d
 506+ C84A 9B                                   sbc     a,e
 507+ C84B E6 01                                and     $01
 508+ C84D 21 13 78                             ld      hl,MasterStations               ; in main memory
 509+ C850 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 510+ C852 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 511+ C853 C9                                   ret
 512+ C854              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 513+ C854 2A 5B C0     UnivPitchToTarget:      ld      hl,( UBnKTargetDotProduct2)        ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 514+ C857 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 515+ C858 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 516+ C85A E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 517+ C85C 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 518+ C85D 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 519+ C85E CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 520+ C860                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 520+ C860 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 520+ C862 D2 6B C8    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 521+ C865                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 521+ C865 AF          >                        xor a
 522+ C866 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 523+ C867 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 524+ C86A C9                                   ret
 525+ C86B 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 526+ C86D B4                                   or      h
 527+ C86E 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 528+ C871 C9                                   ret
 529+ C872
 530+ C872              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 531+ C872              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 532+ C872              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 533+ C872              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 534+ C872              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 535+ C872              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 536+ C872              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 537+ C872              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 538+ C872              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 539+ C872              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 540+ C872
 541+ C872 CD 61 03     UnivRollToTarget:       call    TacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 542+ C875 32 5D C0                             ld      ( UBnKTargetDotProduct3),a             ; .
 543+ C878 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 544+ C879 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 545+ C87C 32 5E C0                             ld      ( UBnKTargetDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 546+ C87F 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 547+ C880 3A 5C C0                             ld      a,( UBnKTargetDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 548+ C883 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 549+ C884 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 550+ C885 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 551+ C887                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 551+ C887 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 551+ C889 D2 92 C8    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 552+ C88C                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 552+ C88C AF          >                        xor a
 553+ C88D B0                                   or      b
 554+ C88E 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 555+ C891 C9                                   ret
 556+ C892 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 557+ C894 B4                                   or      h
 558+ C895 A8                                   xor     b
 559+ C896 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 560+ C899 C9                                   ret
 561+ C89A
 562+ C89A 2A 59 C0     UnivSpeedToTarget:      ld      hl,( UBnKTargetDotProduct1)
 563+ C89D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 564+ C89E A7                                   and     a
 565+ C89F 20 10                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 566+ C8A1 ED 5B 5B C0                          ld      de,( UBnKTargetDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 567+ C8A5 7D                                   ld      a,l
 568+ C8A6                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 568+ C8A6 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 568+ C8A8 DA B1 C8    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 569+ C8AB 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 570+ C8AD 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 571+ C8B0 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 572+ C8B1              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 572+ C8B1 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 572+ C8B3 DA BC C8    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 573+ C8B6 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 574+ C8B8 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 575+ C8BB C9                                   ret
 576+ C8BC              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 576+ C8BC AF          >                        xor a
 577+ C8BD 32 66 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 578+ C8C0 C9                                   ret
 579+ C8C1              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 580+ C8C1              CalculateSpaceStationWarpPositon:
 581+ C8C1 3A 3D 80     .CalcZPosition:         ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+1)      ; seed d & 7
 582+ C8C4 E6 07                                and     %00000111               ; .
 583+ C8C6 C6 07                                add     a,7                     ; + 7
 584+ C8C8 CB 2F                                sra     a                       ; / 2
 585+ C8CA 32 28 C0     .SetZPosition:          ld      (UBnKzsgn),a            ; << 16 (i.e. load into z sign byte
 586+ C8CD 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000               ; now set z hi and lo
 587+ C8D0 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl            ;
 588+ C8D3 3A 41 80     .CalcXandYPosition:     ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)      ; seed f & 3
 589+ C8D6 E6 03                                and     %00000011               ; .
 590+ C8D8 C6 03                                add     a,3                     ; + 3
 591+ C8DA 47                                   ld      b,a
 592+ C8DB 3A 40 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)      ; get low bit of seed e
 593+ C8DE E6 01                                and     %00000001
 594+ C8E0 1F                                   rra                             ; roll bit 0 into bit 7
 595+ C8E1 B0                                   or      b                       ; now calc is f & 3 * -1 if seed e is odd
 596+ C8E2 32 22 C0     .SetXandYPosition:      ld      (UBnKxsgn),a            ; set into x and y sign byte
 597+ C8E5 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a            ; .
 598+ C8E8 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; we want just seed f & 3 here
 599+ C8E9 32 21 C0                             ld      (UBnKxhi),a             ; set into x and y high byte
 600+ C8EC 32 24 C0                             ld      (UBnKyhi),a             ; .
 601+ C8EF                                      ZeroA
 601+ C8EF AF          >                        xor a
 602+ C8F0 32 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),a
 603+ C8F3 32 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),a
 604+ C8F6              .CaclculateSpaceStationOffset:
 605+ C8F6 3A 3E 80     .CalculateOffset:       ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
 606+ C8F9 E6 03                                and     %00000011
 607+ C8FB 4F                                   ld      c,a
 608+ C8FC 3A 3C 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds)
 609+ C8FF E6 01                                and     %00000001
 610+ C901 17                                   rla
 611+ C902 47                                   ld      b,a
 612+ C903 61                                   ld      h,c
 613+ C904 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 614+ C906 C5 E5        .TransposeX:            push    bc,,hl
 615+ C908 ED 5B 21 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKxhi)
 616+ C90C 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 617+ C90F 6F                                   ld      l,a
 618+ C910                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 618+ C910 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 618+ C914 CD 14 01       call        AddBCHtoDELsigned
 619+ C917 ED 53 21 C0                          ld      (UBnKxhi),de
 620+ C91B 7D                                   ld      a,l
 621+ C91C 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 622+ C91F E1 C1        .TransposeY:            pop     bc,,hl
 623+ C921 C5 E5                                push    bc,,hl
 624+ C923 ED 5B 24 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKyhi)
 625+ C927 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 626+ C92A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 627+ C92B                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 627+ C92B ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 627+ C92F CD 14 01       call        AddBCHtoDELsigned
 628+ C932 ED 53 24 C0                          ld      (UBnKyhi),de
 629+ C936 7D                                   ld      a,l
 630+ C937 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 631+ C93A E1 C1        .TransposeZ:            pop     bc,,hl
 632+ C93C ED 5B 27 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKzhi)
 633+ C940 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 634+ C943 6F                                   ld      l,a
 635+ C944                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 635+ C944 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 635+ C948 CD 14 01       call        AddBCHtoDELsigned
 636+ C94B ED 53 27 C0                          ld      (UBnKzhi),de
 637+ C94F 7D                                   ld      a,l
 638+ C950 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 639+ C953 C9                                   ret
 640+ C954              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 641+ C954              UnivSpawnSpaceStationLaunched:
 642+ C954 CD 77 C9                             call    UnivSpawnSpaceStation
 643+ C957 CD 13 C8                             call    CopySpaceStationtoPlanetGlobal
 644+ C95A CD 24 CA                             call    ResetStationLaunch
 645+ C95D C9                                   ret
 646+ C95E                                      DISPLAY "TODO:fall into SpaceStation Launch Position once startup fixed"
 647+ C95E                                      DISPLAY "TODO: Fault is probably as maths for xyz is 16 bit and shoudl be 24"
 648+ C95E              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 649+ C95E              SpaceStationLaunchPositon:
 650+ C95E 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 651+ C961                                      ZeroA
 651+ C961 AF          >                        xor a
 652+ C962 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 653+ C965 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 654+ C968 22 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 655+ C96B 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 656+ C96E 3E 81                                ld      a,$81
 657+ C970 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 658+ C973 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 659+ C976 C9                                   ret
 660+ C977              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 661+ C977              UnivSpawnSpaceStation:  ;    UnivSelSpaceStationType ; set a to type
 662+ C977                                      ;ld      c,13                    ; c to slot 13 which is space station
 663+ C977                                      ;call    SpawnShipTypeASlotC     ; load inito universe slot
 664+ C977 CD 07 C8     .CalculatePosition:     call    CopyPlanetGlobaltoSpaceStation
 665+ C97A CD C1 C8     .CalcOrbitOffset:       call    CalculateSpaceStationWarpPositon
 666+ C97D CD DC CA                             call    InitialiseOrientation
 667+ C980              .SetRollCounters:       ZeroUnivPitch
 667+ C980 AF          >                        xor     a
 667+ C981 32 68 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 668+ C984                                      InfiniteRoll
 668+ C984 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 668+ C986 32 67 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 669+ C989              .SetOrientation:        FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
 669+ C989 3A 37 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 669+ C98C EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 669+ C98E 32 37 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
 670+ C991                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
 670+ C991 3A 39 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 670+ C994 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 670+ C996 32 39 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 671+ C999                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
 671+ C999 3A 3B C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 671+ C99C EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 671+ C99E 32 3B C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
 672+ C9A1 C9                                   ret
 673+ C9A2              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 674+ C9A2              ; This sets the position of the current ship randomly, called after spawing
 675+ C9A2              ; Spawns in withink 16 bit range so 24 bit friendly
 676+ C9A2 CD DC CA     UnivSetSpawnPosition:   call    InitialiseOrientation
 677+ C9A5                                      RandomUnivPitchAndRoll
 677+ C9A5 CD D2 85    >                        call    doRandom
 677+ C9A8 F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 677+ C9AA 32 67 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 677+ C9AD CD D2 85    >                        call    doRandom
 677+ C9B0 F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 677+ C9B2 32 68 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 678+ C9B5 CD D2 85                             call    doRandom                        ; set x lo and y lo to random
 679+ C9B8 32 20 C0     .setXlo:                ld      (UBnKxlo),a
 680+ C9BB 32 23 C0     .setYlo:                ld      (UBnKylo),a
 681+ C9BE 0F           .setXsign:              rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 682+ C9BF 47                                   ld      b,a
 683+ C9C0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 684+ C9C2 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 685+ C9C5 78           .setYSign:              ld      a,b                             ; get random back again
 686+ C9C6 0F                                   rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 687+ C9C7 47                                   ld      b,a
 688+ C9C8 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; and set y sign
 689+ C9CA 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 690+ C9CD CB 08        .setYHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 691+ C9CF 78                                   ld      a,b                             ;
 692+ C9D0 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set y hi to random 0 to 31
 693+ C9D2 32 24 C0                             ld      (UBnKyhi),a                     ;
 694+ C9D5 CB 08        .setXHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 695+ C9D7 78                                   ld      a,b
 696+ C9D8 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set x hi to random 0 to 31
 697+ C9DA 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; save shifted into c as well
 698+ C9DB 32 21 C0                             ld      (UBnKxhi),a
 699+ C9DE 3E 50        .setZHigh:              ld      a,80                            ; set z hi to 80 - xhi - yhi - carry
 700+ C9E0 98                                   sbc     b
 701+ C9E1 99                                   sbc     c
 702+ C9E2 32 27 C0                             ld      (UBnKzhi),a
 703+ C9E5 3A 2D C4     .CheckIfBodyOrJunk:     ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 704+ C9E8                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeJunk
 704+ C9E8 FE 03       >                        cp      ShipTypeJunk
 704+ C9EA C8          >                        ret     z
 705+ C9EB                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeScoopable
 705+ C9EB FE 04       >                        cp      ShipTypeScoopable
 705+ C9ED C8          >                        ret     z
 706+ C9EE 78                                   ld      a,b                             ; its not junk to set z sign
 707+ C9EF 0F                                   rrca                                    ; as it can jump in
 708+ C9F0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 709+ C9F2 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 710+ C9F5 C9                                   ret
 711+ C9F6
 712+ C9F6              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 713+ C9F6              ; This sets the cargo type or carryflag set for not cargo
 714+ C9F6              ; Later this will be done via a loadable lookup table
 715+ C9F6 3A 2D C4     ShipCargoType:          ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 716+ C9F9                                      JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_CargoType5, .CargoCanister
 716+ C9F9 FE 04       >                        cp     ShipID_CargoType5
 716+ C9FB CA 12 CA    >                        jp      z,.CargoCanister
 717+ C9FE              .IsItThargon:           JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Thargon,    .Thargon
 717+ C9FE FE 27       >                        cp     ShipID_Thargon
 717+ CA00 CA 18 CA    >                        jp      z,.Thargon
 718+ CA03              .IsItAlloy:             JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Plate,      .Plate
 718+ CA03 FE 1D       >                        cp     ShipID_Plate
 718+ CA05 CA 1B CA    >                        jp      z,.Plate
 719+ CA08              .IsItSplinter:          JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Splinter,   .Splinter
 719+ CA08 FE 24       >                        cp     ShipID_Splinter
 719+ CA0A CA 1E CA    >                        jp      z,.Splinter
 720+ CA0D              .IsItEscapePod:         JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Escape_Pod, .EscapePod
 720+ CA0D FE 11       >                        cp     ShipID_Escape_Pod
 720+ CA0F CA 21 CA    >                        jp      z,.EscapePod
 721+ CA12 CD D2 85     .CargoCanister:         call    doRandom
 722+ CA15 E6 0F                                and     15                      ; Limit stock from Food to Platinum
 723+ CA17 C9                                   ret
 724+ CA18 3E 11        .Thargon:               ld      a,AlienItemsIndex
 725+ CA1A C9                                   ret
 726+ CA1B 3E 0A        .Plate:                 ld      a,AlloysIndex
 727+ CA1D C9                                   ret
 728+ CA1E 3E 0D        .Splinter:              ld      a,MineralsIndex
 729+ CA20 C9                                   ret
 730+ CA21 3E 04        .EscapePod:             ld      a,SlavesIndex
 731+ CA23 C9                                   ret
 732+ CA24                      IFDEF DEBUG_SHIP_MOVEMENT
 733+ CA24 ~            FixStationPos:          ld      hl, DebugPos
 734+ CA24 ~                                    ld      de, UBnKxlo
 735+ CA24 ~                                    ld      bc,9
 736+ CA24 ~                                    ldir
 737+ CA24 ~                                    ld      hl,DebugRotMat
 738+ CA24 ~                                    ld      de, UBnkrotmatSidevX
 739+ CA24 ~                                    ld      bc,6*3
 740+ CA24 ~                                    ldir
 741+ CA24 ~                                    ret
 742+ CA24                      ENDIF
 743+ CA24                      IFDEF DEBUG_SHIP_MOVEMENT
 744+ CA24 ~            DebugPos:               DB $00,$00,$00,$92,$01,$00,$7E,$04,$00

 746+ CA24 ~            DebugRotMat1:           DB $DF,$6D,$2A,$07,$C1,$83
 747+ CA24 ~            DebugRotMat2:           DB $00,$80,$4A,$9B,$AA,$D8
 748+ CA24                      ENDIF
 749+ CA24
 750+ CA24              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 751+ CA24              ; This sets current univrse object to space station
 752+ CA24 3E 81        ResetStationLaunch:     ld  a,%10000001                         ; Has AI and 1 Missile
 753+ CA26 32 73 C0                             ld  (UBnkaiatkecm),a                    ; set hostinle, no AI, has ECM
 754+ CA29 AF                                   xor a
 755+ CA2A 32 68 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 756+ CA2D 32 2E C4                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a             ; initialise new bits logic
 757+ CA30 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 758+ CA32 32 67 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; set roll to maxi on station
 759+ CA35 21 00 00     .SetPosBehindUs:        ld      hl,$0000
 760+ CA38 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 761+ CA3B 21 00 00                             ld      hl,$0000
 762+ CA3E 22 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 763+ CA41 21 B0 01                             ld      hl,$01B0                            ; so its a negative distance behind
 764+ CA44 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 765+ CA47 AF                                   xor     a
 766+ CA48 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 767+ CA4B 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 768+ CA4E 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 769+ CA50 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 770+ CA53 CD 09 CB     .SetOrientation:        call    LaunchedOrientation             ; set initial facing
 771+ CA56 C9                                   ret
 772+ CA57                  ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 773+ CA57              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 774+ CA57              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 775+ CA57 2A 23 29 27  FighterTypeMapping:     DB ShipID_Worm, ShipID_Sidewinder, ShipID_Viper, ShipID_Thargon
 776+ CA5B
 777+ CA5B              ; Initialiase data, iyh must equal slot number
 778+ CA5B              ;                   iyl must be ship type
 779+ CA5B              ;                   a  = current bank number
 780+ CA5B 01 41 00     UnivInitRuntime:        ld      bc,UBnKRuntimeSize
 781+ CA5E 21 40 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKStartOfRuntimeData
 782+ CA61                                      ZeroA
 782+ CA61 AF          >                        xor a
 783+ CA62 32 78 C0                             ld      (UBnKECMCountDown),a
 784+ CA65 32 80 C0                             ld      (UBnKHeadingToPlanetOrSun),a ; at the moment we don't have a preferred trader route
 785+ CA68 77           .InitLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 786+ CA69 23                                   inc     hl
 787+ CA6A 10 FC                                djnz    .InitLoop
 788+ CA6C              .SetEnergy:             ldCopyByte EnergyAddr, UBnKEnergy
 788+ CA6C 3A 25 C4    >                        ld       a,(EnergyAddr)
 788+ CA6F 32 77 C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
 789+ CA72 FD 7C        .SetBankData:           ld      a,iyh
 790+ CA74 32 40 C0                             ld      (UBnKSlotNumber),a
 791+ CA77 C6 46                                add     a,BankUNIVDATA0
 792+ CA79 32 41 C0                             ld      (UbnKShipUnivBankNbr),a
 793+ CA7C FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 794+ CA7E 32 44 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipModelId),a
 795+ CA81 CD 0F E0                             call    GetShipBankId                ; this will mostly be debugging info
 796+ CA84 32 42 C0                             ld      (UBnkShipModelBank),a        ; this will mostly be debugging info
 797+ CA87 78                                   ld      a,b                          ; this will mostly be debugging info
 798+ CA88 32 43 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipModelNbr),a         ; this will mostly be debugging info
 799+ CA8B 3A 2A C4     .SetUpMissileCount:     ld      a,(LaserAddr)                ; get laser and missile details
 800+ CA8E E6 0F                                and     ShipMissileCount
 801+ CA90 4F                                   ld      c,a
 802+ CA91 3A A2 7E                             ld      a,(RandomSeed1)              ; missile flag limit
 803+ CA94 A1                                   and     c                            ; .
 804+ CA95 32 7B C0                             ld      (UBnKMissilesLeft),a
 805+ CA98 3A 2A C4     .SetupLaserType         ld      a,(LaserAddr)
 806+ CA9B E6 F0                                and     ShipLaserPower
 807+ CA9D ED 23                                swapnib
 808+ CA9F 32 7A C0                             ld      (UBnKLaserPower),a
 809+ CAA2 3A 2F C4     .SetUpFighterBays:      ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
 810+ CAA5 4F                                   ld      c,a
 811+ CAA6 E6 70                                and     ShipFighterBaySize
 812+ CAA8                                      JumpIfANENusng ShipFighterBaySizeInf, .LimitedBay
 812+ CAA8 FE 70       >                        cp     ShipFighterBaySizeInf
 812+ CAAA C2 AF CA    >                        jp      nz,.LimitedBay
 813+ CAAD 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF                       ; force unlimited ships
 814+ CAAF ED 23        .LimitedBay:            swapnib                             ; as its bits 6 to 4 and we have removed bit 7 we can cheat with a swapnib
 815+ CAB1 32 7D C0                             ld      (UBnKFightersLeft),a
 816+ CAB4 79           .SetUpFighterType:      ld      a,c                         ; get back AI flags
 817+ CAB5 E6 0C                                and     ShipFighterType             ; fighter type is bits 2 and 3
 818+ CAB7 CB 1F                                rr      a                           ; so get them down to 0 and 1
 819+ CAB9 CB 1F                                rr      a                           ;
 820+ CABB 21 57 CA                             ld      hl,FighterTypeMapping       ; then use the lookup table
 821+ CABE ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ; for the respective ship id
 822+ CAC0 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; we work on this for optimisation
 823+ CAC1 32 7C C0                             ld      (UBnKFighterShipId),a       ; ship data holds index to this table
 824+ CAC4 3A 30 C4     .SetUpECM:              ld      a,(ShipECMFittedChanceAddr) ; Now handle ECM
 825+ CAC7 47                                   ld      b,a
 826+ CAC8 3A A4 7E     .FetchLatestRandom:     ld      a,(RandomSeed3)
 827+ CACB                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .ECMFitted
 827+ CACB B8          >                        cp      b
 827+ CACC DA D7 CA    >                        jp		c, .ECMFitted
 828+ CACF              .ECMNotFitted:          SetMemFalse UBnKECMFitted
 828+ CACF 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 828+ CAD1 32 79 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKECMFitted),a
 829+ CAD4 C3 DB CA                             jp      .DoneECM
 830+ CAD7              .ECMFitted:             SetMemTrue  UBnKECMFitted
 830+ CAD7 AF          >                        xor     a
 830+ CAD8 32 79 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKECMFitted),a
 831+ CADB              .DoneECM:               ; TODO set up laser power
 832+ CADB C9                                   ret
 833+ CADC                  DISPLAY "Tracing 2", $
 834+ CADC
 835+ CADC                                      include "Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
   1++CADC              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
   2++CADC              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
   3++CADC              ;  nosev = (0,  0, -1)  nosev = (0, 0, &E000)   E000 = SignBit[96]
   4++CADC              InitialiseOrientation:
   5++CADC 21 00 00     ZI1:                    ld      hl, 0
   6++CADF 22 2C C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
   7++CAE2 22 2E C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
   8++CAE5 22 30 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),hl                ; set the zeroes
   9++CAE8 22 34 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
  10++CAEB 22 36 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  11++CAEE 22 38 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
  12++CAF1              ; Optimised as already have 0 in l
  13++CAF1 26 60                                ld      h, $60	             				; 96 in hi byte
  14++CAF3                                      ;ld      hl,1
  15++CAF3 22 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),hl
  16++CAF6 22 32 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),hl
  17++CAF9              ; Optimised as already have 0 in l
  18++CAF9 26 E0                                ld      h, $E0					            ; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
  19++CAFB 22 3A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl
  20++CAFE C9                                   ret
  21++CAFF
  22++CAFF              InitialisePlayerMissileOrientation:
  23++CAFF CD DC CA                             call    InitialiseOrientation
  24++CB02 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000
  25++CB05 22 3A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl           ; mius
  26++CB08 C9                                   ret
  27++CB09
  28++CB09
  29++CB09              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
  30++CB09              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
  31++CB09              ;  nosev = (-0,  -0, 1) nosev = (0, 0, &6000)
  32++CB09 CD DC CA     LaunchedOrientation:    call    InitialiseOrientation
  33++CB0C                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  33++CB0C 3A 37 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  33++CB0F EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  33++CB11 32 37 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
  34++CB14                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  34++CB14 3A 39 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  34++CB17 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  34++CB19 32 39 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
  35++CB1C                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
  35++CB1C 3A 3B C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  35++CB1F EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  35++CB21 32 3B C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
  36++CB24 C9                                   ret
  37++CB25
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
 836+ CB25              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 837+ CB25              ;OrientateVertex:
 838+ CB25              ;                      [ sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z ]   [ x ]
 839+ CB25              ;  projected [x y z] = [ roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z ] . [ y ]
 840+ CB25              ;                      [ nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 841+ CB25              ;
 842+ CB25
 843+ CB25              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 844+ CB25              ;TransposeVertex:
 845+ CB25              ;                      [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]
 846+ CB25              ;  projected [x y z] = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ]
 847+ CB25              ;                      [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 848+ CB25              ; VectorToVertex:
 849+ CB25              ;                     [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]   [ x ]
 850+ CB25              ;  vector to vertex = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ] + [ y ]
 851+ CB25              ;                     [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]   [ z ]
 852+ CB25              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
 853+ CB25              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
 854+ CB25              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 855+ CB25                                      ;include "./ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm"
 856+ CB25               ; OBSOLETE                       include "./ModelRender/TrimToScreenGrad-LL118.asm"
 857+ CB25                                      include "./ModelRender/CLIP-LL145.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/CLIP-LL145.asm
   1++CB25              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++CB25
   3++CB25 00           clipDx                  DB      0           ; also XX12+2
   4++CB26 00           clipDxHigh              DB      0           ; also XX12+3
   5++CB27 00           clipDxHighNonABS        DB      0           ; also XX12+3
   6++CB28 00           clipDy                  DB      0           ; also XX12+4
   7++CB29 00           clipDyHigh              DB      0           ; also XX12+5
   8++CB2A 00           clipGradient            DB      0
   9++CB2B 00           clipDxySign             DB      0
  10++CB2C              varX12p3                equ     clipDxySign
  11++CB2C 00           clipXGTY                DB      0
  12++CB2D 00           clipFlags               DB      0
  13++CB2E 00           SWAP                    DB      0
  14++CB2F 00 00        varYX                   DW      0
  15++CB31              ;varRegX                 DB      0
  16++CB31              ;varXX12p2               DB      0
  17++CB31 00           clipXX13                 DB      0
  18++CB32 00           Gradient                DB      0
  19++CB33              ; for start and end y. bit7 of lower determines its not been setup yet
  20++CB33
  21++CB33              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  22++CB33                      IFNDEF       CLIPVersion3
  23++CB33 ED 4B C8 C0  ClipLine:               ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)          ; bc - XX15(2,3) Y1
  24++CB37 DD 2A CC C0                          ld      ix,(UbnkPreClipY2)          ; ix - XX12(0,1) Y2
  25++CB3B 2A C6 C0                             ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)          ; hl - XX15(0,1) X1
  26++CB3E ED 5B CA C0                          ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)          ; de - XX15(4,5) X2
  27++CB42 AF                                   xor     a
  28++CB43 32 2E CB                             ld      (SWAP),a                    ; SWAP = 0
  29++CB46 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; A = X2Hi
  30++CB47 FD 26 BF     .LL147:                 ld      iyh,$BF                     ; we need to be 191 as its 128 + another bit set from 0 to 6, we are using iyh as regX (128 will actually do)
  31++CB4A DD B4                                or      ixh                         ; if (X2Hi L-OR Y2 Hi <> 0) goto LL107             -- X2Y2 off screen
  32++CB4C 20 0A                                jr      nz, .LL107
  33++CB4E DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  34++CB50 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; if screen hight < y2 lo, i.e y2 lo >127 goto LL107,
  35++CB53 20 03                                jr      nz,.LL107
  36++CB55 FD 26 00                             ld      iyh, 0                      ; else iyh = regX = 0                                                                        -- X2Y2 on screen
  37++CB58              ; XX13 = regX (i.e. iyh)      ( if XX13 = XX13 is 191 if (x2, y2) is off-screen else 0) we bin XX13 as not needed
  38++CB58              ; so XX13 = 0 if x2_hi = y2_hi = 0, y2_lo is on-screen,  XX13 = 191 if x2_hi or y2_hi are non-zero or y2_lo is off the bottom of the screen
  39++CB58 FD 7C        .LL107                  ld      a,iyh
  40++CB5A 32 31 CB                             ld      (clipXX13),a                ; debug copy iyh to xx13
  41++CB5D 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; If (X1 hi L-OR Y1) hi  goto LL83                   -- X1Y1 off screen and maybe X2Y2
  42++CB5E B0                                   or      b                           ;
  43++CB5F 20 27                                jr      nz,.LL83                    ;
  44++CB61 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; or (y1 lo > bottom of screen)
  45++CB62 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; i.e  screen height < y1)
  46++CB65 20 21                                jr      nz,.LL83
  47++CB67              ; If we get here, (x1, y1) is on-screen
  48++CB67 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; iyh = xx13 at this point if  XX13 <> 0 goto LL108                                                        -- X1Y1 on screen, if we flagged X2Y2 off screen goto LL108
  49++CB69 FE 00                                cp      0
  50++CB6B 20 15                                jr      nz, .LL108
  51++CB6D              ; Finished clipping exit point ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  52++CB6D 79           .ClipDone:              ld      a,c                         ; LL146 (Clip Done)               Y1 = y1 lo, x2 = x2 lo, x1 = x1 lo y1 = y1 lo                                   -- Nothing off screen
  53++CB6E 32 C7 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewY1),a
  54++CB71 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  55++CB73 32 C9 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewY2),a
  56++CB76 7D                                   ld      a,l
  57++CB77 32 C6 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewX1),a
  58++CB7A 7B                                   ld      a,e
  59++CB7B 32 C8 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewX2),a
  60++CB7E                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; carry is clear so valid to plot is in XX15(0to3)
  60++CB7E B7          >                        or a
  61++CB7F C9                                   ret                                 ; 2nd pro different, it swops based on swop flag around here.
  62++CB80              ; Finished out of bounds exit point -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  63++CB80              .PointsOutofBounds:     SetCarryFlag                        ; LL109 (ClipFailed) carry flag set as not visible
  63++CB80 37          >                        scf
  64++CB81 C9                                   ret
  65++CB82 FD 7C        .LL108:                 ld      a,iyh
  66++CB84 B7                                   or      a
  67++CB85 1F                                   rra
  68++CB86 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; (X2Y2 Off Screen)         XX13 = 95 (i.e. divide it by 2)                                                 -- X1Y1 on screen X2Y2 off screen
  69++CB88 FD 7C        .LL83:                  ld      a,iyh                       ; (Line On screen Test)      if XX13 < 128 then only 1 point is on screen so goto LL115                      -- We only need to deal with X2Y2
  70++CB8A ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ;
  71++CB8D 28 28                                jr      z, .LL115                   ;
  72++CB8F              ;                       Check for X1 and X2 negative
  73++CB8F 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; If both x1_hi and x2_hi have bit 7 set, jump to LL109  to return from the subroutine with the C flag set, as the entire line is above the top of the screen
  74++CB90 A2                                   and     d
  75++CB91                                      JumpIfNegative  .PointsOutofBounds
  75++CB91 FA 80 CB    >                        jp		m, .PointsOutofBounds
  76++CB94              ;                       Check for Y1 and Y2 negative
  77++CB94 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; If both y1_hi and y2_hi have bit 7 set, jump to LL109  to return from the subroutine with the C flag set, as the entire line is above the top of the screen
  78++CB95 DD A4                                and     ixh
  79++CB97                                      JumpIfNegative  .PointsOutofBounds
  79++CB97 FA 80 CB    >                        jp		m, .PointsOutofBounds
  80++CB9A              ;                       Check for X1 and X2 both > 255
  81++CB9A 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; If neither (x1_hi - 1) or (x2_hi - 1) have bit 7 set, jump to LL109 to return from the subroutine with the C  flag set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
  82++CB9B 3D                                   dec     a
  83++CB9C FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; using iyl as XX12+2 var
  84++CB9E 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; a = x2 hi
  85++CB9F 3D                                   dec     a
  86++CBA0 FD B5                                or      iyl                         ; (x2 hi -1 ) or (x1 hi -1)
  87++CBA2                                      JumpIfPositive .PointsOutofBounds   ; if both x1 and x2hi were > 0 then subtracting 1 would result in 0..254 so either being negative means it was 0 before
  87++CBA2 F2 80 CB    >                        jp		p, .PointsOutofBounds
  88++CBA5              ; by here we have eliminated -ve Y1 bounds so can just test for positive high and bit 7 of lo
  89++CBA5 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh
  90++CBA7 3D                                   dec     a
  91++CBA8 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
  92++CBAA 78                                   ld      a,b
  93++CBAB 3D                                   dec     a
  94++CBAC FD B5                                or      iyl
  95++CBAE                                      JumpIfPositive .PointsOutofBounds   ; if both x1 and x2hi were > 0 then subtracting 1 would result in 0..254 so either being negative means it was 0 before
  95++CBAE F2 80 CB    >                        jp		p, .PointsOutofBounds
  96++CBB1 79                                   ld      a,c
  97++CBB2 DD A5                                and     ixl
  98++CBB4                                      JumpIfNegative .PointsOutofBounds   ; really if both are > 127
  98++CBB4 FA 80 CB    >                        jp		m, .PointsOutofBounds
  99++CBB7              ; Clip line: calulate the line's gradient
 100++CBB7              ; here as an optimisation we make sure X1 is always < X2  later on
 101++CBB7              .LL115:                 ClearCarryFlag
 101++CBB7 B7          >                        or a
 102++CBB8 E5 D5        .CalcDX:                push    hl,,de
 103++CBBA EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; so hl is x2 and de = x1
 104++CBBB ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 105++CBBD 22 25 CB                             ld      (clipDx),hl
 106++CBC0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 107++CBC1 32 27 CB                             ld      (clipDxHighNonABS),a
 108++CBC4              .CalcDy:                ClearCarryFlag
 108++CBC4 B7          >                        or a
 109++CBC5 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 110++CBC8 ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc
 111++CBCA 54 5D                                ld      de,hl           ;;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21
 112++CBCC 22 28 CB                             ld      (clipDy),hl     ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 113++CBCF 7C           .CalcQuadrant:          ld      a,h
 114++CBD0 32 29 CB                             ld      (clipDyHigh),a              ; so A = sign of deltay in effect
 115++CBD3              ; So we now have delta_x in XX12(3 2), delta_y in XX12(5 4)  where the delta is (x1, y1) - (x2, y2))
 116++CBD3 21 26 CB                             ld      hl,clipDxHigh
 117++CBD6 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; now a = sign dx xor sign dy
 118++CBD7 32 AE 7F                             ld      (varS),a                    ; DEBGU putting it in var S too for now
 119++CBDA 32 2B CB                             ld      (clipDxySign),a
 120++CBDD 3A 29 CB     .AbsDy:                 ld      a,(clipDyHigh)
 121++CBE0 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 122++CBE3 28 0E                                jr      z,.LL110                    ; If delta_y_hi is positive, jump down to LL110 to skip the following
 123++CBE5 ED 5B 28 CB                          ld      de,(clipDy)                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 124++CBE9                                      macronegate16de                     ; Otherwise flip the sign of delta_y to make it  positive, starting with the low bytes
 124++CBE9 AF          >					xor 	a
 124++CBEA 93          >                    sub 	e
 124++CBEB 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 124++CBEC 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 124++CBED 92          >                    sub 	d
 124++CBEE 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 125++CBEF ED 53 28 CB                          ld      (clipDy),de                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 126++CBF3 2A 25 CB     .LL110:                 ld      hl,(clipDx)
 127++CBF6 3A 26 CB                             ld      a,(clipDxHigh)
 128++CBF9 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; is it a negative X
 129++CBFC 28 06                                jr      z,.LL111                    ; If delta_x_hi is positive, jump down to LL110 to skip the following
 130++CBFE                                      ;ld      hl,(clipDx)                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 131++CBFE                                      macronegate16hl                     ; Otherwise flip the sign of delta_y to make it  positive, starting with the low bytes
 131++CBFE AF          >					xor 	a
 131++CBFF 95          >					sub 	l
 131++CC00 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 131++CC01 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 131++CC02 94          >					sub 	h
 131++CC03 67          >					ld 		h,a
 132++CC04              .LL111:
 133++CC04 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h                         ; At this point DX and DY are ABS values
 134++CC05 B2                                   or      d
 135++CC06 28 0A                                jr      z,.CalculateDelta
 136++CC08                                      ShiftDERight1
 136++CC08 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 136++CC0A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 137++CC0C                                      ShiftHLRight1
 137++CC0C CB 3C       >			   srl h
 137++CC0E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 138++CC10 18 F2                                jr      .ScaleLoop                  ; scaled down Dx and Dy to 8 bit, Dy may have been negative
 139++CC12              .CalculateDelta:
 140++CC12              ; By now, the high bytes of both |delta_x| and |delta_y| are zero We know that h and d are both = 0 as that's what we tested with a BEQ
 141++CC12 AF           .LL113:                 xor     a
 142++CC13 32 C8 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; t = 0
 143++CC16 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; If delta_x_lo < delta_y_lo, so our line is more vertical than horizontal, jump to LL114
 144++CC17                                      JumpIfALTNusng  e, .LL114           ;
 144++CC17 BB          >                        cp      e
 144++CC18 DA 28 CC    >                        jp		c, .LL114
 145++CC1B              ; Here Dx >= Dy sp calculate Delta Y / delta X
 146++CC1B 32 AC 7F     .DxGTEDy:               ld      (varQ),a                    ; Set Q = delta_x_lo
 147++CC1E 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; d = also Q for calc
 148++CC1F 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; Set A = delta_y_lo
 149++CC20 CD 77 96                             call    AEquAmul256DivD; LL28Amul256DivD             ; Call LL28 to calculate:  R (actually a reg) = 256 * A / Q   = 256 * delta_y_lo / delta_x_lo
 150++CC23 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 151++CC26 18 10                                jr      .LL116                      ; Jump to LL116, as we now have the line's gradient in R
 152++CC28              ; Here Delta Y > Delta X so calulate delta X / delta Y
 153++CC28 7B           .LL114:                 ld      a,e                         ; Set Q = delta_y_lo
 154++CC29 57                                   ld      d,a
 155++CC2A 32 AC 7F                             ld      (varQ),a
 156++CC2D 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; Set A = delta_x_lo
 157++CC2E CD 77 96                             call    AEquAmul256DivD; LL28Amul256DivD             ; Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q  = 256 * delta_x_lo / delta_y_lo
 158++CC31 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 159++CC34 21 C8 7F                             ld      hl,varT                     ; T was set to 0 above, so this sets T = &FF
 160++CC37 35                                   dec     (hl)
 161++CC38 D1           .LL116:                 pop     de                          ; get back X2
 162++CC39 E1                                   pop     hl                          ; get back X1 into hl,
 163++CC3A 3A AD 7F                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; Store the gradient in XX12+2 this can be optimised later
 164++CC3D 32 2A CB                             ld      (clipGradient),a
 165++CC40 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 166++CC42 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 167++CC45 32 2B CB                             ld      (clipDxySign),a             ;  Store the type of slope in XX12+3, bit 7 clear means ?Not needed as clipDxySign is used for varS earlier?
 168++CC48                                                                          ; top left to bottom right, bit 7 set means top right to bottom left **CODE IS WRONG HERE A TEST IS BL to TR
 169++CC48 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; iyh was XX13 from earlier
 170++CC4A FE 00                                cp      0                           ; If XX13 = 0, skip the following instruction
 171++CC4C 28 05                                jr      z,.LL138                    ;
 172++CC4E ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; If XX13 is positive, it must be 95. This means (x1, y1) is on-screen but (x2, y2) isn't, so we jump to LLX117 to swap the (x1, y1) and (x2, y2)
 173++CC51 28 13                                jr      z,.LLX117                   ; coordinates around before doing the actual clipping, because we need to clip (x2, y2) but the clipping routine at LL118 only clips (x1, y1)
 174++CC53              ; If we get here, XX13 = 0 or 191, so (x1, y1) is off-screen and needs clipping
 175++CC53 CD 7A CC     .LL138                  call    ClipPointHLBC               ; Call LL118 to move (x1, y1) along the line onto the screen, i.e. clip the line at the (x1, y1) end
 176++CC56 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; If XX13 = 0, i.e. (x2, y2) is on-screen, jump down to LL124 to return with a successfully clipped line
 177++CC58 ED 27 80                             test    $80
