 178++CC5B 28 1A                                jr      z,.LL124
 179++CC5D              ; If we get here, XX13 = 191 (both coordinates are off-screen)
 180++CC5D 7C           .LL117:                 ld      a,h                         ; If either of x1_hi or y1_hi are non-zero, jump to
 181++CC5E B0                                   or      b                           ; LL137 to return from the subroutine with the C flag
 182++CC5F C2 80 CB                             jp      nz, .PointsOutofBounds      ; set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 183++CC62 B1                                   or      c                           ; if x1 and y1 hi are both zero test bit 8 or Y1 to see if its > 128
 184++CC63 FA 80 CB                             jp      m, .PointsOutofBounds       ; set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 185++CC66              ; If we get here, XX13 = 95 or 191, and in both cases (x2, y2) is off-screen, so we now need to swap the (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) coordinates around before doing
 186++CC66              ; the actual clipping, because we need to clip (x2, y2) but the clipping routine at LL118 only clips (x1, y1)
 187++CC66 EB           .LLX117:                ex      de,hl                       ;  swap X1 and X2
 188++CC67 DD E5                                push    ix                          ;  swap Y1 and Y2
 189++CC69 C5                                   push    bc
 190++CC6A DD E1                                pop     ix
 191++CC6C C1                                   pop     bc
 192++CC6D CD 7A CC                             call    ClipPointHLBC               ;  Call LL118 to move (x1, y1) along the line onto the screen, i.e. clip the line at the (x1, y1) end
 193++CC70 3A 2E CB                             ld      a,(SWAP)
 194++CC73 3D                                   dec     a
 195++CC74 32 2E CB                             ld      (SWAP),a                    ; Set SWAP = &FF to indicate that we just clipped the line at the (x2, y2) end by swapping the coordinates (the DEC does this as we set SWAP to 0 at the start of this subroutine)
 196++CC77 C3 6D CB     .LL124:                 jp      .ClipDone                    ; now put points in place
 197++CC7A              ; Move a point along a line until it is on-screen point is held in HL(X) BC(Y) LL118
 198++CC7A              ; iyh still holds XX13 iyl still holds gradient
 199++CC7A 7C           ClipPointHLBC:          ld      a,h                         ; If x1_hi is positive, jump down to LL119 to skip the following
 200++CC7B ED 27 80                             test    $80
 201++CC7E 28 17                                jr      z,.LL119
 202++CC80 32 AE 7F     .X1isNegative:          ld      (varS),a                    ;  Otherwise x1_hi is negative, i.e. off the left of the screen, so set S = x1_hi
 203++CC83 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 204++CC86 CD FC CC                             call    LL120                       ;  Call LL120 to calculate:   (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2      if T = 0   = x1 * gradient
 205++CC89                                                                          ;                             (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2      if T <> 0  = x1 / gradient
 206++CC89                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 207++CC89 C1 D1 E1                             pop    hl,,de,,bc                   ;  get coordinates back
 208++CC8C 2A 2F CB                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 209++CC8F 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ; y1 = y1 + varYX
 210++CC90 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 211++CC92 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; Set x1 = 0
 212++CC95 18 1A                                jr      .LL134                      ; in BBC is set x to 0 to force jump, we will just jump
 213++CC97 FE 00        .LL119:                 cp      0
 214++CC99 28 16                                jr      z,.LL134                    ;  If x1_hi = 0 then jump down to LL134 to skip the following, as the x-coordinate is already on-screen (as 0 <= (x_hi x_lo) <= 255)
 215++CC9B 3D                                   dec     a
 216++CC9C 32 AE 7F                             ld      (varS),a                    ;  Otherwise x1_hi is positive, i.e. x1 >= 256 and off the right side of the screen, so set S = x1_hi - 1
 217++CC9F E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 218++CCA2 CD FC CC                             call    LL120                      ;  Call LL120 to calculate: (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2      if T = 0  = (x1 - 256) * gradient
 219++CCA5                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2      if T <> 0 = (x1 - 256) / gradient
 220++CCA5                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of theline's direction of slope
 221++CCA5 C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 222++CCA8 2A 2F CB                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 223++CCAB 09                                   add     hl,bc                        ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 simplfied post debug
 224++CCAC 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                        ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 simplfied post debug
 225++CCAE 21 FF 00                             ld      hl,255                      ; Set x1 = 255
 226++CCB1              ; We have moved the point so the x-coordinate is on screen (i.e. in the range 0-255), so now for they-coordinate
 227++CCB1 78           .LL134:                 ld      a,b                         ; If y1_hi is positive, jump down to LL135  to skip the following
 228++CCB2 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ;
 229++CCB5 28 1A                                jr      z,.LL135                    ;
 230++CCB7 32 AE 7F                             ld      (varS),a                    ; Otherwise y1_hi is negative, i.e. off the top of the screen, so set S = y1_hi
 231++CCBA 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; Set R = y1_lo
 232++CCBB 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 233++CCBE E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 234++CCC1 CD 5D CD                             call    LL123                       ;  Call LL123 to calculate: (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2      if T = 0  = y1 / gradient
 235++CCC4                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2      if T <> 0 = y1 * gradient
 236++CCC4                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 237++CCC4 C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 238++CCC7 D5                                   push    de
 239++CCC8 EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; de = x1
 240++CCC9 2A 2F CB                             ld      hl,(varYX)                  ; hl = varYX
 241++CCCC 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; we don't need to swap back as its an add, Set x1 = x1 + (Y X)
 242++CCCD D1                                   pop     de                          ; de = x2 again
 243++CCCE 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                        ; Set y1 = 0
 244++CCD1 79           .LL135:                 ld      a,c                         ; if bc < 128 then no work to do
 245++CCD2 E6 80                                and     $80
 246++CCD4 B0                                   or      b                           ; here we see if c bit 8 is set or anything in b as we know if its 0 this would mean there is no need to clip
 247++CCD5 C8                                   ret     z
 248++CCD6 E5                                   push    hl
 249++CCD7 60 69                                ld      hl,bc
 250++CCD9 01 80 00                             ld      bc,128
 251++CCDC B7                                   or      a
 252++CCDD ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc                       ; hl =  (S R) = (y1_hi y1_lo) - 128
 253++CCDF 22 AD 7F                             ld      (varRS), hl                 ; and now RS (or SR)
 254++CCE2 7C                                   ld      a,h
 255++CCE3 E1                                   pop     hl
 256++CCE4 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; If the subtraction underflowed, i.e. if y1 < 192, then y1 is already on-screen, so jump to LL136 to return from the subroutine, as we are done
 257++CCE7 C0                                   ret     nz
 258++CCE8              ; If we get here then y1 >= 192, i.e. off the bottom of the screen
 259++CCE8 E5 D5 C5     .LL139:                 push    hl,,de,,bc
 260++CCEB CD 5D CD                             call    LL123                       ;  Call LL123 to calculate: (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2      if T = 0  = y1 / gradient
 261++CCEE                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2      if T <> 0 = y1 * gradient
 262++CCEE                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 263++CCEE C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 264++CCF1 D5                                   push    de
 265++CCF2 EB                                   ex      hl,de
 266++CCF3 2A 2F CB                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 267++CCF6 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; we don't need to swap back as its an add, Set x1 = x1 + (Y X)
 268++CCF7 01 7F 00                             ld      bc,127                      ; set bc to 127 bottom of screen
 269++CCFA D1                                   pop     de
 270++CCFB C9           .LL136:                 ret                                 ;  Return from the subroutine
 271++CCFC                      ENDIF
 272++CCFC
 273++CCFC              ; Calculate the following:   * If T = 0  (more vertical than horizontal), (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2
 274++CCFC              ;                            * If T <> 0 (more horizontal than vertical), (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2
 275++CCFC              ;                              giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
 276++CCFC              ; Other entry points        LL122                Calculate (Y X) = (S R) * Q and set the sign to the opposite of the top byte on the stack
 277++CCFC 7D           LL120:                  ld      a,l                          ; Set R = x1_lo
 278++CCFD 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a
 279++CD00 CD BA CD                             call    LL129                        ;  Call LL129 to do the following:  Q = XX12+2   = line gradient  A = S EOR XX12+3 = S EOR slope direction (S R) = |S R| So A contains the sign of S * slope direction
 280++CD03 F5                                   push    af                           ;  Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 281++CD04 C5                                   push    bc
 282++CD05 47                                   ld      b,a
 283++CD06 3A C8 7F                             ld      a,(varT)                     ; instead : (Y X) = (S R ) / Q
 284++CD09 FE 00                                cp      0
 285++CD0B 78                                   ld      a,b
 286++CD0C C1                                   pop     bc                           ; we can't use af as that would disrupt the flags
 287++CD0D C2 24 CD                             jp      nz, .LL121
 288++CD10              ; The following calculates:  (Y X) = (S R) * Q using the same shift-and-add algorithm that's documented in MULT1
 289++CD10 3A 2A CB     .LL122:                  ld      a,(clipGradient)
 290++CD13 32 AC 7F                             ld      (varQ),a; optimise
 291++CD16 CD 60 91                             call    HLequSRmulQdiv256
 292++CD19 22 2F CB                             ld      (varYX),hl
 293++CD1C F1                                   pop     af
 294++CD1D ED 27 80                             test    $80
 295++CD20 CA 50 CD                             jp      z,.LL133
 296++CD23 C9                                   ret
 297++CD24 11 FE FF     .LL121:                  ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 298++CD27 2A AD 7F                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ; hl = RS
 299++CD2A 3A AC 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
 300++CD2D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = q
 301++CD2E              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 301++CD2E CB 25       >			   sla l
 301++CD30 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 302++CD32 7C                                   ld      a,h
 303++CD33 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 304++CD35                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 304++CD35 B8          >                        cp      b
 304++CD36 DA 41 CD    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 305++CD39 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 306++CD3A 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; q
 307++CD3B 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 308++CD3C 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 309++CD3D DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 310++CD3F 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 311++CD40 3F                                   ccf
 312++CD41              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 312++CD41 CB 13       >               rl  e
 312++CD43 CB 12       >               rl  d
 313++CD45 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 314++CD47 ED 53 2F CB                          ld      (varYX),de
 315++CD4B F1                                   pop     af              ; get back sign
 316++CD4C ED 27 80                             test    $80
 317++CD4F C8                                   ret     z               ; if negative then return with value as is reversed sign
 318++CD50 2A 2F CB     .LL133:                 ld      hl,(varYX)      ; may not actually need this?
 319++CD53                                      NegHL
 319++CD53 AF          >                    xor a
 319++CD54 95          >                    sub l
 319++CD55 6F          >                    ld l,a
 319++CD56 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 319++CD57 94          >                    sub h
 319++CD58 67          >                    ld h,a
 320++CD59 22 2F CB                             ld      (varYX),hl
 321++CD5C C9           .LL128:                 ret
 322++CD5D
 323++CD5D
 324++CD5D
 325++CD5D
 326++CD5D              ; Calculate the following: * If T = 0,  calculate (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2 (actually SR & XX12+2 /256)
 327++CD5D              ;                          * If T <> 0, calculate (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2
 328++CD5D              ;                          giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
 329++CD5D              ;
 330++CD5D              ; Other entry points:      LL121                Calculate (Y X) = (S R) / Q and set the sign to the opposite of the top byte on the stack
 331++CD5D              ;                          LL133                Negate (Y X) and return from the subroutine
 332++CD5D              ;                          LL128                Contains an RTS
 333++CD5D CD BA CD     LL123:                  call    LL129                       ; Call LL129 to do the following: Q = XX12+2   = line gradient  A = S EOR XX12+3 = S EOR slope direction (S R) = |S R| So A contains the sign of S * slope direction
 334++CD60 F5                                   push    af                          ; Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 335++CD61 C5                                   push    bc                          ; If T is non-zero, so it's more horizontal than vertical, jump down to LL121 to calculate this
 336++CD62 47                                   ld      b,a
 337++CD63 3A C8 7F                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; instead : (Y X) = (S R) * Q *** this looks to be the wrong way roudn for Y!!!!
 338++CD66 FE 00                                cp      0
 339++CD68 78                                   ld      a,b
 340++CD69 C1                                   pop     bc
 341++CD6A C2 A6 CD                             jp      nz, .LL122
 342++CD6D              ; The following calculates: (Y X) = (S R) / Q using the same shift-and-subtract algorithm that's documented in TIS2, its actually X.Y=R.S*256/Q
 343++CD6D 11 FE FF     .LL121:                 ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 344++CD70 2A AD 7F                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ; hl = RS
 345++CD73 3A AC 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
 346++CD76 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = q
 347++CD77              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 347++CD77 CB 25       >			   sla l
 347++CD79 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 348++CD7B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 349++CD7C 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 350++CD7E                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 350++CD7E B8          >                        cp      b
 350++CD7F DA 8A CD    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 351++CD82 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 352++CD83 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; q
 353++CD84 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 354++CD85 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 355++CD86 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 356++CD88 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 357++CD89 3F                                   ccf
 358++CD8A              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 358++CD8A CB 13       >               rl  e
 358++CD8C CB 12       >               rl  d
 359++CD8E 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 360++CD90 ED 53 2F CB                          ld      (varYX),de
 361++CD94 F1                                   pop     af              ; get back sign
 362++CD95 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 363++CD98 C8                                   ret     z               ; if negative then return with value as is reversed sign
 364++CD99 2A 2F CB     .LL133:                 ld      hl,(varYX)      ; may not actually need this?
 365++CD9C                                      NegHL
 365++CD9C AF          >                    xor a
 365++CD9D 95          >                    sub l
 365++CD9E 6F          >                    ld l,a
 365++CD9F 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 365++CDA0 94          >                    sub h
 365++CDA1 67          >                    ld h,a
 366++CDA2 22 2F CB                             ld      (varYX),hl
 367++CDA5 C9           .LL128:                 ret
 368++CDA6              ; The following calculates:  (Y X) = (S R) * Q using the same shift-and-add algorithm that's documented in MULT1
 369++CDA6 3A 2A CB     .LL122:                 ld      a,(clipGradient)
 370++CDA9 32 AC 7F                             ld      (varQ),a; optimise
 371++CDAC CD 60 91                             call    HLequSRmulQdiv256
 372++CDAF 22 2F CB                             ld      (varYX),hl
 373++CDB2 F1                                   pop     af
 374++CDB3 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 375++CDB6 CA 99 CD                             jp      z,.LL133
 376++CDB9 C9                                   ret
 377++CDBA
 378++CDBA              ; Do the following, in this order:  Q = XX12+2
 379++CDBA              ;                                   A = S EOR XX12+3
 380++CDBA              ;                                   (S R) = |S R|
 381++CDBA              ; This sets up the variables required above to calculate (S R) / XX12+2 and give the result the opposite sign to XX13+3.
 382++CDBA 3A 2A CB     LL129:                  ld      a,(clipGradient)
 383++CDBD 32 AC 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Set Q = XX12+2
 384++CDC0 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; If S is positive, jump to LL127
 385++CDC3 E5 F5                                push    hl,,af                      ; else
 386++CDC5 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ;   if bit 7 is clear
 387++CDC8 28 0C                                jr      z,.LL127                    ;      RS = ABS RS
 388++CDCA 2A AD 7F                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ;      .
 389++CDCD                                      NegHL                               ;      .
 389++CDCD AF          >                    xor a
 389++CDCE 95          >                    sub l
 389++CDCF 6F          >                    ld l,a
 389++CDD0 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 389++CDD1 94          >                    sub h
 389++CDD2 67          >                    ld h,a
 390++CDD3 22 AD 7F                             ld      (varRS),hl                  ;      .
 391++CDD6 21 2B CB     .LL127:                 ld      hl,clipDxySign              ;   hl = dxy sign
 392++CDD9 F1                                   pop     af                          ;
 393++CDDA AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; a = S XOR clipDxySign
 394++CDDB E1                                   pop     hl
 395++CDDC C9                                   ret
 396++CDDD
 397++CDDD              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 398++CDDD              ; Thow away out of bounds by more than 250
 399++CDDD              ClipLineV3:             ;break
 400++CDDD                      IFDEF       CLIPVersion3
 401++CDDD ~            ;My logic version
 402++CDDD ~            .CheckYorder:
 403++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipY1)
 404++CDDD ~                                    ld      de,(UbnkPreClipY2)
 405++CDDD ~                                    call    CompareHLDESgn
 406++CDDD ~                                    jr      c,.LineP1toP2                          ; if Y1 < Y2 then we can use the points as is else we have to swap
 407++CDDD ~            .LineP2toP1:            ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY2)                      ; fetch and write out in reverse
 408++CDDD ~                                    ld      ix,(UbnkPreClipY1)
 409++CDDD ~                                    ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX1)
 410++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX2)
 411++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipY1),bc                      ; bc - XX15(2,3) Y1
 412++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipY2),ix                      ; ix - XX12(0,1) Y2
 413++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipX1),hl                      ; hl - XX15(0,1) X1
 414++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipX2),de                      ;  de - XX15(4,5) X2
 415++CDDD ~                                    jp      .CheckNoClip
 416++CDDD ~            .LineP1toP2             ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)                      ; bc - XX15(2,3) Y1
 417++CDDD ~                                    ld      ix,(UbnkPreClipY2)                      ; ix - XX12(0,1) Y2
 418++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)                      ; hl - XX15(0,1) X1
 419++CDDD ~                                    ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)                      ; de - XX15(4,5) X2
 420++CDDD ~            .CheckNoClip:           ld      a,b
 421++CDDD ~                                    or      d
 422++CDDD ~                                    or      h
 423++CDDD ~                                    or      ixh
 424++CDDD ~                                    jp      nz,.CheckXOffScreen                 ; if both Y1 and y2 have bit 7 set
 425++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,c                                 ; then we clip
 426++CDDD ~                                    and     ixl
 427++CDDD ~                                    test    $80
 428++CDDD ~                                    jp      z, .ClipComplete
 429++CDDD ~            ;if either x1hi x2hi are 0 then we clip. if both <> 0and both same sign exit
 430++CDDD ~            .CheckXOffScreen:       ld      a,h
 431++CDDD ~                                    xor     d
 432++CDDD ~                                    test    $80                                 ; non descructive test of bit 7 is set
 433++CDDD ~                                    jp      nz,.X1X2OppositeSign                ; if bit 7 was set then x1 and x2 must be opposite signs so its on screen
 434++CDDD ~            .X1X2SameSigns:         ld      a,h                                 ; so to get there h and d must be the same sign
 435++CDDD ~                                    test    $80                                 ; if they are the same sign and at x1 is negative then x2 must be negative so off screen
 436++CDDD ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero .X1X2CheckIfBothRight
 437++CDDD ~            .X1X2BothNegative:      SetCarryFlag                                ; to get to here x1 and x2 must be high and off the same sign so its not to draw
 438++CDDD ~                                    ret
 439++CDDD ~            .X1X2CheckIfBothRight:  and     a                                   ; we have h in a already
 440++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.X1OnScreen
 441++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,d
 442++CDDD ~                                    and     a
 443++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.X2OnScreen
 444++CDDD ~            .X1X2OffRightSide:      SetCarryFlag                                ; to get to here x1 and x2 must be high and off the same sign so its not to draw
 445++CDDD ~                                    ret
 446++CDDD ~            ;                       to get to here x1 and x2 either span -ve to +ve or from on screen to off screen
 447++CDDD ~            .X1OnScreen:
 448++CDDD ~            .X2OnScreen:
 449++CDDD ~            .X1X2OppositeSign:
 450++CDDD ~            ;                       Now check to see if Y is off screen
 451++CDDD ~            .CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b                                     ; Check if y1 and y2 are opposite signs, fi so it spans screen so we are good
 452++CDDD ~            .CheckBothYNegative:    xor     ixh
 453++CDDD ~                                    test    $80                                     ; if bit 7 is set then opposite signs
 454++CDDD ~                                    jp      nz,.Y1Y2OppositeSign                    ; if y1 and y2 are opposite signs its on screen and spans at least one side
 455++CDDD ~            .Y1Y2SameSign:          ld      a,b                                     ; if they are the same sign then if one is negative, so is the other so off screen
 456++CDDD ~                                    test    $80
 457++CDDD ~                                    jp      z,.Y1Y2Positive
 458++CDDD ~            .Y1Y2Negative:          SetCarryFlag
 459++CDDD ~                                    ret
 460++CDDD ~            .Y1Y2Positive:          ld      a,c                                     ; if its the same sign y1 or y2 could be 0 and if they are
 461++CDDD ~                                    and     $80                                     ; this will test to see if b >0 or c > 127
 462++CDDD ~                                    or      b                                       ;
 463++CDDD ~                                    jp      z,.Y1OnScreen
 464++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,ixl
 465++CDDD ~                                    and     $80
 466++CDDD ~                                    or      ixh
 467++CDDD ~                                    jp      z,.Y2OnScreen
 468++CDDD ~            .Y1Y2OffBottomSide:     SetCarryFlag
 469++CDDD ~                                    ret
 470++CDDD ~            .Y1OnScreen:
 471++CDDD ~            .Y2OnScreen:
 472++CDDD ~            .Y1Y2OppositeSign:
 473++CDDD ~            .StartProcessing:       ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)                      ; Now we can test and Clip
 474++CDDD ~                                    ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)                      ; de - XX15(4,5)
 475++CDDD ~                                    ld      iyh,0                                   ; set iyh flags to 0
 476++CDDD ~            ; if x1hi or y1 high <> 0 or y1 > 127 then set bit 1 of clipcoord       ; we can optimise this later
 477++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,h
 478++CDDD ~                                    or      b
 479++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.CheckP1Ylo
 480++CDDD ~            ;                       iyh     bit 0 - P1 Needs Clipping
 481++CDDD ~            ;                               bit 1 - P2 Needs Clipping
 482++CDDD ~            ;                               bit 2 - x1 >= x2 (left to right)
 483++CDDD ~            ;                               bit 3 - y1 >= y2 (top to bottom)
 484++CDDD ~            ;                               bit 4 -  DY/DX (steep)
 485++CDDD ~            .P1OffScreen:           ld      iyh,1                                   ; if either p1 x or y was off screen set bit 0 to 1
 486++CDDD ~                                    jp      .CheckP2OffScreen                       ; .
 487++CDDD ~            .CheckP1Ylo:            ld      a,c                                     ; .
 488++CDDD ~                                    and     $80                                     ; .
 489++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.CheckP2OffScreen                     ; .
 490++CDDD ~                                    ld      iyh,1                                   ; .
 491++CDDD ~            .CheckP2OffScreen:      ld      a,d                                     ; if x2hi or y2 off screen then set bit 2 of clipcoord to 1
 492++CDDD ~                                    or      ixh                                     ; .
 493++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.CheckP2Ylo                           ; .
 494++CDDD ~            .P2OffScreen:           ld      a,iyh                                   ; .
 495++CDDD ~                                    or      2                                       ; .
 496++CDDD ~                                    ld      iyh,a                                   ; .
 497++CDDD ~                                    jp      .CheckXDirection                        ; .
 498++CDDD ~            .CheckP2Ylo:            ld      a,ixl                                   ; .
 499++CDDD ~                                    and     $80                                     ; .
 500++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.CheckXDirection                      ; .
 501++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,iyh                                   ; .
 502++CDDD ~                                    or      2                                       ; .
 503++CDDD ~                                    ld      iyh,a                                   ; .
 504++CDDD ~            .CheckXDirection:       push    de,,hl
 505++CDDD ~                                    call    CompareHLDESgn                          ; IF HL equals DE, Z=1,C=0, IF HL is less than DE, Z=0,C=1, IF HL is more than DE, Z=0,C=0
 506++CDDD ~                                    pop     de,,hl
 507++CDDD ~                                    jp      c,.CalculateDx                          ;
 508++CDDD ~            .X1gteX2:               ld      a,iyh                                   ; if x1 >= x2 then set bit 3 to denote -ve x direction, note we will eliminate horziontal / vertical early as an optimisation
 509++CDDD ~                                    or      4                                       ; .
 510++CDDD ~                                    ld      iyh,a                                   ; .
 511++CDDD ~                                    ; Y Direction is now always top to bottom
 512++CDDD ~            .CalculateDx:           ClearCarryFlag                                  ;                       calculate DX
 513++CDDD ~                                    sbc     hl,de                                   ; .
 514++CDDD ~            .ABSDX:                 ld      a,h                                     ; HL = | HL - DE |
 515++CDDD ~                                    test    $80                                     ; .
 516++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.DXPositive                           ; .
 517++CDDD ~                                    macronegate16hl                                 ; .
 518++CDDD ~            .DXPositive:            ex      de,hl                                   ; de = abs delta x
 519++CDDD ~            .CalculateDy:           ClearCarryFlag                                  ; hl = Y2 -Y1 as its pre sorted its always positive if on screen
 520++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,ix                                   ; iy = hl = Y2 - Y1
 521++CDDD ~                                    sbc     hl,bc                                   ; .
 522++CDDD ~            .DYPositive:            ; Scale DX and DY to 8 bit, by here hl = abs dy, de = abs dx
 523++CDDD ~            ;calculate DY
 524++CDDD ~            .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h                                     ; At this point DX and DY are ABS values
 525++CDDD ~                                    or      d                                       ; .
 526++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.ScaleDone                            ; .
 527++CDDD ~                                    ShiftDERight1                                   ; .
 528++CDDD ~                                    ShiftHLRight1                                   ; .
 529++CDDD ~                                    jr      .ScaleLoop                              ; scaled down Dx and Dy to 8 bit, Dy may have been;;                                                                                               negative
 530++CDDD ~            .ScaleDone:             ; hl = ABS DY, DE = ABS DX,  bc = Y1, ix = Y2,   note H and D will be zero
 531++CDDD ~            ; if Dx = 0 then horizontal line and clip X1 & X2 only then exit
 532++CDDD ~            ; if Dy = 0 then vertical line and clip Y1 & Y2 only then exit
 533++CDDD ~
 534++CDDD ~            ; if DX < DY  gradient = 256 * delta_x_lo / delta_y_lo
 535++CDDD ~            ;        else gradient = 256 * delta_y_lo / delta_x_lo, set bit 5 of clipcord
 536++CDDD ~            .CalculateDelta:        ld      a,e                                     ; if DX < DY goto DX/DY
 537++CDDD ~                                    JumpIfALTNusng l,.DXdivDY                       ; else do DY/DX
 538++CDDD ~            .DYdivDX:               ld      a,l                                     ;    A = DY
 539++CDDD ~                                    ld      d,e                                     ;    D = DX
 540++CDDD ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivD                         ;    A = R = 256 * DY / DX
 541++CDDD ~            .SaveGradientDYDX:      ld      (Gradient),a
 542++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,iyh                                   ;    bit 5 of iyh denotes that its a DX/DY (steep), if its clear its DY/DX (shallow)
 543++CDDD ~                                    or      16                                      ;    .
 544++CDDD ~                                    ld      iyh,a                                   ;    .
 545++CDDD ~                                    jp      .ClipP1                                 ;    .
 546++CDDD ~            .DXdivDY:               ld      a,e                                     ;    A = DX
 547++CDDD ~                                    ld      d,l                                     ;    D = DY
 548++CDDD ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivD                         ;    A = R = 256 * DX / DY
 549++CDDD ~            .SaveGradientDXDY:      ld      (Gradient),a
 550++CDDD ~            ; if bit 1 of clipccord is set call    LL118
 551++CDDD ~            .ClipP1:                ld      a,iyh                                   ; if bit 1 is clear to say no need to clip pont 1 we just jump to point 2
 552++CDDD ~                                    test    1                                       ; .
 553++CDDD ~                                    jp      z,.ClipP2                               ; .
 554++CDDD ~                                    call    LL118v3                                 ; else clip P1 first
 555++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,b                                     ;      and if b or h have a value its failed to totally clip  as it may be only in bounds on just x or y
 556++CDDD ~                                    or      h                                       ;      .
 557++CDDD ~                                    jr      z, .P1Ygt127Check                       ;      .
 558++CDDD ~            .P1HighOutofBounds:     SetCarryFlag                                    ;      .
 559++CDDD ~                                    ret                                             ;      .
 560++CDDD ~            .P1Ygt127Check:         ld      a,c                                     ;      or if y > 127 its failed to totally clip
 561++CDDD ~                                    test    $80                                     ;      .
 562++CDDD ~                                    SetCarryFlag                                    ;      .
 563++CDDD ~                                    ret     nz                                      ;      .
 564++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipY1), bc                     ;      else its valid and clipped point 1 so save ti back
 565++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipX1), hl
 566++CDDD ~            ; if bit 2 of clipcoord is set
 567++CDDD ~            ;        swap x1y1 with x2y2
 568++CDDD ~            ;        call    LL118
 569++CDDD ~            .ClipP2:                ld      a,iyh                                   ; so now repeat all that for point 2
 570++CDDD ~                                    and     2
 571++CDDD ~                                    jp      z,.ClipComplete
 572++CDDD ~                                    call    LL118v3PreSwap                          ; now clip p2
 573++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,b                                     ; if either high is set then it failed to properly clip
 574++CDDD ~                                    or      h                                       ; .
 575++CDDD ~                                    jr      z, .P2Ygt127Check                       ; .
 576++CDDD ~            .P2HighOutofBounds:     SetCarryFlag                                    ; .
 577++CDDD ~                                    ret                                             ; .
 578++CDDD ~            .P2Ygt127Check:         ld      a,c                                     ; if c > 127 then it also failed to clip
 579++CDDD ~                                    test    $80                                     ; .
 580++CDDD ~                                    SetCarryFlag                                    ; .
 581++CDDD ~                                    ret     nz                                      ; .
 582++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipY2), bc                     ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 583++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipX2), hl
 584++CDDD ~            ;clip compelte exit
 585++CDDD ~            .ClipComplete:          ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)                      ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 586++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)
 587++CDDD ~                                    ld      ix,(UbnkPreClipY2)                      ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 588++CDDD ~                                    ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)
 589++CDDD ~            .SaveClippedLine:       ld      a,c                                     ; Y1 = y1 lo, x2 = x2 lo, x1 = x1 lo y1 = y1 lo                                   -- Nothing off screen
 590++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UBnkNewY1),a
 591++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,ixl
 592++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UBnkNewY2),a
 593++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,l
 594++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UBnkNewX1),a
 595++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,e
 596++CDDD ~                                    ld      (UBnkNewX2),a
 597++CDDD ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                              ; we have a success so not carry
 598++CDDD ~                                    ret
 599++CDDD ~            ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 600++CDDD ~            LL118v3PreSwap:         ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY2)                  ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 601++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX2)
 602++CDDD ~                                    jp      LL118v3Fetched
 603++CDDD ~            ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 604++CDDD ~            LL118v3:                ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)                  ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 605++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)
 606++CDDD ~            ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 607++CDDD ~            LL118v3Fetched:
 608++CDDD ~            ;                       At this point bc = y position, hl = x position both 16 bit
 609++CDDD ~            ;                       if x < 0 then x = 0
 610++CDDD ~            ;                                     adjust = -x */ gradient depending on if its steep or shallow
 611++CDDD ~            ;                                     y = y +- adjust depending on if we are going +ve direction or negative direction  (or simplify it, that it will always be + for x1y1 and - for x2y2 as we pre-sort)
 612++CDDD ~            ;                       if x > 255 then x = 255
 613++CDDD ~            ;                                     adjust = x-255 */ gradient
 614++CDDD ~            ;                                     y = y +- adjust depending on if we are going +ve direction or negative direction  (or simplify it, that it will always be + for x1y1 and - for x2y2 as we pre-sort)
 615++CDDD ~            ;                       if y < 0 then y = 0
 616++CDDD ~            ;                                     adjust = -y */ gradient
 617++CDDD ~            ;                                     x = x +- adjust depending on if we are going left to right or visa versa
 618++CDDD ~            ;                       if y >127 then y = 127
 619++CDDD ~            ;                                     adjust = y-127 */ gradient
 620++CDDD ~            ;                                     x = x +- adjust depending on if we are going left to right or visa versa
 621++CDDD ~            ;
 622++CDDD ~            ;                       iyh     bit 0 - P1 Needs Clipping
 623++CDDD ~            ;                               bit 1 - P2 Needs Clipping
 624++CDDD ~            ;                               bit 2 - x1 >= x2 (left to right)
 625++CDDD ~            ;                               bit 3 - y1 >= y2 (top to bottom)
 626++CDDD ~            ;                               bit 4 -  DY/DX (steep)
 627++CDDD ~            ; if X1 hi <> 0
 628++CDDD ~            LL118:                  ;break
 629++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,h                                     ; if x1 high is 0 then we don't need to clip x at all
 630++CDDD ~                                    and     a
 631++CDDD ~                                    jp      z,.X1NoClipNeeded
 632++CDDD ~            ;                       if x1 hi bit 7 is set (so negative)
 633++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockX:            test    $80                                     ; if h is postiive then jump to the XPositive Calc block
 634++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.CalcBlockXPositive
 635++CDDD ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = abs(X1) / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 636++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockXNegative:    ld      a,iyh                                   ;
 637++CDDD ~                                    test    16                                      ; bit 5 of iyh denotes that its a DY/DX, if its clear its DX/DY
 638++CDDD ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockXNegMulGrad
 639++CDDD ~            .CaclBlockXNegDivGrad:  macronegate16hl
 640++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)
 641++CDDD ~                                    push    bc                                      ; abs(X1) / Gradient
 642++CDDD ~                                    ld      h,c                     ; move offset into high byte of h
 643++CDDD ~                                    ld      l,0
 644++CDDD ~                                    ld      c,a
 645++CDDD ~                                    call    div_hl_c
 646++CDDD ~                                    pop     bc
 647++CDDD ~                                    jp      .DoneXNegCalc
 648++CDDD ~            ;                       else set Adjust = abs(X1) * Gradient
 649++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockXNegMulGrad:  push    bc                                      ; abs(X1) * Gradient
 650++CDDD ~                                    macronegate16hl
 651++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)
 652++CDDD ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256
 653++CDDD ~                                    pop     bc
 654++CDDD ~            ;                       y1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 4 of clipcoord is set)
 655++CDDD ~            ;                       x1 = 0 then call into DonrX1Calc
 656++CDDD ~            ;                       we can skip the test for negative Y direection
 657++CDDD ~            .DoneXNegCalc:          macronegate16hl
 658++CDDD ~            .XNegSkipNegate:        ld      de,bc
 659++CDDD ~                                    ex      hl,de
 660++CDDD ~                                    add     hl,de
 661++CDDD ~                                    ld      bc,hl
 662++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,0
 663++CDDD ~                                    jp      .DoneXCalc
 664++CDDD ~            ;                       else x1 hi is positive
 665++CDDD ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = X1 lo / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 666++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockXPositive:    ld      a,iyh
 667++CDDD ~                                    test    16
 668++CDDD ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockXPosMulGrad
 669++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockXPosDivGrad:  ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 670++CDDD ~                                    push    bc
 671++CDDD ~                                    ld      c,a
 672++CDDD ~                                    ld      de,255
 673++CDDD ~                                    sub     hl,de
 674++CDDD ~                                    ld      h,l
 675++CDDD ~                                    ld      l,0
 676++CDDD ~                                    call    div_hl_c
 677++CDDD ~                                    pop     bc
 678++CDDD ~                                    jp      .DoneX2Calc
 679++CDDD ~            ;                                 else set Adjust = X1 lo * Gradient
 680++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockXPosMulGrad:  push    bc
 681++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 682++CDDD ~                                    ld      de,255
 683++CDDD ~                                    sub     hl,de
 684++CDDD ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 685++CDDD ~                                    pop     bc
 686++CDDD ~            ;                       y1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 4 of clipcoord is set)
 687++CDDD ~            ;                       x1 = 255
 688++CDDD ~            ;                       we can skip the test for negative Y direection
 689++CDDD ~            .DoneX2Calc:            macronegate16hl
 690++CDDD ~            .X2SkipNegate:          ex      de,hl
 691++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 692++CDDD ~                                    add     hl,de
 693++CDDD ~                                    ld      bc,hl
 694++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,255
 695++CDDD ~            ;                       if Y1 hi <> 0 or Y1 low >= 128 then y coordinate is good
 696++CDDD ~            .DoneXCalc:             ld      a,b
 697++CDDD ~                                    and     a
 698++CDDD ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockY1Test
 699++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,c
 700++CDDD ~                                    and     $80
 701++CDDD ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                  ; speculative clear of carry in case its good
 702++CDDD ~                                    ret     z
 703++CDDD ~            ;                       if Y1 hi bit 7 is set
 704++CDDD ~            .X1NoClipNeeded:
 705++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockY1Test:       ld      a,b
 706++CDDD ~                                    test    $80
 707++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.CalcBlockYPos       ; if Y is positive jump forward
 708++CDDD ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = abs(Y1) / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 709++CDDD ~                                    break
 710++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockY1:           ld      a,iyh
 711++CDDD ~                                    test    16
 712++CDDD ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockYNegMulGrad
 713++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockYNegDivGrad:  macronegate16bc
 714++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 715++CDDD ~                                    push    hl
 716++CDDD ~                                    ld      h,c                     ; move offset into high byte of h
 717++CDDD ~                                    ld      l,0
 718++CDDD ~                                    ld      c,a
 719++CDDD ~                                    call    div_hl_c;LLHLdivC;div_hl_c
 720++CDDD ~                                    pop     de
 721++CDDD ~                                    ex      de,hl
 722++CDDD ~                                    jp      .DoneBlockY1
 723++CDDD ~            ;                                 else set Adjust = abs(Y1) * Gradient
 724++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockYNegMulGrad:  macronegate16bc
 725++CDDD ~                                    push    hl
 726++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 727++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 728++CDDD ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 729++CDDD ~                                    pop     de
 730++CDDD ~                                    ex      de,hl
 731++CDDD ~            ;                       x1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 3 of clipcoord is set)
 732++CDDD ~            ;                       y1 = 0
 733++CDDD ~            ;                       ret
 734++CDDD ~            ;                       now we have done the adjustment, if y or x are off screen then the line spans screen in only 1 dimension so doesn't get drawn
 735++CDDD ~            .DoneBlockY1:           ld      a,iyh
 736++CDDD ~                                    test    4
 737++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.Y1SkipNegate
 738++CDDD ~                                    macronegate16de
 739++CDDD ~            .Y1SkipNegate:          add     hl,de
 740++CDDD ~                                    ld      bc,0
 741++CDDD ~                                    ret
 742++CDDD ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = Y1 lo / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 743++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockYPos:         ld      a,iyh
 744++CDDD ~                                    test    16
 745++CDDD ~                                    jr      z,.CalcBlockYPosMulGrad
 746++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockYPosDivGrad:  ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 747++CDDD ~                                    push    hl
 748++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 749++CDDD ~                                    ld      de,127
 750++CDDD ~                                    sub     hl,de
 751++CDDD ~                                    ld      h,l
 752++CDDD ~                                    ld      l,0
 753++CDDD ~                                    ld      c,a
 754++CDDD ~                                    call    div_hl_c;LLHLdivC
 755++CDDD ~                                    pop     de
 756++CDDD ~                                    ex      de,hl
 757++CDDD ~                                    jp      .DoneBlockY2
 758++CDDD ~            ;                                 else set Adjust = Y1 lo * Gradient
 759++CDDD ~            .CalcBlockYPosMulGrad:  push    hl
 760++CDDD ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 761++CDDD ~                                    ld      de,127
 762++CDDD ~                                    sub     hl,de
 763++CDDD ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)
 764++CDDD ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 765++CDDD ~                                    pop     de
 766++CDDD ~                                    ex      de,hl
 767++CDDD ~            ;                x1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 3 of clipcoord is set)
 768++CDDD ~            ;                y1 = 127
 769++CDDD ~            .DoneBlockY2:           ld      a,iyh
 770++CDDD ~                                    test    4
 771++CDDD ~                                    jr      nz,.Y2SkipNegate
 772++CDDD ~                                    macronegate16de
 773++CDDD ~            .Y2SkipNegate:          add     hl,de
 774++CDDD ~                                    ld      bc,127
 775++CDDD ~                                    ret
 776++CDDD                      ELSE
 777++CDDD C9                       ret
 778++CDDE                      ENDIF
 779++CDDE              ; old code for on screen test
 780++CDDE              ;;;;;;; if y1 > 127 and y2 > 127 then same sing and exit
 781++CDDE              ;;;;;;
 782++CDDE              ;;;;;;;if y1hi y2hi are <> 0 and both same sign exit
 783++CDDE              ;;;;;;.CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b                                 ; y1 and y2 high tests
 784++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh
 785++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        jp      .CheckYLow
 786++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ld
 787++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     a                                   ; if either is zero then we can check for > 127
 788++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.YHighNegativeCheck               ;
 789++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,ixh                               ;
 790++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     a                                   ;
 791++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz                                  ;
 792++CDDE              ;;;;;;;if y1h bit 7 and y2h bit 7 set then exit as both -ve
 793++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b                                 ;
 794++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh                                 ;
 795++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     $80                                 ;
 796++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;
 797++CDDE              ;;;;;;;if y1h > 0 and y2h > 0 then exit as both are +ve high
 798++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b                                 ;
 799++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh                                 ;
 800++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz                                  ;
 801++CDDE              ;;;;;;;if y1h or y2h is not 0 then proceed to clip
 802++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b
 803++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        or      ixh
 804++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.StartProcessing
 805++CDDE              ;;;;;;;if (y1l bit 7 is set and y1h is clear ) or (y2l bit 7 is set and y2h is clear) the proceed to clip
 806++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,c
 807++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        or      ixl
 808++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 809++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.StartProcessing
 810++CDDE              ;;;;;;
 811++CDDE              ;;;;;;.CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b                                 ;
 812++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 813++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.Y1HighIsZero                     ;
 814++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,ixh                               ; if we get here Y1 high <> 0
 815++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 816++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.Y2HighIsZero                     ; if they are both non zero we can do a sign check
 817++CDDE              ;;;;;;.CheckYSameSign:        ld      a,b                                 ; if we get here Y1 high and Y2 high are not zero
 818++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        xor     ixh                                 ; so same sign then bail out if they are
 819++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     $80                                 ;
 820++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;
 821++CDDE              ;;;;;;;if we get here either y1hi or y2 hi are 0, now check and y1 low > 127 & y2 low > 127, exit
 822++CDDE              ;;;;;;.Y1HighIsZero:          ld      a,ixh                               ; as y1h is zero, if y2h is zero we do y1 y2 test
 823++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 824++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.Startprocessing                 ;
 825++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,c                                 ; so by here y1h and y2h must be zero
 826++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     ixl
 827++CDDE              ;;;;;;
 828++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        .CheckY2Lo                        ;
 829++CDDE              ;;;;;;.CheckY1Lo:             ld      a,c
 830++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 831++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.StartProcessing
 832++CDDE              ;;;;;;.CheckY2Lo:             ld      a,ixl
 833++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 834++CDDE              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz
 835++CDDE              ;;;;;;;clip = 0
# file closed: ././ModelRender/CLIP-LL145.asm

 859+ CDDE                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
   1++CDDE              ; Set TransMatTo
   2++CDDE              ; XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)   = sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z XX16(13,12) (15 14) (17 16)
   3++CDDE              ; XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10) = roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10)
   4++CDDE              ; XX16(13 12) (15 14) (17 16) = nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)
   5++CDDE              ; This moves Side XYZ to position 0, Roof XYZ to position 1 annd nose XYZ to position 2 as a copy of each batch of 6 bytes
   6++CDDE              ; 18 byte fast copy
   7++CDDE
   8++CDDE              ; Fast copy using the stack                                                         ; T states
   9++CDDE F3           CopyRotmatToTransMat:   di                                                          ; disable interrups to protect during copy
  10++CDDF DD 21 00 00                          ld      ix,0                                                ; 14
  11++CDE3 DD 39                                add     ix,sp                                               ; 15
  12++CDE5 31 2A C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatSidevX ; Source                        ; 10
  13++CDE8 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  14++CDE9 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  15++CDEA C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  16++CDEB D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  17++CDEC E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvX              ; 10
  18++CDED D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvY              ; 10
  19++CDEE C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvZ              ; 10
  20++CDEF 31 8D C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatRoofvZ+2 ; Target + 2 reversed       ; 10
  21++CDF2 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  22++CDF3 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  23++CDF4 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  24++CDF5 D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  25++CDF6 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  26++CDF7 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  27++CDF8 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  28++CDF9 31 36 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatNosevX ; Source                        ; 10
  29++CDFC E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  30++CDFD D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  31++CDFE C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  32++CDFF 31 93 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+2                             ; 10
  33++CE02 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  34++CE03 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  35++CE04 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  36++CE05 DD F9                                ld      sp,ix               ; restore stack                 ; 10
  37++CE07                                  IFNDEF INTERRUPS_DISABLE
  38++CE07 FB                                   ei
  39++CE08                                  ENDIF
  40++CE08 C9                                   ret                                                         ; 10 Total 267 (LDI version is 318)
  41++CE09
  42++CE09
  43++CE09
  44++CE09              ;CopyRotmatToTransMat:
  45++CE09              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  46++CE09              ;                        ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  47++CE09              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  48++CE09              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  49++CE09              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatRoofvX
  50++CE09              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  51++CE09              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  52++CE09              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatNosevX
  53++CE09              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  54++CE09              ;                        ret
  55++CE09
  56++CE09              CopyRotToTransMacro:    MACRO
  57++CE09 ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  58++CE09 ~                                    ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  59++CE09 ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  60++CE09 ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  61++CE09 ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  62++CE09                                      ENDM
  63++CE09

 860+ CE09                                      include "./Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
   1++CE09              TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15:
   2++CE09 2A CC C0             ld		hl,(UBnkXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++CE0C 7C           		ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++CE0D E6 80        		and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++CE0F 47           		ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++CE10                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++CE10 7C                   ld      a,h
   8++CE11 E6 7F                and     $7F
   9++CE13 67                   ld      h,a
  10++CE14                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++CE14 ED 5B 20 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKxlo)						;
  12++CE18 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++CE1B E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++CE1D 4F           		ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++CE1E CD 33 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++CE21 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++CE22 67           		ld		h,a
  18++CE23 22 C6 C0     		ld		(UBnkXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++CE26              ; ..................................
  20++CE26 2A CE C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++CE29 7C           		ld		a,h
  22++CE2A E6 80        		and		$80
  23++CE2C 47           		ld		b,a
  24++CE2D                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++CE2D 7C                   ld      a,h
  26++CE2E E6 7F                and     $7F
  27++CE30 67                   ld      h,a
  28++CE31                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++CE31 ED 5B 23 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKylo)
  30++CE35 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKysgn)
  31++CE38 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++CE3A 4F           		ld		c,a
  33++CE3B CD 33 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++CE3E B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++CE3F 67           		ld		h,a
  36++CE40 22 C8 C0     		ld		(UBnkYScaled),hl
  37++CE43              ; ..................................
  38++CE43 2A D0 C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++CE46 7C           		ld		a,h
  40++CE47 E6 80        		and		$80
  41++CE49 47           		ld		b,a
  42++CE4A                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++CE4A 7C                   ld      a,h
  44++CE4B E6 7F                and     $7F
  45++CE4D 67                   ld      h,a
  46++CE4E                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++CE4E ED 5B 26 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKzlo)
  48++CE52 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKzsgn)
  49++CE55 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++CE57 4F           		ld		c,a
  51++CE58 CD 33 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++CE5B B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++CE5C 67           		ld		h,a
  54++CE5D CB 7C        		bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++CE5F 20 16        		jr		nz,ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++CE61 E6 7F                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++CE63 20 06                jr      nz,NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++CE65 7D                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++CE66              		JumpIfALTNusng 4,ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++CE66 FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++CE68 DA 77 CE    >                        jp		c, ClampZto4
  60++CE6B              NoClampZto4:
  61++CE6B 22 CA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  62++CE6E 7D           		ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  63++CE6F 32 C8 7F             ld      (varT),a
  64++CE72 7C           		ld		a,h
  65++CE73 32 AB 7F             ld      (varU),a
  66++CE76 C9           		ret
  67++CE77              ClampZto4:											; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  68++CE77 21 04 00     		ld		hl,4
  69++CE7A 22 CA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  70++CE7D 7D           		ld		a,l
  71++CE7E 32 C8 7F             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  72++CE81 7C           		ld		a,h
  73++CE82 32 AB 7F             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  74++CE85 C9           		ret
  75++CE86
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
 861+ CE86                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
   1++CE86              ScaleNodeTo8Bit:								; TODO make signed
   2++CE86 ED 4B CA C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)
   3++CE8A 2A C6 C0     	ld			hl,(UBnkXScaled)
   4++CE8D ED 5B C8 C0  	ld			de,(UBnkYScaled)
   5++CE91              SetABSbc:
   6++CE91 78           	ld			a,b
   7++CE92 DD 67        	ld			ixh,a
   8++CE94 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
   9++CE96 47           	ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
  10++CE97              SetABShl:
  11++CE97 7C           	ld			a,h
  12++CE98 DD 6F        	ld			ixl,a
  13++CE9A E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  14++CE9C 67           	ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
  15++CE9D              SetABSde:
  16++CE9D 7A           	ld			a,d
  17++CE9E FD 67        	ld			iyh,a
  18++CEA0 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  19++CEA2 57           	ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
  20++CEA3              ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:
  21++CEA3 78               ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
  22++CEA4 B4           	or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
  23++CEA5 B2           	or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
  24++CEA6 28 0F            jr          z,ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
  25++CEA8                  ShiftHLRight1
  25++CEA8 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  25++CEAA CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  26++CEAC                  ShiftDERight1
  26++CEAC CB 3A       >			   srl d
  26++CEAE CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  27++CEB0              	ShiftBCRight1
  27++CEB0 CB 38       >			   srl b
  27++CEB2 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  28++CEB4 C3 A3 CE         jp          ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
  29++CEB7              ScaleNodeDone:										; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
  30++CEB7 DD 7C        	ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
  31++CEB9 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  32++CEBB B0           	or			b
  33++CEBC 47           	ld			b,a
  34++CEBD              SignforHL:
  35++CEBD DD 7D        	ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
  36++CEBF E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  37++CEC1 B4           	or			h
  38++CEC2 67           	ld			h,a
  39++CEC3              SignforDE:
  40++CEC3 FD 7C        	ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
  41++CEC5 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  42++CEC7 B2           	or			d
  43++CEC8 57           	ld			d,a
  44++CEC9              SignsDoneSaveResult:
  45++CEC9 ED 43 CA C0  	ld			(UBnkZScaled),bc
  46++CECD 22 C6 C0     	ld			(UBnkXScaled),hl
  47++CED0 ED 53 C8 C0  	ld			(UBnkYScaled),de
  48++CED4 78           	ld			a,b
  49++CED5 32 AB 7F     	ld			(varU),a
  50++CED8 79           	ld			a,c
  51++CED9 32 C8 7F     	ld			(varT),a
  52++CEDC C9           	ret
  53++CEDD
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm

 864+ CEDD 21 F2 C0     SetFaceAVisible:        ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 865+ CEE0 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 866+ CEE2 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 867+ CEE4 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 868+ CEE5 C9                                   ret
 869+ CEE6              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 870+ CEE6 21 F2 C0     SetFaceAHidden:         ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 871+ CEE9 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 872+ CEEB AF                                   xor     a
 873+ CEEC 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 874+ CEED C9                                   ret
