 876+ CEEE 3A 23 C4     SetAllFacesVisible:     ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+FaceCtX4Addr                                 ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 877+ CEF1 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 878+ CEF3 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4  TODO add this into blueprint data for speed                                                           ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 879+ CEF5 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 880+ CEF6 21 F2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 881+ CEF9 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 882+ CEFB              SetAllFacesVisibleLoop:
 883+ CEFB 77           EE30:                   ld      (hl),a
 884+ CEFC 23                                   inc     hl
 885+ CEFD 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesVisibleLoop
 886+ CEFF C9                                   ret
 887+ CF00              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 888+ CF00 3A 23 C4     SetAllFacesHidden:      ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+ShipHullFacesCount                           ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 889+ CF03 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 890+ CF05 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4                                                                                  ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 891+ CF07 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 892+ CF08 06 10                                ld      b,16
 893+ CF0A 21 F2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 894+ CF0D 3E 00                                ld      a,$00
 895+ CF0F 77           SetAllFacesHiddenLoop:  ld      (hl),a
 896+ CF10 23                                   inc     hl
 897+ CF11 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesHiddenLoop
 898+ CF13 C9                                   ret
 899+ CF14              ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 900+ CF14              ;--
 901+ CF14                  DISPLAY "TODO: Change to a tidy that checks for normal accuracy first"
 902+ CF14              TidyRotation:       IFNDEF FORCE_TIDY
 903+ CF14 3A 29 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkTidyCounter)         ; loops every 16 iterations
 904+ CF17 3D                                   dec     a                           ; and call is determined
 905+ CF18 E6 0F                                and     %00001111                   ; by if the counter
 906+ CF1A 32 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkTidyCounter),a         ; matches teh slot number
 907+ CF1D 21 40 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKSlotNumber           ; of course this is then 16 slots max
 908+ CF20 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 909+ CF21 C0                                   ret     nz                          ; when counter matches slot number tidy stops it doing all tidies on same iteration
 910+ CF22                                  ENDIF
 911+ CF22                                  IFNDEF BYPASS_TIDY
 912+ CF22 ~                                    call    TidyVectorsIX
 913+ CF22                                  ENDIF
 914+ CF22 C9                                   ret
 915+ CF23              ;;;;X = normal scale
 916+ CF23              ;;;;ZtempHi = zhi
 917+ CF23              ;;;;......................................................
 918+ CF23              ;;;; if ztemp hi <> 0                                   ::Scale Object Distance
 919+ CF23              ;;;;  Loop                                              ::LL90
 920+ CF23              ;;;;     inc X
 921+ CF23              ;;;;     divide X, Y & ZtempHiLo by 2
 922+ CF23              ;;;;  Until ZtempHi = 0
 923+ CF23              ;;;;......................................................
 924+ CF23              ;-LL21---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 925+ CF23                  DISPLAY "Tracing 3", $
 926+ CF23
 927+ CF23                                      include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++CF23              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++CF23 47           Norm256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
   3++CF24 0E 00                                ld      c,0
   4++CF26 16 00                                ld      d,0
   5++CF28 3A AC 7F                             ld      a,(varQ)
   6++CF2B 5F                                   ld      e,a
   7++CF2C              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   8++CF2C              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
   9++CF2C 21 00 00     NormDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  10++CF2F 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++CF30 06 10                                ld      b,16
  12++CF32 CB 31        NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  13++CF34 17                                   rla	    		; ...
  14++CF35 ED 6A                                adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  15++CF37 ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  16++CF39 30 02                                jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  17++CF3B 19                                   add	    hl,de		; ...
  18++CF3C 0D                                   dec	    c		; ...
  19++CF3D 10 F3        NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  20++CF3F 79                                   ld      a,c
  21++CF40 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  22++CF43 C9                                   ret
  23++CF44
  24++CF44 FD 67        Norm256mulAdivQSignA:   ld      iyh,a
  25++CF46                                      ClearSignBitA
  25++CF46 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  26++CF48 CD 23 CF                             call    Norm256mulAdivQ              ; do 15 bit unsigned
  27++CF4B FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now correct R reg
  28++CF4D                                      SignBitOnlyA
  28++CF4D E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  29++CF4F B1                                   or      c
  30++CF50 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a
  31++CF53 C9                                   ret
  32++CF54
  33++CF54              ; Tested OK
  34++CF54              ;LL21
  35++CF54              NormaliseTransMat:
  36++CF54                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  37++CF54 ~                            ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1     ; initialise loop
  38++CF54 ~                            ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  39++CF54 ~                            MMUSelectMathsTables
  40++CF54 ~            .LL21Loop:      ld      d,(hl)
  41++CF54 ~                            dec     hl
  42++CF54 ~                            ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  43++CF54 ~                            ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  44++CF54 ~                            ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  45++CF54 ~                            push	hl
  46++CF54 ~                            push	bc
  47++CF54 ~                            call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  48++CF54 ~                            ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  49++CF54 ~                            pop		bc
  50++CF54 ~                            pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  51++CF54 ~                            ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  52++CF54 ~                            dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  53++CF54 ~                            djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  54++CF54 ~                            MMUSelectROM0
  55++CF54 ~                            ret
  56++CF54                      ELSE
  57++CF54 21 92 C0                     ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  58++CF57 0E C5                        ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  59++CF59 79                           ld      a,c
  60++CF5A 32 AC 7F                     ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  61++CF5D 06 09                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  62++CF5F 56           LL21Loop:       ld      d,(hl)
  63++CF60 2B                           dec     hl
  64++CF61 5E                           ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  65++CF62                              ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  65++CF62 CB 23       >			   sla e
  65++CF64 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  66++CF66 7A                           ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  67++CF67 E5                           push	hl
  68++CF68 C5                           push	bc
  69++CF69 CD 23 CF                     call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  70++CF6C                              ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  71++CF6C 79                           ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  72++CF6D C1                           pop		bc
  73++CF6E E1                           pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  74++CF6F 77                           ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  75++CF70 2B                           dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  76++CF71 10 EC                        djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  77++CF73 C9                           ret
  78++CF74                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
 928+ CF74              ;;;                        include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseXX15.asm"
 929+ CF74              ;-LL91---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 930+ CF74
 931+ CF74              ; Now we have
 932+ CF74              ;   * XX18(2 1 0) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo)
 933+ CF74              ;   * XX18(5 4 3) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo)
 934+ CF74              ;   * XX18(8 7 6) = (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 935+ CF74              ;
 936+ CF74              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 937+ CF74                                      include "Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
   1++CF74              ; TESTEDOK
   2++CF74
   3++CF74              ;ScaleOrientationXX16:                       ; DEBUG TODO will combine with inverse later
   4++CF74              ;        ld      a,(XX17)
   5++CF74              ;        ld      ixl,a
   6++CF74              ;        ld      ixh,9
   7++CF74              ;        ld      hl,UBnkTransInv0x
   8++CF74              ;        ld      a,(hl)
   9++CF74              ;ScaleNode:
  10++CF74              ;        ld      b,ixl
  11++CF74              ;ScaleNodeLoop:
  12++CF74              ;        sla      a
  13++CF74              ;        djnz    ScaleNodeLoop
  14++CF74              ;        ld      (hl),a
  15++CF74              ;        inc     hl
  16++CF74              ;        inc     hl
  17++CF74              ;        dec     ixh
  18++CF74              ;        jr      nz,ScaleNode
  19++CF74              ;        ret
  20++CF74
  21++CF74
  22++CF74              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++CF74              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++CF74              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++CF74              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++CF74              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++CF74              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++CF74              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++CF74              ; OUTPUT
  30++CF74              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++CF74              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++CF74              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++CF74              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++CF74 2A 81 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++CF77 ED 5B 87 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++CF7B ED 4B 8D C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++CF7F 22 99 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++CF82 ED 53 9B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++CF86 ED 43 9D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++CF8A 2A 83 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++CF8D ED 5B 89 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++CF91 ED 4B 8F C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++CF95 22 A1 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++CF98 ED 53 A3 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++CF9C ED 43 A5 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++CFA0 2A 85 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++CFA3 ED 5B 8B C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++CFA7 ED 4B 91 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++CFAB 22 A9 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++CFAE ED 53 AB C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++CFB2 ED 43 AD C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++CFB6 C9                   ret
  53++CFB7
  54++CFB7
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 938+ CFB7              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 939+ CFB7              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 940+ CFB7              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 941+ CFB7              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 942+ CFB7              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 943+ CFB7              ; Returns
 944+ CFB7              ;
 945+ CFB7              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 946+ CFB7              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 947+ CFB7              ;
 948+ CFB7              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 949+ CFB7              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 950+ CFB7              ;
 951+ CFB7              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 952+ CFB7              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 953+ CFB7              ; TESTEDOK
 954+ CFB7              XX12DotOneRow:
 955+ CFB7              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 955+ CFB7 3A C6 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 955+ CFBA 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 955+ CFBB 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 955+ CFBC 57          >                        ld      d,a
 955+ CFBD ED 30       >                        mul
 955+ CFBF 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 955+ CFC0 32 C8 7F    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 956+ CFC3 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 957+ CFC4              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 957+ CFC4 3A C7 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 957+ CFC7 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 958+ CFC8 32 AE 7F                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 959+ CFCB 23                                   inc     hl
 960+ CFCC              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 960+ CFCC 3A C8 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 960+ CFCF 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 960+ CFD0 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 960+ CFD1 57          >                        ld      d,a
 960+ CFD2 ED 30       >                        mul
 960+ CFD4 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 960+ CFD5 32 AC 7F    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 961+ CFD8                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 961+ CFD8 3A C8 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 961+ CFDB 32 AD 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 962+ CFDE 23                                   inc     hl
 963+ CFDF                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 963+ CFDF 3A C9 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 963+ CFE2 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 964+ CFE3              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 965+ CFE3 E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 966+ CFE4 CD E8 9E                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 967+ CFE7 E1                                   pop     hl
 968+ CFE8 32 C8 7F                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 969+ CFEB 23                                   inc     hl
 970+ CFEC              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 970+ CFEC 3A CA C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 970+ CFEF 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 970+ CFF0 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 970+ CFF1 57          >                        ld      d,a
 970+ CFF2 ED 30       >                        mul
 970+ CFF4 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 970+ CFF5 32 AC 7F    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 971+ CFF8                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 971+ CFF8 3A C8 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 971+ CFFB 32 AD 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 972+ CFFE 23                                   inc     hl
 973+ CFFF                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 973+ CFFF 3A CB C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 973+ D002 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 974+ D003              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 975+ D003 CD E8 9E                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 976+ D006              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 977+ D006 C9                                   ret
 978+ D007
 979+ D007
 980+ D007                  DISPLAY "Tracing 4", $
 981+ D007
 982+ D007              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 983+ D007              ;TESTED OK
 984+ D007              ;XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 985+ D007              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 986+ D007 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 987+ D00A 21 81 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 988+ D00D CD B7 CF                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 989+ D010 32 CC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 990+ D013 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 991+ D016 32 CD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 992+ D019 21 87 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 993+ D01C CD B7 CF                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 994+ D01F 32 CE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 995+ D022 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
 996+ D025 32 CF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 997+ D028 21 8D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 998+ D02B CD B7 CF                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 999+ D02E 32 D0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
1000+ D031 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)
1001+ D034 32 D1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a
1002+ D037 C9                                   ret

   1++D038              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:

   1++D082              CopyXX18toXX15:
   2++D082              CopyDrawCamToScaled:
   3++D082                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo ,UBnkXScaled        ; xlo
   3++D082 3A BA C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
   3++D085 32 C6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D088                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xSgn,UBnkXScaledSign    ; xsg
   4++D088 3A BC C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
   4++D08B 32 C7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a

   5++D091 32 C8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   6++D094                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0ySgn,UBnkYScaledSign    ; xsg
   6++D094 3A BF C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
   6++D097 32 C9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
   7++D09A                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo ,UBnkZScaled        ; xlo

   7++D09D 32 CA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a

  57++D0ED              LL94Z:

  59++D0EF 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  60++D0F1 3A CA C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  61++D0F4 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  62++D0F5 3A CB C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  63++D0F8 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  64++D0F9 3A C0 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  65++D0FC 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  66++D0FD 3A C2 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)                                    ;
  67++D100 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  68++D101 CD 33 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  69++D104 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  70++D105 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  71++D106 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ

1008+ D151                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++D151              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D151              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D151                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D151 3A CC C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D154 32 C6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D157                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D157 3A CE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D15A 32 C8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D15D                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++D15D 3A D0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++D160 32 CA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++D163 C9                   ret

1009+ D164              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1010+ D164                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D164              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D164              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D164              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D164              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D164              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D164              ;;; R = T
   7++D164              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D164              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D164              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D164              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D164              ;;; R = T
  12++D164              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D164
  14++D164
  15++D164
  16++D164
  17++D164
  18++D164              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D164 ~            						mul
  20++D164 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D164              						ENDM
  22++D164              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D164 3A CC C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D167                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D167 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D168 CA 85 D1    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++D16B 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D16C 3A C6 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D16F 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D170                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D170 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D171 CA 85 D1    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++D174 ED 30        		mul
  30++D176 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D177 3A CD C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D17A 21 C7 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D17D AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D17E E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D180 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D182 C3 89 D1             jp          dotmuly
  37++D185              dotxskipzero:
  38++D185 AF                   xor         a
  39++D186 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D187 FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D189              dotmuly:
  42++D189              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D189 3A CE C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D18C                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D18C A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D18D CA AC D1    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++D190 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D191 3A C8 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D194                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D194 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D195 CA AC D1    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++D198 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D199 ED 30                mul
  50++D19B 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D19C DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D19E 3A CF C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D1A1 21 C9 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D1A4 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D1A5 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D1A7 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D1A9 C3 B0 D1             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D1AC              dotyskipzero:
  59++D1AC AF                   xor         a
  60++D1AD 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D1AE DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D1B0              dotaddxy:
  63++D1B0              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D1B0 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D1B2 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D1B3 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D1B5 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D1B6 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D1B8 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D1B9 CD 33 00             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D1BC 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D1BD 3A D0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D1C0                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D1C0 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D1C1 CA E6 D1    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++D1C4 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D1C5 3A CA C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D1C8                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D1C8 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D1C9 CA E6 D1    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++D1CC 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D1CD ED 30                mul
  79++D1CF E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D1D0 3A CB C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D1D3 21 D1 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D1D6 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D1D7 E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D1D9 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D1DA E1                   pop         hl
  86++D1DB 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D1DC 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D1DE CD 33 00             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D1E1 32 AE 7F             ld          (varS),a
  90++D1E4 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D1E5 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D1E6              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D1E6 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D1E7 32 AE 7F             ld          (varS),a
  95++D1EA 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D1EB C9                   ret
  97++D1EC              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D1EC              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D1EC              ;;;;		mul
 104++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D1EC              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D1EC              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D1EC              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D1EC              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D1EC              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D1EC              ;;;;       mul
 117++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D1EC              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D1EC              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D1EC              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D1EC              ;;;;       mul
 132++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D1EC              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D1EC              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D1EC              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D1EC              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D1EC              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D1EC              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D1EC
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
1011+ D1EC              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1012+ D1EC              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
1013+ D1EC              ; Not Used in code      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
1014+ D1EC              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1015+ D1EC                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D1EC              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D1EC              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D1EC 3A 29 C4             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D1EF 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D1F0              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D1F0 3A C1 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D1F3 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D1F4                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D1F4 A7          >                        and     a
   8++D1F5 C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D1F6              LL90Loop:
  10++D1F6              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D1F6 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D1F7                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D1F7 2A BD C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D1FA CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D1FC CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D1FE 22 BD C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D201                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D201 2A BA C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D204 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D206 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D208 22 BA C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D20B                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D20B 2A C0 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D20E CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D210 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D212 22 C0 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D215 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D216                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D216 A7          >                        and     a
  16++D217 C2 F6 D1    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++D21A C9                   ret
  18++D21B
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
1016+ D21B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1017+ D21B
1018+ D21B              ; Backface cull
1019+ D21B              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
1020+ D21B              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
1021+ D21B              ;
1022+ D21B                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D21B 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D21C 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D21D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D21F 32 C7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D222 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D223 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D225 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D226 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D228 32 C9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D22B 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D22C CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D22E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D230 32 CB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D233 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D234 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D235 32 C6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D238 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D239 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D23A 32 C8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D23D 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D23E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D23F 32 CA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D242 C9                                   ret
  24++D243

1023+ D243                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D243 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D244 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D245 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D247 32 CD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D24A 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D24B CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D24D 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D24E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D250 32 CF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D253 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D254 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D256 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D258 32 D1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D25B 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D25C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D25D 32 CC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D260 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D261 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D262 32 CE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D265 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;

# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
1024+ D26B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
1025+ D26B              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
1026+ D26B              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
1027+ D26B              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
1028+ D26B              ; return if no faces
1029+ D26B              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
1030+ D26B              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
1031+ D26B              ; While Z hi <> 0
1032+ D26B              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
1033+ D26B              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
1034+ D26B              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
1035+ D26B              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
1036+ D26B              ; Loop
1037+ D26B              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
1038+ D26B              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
1039+ D26B              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
1040+ D26B              ; For each face
1041+ D26B              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
1042+ D26B              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
1043+ D26B              ;        Get Face data into XX12
1044+ D26B              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
1045+ D26B              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
1046+ D26B              ;        else
1047+ D26B              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
1048+ D26B              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
1049+ D26B              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
1050+ D26B              ;           While X >= 0
1051+ D26B              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
1052+ D26B              ;              if  x >= 0
1053+ D26B              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
1054+ D26B              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
1055+ D26B              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
1056+ D26B              ;           loop
1057+ D26B              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
1058+ D26B              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
1059+ D26B              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
1060+ D26B              ;               X = 1
1061+ D26B              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
1062+ D26B              ;           else
1063+ D26B              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
1064+ D26B              ;           endif
1065+ D26B              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
1066+ D26B              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
1067+ D26B              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
1068+ D26B              ;               X = 1
1069+ D26B              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
1070+ D26B              ;           else
1071+ D26B              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
1072+ D26B              ;           endif
1073+ D26B              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
1074+ D26B              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
1075+ D26B              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
1076+ D26B              ;               X = 1
1077+ D26B              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
1078+ D26B              ;           else
1079+ D26B              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
1080+ D26B              ;           endif
1081+ D26B              ;        endif
1082+ D26B              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
1083+ D26B              ;        if dot product < 0
1084+ D26B              ;           set face visible
1085+ D26B              ;        else
1086+ D26B              ;           set face invisible
1087+ D26B              ;        end if
1088+ D26B              ;     else
1089+ D26B              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
1090+ D26B              ;     end if
1091+ D26B              ; Next Face
1092+ D26B
1093+ D26B              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
1094+ D26B
1095+ D26B              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
1096+ D26B              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
1097+ D26B              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
1098+ D26B              ;
1099+ D26B              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
1100+ D26B              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
1101+ D26B              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
1102+ D26B              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
1103+ D26B              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
1104+ D26B                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D26B              ;    DEFINE DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE 1
   2++D26B                  DEFINE CHECKDOTSHIPDATA  1
   3++D26B               ;   DEFINE DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW 1
   4++D26B 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   5++D26C              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   6++D26C              ; EE29:
   7++D26C
   8++D26C              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   9++D26C              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
  10++D26C              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
  11++D26C              ;       Where [x y z] =
  12++D26C              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  13++D26C              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  14++D26C              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  15++D26C              ;
  16++D26C              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  17++D26C              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  18++D26C              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  19++D26C              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  20++D26C              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  21++D26C              ;
  22++D26C              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  23++D26C              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  24++D26C              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  25++D26C              ;
  26++D26C              ; so
  27++D26C              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  28++D26C              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  29++D26C              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  30++D26C              ;
  31++D26C              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  32++D26C              ;
  33++D26C              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  34++D26C              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  35++D26C              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  36++D26C              ;
  37++D26C
  38++D26C
  39++D26C
  40++D26C 3A C1 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  41++D26F                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  41++D26F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  41++D270 CA 9C D2    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  42++D273 2A BA C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  43++D276 ED 5B BD C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  44++D27A ED 4B C0 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  45++D27E FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  46++D280                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  46++D280 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  46++D282 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  47++D284                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  47++D284 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  47++D286 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  48++D288                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  48++D288 CB 38       >			   srl b
  48++D28A CB 19       >			   rr  c
  49++D28C 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  50++D28D                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  50++D28D A7          >                        and     a
  50++D28E C2 7E D2    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  51++D291 22 BA C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  52++D294 ED 53 BD C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  53++D298 ED 43 C0 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  54++D29C FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  55++D29E 32 B3 7F                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  56++D2A1 C9                                   ret
  57++D2A2
  58++D2A2 3A 28 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
  59++D2A5 E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
  60++D2A7 20 2A                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
  61++D2A9 2A 26 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
  62++D2AC 7C                                   ld      a,h
  63++D2AD                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
  63++D2AD FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
  63++D2AF D2 D3 D2    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
  64++D2B2 ED 5B 20 C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
  65++D2B6 CD BD 9A                             call    compare16HLDE
  66++D2B9 38 18                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  67++D2BB ED 5B 23 C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
  68++D2BF CD BD 9A                             call    compare16HLDE
  69++D2C2 38 0F                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  70++D2C4                                      IFDEF   CHECKDOTSHIPDATA
  71++D2C4 3A 24 C4     .CheckDotV2:                ld      a,(DotAddr)
  72++D2C7                                          JumpIfAGTENusng h, .DrawFull
  72++D2C7 BC          >                        cp     h
  72++D2C8 D2 CE D2    >                        jp		nc,.DrawFull
  73++D2CB C3 D7 D2                                 jp      .ShipIsADot
  74++D2CE CD A0 C7     .DrawFull:                  call    UnivVisibleNonDot           ;
  75++D2D1                                          ClearCarryFlag
  75++D2D1 B7          >                        or a
  76++D2D2 C9                                       ret
  77++D2D3                                      ELSE
  78++D2D3 ~            .CalculateXX4:              ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
  79++D2D3 ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  80++D2D3 ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  81++D2D3 ~                                        ld      a,h
  82++D2D3 ~                                        srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
  83++D2D3 ~            .DrawAsDotCheck:            JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
  84++D2D3 ~                                        ; Check visbility distance
  85++D2D3 ~            .SetXX4Dist:                ;break
  86++D2D3 ~                                        ld      a,l
  87++D2D3 ~                                        rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
  88++D2D3 ~                                        srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
  89++D2D3 ~                                        srl     a
  90++D2D3 ~                                        srl     a
  91++D2D3 ~                                        ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
  92++D2D3 ~                                        call    UnivVisibleNonDot               ;
  93++D2D3 ~                                        ClearCarryFlag
  94++D2D3 ~                                        ret
  95++D2D3                                      ENDIF
  96++D2D3 CD 8E C7     .ShipNoDraw:            call    UnivInvisible
  97++D2D6 C9                                   ret
  98++D2D7              .ShipIsADot:            IFDEF DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE
  99++D2D7 ~                                        call    UnivVisible  ;
 100++D2D7                                      ELSE
 101++D2D7 CD AB C7                                 call    UnivVisibleDot
 102++D2DA                                      ENDIF

 105++D2DB                                                  DISPLAY "TODO:remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done"

 106++D2DE A7          >                        and a
 106++D2DF C8          >                        ret    z

 108++D2E0 CD DE CD                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
