 110++D2E6 CD A7 D0                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 111++D2E9                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 112++D2E9 3A 29 C4     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 113++D2EC FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 114++D2EE              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 115++D2EE CD 6C D2                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 116++D2F1 CD CB D0                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 117++D2F4 CD B9 7A     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 118++D2F7 CD 38 D0                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 119++D2FA 21 E9 C5     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 120++D2FD 22 B2 7E                             ld      (varV),hl
 121++D300 3A 23 C4                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 122++D303 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 123++D305 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 124++D307 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 125++D308 AF                                   xor     a
 126++D309 32 6B D2                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 127++D30C E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 128++D30D C5                                   push    bc
 129++D30E 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 130++D30F E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 131++D311 E5                                   push    hl
 132++D312 21 71 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 133++D315 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 134++D316 E1                                   pop     hl
 135++D317                                      IFDEF DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW
 136++D317 ~                                        jp      .FaceVisible
 137++D317                                      ELSE
 138++D317 DA 5C D4                                 jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 139++D31A                                      ENDIF
 140++D31A              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 141++D31A CD 43 D2     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 142++D31D 3A B3 7F                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 143++D320 47                                   ld      b,a
 144++D321                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 144++D321 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 144++D323 DA 5E D3    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 145++D326 CD 82 D0     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 146++D329 C3 ED D3                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 147++D32C 3A BA C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 148++D32F CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 149++D331 32 BA C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 150++D334 3A C0 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 151++D337 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 152++D339 32 C0 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 153++D33C 3A BD C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 154++D33F CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 155++D341 32 BD C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 156++D344 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 157++D346                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 157++D346 3A C6 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 157++D349 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 157++D34B 32 C6 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 158++D34E                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 158++D34E 3A C8 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 158++D351 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 158++D353 32 C8 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 159++D356                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 159++D356 3A CA C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 159++D359 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 159++D35B 32 CA C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 160++D35E              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 161++D35E              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 162++D35E CD 5D D0                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 163++D361 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 164++D362 FA 81 D3                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 165++D365              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 165++D365 3A C6 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 165++D368 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 165++D36A 32 C6 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 166++D36D                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 166++D36D 3A C8 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 166++D370 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 166++D372 32 C8 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 167++D375                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 167++D375 3A CA C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 167++D378 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 167++D37A 32 CA C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 168++D37D 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 169++D37E F2 65 D3                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 170++D381              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 171++D381              ; Add normal to XX15
 172++D381              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 173++D381              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 174++D381              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 175++D381              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 176++D381              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 176++D381 3A CA C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 176++D384 32 AD 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 177++D387                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 177++D387 3A D1 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 177++D38A 32 AE 7F    >                        ld       (varS),a
 178++D38D                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 178++D38D 3A C0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 178++D390 32 AC 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 179++D393 3A C2 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 180++D396 CD E8 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 181++D399 DA 2C D3                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 182++D39C 32 CA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 183++D39F                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 183++D39F 3A AE 7F    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 183++D3A2 32 CB C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 184++D3A5                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 184++D3A5 3A C6 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 184++D3A8 32 AD 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 185++D3AB                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 185++D3AB 3A CD C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 185++D3AE 32 AE 7F    >                        ld       (varS),a
 186++D3B1                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 186++D3B1 3A BA C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 186++D3B4 32 AC 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 187++D3B7 3A BC C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 188++D3BA CD E8 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 189++D3BD DA 2C D3                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 190++D3C0 32 C6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 191++D3C3                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 191++D3C3 3A AE 7F    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 191++D3C6 32 C7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 192++D3C9                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 192++D3C9 3A C8 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 192++D3CC 32 AD 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 193++D3CF                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 193++D3CF 3A CF C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 193++D3D2 32 AE 7F    >                        ld       (varS),a
 194++D3D5                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 194++D3D5 3A BD C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 194++D3D8 32 AC 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 195++D3DB 3A BF C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 196++D3DE CD E8 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 197++D3E1 DA 2C D3                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 198++D3E4 32 C8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 199++D3E7                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 199++D3E7 3A AE 7F    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 199++D3EA 32 C9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 200++D3ED              ; calculate dot product LL89
 201++D3ED              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 201++D3ED 3A CC C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 201++D3F0 32 AC 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 202++D3F3 3A C6 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 203++D3F6 CD B0 9E                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 204++D3F9 32 C8 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 205++D3FC 3A CD C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 206++D3FF 21 C7 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 207++D402 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 208++D403 32 AE 7F                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 209++D406                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 209++D406 3A CE C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 209++D409 32 AC 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 210++D40C 3A C8 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 211++D40F CD B0 9E                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 212++D412 32 AC 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 213++D415                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 213++D415 3A C8 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 213++D418 32 AD 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 214++D41B 3A CF C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 215++D41E 21 C9 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 216++D421 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 217++D422 CD E8 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 218++D425 32 C8 7F                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 219++D428                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 219++D428 3A D0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 219++D42B 32 AC 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 220++D42E 3A CA C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 221++D431 CD B0 9E                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 222++D434 32 AC 7F                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 223++D437                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 223++D437 3A C8 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 223++D43A 32 AD 7F    >                        ld       (varR),a
 224++D43D 3A CB C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 225++D440 21 D1 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 226++D443 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 227++D444 CD E8 9E                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 228++D447 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 229++D449 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 230++D44B 3A AE 7F                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 231++D44E ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 232++D451 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 233++D453 3A 6B D2     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 234++D456 CD E6 CE                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 235++D459 C3 62 D4                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 236++D45C 3A 6B D2     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 237++D45F CD DD CE                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 238++D462 21 6B D2     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 239++D465 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 240++D466 C1                                   pop         bc
 241++D467 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 242++D468 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 243++D46A ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 244++D46C 22 B2 7E                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 245++D46F 05                                   dec         b
 246++D470 C2 0C D3                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 247++D473 C9                                   ret
 248++D474
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm

1112+ D482              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
1113+ D482              NodeXPositiveX:
1114+ D482 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
1115+ D483 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
1116+ D485 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo

1118+ D48A 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
1119+ D48B 22 C6 C0             ld          (UbnkXPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
1120+ D48E AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
1121+ D48F 32 C8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
1122+ D492 C3 B1 D4             jp          FinishedThisNodeX
1123+ D495              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
1124+ D495              NodeNegativeX:
1125+ D495              LL52X:                                                 ;
1126+ D495 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; Coord

1130+ D4A0 F2 AE D4             jp          p,SetAndMopX                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1131+ D4A3              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
1132+ D4A3              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1133+ D4A3 CD 68 94             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1134+ D4A6 3A C8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1135+ D4A9 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1136+ D4AB 32 C8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1137+ D4AE              SetAndMopX:
1138+ D4AE 22 20 C0             ld          (UBnKxlo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1139+ D4B1              FinishedThisNodeX:
