1289+ D5B0 06 00                ld          b,0
1290+ D5B2                      ClearCarryFlag
1290+ D5B2 B7          >                        or a
1291+ D5B3 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1292+ D5B5 EB                   ex          de,hl
1293+ D5B6              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1294+ D5B6 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1295+ D5B9 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1296+ D5BC FD 23                inc         iy
1297+ D5BE FD 23                inc         iy
1298+ D5C0              ; ......................................................
1299+ D5C0              LL66:
1300+ D5C0              ProcessYPoint:
1301+ D5C0 AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
1302+ D5C1 32 AB 7F             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1303+ D5C4                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
1303+ D5C4 3A C8 7F    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1303+ D5C7 32 AC 7F    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1304+ D5CA 3A C9 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
1305+ D5CD 21 AC 7F             ld          hl,varQ
1306+ D5D0 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1307+ D5D1                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
1307+ D5D1 DA DA D5    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
1308+ D5D4              SmallYPoint:
1309+ D5D4 CD AF 94             call        RequAmul256divQ;RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
1310+ D5D7 C3 DD D5             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
1311+ D5DA              SmallYHop:
1312+ D5DA              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
1313+ D5DA CD AF 94             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1314+ D5DD              SkipYScale:
1315+ D5DD              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
1316+ D5DD 3A CB C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
1317+ D5E0 CB 7F                bit         7,a
1318+ D5E2 C2 F5 D5             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1319+ D5E5              PositiveYPoint:
1320+ D5E5 3A AD 7F             ld          a,(varR)
1321+ D5E8 6F                   ld          l,a
1322+ D5E9 3A AB 7F             ld          a,(varU)
1323+ D5EC 67                   ld          h,a
1324+ D5ED 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1325+ D5EF ED 31                add         hl,a
1326+ D5F1 EB                   ex          de,hl
1327+ D5F2 C3 05 D6             jp          LL50
1328+ D5F5              NegativeYPoint:
1329+ D5F5              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1330+ D5F5 3A AD 7F             ld          a,(varR)
1331+ D5F8 6F                   ld          l,a
1332+ D5F9 3A AB 7F             ld          a,(varU)
1333+ D5FC 67                   ld          h,a
1334+ D5FD 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1335+ D5FF 06 00                ld          b,0
1336+ D601                      ClearCarryFlag
1336+ D601 B7          >                        or a
1337+ D602 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1338+ D604 EB                   ex          de,hl
1339+ D605              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1340+ D605 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1341+ D608 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1342+ D60B FD 23                inc         iy
1343+ D60D FD 23                inc         iy
1344+ D60F C9                   ret
1345+ D610              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1346+ D610              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1347+ D610              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1348+ D610              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1349+ D610              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1350+ D610              CopyNodeToXX15:             ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1350+ D610 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1350+ D611 32 C6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1351+ D614 23                                       inc         hl
1352+ D615                                          ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1352+ D615 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1352+ D616 32 C8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1353+ D619 23                                       inc         hl
1354+ D61A                                          ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1354+ D61A 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1354+ D61B 32 CA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1355+ D61E 23                                       inc         hl
1356+ D61F              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1357+ D61F 7E           .PopulateXX15SignBits:      ld          a,(hl)
1358+ D620 4F                                       ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1359+ D621 47                                       ld          b,a
1360+ D622 E6 80                                    and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1361+ D624 32 C7 C0                                 ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1362+ D627 78                                       ld          a,b
1363+ D628 E6 40                                    and         $40
1364+ D62A CB 27                                    sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1365+ D62C 32 C9 C0                                 ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1366+ D62F 78                                       ld          a,b
1367+ D630 E6 20                                    and         $20
1368+ D632 CB 27                                    sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1369+ D634 CB 27                                    sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1370+ D636 32 CB C0                                 ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1371+ D639 79                                       ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1372+ D63A E6 1F                                    and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1373+ D63C 32 C8 7F                                 ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1374+ D63F C9                                       ret
1375+ D640
1376+ D640              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1377+ D640              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1378+ D640              ;..............................................................................................................................
1379+ D640              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1380+ D640              LL48GetScale:
1381+ D640 3A 9D 7E             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1382+ D643 5F                   ld          e,a
1383+ D644 CD 10 D6             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1384+ D647              LL48GetVertices:
1385+ D647              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1386+ D647                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1386+ D647 BB          >                        cp      e
1386+ D648 DA 85 D6    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1387+ D64B              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1388+ D64B                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1388+ D64B 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1388+ D64C 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1388+ D64D 32 AC 7E    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1389+ D650 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1390+ D651 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1391+ D653 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1392+ D654                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1392+ D654 21 F2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1392+ D657 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1392+ D659 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1393+ D65A E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1394+ D65B                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1394+ D65B A7          >                        and     a
1394+ D65C C2 8B D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1395+ D65F              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1396+ D65F 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1397+ D660 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1398+ D662 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1399+ D664                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1399+ D664 A7          >                        and     a
1399+ D665 C2 8B D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1400+ D668              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1401+ D668                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1401+ D668 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1401+ D669 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1401+ D66A 32 AC 7E    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1402+ D66D 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1403+ D66E E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1404+ D670 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1405+ D671                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1405+ D671 21 F2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1405+ D674 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1405+ D676 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1406+ D677 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1407+ D678                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1407+ D678 A7          >                        and     a
1407+ D679 C2 8B D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1408+ D67C              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1409+ D67C 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1410+ D67D ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1411+ D67F E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1412+ D681                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1412+ D681 A7          >                        and     a
1412+ D682 C2 8B D6    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1413+ D685              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1414+ D685 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1415+ D688 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1416+ D68A                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1417+ D68A C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1418+ D68B              NodeIsVisible:
1419+ D68B              LL49:
1420+ D68B CD 32 D5             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1421+ D68E C9                   ret
1422+ D68F
1423+ D68F                  DISPLAY "Tracing 6", $
1424+ D68F
1425+ D68F              ProjectNodeToEye:
1426+ D68F ED 4B CA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1427+ D693 79               ld          a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1428+ D694 32 AC 7F         ld          (varQ),a                            ; VarQ = z
1429+ D697 3A C6 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo which is signed
1430+ D69A CD 29 97         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1431+ D69D 3A C7 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1432+ D6A0                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1432+ D6A0 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1432+ D6A2 C2 AD D6    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1433+ D6A5              EyePositiveXPoint:                                  ; x was positive result
1434+ D6A5 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX                     ;
1435+ D6A7 26 00            ld          h,0
1436+ D6A9 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre + X
1437+ D6AA C3 B4 D6         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1438+ D6AD              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1439+ D6AD 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1440+ D6AF 26 00            ld          h,0
1441+ D6B1                  ClearCarryFlag
1441+ D6B1 B7          >                        or a
1442+ D6B2 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1443+ D6B4              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1444+ D6B4 EB               ex          de,hl
1445+ D6B5 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1446+ D6B8 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1447+ D6BB              EyeProcessYPoint:
1448+ D6BB ED 4B CA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; Now process Y co-ordinate
1449+ D6BF 79               ld          a,c
1450+ D6C0 32 AC 7F         ld          (varQ),a
1451+ D6C3 3A C8 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1452+ D6C6 CD 29 97         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1453+ D6C9 3A C9 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1454+ D6CC                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1454+ D6CC CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1454+ D6CE C2 D9 D6    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1455+ D6D1              EyePositiveYPoint:                                  ; Y is positive so above the centre line
1456+ D6D1 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1457+ D6D3                  ClearCarryFlag
1457+ D6D3 B7          >                        or a
1458+ D6D4 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1459+ D6D6 C3 DE D6         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1460+ D6D9              EyeNegativeYPoint:                                  ; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1461+ D6D9 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1462+ D6DB 26 00            ld          h,0
1463+ D6DD 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1464+ D6DE              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1465+ D6DE EB               ex          de,hl
1466+ D6DF FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1467+ D6E2 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1468+ D6E5 C9               ret
1469+ D6E6
1470+ D6E6
1471+ D6E6
1472+ D6E6              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1473+ D6E6              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1474+ D6E6              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1475+ D6E6              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1476+ D6E6              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1477+ D6E6              ; which can be simplified as:
1478+ D6E6              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1479+ D6E6              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1480+ D6E6              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1481+ D6E6              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1482+ D6E6              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1483+ D6E6              ;      Roll calculations:
1484+ D6E6              ;
1485+ D6E6              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1486+ D6E6              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1487+ D6E6              ;      Pitch calculations:
1488+ D6E6              ;
1489+ D6E6              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1490+ D6E6              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1491+ D6E6
1492+ D6E6
1493+ D6E6              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1494+ D6E6                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D6E6
   2++D6E6              ; Full version
   3++D6E6              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D6E6              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D6E6              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D6E6              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D6E6
   8++D6E6                  IFDEF USE_24BIT_ROLL_AND_PITCH
   9++D6E6 00 00 00 00  UBnK24BitAlphaMulX      DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  10++D6EA 00 00 00 00  UBnK24BitAlphaMulY      DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  11++D6EE 00 00 00 00  UBnK24BitAlphaMulZ      DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  12++D6F2 00 00 00 00  UBnK24BitBetaMulZ       DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  13++D6F6 00 00 00 00  UBnK24BitBetaMulY       DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  14++D6FA 00 00 00     UBnK24BitK2             DS 3
  15++D6FD
  16++D6FD 01           PitchBlock              DB  1
  17++D6FE
  18++D6FE 3A C5 7E     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
  19++D701 A7           .CheckForRoll:          and		a
  20++D702 C4 72 D7     						call	nz,UBnKRoll_24Bit
  21++D705 3A B8 7E     .CheckForPitch:			ld		a,(BETA)
  22++D708 A7           						and		a
  23++D709 C4 D8 D7     						call	nz,UBnKPitch_24Bit
  24++D70C 3A A6 7F     .ApplySpeed:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
  25++D70F A7                                   and     a
  26++D710 CA 2B D7                             jp      z,.ApplyOrientation
  27++D713              						;ReturnIfAIsZero
  28++D713 0E 00        						ld      c,0                         ;
  29++D715 67           						ld      h,a                         ;
  30++D716 06 80        						ld      b,$80                       ;
  31++D718 ED 5B 27 C0  						ld      de,(UBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
  32++D71C 3A 26 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
  33++D71F 6F           						ld      l,a                         ; .
  34++D720 CD 14 01     						call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
  35++D723 ED 53 27 C0  						ld      (UBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
  36++D727 7D           						ld      a,l
  37++D728 32 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),a                ;
  38++D72B 3A C5 7E     .ApplyOrientation:      ld      a,(ALPHA)
  39++D72E 21 B8 7E                             ld      hl,BETA
  40++D731 B6                                   or      (hl)
  41++D732 C8                                   ret     z
  42++D733 3A FD D6                             ld      a,(PitchBlock)
  43++D736 A7                                   and     a
  44++D737 C8                                   ret     z
  45++D738                                      ;break
  46++D738 DD 21 2A C0  PitchBreak:             ld      ix,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  47++D73C DD 7E 01     DebugAlert1:            ld      a,(ix+1)
  48++D73F DD 56 03                             ld      d,(ix+3)
  49++D742 DD 5E 05                             ld      e,(ix+5)
  50++D745 B2                                   or     d
  51++D746 B3                                   or     e
  52++D747 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  53++D749 C2 4E D7                             jp      nz,.NoBreak
  54++D74C DD 01                                break
  55++D74E              .NoBreak
  56++D74E
  57++D74E CD BA 02                             call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
  58++D751 DD 7E 01     DebugAlert2:             ld      a,(ix+1)
  59++D754 DD 56 03                             ld      d,(ix+3)
  60++D757 DD 5E 05                             ld      e,(ix+5)
  61++D75A B2                                   or     d
  62++D75B B3                                   or     e
  63++D75C E6 7F                                and     $7F
  64++D75E C2 63 D7                             jp      nz,.NoBreak
  65++D761 DD 01                                break
  66++D763              .NoBreak
  67++D763 DD 21 30 C0                          ld      ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  68++D767 CD BA 02                             call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
  69++D76A DD 21 36 C0                          ld      ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  70++D76E CD BA 02                             call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
  71++D771 C9                                   ret
  72++D772
  73++D772 3A C5 7E     UBnKRoll_24Bit:			ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  74++D775 E6 7F        						and 	$7F
  75++D777 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
  76++D778 3A 23 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  77++D77B 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
  78++D77C 2A 24 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
  79++D77F CD EB 92     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  80++D782 7D           						ld		a,l
  81++D783 32 EA D6     						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulY),a			; save result
  82++D786 ED 53 EB D6  						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulY+1),de		; save result
  83++D78A 3A C5 7E     						ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  84++D78D E6 7F        						and 	$7F
  85++D78F 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
  86++D790 3A 20 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  87++D793 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
  88++D794 2A 21 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKxhi)               ; .
  89++D797 CD EB 92     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  90++D79A 7D           						ld		a,l
  91++D79B 32 E6 D6     						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulX),a			; save result
  92++D79E ED 53 E7 D6  						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulX+1),de		; save result
  93++D7A2 3A C5 7E     						ld		a,(ALPHA)
  94++D7A5 E6 80        						and		$80
  95++D7A7 CA C1 D7     						jp		z,.RollingRight
  96++D7AA DD 21 20 C0  .RollingLeft:			ld		ix,UBnKxlo
  97++D7AE FD 21 EA D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulY
  98++D7B2 CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  99++D7B5 DD 21 23 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKylo
 100++D7B9 FD 21 E6 D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulX
 101++D7BD CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 102++D7C0 C9           						ret
 103++D7C1 DD 21 20 C0  .RollingRight:			ld		ix,UBnKxlo
 104++D7C5 FD 21 EA D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulY
 105++D7C9 CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 106++D7CC DD 21 23 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKylo
 107++D7D0 FD 21 E6 D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulX
 108++D7D4 CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 109++D7D7 C9           						ret
 110++D7D8
 111++D7D8 3A B8 7E     UBnKPitch_24Bit:		ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 112++D7DB E6 7F        						and 	$7F
 113++D7DD 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
 114++D7DE 3A 23 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 115++D7E1 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
 116++D7E2 2A 24 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
 117++D7E5 CD EB 92     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 118++D7E8 7D           						ld		a,l
 119++D7E9 32 F6 D6     						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulY),a			; save result
 120++D7EC ED 53 F7 D6  						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulY+1),de		; save result
 121++D7F0 3A B8 7E     						ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 122++D7F3 E6 7F        						and 	$7F
 123++D7F5 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
 124++D7F6 3A 26 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 125++D7F9 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
 126++D7FA 2A 27 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)               ; .
 127++D7FD CD EB 92     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 128++D800 7D           						ld		a,l
 129++D801 32 F2 D6     						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulZ),a			; save result
 130++D804 ED 53 F3 D6  						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulZ+1),de		; save result
 131++D808 3A B8 7E     						ld		a,(BETA)
 132++D80B E6 80        						and		$80
 133++D80D CA 27 D8     						jp		z,.Climbing
 134++D810 DD 21 23 C0  .Diving:				ld		ix,UBnKylo
 135++D814 FD 21 F2 D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulZ
 136++D818 CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 137++D81B DD 21 26 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 138++D81F FD 21 F6 D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulY
 139++D823 CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 140++D826 C9           						ret
 141++D827 DD 21 23 C0  .Climbing:		     	ld		ix,UBnKylo
 142++D82B FD 21 F2 D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulZ
 143++D82F CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 144++D832 DD 21 26 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 145++D836 FD 21 F6 D6  						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulY
 146++D83A CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 147++D83D C9           						ret
 148++D83E
 149++D83E                  ELSE
 150++D83E ~            APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
 151++D83E ~                                    push    bc
 152++D83E ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
 153++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
 154++D83E ~                                    ld      b,a
 155++D83E ~                                    ld      a,c
 156++D83E ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
 157++D83E ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
 158++D83E ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
 159++D83E ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
 160++D83E ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
 161++D83E ~                                    add     hl,de
 162++D83E ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
 163++D83E ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
 164++D83E ~                                    pop     bc
 165++D83E ~                                    ret
 166++D83E ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
 167++D83E ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
 168++D83E ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
 169++D83E ~                                    or      a
 170++D83E ~                                    sbc     hl,de
 171++D83E ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
 172++D83E ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
 173++D83E ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
 174++D83E ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
 175++D83E ~                                    pop     bc
 176++D83E ~                                    ret
 177++D83E ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
 178++D83E ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
 179++D83E ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
 180++D83E ~                                    pop     bc
 181++D83E ~                                    ret
 182++D83E ~                                    ENDM
 183++D83E ~
 184++D83E ~
 185++D83E ~            APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
 186++D83E ~
 187++D83E ~            APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
 188++D83E ~
 189++D83E ~            APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
 190++D83E ~
 191++D83E ~            ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
 192++D83E ~            rollWork      DS 3
 193++D83E ~            rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
 194++D83E ~            rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
 195++D83E ~            rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
 196++D83E ~
 197++D83E ~            ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 198++D83E ~            ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
 199++D83E ~            ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 200++D83E ~                                    ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
 201++D83E ~                                    or      (hl)
 202++D83E ~                                    jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
 203++D83E ~            ; If the xsgn,ysng or zsng are not 0 or $80 then we use 24 bit routines
 204++D83E ~            ; else we can just continue to use 16 bit
 205++D83E ~                                   ;jp      ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit
 206++D83E ~
 207++D83E ~            .CheckFor24Bit:         ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 208++D83E ~                                    ld      hl,UBnKysgn
 209++D83E ~                                    or      (hl)
 210++D83E ~                                    ld      hl,UBnKzsgn
 211++D83E ~                                    or      (hl)
 212++D83E ~                                    and     $7F
 213++D83E ~                                    jp      nz,ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit
 214++D83E ~                                    ;break
 215++D83E ~            ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
 216++D83E ~            .Not24BitCalcs:         ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
 217++D83E ~                                    ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
 218++D83E ~                                    call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
 219++D83E ~                                    ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
 220++D83E ~                                    ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
 221++D83E ~            ; A = Flip sign
 222++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(ALP2)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
 223++D83E ~                                    ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
 224++D83E ~                                    xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
 225++D83E ~            ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
 226++D83E ~                                    call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
 227++D83E ~            ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
 228++D83E ~                                    ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
 229++D83E ~                                    ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
 230++D83E ~            ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
 231++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
 232++D83E ~                                    ld      e,a
 233++D83E ~                                    call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
 234++D83E ~                                    ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
 235++D83E ~                                    ld      (varP),hl
 236++D83E ~            ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
 237++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
 238++D83E ~                                    ld      e,a
 239++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(BET2)
 240++D83E ~                                    xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 241++D83E ~            ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 242++D83E ~                                    call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 243++D83E ~                                    ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 244++D83E ~                                    ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 245++D83E ~            ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 246++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 247++D83E ~                                    ld      e,a
 248++D83E ~                                    call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 249++D83E ~                                    ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 250++D83E ~                                    ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 251++D83E ~            ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 252++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 253++D83E ~                                    ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 254++D83E ~                                    ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 255++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 256++D83E ~                                    xor     e                           ;
 257++D83E ~                                    ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 258++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 259++D83E ~                                    xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 260++D83E ~                                    jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 261++D83E ~                                    ld      hl,(varPp1)
 262++D83E ~                                    ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 263++D83E ~                                    or      a
 264++D83E ~                                    add     hl,de
 265++D83E ~                                    jp      .MV44
 266++D83E ~            .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 267++D83E ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)
 268++D83E ~                                    or      a
 269++D83E ~                                    sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 270++D83E ~                                    jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 271++D83E ~                                    NegHL
 272++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and Univs are sign + 23 bit xpos
 273++D83E ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit
 274++D83E ~                                    ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 275++D83E ~            ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 276++D83E ~            .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 277++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 278++D83E ~                                    ld      e,a
 279++D83E ~                                    ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 280++D83E ~                                    call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 281++D83E ~                                    ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 282++D83E ~                                    ld      (varP),hl
 283++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)
 284++D83E ~                                    ld      e,a
 285++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 286++D83E ~                                    xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 287++D83E ~                                    call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 288++D83E ~                                    ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 289++D83E ~                                    ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 290++D83E ~                                    ;break
 291++D83E ~                                    call    ApplyMyRollToOrientation
 292++D83E ~                                    call    ApplyMyPitchToOrientation
 293++D83E ~                                    ; if its not a Univ then apply to local orientation
 294++D83E ~            .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 295++D83E ~                                    ld      d,0
 296++D83E ~                                    ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 297++D83E ~                                    ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 298++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 299++D83E ~                                    ld      b,a                         ;
 300++D83E ~                                    ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 301++D83E ~                                    call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 302++D83E ~                                    ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 303++D83E ~                                    ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 304++D83E ~                                    ret
 305++D83E ~
 306++D83E ~                           DISPLAY "TODO: Looks like pitch is always being applied as positive"
 307++D83E ~            ApplyMyRollToOrientation:MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 308++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(ALPHA)
 308++D83E ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 308++D83E ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatNosevY
 308++D83E ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToNosev:
 309++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(ALPHA)
 309++D83E ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatSidevX
 309++D83E ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatSidevY
 309++D83E ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToSidev:
 310++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(ALPHA)
 310++D83E ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
 310++D83E ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
 310++D83E ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToRoofv:
 311++D83E ~                                    ret
 312++D83E ~
 313++D83E ~            ApplyMyPitchToOrientation:
 314++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(BETA)
 314++D83E ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
 314++D83E ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatNosevY
 314++D83E ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToNosev:
 315++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(BETA)
 315++D83E ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 315++D83E ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatSidevY
 315++D83E ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToSidev:
 316++D83E ~                                    ld      a,(BETA)
 316++D83E ~              ld ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
 316++D83E ~              ld iy,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
 316++D83E ~              call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:
 317++D83E ~                                    ret
 318++D83E ~            ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 319++D83E ~            ; 24 bit version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 320++D83E ~            ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
 321++D83E ~            ; Minsky Roll       Minsky Pitch
 322++D83E ~            ;  y -= alpha * x    y -= beta * z
 323++D83E ~            ;  x += alpha * y    z += beta * y
 324++D83E ~            ; or once combined
 325++D83E ~            ;   1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 326++D83E ~            ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
 327++D83E ~            ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
 328++D83E ~            ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 329++D83E ~            ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 330++D83E ~            ; Based on non optimised version of Planet pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 331++D83E ~            ; Now at least rolls the correct direction
 332++D83E ~            UnivAlphaMulX               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 333++D83E ~            UnivAlphaMulY               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 334++D83E ~            UnivAlphaMulZ               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 335++D83E ~            UnivBetaMulZ                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 336++D83E ~            UnivBetaMulY                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 337++D83E ~            UnivK2                      DS 3
 338++D83E ~
 339++D83E ~            ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit: 	 ld     a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
 340++D83E ~                                         ld     hl,BETA
 341++D83E ~                                         or     (hl)
 342++D83E ~                                         call   nz, Univ_Roll_And_Pitch
 343++D83E ~            ;.CheckForRoll:              and		a
 344++D83E ~            ;							call	nz,Univ_Roll
 345++D83E ~            ;.CheckForPitch:				ld		a,(BETA)
 346++D83E ~            ;							and		a
 347++D83E ~            ;							call	nz,Univ_Pitch
 348++D83E ~            .ApplySpeed:            	ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
 349++D83E ~            							ReturnIfAIsZero
 350++D83E ~            							ld      c,0                         ;
 351++D83E ~            							ld      h,a                         ;
 352++D83E ~            							ld      b,$80                       ;
 353++D83E ~            							ld      de,(UBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
 354++D83E ~            							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 355++D83E ~            							ld      l,a                         ; .
 356++D83E ~            							call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
 357++D83E ~            							ld      (UBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
 358++D83E ~            							ld      a,l
 359++D83E ~            							ld      (UBnKzlo),a                ;
 360++D83E ~            							ret
 361++D83E ~
 362++D83E ~            ; Performs minsky rotation
 363++D83E ~            ; Joystick left          Joystick right
 364++D83E ~            ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 365++D83E ~            ; x :=  x      + y / 64  x :=  x -  y / 64  so rather than /64  is z * alpha / 256
 366++D83E ~            ; y :=  y      - x /64   y :=  y +  x / 64
 367++D83E ~            ;
 368++D83E ~            ; Joystick down          Joystick up
 369++D83E ~            ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 370++D83E ~            ; y :=  y      + z / 64  y :=  y - z / 64
 371++D83E ~            ; z :=  z      - y / 64  z :=  z + y / 64
 372++D83E ~            ;
 373++D83E ~            ; get z, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 374++D83E ~            ; get x, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 375++D83E ~            ; if alpha +ve subtract x = x - z adj, z =z + x adj , else x += z adj z -= z adj
 376++D83E ~            ; so we can assume 24 bit maths and just do 16 bit multiply of say HL = nosev x [sgn][hi] and de = [0][alpha] by calling AHLequHLmulE
 377++D83E ~            ; for roll
 378++D83E ~            ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 379++D83E ~            ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 380++D83E ~            ; and for pitch
 381++D83E ~            ; nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
 382++D83E ~            ; nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
 383++D83E ~            ;  1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 384++D83E ~            ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
 385++D83E ~            ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
 386++D83E ~            ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 387++D83E ~            ;
 388++D83E ~            ;   1a. K [3 2 1 0] = -alpha * (x sign hi lo)
 389++D83E ~            ;   1b. K [3 2 1]   = y sign hi lo + K [321] (in effect y minus (alpha * x / 256)
 390++D83E ~            ;   1c. K2 [3 2 1]  = k [3 2 1 ]
 391++D83E ~            ;   2a. K[3 2 1 0]  = k2 [3 2 1] * beta
 392++D83E ~            ;   2b. z sign hi lo += K[3 2 1] ( in effect z += (beta * K2)/256
 393++D83E ~            ;   3a. K [3 2 1 0] = z sign hi lo * -beta
 394++D83E ~            ;   3b. y sign hi lo = K2 [3 2 1] - K [3 2 1] ( in effect K2 - (beta * z) /256
 395++D83E ~            ;
 396++D83E ~            ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 397++D83E ~
 398++D83E ~
 399++D83E ~
 400++D83E ~            ;-- Q = - ALPHA
 401++D83E ~            ;-- A P[1 0] = xsign xhi xlo
 402++D83E ~            ;-- call K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q which means  K(3 2 1) = (A P+1 P) * Q / 256 = x * -alpha / 256 = - alpha * x / 256
 403++D83E ~            ;-- call K[3 2 1] = ysign hi lo + K[3 2 1] (= y - alpha * x / 256)
 404++D83E ~            ;-- K2 [3 2 1 ] = K [ 3 2 1 ]
 405++D83E ~            ;-- A P [1 0]   = K [3 2 1]
 406++D83E ~            ;-- Q = BETA
 407++D83E ~            ;-- K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q
 408++D83E ~            ;-- K3[3 2 1] = z sign hi lo + K[3 2 1]
 409++D83E ~            ;-- A P [1 0] = -K [3 2 1]
 410++D83E ~            ;-- z sign hi lo = K[3 2 1]
 411++D83E ~            ;-- K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q
 412++D83E ~            ;-- T = K[3] sign bit
 413++D83E ~            ;-- A = K[3] sign bit xor K2[3]
 414++D83E ~            ;-- if positive A yhi lo - = K [3 2 1 0] + K2[3 2 1 0] so A yhi ylo = K + K2 /256 as we abandon low byte
 415++D83E ~            ;-- if negative A yhi lo = (K - k2 )/256
 416++D83E ~            ;-- A = A xor T
 417++D83E ~            ;-- y sign = A
 418++D83E ~            ;-- Q = alpha
 419++D83E ~            ;-- A P(1 0) = y sign hi lo
 420++D83E ~            ;-- K[3 2 1 0 ] A P[1 0] * Q
 421++D83E ~            ;-- x sign hi lo = K[3 2 1] = xsign hi lo * K[3 2 1]
 422++D83E ~
 423++D83E ~            K2      DS  3
 424++D83E ~
 425++D83E ~            Univ_Roll_And_Pitch:	    ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 426++D83E ~            ;** 1. K2 = y - alpha * x **************************************
 427++D83E ~            ;-- DEL = alpha * (x sign hi lo) /256
 428++D83E ~            							ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha
 429++D83E ~            							ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 430++D83E ~            							ld      e,a                         ; .
 431++D83E ~            							ld      hl,(UBnKxhi)                ; hl = UBnKchi sgn
 432++D83E ~            							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * alpha / 256
 433++D83E ~            ;-- DEL = K2 = y - alpha * x
 434++D83E ~                                        ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 435++D83E ~                                        ld      h,l
 436++D83E ~                                        ld      de,(UBnKyhi)
 437++D83E ~                                        ld      a,(UBnKylo)
 438++D83E ~                                        ld      l,a
 439++D83E ~                                        call    SubBCHfromDELsigned
 440++D83E ~                                        ld      (K2+1),de
 441++D83E ~                                        ld      a,l
 442++D83E ~                                        ld      (K2),a
 443++D83E ~            ;** 2. z = z + beta * K2 ***************************************
 444++D83E ~            ;-- HLE = DEL ..................................................
 445++D83E ~                                        ex      de,hl                       ; will set hl to de and e to l in one go
 446++D83E ~            ;-- DELC = beta * HLE, i.e. beta * K2
 447++D83E ~                                        ld      a,(BETA)
 448++D83E ~                                        ld      d,a
 449++D83E ~                                        call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = beta * K2
 450++D83E ~            ;-- DEL = z + DEL, i.e. z + Beta * K2 /256
 451++D83E ~                                        ld      bc,(UBnKzhi)                ; BCH = z
 452++D83E ~                                        ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 453++D83E ~                                        ld      h,a                         ; .
 454++D83E ~                                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL =z + (beta * K2)/256
 455++D83E ~                                        ld      (UBnKzhi),de                ; and save to Z
 456++D83E ~                                        ld      a,l                         ; .
 457++D83E ~                                        ld      (UBnKzlo),a                 ; .
 458++D83E ~            ;** 3. y = K2 - beta * z ***************************************
 459++D83E ~            ;-- DEL = beta * z / 256
 460++D83E ~                                        ld      a,(BETA)                    ; get pitch value
 461++D83E ~            							ld      d,a                         ; d = pitch
 462++D83E ~            							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; HLE = z sgn, hi, lo
 463++D83E ~            							ld      e,a                         ; .
 464++D83E ~            							ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)                ; hl = UBnKchi sgn
 465++D83E ~            							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = z * beta, so DEL = z * beta / 256
 466++D83E ~            ;-- BCH = DEL ..................................................
 467++D83E ~                                        ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 468++D83E ~                                        ld      h,l
 469++D83E ~            ;-- y = DEL = K2 - beta * z = DEL - BCH
 470++D83E ~                                        ld      de,(K2+1)                   ; del = K2
 471++D83E ~                                        ld      a,(K2)                      ; .
 472++D83E ~                                        ld      l,a                         ; .
 473++D83E ~                                        call    SubBCHfromDELsigned         ; .
 474++D83E ~                                        ld      (UBnKyhi),de                ; and save to y
 475++D83E ~                                        ld      a,l                         ; .
 476++D83E ~                                        ld      (UBnKylo),a                 ; .
 477++D83E ~            ;** 4. x = x + alpha * y ***************************************
 478++D83E ~            ;-- DEL = alpha * y
 479++D83E ~                                        ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 480++D83E ~            ;-- DEL = alpha * (y sign hi lo) /256
 481++D83E ~            							ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha
 482++D83E ~            							ld      a,(UBnKylo)                 ; HLE = y sgn, hi, lo
 483++D83E ~            							ld      e,a                         ; .
 484++D83E ~            							ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)                ; hl = UBnKyhi sgn
 485++D83E ~            							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = y * alpha, so DEL = Y * alpha / 256
 486++D83E ~            ;-- DEL = x + alpha * y
 487++D83E ~                                        ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 488++D83E ~                                        ld      h,l                         ; .
 489++D83E ~                                        ld      de,(UBnKxhi)                ; del = x
 490++D83E ~                                        ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                 ; .
 491++D83E ~                                        ld      l,a                         ; .
 492++D83E ~                                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; del = del + bch = x + alpha * y
 493++D83E ~                                        ld      (UBnKxhi),de                ; and save to x
 494++D83E ~                                        ld      a,l                         ; .
 495++D83E ~                                        ld      (UBnKxlo),a                 ; .
 496++D83E ~            .ApplyRollToRight:          ;call    ApplyMyRollToOrientation
 497++D83E ~            .ApplyPitchToClimb:         call    ApplyMyPitchToOrientation
 498++D83E ~                                      ;  call    TidyVectorsIX ; doesn't work
 499++D83E ~            							ret
 500++D83E                  ENDIF
 501++D83E
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
1495+ D83E                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D83E
   2++D83E              ; A = value for rotation
   3++D83E              ; HL = address of value for rotation
   4++D83E              ; TODO logic for permanent spin, I thik this it -127??
   5++D83E              SplitAndDampenZ:        MACRO
   6++D83E ~                                    ld      b,a
   7++D83E ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
   8++D83E ~                                    jp      z,.ProcessRoll
   9++D83E ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  10++D83E ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  11++D83E ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  12++D83E ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  13++D83E ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  14++D83E ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  15++D83E ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  16++D83E ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  17++D83E ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  18++D83E ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  19++D83E                                      ENDM
  20++D83E
  21++D83E              SplitAndDampenX:        MACRO
  22++D83E ~                                    ld      b,a
  23++D83E ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  24++D83E ~                                    and     a                       ; .
  25++D83E ~                                    ret     z                       ; .
  26++D83E ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  27++D83E ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  28++D83E ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  29++D83E ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  30++D83E ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  31++D83E ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  32++D83E ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  33++D83E ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  34++D83E ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  35++D83E ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  36++D83E                                      ENDM
  37++D83E
  38++D83E
  39++D83E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  40++D83E              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  41++D83E              ; x and z counters are proper 2's c values
  42++D83E 3A 68 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  43++D841 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  44++D843 28 18                                jr      z,.PitchSAxes
  45++D845                                      SplitAndDampenZ
  45++D845 47          >                        ld      b,a
  45++D846 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
  45++D848 CA 8A D8    >                        jp      z,.ProcessRoll
  45++D84B 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  45++D84C E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  45++D84E 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  45++D84F 32 6E C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  45++D852 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  45++D853 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  45++D855 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  45++D856 32 6F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++D859 B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  45++D85A 32 68 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  46++D85D                                      ;ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  47++D85D 21 30 C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  48++D860 22 91 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  49++D863 21 36 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  50++D866 22 93 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  51++D869 CD D6 D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  52++D86C 21 32 C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  53++D86F 22 91 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  54++D872 21 38 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  55++D875 22 93 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  56++D878 CD D6 D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  57++D87B 21 34 C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  58++D87E 22 91 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  59++D881 21 3A C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  60++D884 22 93 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  61++D887 CD D6 D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  62++D88A 3A 67 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  63++D88D FE FF                                cp      $FF
  64++D88F 28 17                                jr      z,.RollSAxis
  65++D891                                      SplitAndDampenX
  65++D891 47          >                        ld      b,a
  65++D892 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  65++D894 A7          >                        and     a                       ; .
  65++D895 C8          >                        ret     z                       ; .
  65++D896 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  65++D897 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  65++D899 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  65++D89A 32 6E C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  65++D89D 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  65++D89E E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  65++D8A0 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  65++D8A1 32 6F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  65++D8A4 B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  65++D8A5 32 67 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  66++D8A8 21 30 C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  67++D8AB 22 91 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  68++D8AE 21 2A C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  69++D8B1 22 93 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  70++D8B4 CD D6 D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  71++D8B7 21 32 C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  72++D8BA 22 91 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  73++D8BD 21 2C C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  74++D8C0 22 93 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  75++D8C3 CD D6 D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  76++D8C6 21 34 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  77++D8C9 22 91 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  78++D8CC 21 2E C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  79++D8CF 22 93 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  80++D8D2 CD D6 D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  81++D8D5 C9                                   ret
  82++D8D6
  83++D8D6
  84++D8D6
  85++D8D6              ; Roate around axis
  86++D8D6              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  87++D8D6              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  88++D8D6              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  89++D8D6              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  90++D8D6              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  91++D8D6              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  92++D8D6              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  93++D8D6              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  94++D8D6              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  95++D8D6 2A 91 7E     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  96++D8D9 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  97++D8DA 23                                   inc     hl
  98++D8DB 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  99++D8DC EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 100++D8DD 7C                                   ld      a,h
 101++D8DE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 102++D8E0 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 103++D8E2 7C                                   ld      a,h
 104++D8E3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 105++D8E5 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 106++D8E7 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 107++D8E8 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 108++D8EA 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 109++D8EB B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 110++D8EC CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 111++D8EF              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112++D8EF E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 113++D8F0 7D                                   ld      a,l
 114++D8F1 32 AD 7F                             ld      (varR),a
 115++D8F4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 116++D8F5 32 AE 7F                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 117++D8F8              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 118++D8F8 2A 93 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 119++D8FB 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 120++D8FC 23                                   inc     hl
 121++D8FD 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 122++D8FE 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123++D8FF E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 124++D901 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 125++D903 7A                                   ld      a,d
 126++D904 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 127++D906 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 128++D907                                      ShiftDERight1
 128++D907 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 128++D909 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 129++D90B                                      ShiftDERight1
 129++D90B CB 3A       >			   srl d
 129++D90D CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 130++D90F                                      ShiftDERight1
 130++D90F CB 3A       >			   srl d
 130++D911 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 131++D913                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 131++D913 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 131++D915 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 132++D917 3A 6E C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 133++D91A FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 134++D91C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 135++D91E B2                                   or      d
 136++D91F 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 137++D920              ;;; ld      a,e
 138++D920              ;;;     or      iyh
 139++D920              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 140++D920              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 141++D920 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 142++D921                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 143++D921              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144++D921 CD 56 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
 145++D924 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 146++D925              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 147++D925              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 148++D925 2A 93 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 149++D928 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 150++D929 23                                   inc     hl
 151++D92A 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 152++D92B EB                                   ex      de,hl
 153++D92C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 154++D92D E6 80                                and     $80
 155++D92F FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 156++D931 7C                                   ld      a,h
 157++D932 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 158++D934 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 159++D936 5F                                   ld      e,a
 160++D937 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 161++D939 57                                   ld      d,a
 162++D93A B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 163++D93B CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15
 164++D93E              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 165++D93E E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 166++D93F 7D                                   ld      a,l
 167++D940 32 AC 7E                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 168++D943 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169++D944 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 170++D946 32 C8 7F                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 171++D949              ;-- Set up TQ
 172++D949 2A 91 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 173++D94C              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 174++D94C 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 175++D94D 23                                   inc     hl
 176++D94E 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 177++D94F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 178++D950 E6 80                                and     $80
 179++D952 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 180++D954 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181++D955 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 182++D957 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 183++D958                                      ShiftDERight1
 183++D958 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 183++D95A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 184++D95C                                      ShiftDERight1
 184++D95C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 184++D95E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 185++D960                                      ShiftDERight1
 185++D960 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 185++D962 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 186++D964                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 186++D964 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 186++D966 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 187++D968 3A 6E C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 188++D96B FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 189++D96D E6 80                                and     $80
 190++D96F B2                                   or      d
 191++D970 57                                   ld      d,a
 192++D971              ;;; ld      a,e
 193++D971              ;;;     or      iyh
 194++D971              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 195++D971 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 196++D972              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 197++D972 CD 75 01                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 198++D975              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 199++D975 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 200++D976 2A 93 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 201++D979 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 202++D97A 23                                   inc     hl
 203++D97B 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 204++D97C              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 205++D97C D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 206++D97D 2A 91 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 207++D980 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 208++D981 23                                   inc     hl
 209++D982 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 210++D983 C9                                   ret
 211++D984
 212++D984
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm

  10++D984              ;                        ENDM
