  15++D987 FE 00                                cp      0
  16++D989 C8                                   ret     z
  17++D98A CB 27                                sla     a
  18++D98C CB 27                                sla     a
  19++D98E FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                           ; save pre calculated speed
  20++D990              .ApplyToX:              SpeedMulAxis    a, UBnkrotmatNosevX     ; e =  ABS (nosev x hi) c = sign
  20++D990 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  20++D991 2A 36 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
  20++D994 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  20++D995             >                        ClearSignBitA
  20++D995 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  20++D997 57          >                        ld      d,a
  20++D998 ED 30       >                        mul     de
  20++D99A 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  20++D99B             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  20++D99B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  20++D99D 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  20++D99E 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  20++D99F 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0
  21++D9A1              .AddSpeedToX:           AddSpeedToVert UBnKxlo
  21++D9A1 ED 5B 21 C0 >                        ld      de,(UBnKxlo+1)
  21++D9A5 3A 20 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxlo)
  21++D9A8 6F          >                        ld      l,a
  21++D9A9 CD 14 01    >                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned               ; DEL = DEL + BCH
  21++D9AC 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  21++D9AD 32 20 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKxlo),a
  21++D9B0 ED 53 21 C0 >                        ld      (UBnKxlo+1),de
  22++D9B4              .ApplyToY:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatNosevY
  22++D9B4 FD 5D       >                        ld      e,iyl
  22++D9B6 2A 38 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
  22++D9B9 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  22++D9BA             >                        ClearSignBitA
  22++D9BA E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  22++D9BC 57          >                        ld      d,a
  22++D9BD ED 30       >                        mul     de
  22++D9BF 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  22++D9C0             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  22++D9C0 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  22++D9C2 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  22++D9C3 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  22++D9C4 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0
  23++D9C6              .AddSpeedToY:           AddSpeedToVert UBnKylo
  23++D9C6 ED 5B 24 C0 >                        ld      de,(UBnKylo+1)
  23++D9CA 3A 23 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKylo)
  23++D9CD 6F          >                        ld      l,a
  23++D9CE CD 14 01    >                        call    AddBCHtoDELsigned               ; DEL = DEL + BCH
  23++D9D1 7D          >                        ld      a,l
  23++D9D2 32 23 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKylo),a
  23++D9D5 ED 53 24 C0 >                        ld      (UBnKylo+1),de
  24++D9D9              .ApplyToZ:              SpeedMulAxis    iyl, UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  24++D9D9 FD 5D       >                        ld      e,iyl
  24++D9DB 2A 3A C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
  24++D9DE 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  24++D9DF             >                        ClearSignBitA
  24++D9DF E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  24++D9E1 57          >                        ld      d,a
  24++D9E2 ED 30       >                        mul     de
  24++D9E4 7C          >                        ld      a,h
  24++D9E5             >                        SignBitOnlyA
  24++D9E5 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  24++D9E7 47          >                        ld      b,a;ld      c,a
  24++D9E8 62          >                        ld      h,d;ld      e,d
  24++D9E9 0E 00       >                        ld      c,0;ld      d,0

  25++D9EF 3A 26 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzlo)

1614+ DB6D                                      JumpOnABitSet ShipExplodingBitNbr, .ExplodingCloud; we always do the cloud processing even if invisible

1667+ DBB9 C6 04                                add     4                           ; we do this early as we now have logic for
1668+ DBBB DA 7D DC                             jp      c,.FinishedExplosion        ; display or not later

1670+ DBC6 C8          >                        ret		z

1671+ DBC7 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1671+ DBC9 C2 7A DB    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot

1673+ DBCF 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .

1674+ DBD0 FE 20       >                        cp      32
1674+ DBD2 DA DA DB    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1675+ DBD5 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1676+ DBD7 C3 E5 DB                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1677+ DBDA              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1677+ DBDA CB 25       >			   sla l
1677+ DBDC CB 14       >			   rl  h
1678+ DBDE                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1678+ DBDE CB 25       >			   sla l
1678+ DBE0 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1679+ DBE2                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1679+ DBE2 37          >                        scf
1680+ DBE3 CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1681+ DBE5 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1682+ DBE7 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1683+ DBE8 3A 7E C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1684+ DBEB                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
1685+ DBEB ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
1686+ DBEB ~                                    ld      b,h
1687+ DBEB ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivBLog
1688+ DBEB ~                                    ld      d,a
1689+ DBEB ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
1690+ DBEB                      ELSE
1691+ DBEB 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
1692+ DBEC 1E 00                                ld      e,0                         ;
1693+ DBEE CD 9D 96                             call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1694+ DBF1 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1695+ DBF2                      ENDIF
1696+ DBF2                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1696+ DBF2 FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1696+ DBF4 DA FC DB    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1697+ DBF7 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1698+ DBF9 C3 08 DC                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1699+ DBFC              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1699+ DBFC CB 23       >			   sla e
1699+ DBFE CB 12       >			   rl  d
1700+ DC00                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1700+ DC00 CB 23       >			   sla e
1700+ DC02 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1701+ DC04                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1701+ DC04 CB 23       >			   sla e
1701+ DC06 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1702+ DC08 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1703+ DC09 32 7F C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a         ; .
1704+ DC0C DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1705+ DC0E 3A 7E C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1706+ DC11 ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1707+ DC13 E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1708+ DC15 CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1709+ DC17 21 87 DC                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1710+ DC1A ED 31                                add     hl,a
1711+ DC1C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1712+ DC1D FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1713+ DC1F 3A 7E C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1714+ DC22                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1714+ DC22 CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1714+ DC24 CA 29 DC    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1714+ DC27 ED 44       >                        neg
1714+ DC29             >.DoneABSa:
1715+ DC29 CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1716+ DC2B CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1717+ DC2D CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1718+ DC2F F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1719+ DC31 DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1720+ DC33 3A 1E C4     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1721+ DC36 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1722+ DC37 21 10 C1                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1723+ DC3A C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1724+ DC3C DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1725+ DC3E 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1726+ DC3F 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1727+ DC40 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1728+ DC41 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1729+ DC42 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1730+ DC43 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1731+ DC44 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1732+ DC45 DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1733+ DC47 FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1734+ DC49                                          ;break
1735+ DC49 D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1736+ DC4B EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1737+ DC4C DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1738+ DC4E CD 8F DC                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1739+ DC51 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1740+ DC52                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1740+ DC52 A7          >                        and     a
1740+ DC53 C2 6E DC    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1741+ DC56 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1742+ DC57 E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1743+ DC58 E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1744+ DC59 D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1745+ DC5A DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1746+ DC5C CD 8F DC                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1747+ DC5F D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1748+ DC60 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1749+ DC61                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1749+ DC61 A7          >                        and     a
1749+ DC62 C2 6E DC    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1750+ DC65 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1751+ DC66 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1752+ DC67                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1752+ DC67 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1753+ DC6B CD 00 E3                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1754+ DC6E C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1755+ DC70 FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1756+ DC72 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1757+ DC74 E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1758+ DC76 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1759+ DC78 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1760+ DC7A 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1761+ DC7C C9                                   ret
1762+ DC7D              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1763+ DC7D 3A 40 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1764+ DC80 CD EF 84                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1765+ DC83 CD 9A C7                             call    UnivFinishedExplosion       ;
1766+ DC86 C9                                   ret
1767+ DC87
1768+ DC87
1769+ DC87 FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1769+ DC8B 6C 48 24 25
1770+ DC8F                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1771+ DC8F
1772+ DC8F              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1773+ DC8F              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1774+ DC8F              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1775+ DC8F              ; uses registers hl, de
1776+ DC8F E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1777+ DC90 CD D2 85                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1778+ DC93 E1                                   pop     hl
1779+ DC94 17                                   rla                                 ;
1780+ DC95 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1781+ DC97 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1782+ DC98 ED 30                                mul
1783+ DC9A 5A                                   ld  e,d
1784+ DC9B 16 00                                ld  d,0
1785+ DC9D                                      ClearCarryFlag
1785+ DC9D B7          >                        or a
1786+ DC9E ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1787+ DCA0 C9                                   ret
1788+ DCA1 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1789+ DCA2 ED 30                                mul
1790+ DCA4 5A                                   ld  e,d
1791+ DCA5 16 00                                ld  d,0
1792+ DCA7                                      ClearCarryFlag
1792+ DCA7 B7          >                        or a
1793+ DCA8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1794+ DCAA C9                                   ret
1795+ DCAB
1796+ DCAB              GetExperiencePoints:    ; TODO calculate experience points
1797+ DCAB                                      ; TODO mission updates check
1798+ DCAB C9                                   ret
1799+ DCAC
1800+ DCAC              ; ......................................................
1801+ DCAC 3A 2D C4     KillShip:               ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1802+ DCAF FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1803+ DCB1 C8                                   ret     z
1804+ DCB2 CD BD C7                             call    UnivExplodeShip             ; remove AI, mark killed, mark exploding
1805+ DCB5                                      SetMemToN   UBnKexplDsp, ShipExplosionDuration ; set debris cloud timer, also usered in main to remove from slots
1805+ DCB5 3E 4B       >                        ld      a,ShipExplosionDuration
1805+ DCB7 32 70 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKexplDsp),a
1806+ DCBA                                      ldWriteZero UBnKEnergy              ; Zero ship energy
1806+ DCBA AF          >                        xor      a
1806+ DCBB 32 77 C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
1807+ DCBE 32 7F C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a
1808+ DCC1 3E 12                                ld      a,18
1809+ DCC3 32 7E C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; Zero cloud
1810+ DCC6                                      ; TODO logic to spawn cargo/plates goes here
1811+ DCC6 C9                                   ret
1812+ DCC7
1813+ DCC7              ; in a = damage
1814+ DCC7 47           DamageShip:             ld      b,a                         ; b = a = damage comming in
1815+ DCC8 3A 2D C4                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1816+ DCCB FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1817+ DCCD C8                                   ret     z
1818+ DCCE 3A 77 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)              ; get current energy level
1819+ DCD1                                      ClearCarryFlag
1819+ DCD1 B7          >                        or a
1820+ DCD2 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; subtract damage
1821+ DCD3 D2 DA DC     .Overkilled:            jp      nc,.DoneDamage              ; if no carry then its not gone negative
1822+ DCD6 CD AC DC                             call    KillShip                    ; else kill it
1823+ DCD9 C9                                   ret
1824+ DCDA 32 77 C0     .DoneDamage:            ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
1825+ DCDD C9                                   ret
1826+ DCDE              ; need recovery for energy too
1827+ DCDE              ; Shall we have a "jolt ship off course routine for when it gets hit by a blast or collision)
1828+ DCDE
1829+ DCDE              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1830+ DCDE              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1831+ DCDE              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1832+ DCDE              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1833+ DCDE              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1834+ DCDE              ;
1835+ DCDE              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1836+ DCDE              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1837+ DCDE              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1838+ DCDE              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1839+ DCDE              AddLaserBeamLine:
1840+ DCDE              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1841+ DCDE              GetGunVertexNode:
1842+ DCDE 3A 1C C4             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1843+ DCE1 21 10 C1             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1844+ DCE4 ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1845+ DCE6 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1846+ DCE9              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1847+ DCE9 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1848+ DCEA 23                   inc         hl
1849+ DCEB 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1850+ DCEC 23                   inc         hl
1851+ DCED ED 43 C6 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1852+ DCF1 0C                   inc         c
1853+ DCF2 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1854+ DCF3 04                   inc         b
1855+ DCF4 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1856+ DCF5              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1857+ DCF5 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1858+ DCF6 23                   inc         hl
1859+ DCF7 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1860+ DCF8 23                   inc         hl
1861+ DCF9 ED 43 C8 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1862+ DCFD              SetX2PointToXX15:
1863+ DCFD 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1864+ DD00 ED 43 CA C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1865+ DD04 3A 26 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1866+ DD07 4F                   ld          c,a
1867+ DD08              SetY2PointToXX15:
1868+ DD08 ED 43 CC C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1869+ DD0C 3A 22 C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1870+ DD0F                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1870+ DD0F CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1870+ DD11 CA 19 DD    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1871+ DD14              LL74DecX2:
1872+ DD14 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1873+ DD16 32 CA C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1874+ DD19              LL74SkipDec:
1875+ DD19 CD DD CD             call        ClipLineV3                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1876+ DD1C 38 5A                jr          c,CalculateNewLines
1877+ DD1E              ;        jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1878+ DD1E              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1879+ DD1E 2A AF 7F             ld          hl,(varU16)
1880+ DD21 3A C6 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1881+ DD24 77                   ld          (hl),a
1882+ DD25 23                   inc         hl
1883+ DD26 3A C8 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1884+ DD29 77                   ld          (hl),a
1885+ DD2A 23                   inc         hl
1886+ DD2B 3A CA C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1887+ DD2E 77                   ld          (hl),a
1888+ DD2F 23                   inc         hl
1889+ DD30 3A CC C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1890+ DD33 77                   ld          (hl),a
1891+ DD34 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1892+ DD36 23                   inc         hl
1893+ DD37 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1894+ DD39 22 AF 7F             ld          (varU16),hl
1895+ DD3C C9                   ret
1896+ DD3D

   5++DD3D                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"

   1++DD3D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DD3D              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DD3D 21 10 C1     getVertexNodeAtAToDE:   ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DD40 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DD42 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DD43 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   7++DD45 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   8++DD47 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
   9++DD49 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  10++DD4B C9                                   ret

  12++DD4C                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DD4C              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DD4C              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DD4C ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DD4C ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DD4C ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DD4C                                  ENDM
   7++DD4C
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
  13++DD4C                      DISPLAY "Tracing 11", $
  14++DD4C
  15++DD4C              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  16++DD4C              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
  17++DD4C               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  18++DD4C 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
  19++DD4D
  20++DD4D              PrepLines:
  21++DD4D              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  22++DD4D
  23++DD4D              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  24++DD4D              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  25++DD4D              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  26++DD4D              ;        or          8
  27++DD4D              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  28++DD4D              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  29++DD4D              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  30++DD4D              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  31++DD4D              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  32++DD4D              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  33++DD4D              ;
  34++DD4D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  35++DD4D
  36++DD4D              InitialiseLineRead:
  37++DD4D                      ;break
  38++DD4D                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  38++DD4D AF          >                        xor      a
  38++DD4E 32 0A C4    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  39++DD51 32 0B C4             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  40++DD54 32 4C DD             ld          (PLEDGECTR),a
  41++DD57 3A 20 C4             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  42++DD5A DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  43++DD5C FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  44++DD5F 21 50 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  45++DD62 22 AF 7F             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  46++DD65                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  46++DD65 3A 20 C4    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  46++DD68 32 B3 7F    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  47++DD6B 3A 70 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  48++DD6E                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  48++DD6E CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  48++DD70 CA 78 DD    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  49++DD73 E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  50++DD75 32 70 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  51++DD78              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  52++DD78              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  53++DD78              CalculateNewLines:
  54++DD78              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  55++DD78              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  56++DD78 21 21 C5             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  57++DD7B                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  58++DD7B 22 B2 7E             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  59++DD7E 3A 1B C4             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  60++DD81 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  61++DD82              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  62++DD82              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  63++DD82 2A B2 7E             ld          hl,(varV)
  64++DD85 E5                   push        hl
  65++DD86 FD E1                pop         iy
  66++DD88                     ; DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  67++DD88                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  68++DD88 ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  69++DD88                      ENDIF
  70++DD88 3A 9D 7E             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  71++DD8B 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  72++DD8C              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  73++DD8C FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  74++DD8F                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  74++DD8F BA          >                        cp      d
  74++DD90 DA EB DD    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  75++DD93              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  76++DD93              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  77++DD93              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  78++DD93 FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  79++DD96 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  80++DD97 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  81++DD99                      GetFaceAtA
  81++DD99 21 F2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  81++DD9C ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  81++DD9E 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  82++DD9F              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  83++DD9F                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  83++DD9F A7          >                        and     a
  83++DDA0 C2 B4 DD    >                        jp	    nz,VisibileEdge
  84++DDA3              IsFace2Visibile:
  85++DDA3 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  86++DDA4 ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  87++DDA6 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  88++DDA8 E5                   push        hl
  89++DDA9                      GetFaceAtA
  89++DDA9 21 F2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  89++DDAC ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  89++DDAE 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  90++DDAF E1                   pop         hl
  91++DDB0                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  91++DDB0 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  91++DDB1 CA EB DD    >                        jp	    z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  92++DDB4              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  93++DDB4              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  94++DDB4              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  95++DDB4 FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  96++DDB7 11 C6 C0             ld          de,UBnkX1
  97++DDBA CD 3D DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  98++DDBD FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  99++DDC0 11 CA C0             ld          de,UBnkX2
 100++DDC3 CD 3D DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
 101++DDC6
 102++DDC6                      IFDEF       CLIPVersion3
 103++DDC6 ~                        call        ClipLineV3
 104++DDC6 ~                        jr          nc,.SkipBreak1
 105++DDC6 ~                        nop
 106++DDC6 ~                        nop
 107++DDC6 ~                        ;break
 108++DDC6 ~            .SkipBreak1:
 109++DDC6 ~                        jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible
 110++DDC6 ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING        ELSE
 111++DDC6 ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            call        ClipLine
 112++DDC6 ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
 113++DDC6                      ENDIF
 114++DDC6              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
 115++DDC6                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 116++DDC6 ED 5B AF 7F                  ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 117++DDCA 21 C6 C0                     ld          hl,UbnkPreClipX1
 118++DDCD                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 118++DDCD ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DDCF ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DDD1 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DDD3 ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DDD5                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 119++DDD5 ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DDD7 ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DDD9 ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DDDB ED A0       >                        ldi
 120++DDDD ED 53 AF 7F                  ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 121++DDE1                      ELSE
 122++DDE1 ~                            ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 123++DDE1 ~                            ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
 124++DDE1 ~                            FourLDIInstrunctions
 125++DDE1 ~                            ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 126++DDE1                      ENDIF
 127++DDE1 21 0A C4             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
 128++DDE4 34                   inc         (hl)
 129++DDE5 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
 130++DDE6                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
 130++DDE6 FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
 130++DDE8 D2 01 DE    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
 131++DDEB              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
 132++DDEB              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 133++DDEB              LL78:
 134++DDEB 2A B2 7E             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 135++DDEE 3E 04                ld          a,4
 136++DDF0 ED 31                add         hl,a
 137++DDF2 22 B2 7E             ld          (varV),hl
 138++DDF5 21 4C DD             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 139++DDF8 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 140++DDF9 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 141++DDFA                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 141++DDFA 21 B3 7F    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 141++DDFD BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 141++DDFE C2 82 DD    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 142++DE01              CompletedLineGeneration:
 143++DE01              LL81:
 144++DE01              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 145++DE01 3A 0A C4             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 146++DE04 CB 27                sla         a
 147++DE06 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 148++DE08                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 149++DE08 CB 27                        sla         a                           ; multiple by 8 to equal number of bytes
 150++DE0A                      ENDIF
 151++DE0A 32 0B C4             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 152++DE0D              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 153++DE0D C9                   ret
 154++DE0E
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm
1900+ DE0E

1902+ DE0E
1903+ DE0E              UnivBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfUniv
1904+ DE0E

   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   4+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   5+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   6+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   7+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   8+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   9+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  10+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  11+ C000
  12+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  13+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  14+ C000 53 75 6E 20  StartOfSun:        DB "Sun Data ......."
  14+ C004 44 61 74 61
  14+ C008 20 2E 2E 2E
  14+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E
  15+ C010              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  16+ C010              CheckRowHLOnScreen:     MACRO   failtarget
  17+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
  18+ C010 ~                                    and     a                               ; .
  19+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
  20+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
  21+ C010 ~                                    and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
  22+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ;
  23+ C010                                      ENDM
  24+ C010
  25+ C010              ; IY = SBnKLineArray + rowValue*2
  26+ C010              IYEquRowN:              MACRO   rowValue                        ; set up iy as target address
  27+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,rowValue
  28+ C010 ~                                    ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
  29+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C010 ~                                    push    hl
  32+ C010 ~                                    pop     iy
  33+ C010                                      ENDM
  34+ C010              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.
  35+ C010              ; Universe map substibute for INWK

  27++C07E              SBnkTemp2Hi                 equ SXX12+4
  28++C07E

  94+ C1A9 44           WarpSunByHL:            ld      b,h
  95+ C1AA 4D                                   ld      c,l
  96+ C1AB 26 00                                ld      h,0

 106+ C1C5
 107+ C1C5              ; Z Must be at least 2 and positve to warp
 108+ C1C5 21 18 C0     WarpSunCloser:          ld      hl,SBnKzsgn
 109+ C1C8 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 110+ C1C9                                      ReturnIfALTNusng 2                      ; hard liit along z axis
 110+ C1C9 FE 02       >                        cp    2
 110+ C1CB D8          >                        ret	 c
 111+ C1CC 35                                   dec     (hl)
 112+ C1CD C9                                   ret
 113+ C1CE
 114+ C1CE              ; It should normally be behind but someone could fly past a planet, turn aroudn and jump
 115+ C1CE 21 18 C0     WarpSunFurther:         ld      hl,SBnKzsgn
 116+ C1D1 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 117+ C1D2                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng $7F                   ; this is the hard limit else it woudl turn negative and flip to -0
 117+ C1D2 FE 7F       >                        cp    $7F
 117+ C1D4 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 118+ C1D5 34                                   inc     (hl)                           ; if its negative it will still increase as we will block insane values
 119+ C1D6 C9                                   ret
 120+ C1D7              ; This uses UBNKNodeArray as the list
 121+ C1D7              ; the array is 256 * 2 bytes
 122+ C1D7              ; counter is current row y pos
 123+ C1D7              ; byte 1 is start x pos
 124+ C1D7              ; byte 2 is end x pos
 125+ C1D7              ; if they are both 0 then skip
 126+ C1D7              ; its always horizontal, yellow
 127+ C1D7
 128+ C1D7              .SunNoDraw:             SetCarryFlag                    ; ship is behind so do not draw, so we don't care abour draw as dot
 128+ C1D7 37          >                        scf
 129+ C1D8 C9                                   ret
 130+ C1D9
 131+ C1D9              SunBankDraw:            MACRO
 132+ C1D9 ~            .drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 133+ C1D9 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 134+ C1D9 ~                                    inc     hl
 135+ C1D9 ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 136+ C1D9 ~                                    inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 137+ C1D9 ~                                    push    hl,,bc
 138+ C1D9 ~                                    cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 139+ C1D9 ~                                    IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 140+ C1D9 ~                                    ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 141+ C1D9 ~                                    sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 142+ C1D9 ~                                    inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 143+ C1D9 ~                                    call    z, .FixWidth
 144+ C1D9 ~                                    ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 145+ C1D9 ~                                    ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 146+ C1D9 ~                                    call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 147+ C1D9 ~            .NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 148+ C1D9 ~                                    inc     b
 149+ C1D9 ~                                    dec     iyh
 150+ C1D9 ~                                    IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 151+ C1D9                                      ENDM
 152+ C1D9
 153+ C1D9
 154+ C1D9
 155+ C1D9              SunDraw:                MMUSelectLayer2
 155+ C1D9 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 156+ C1DD 3A ED C5     .OptimiseStartPos:      ld      a,(MinYOffset)
 157+ C1E0                                      JumpIfAIsZero .OffsetIsZero     ; if offset is 0 then just initate as normal
 157+ C1E0 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 157+ C1E1 CA F1 C1    >                        jp	    z, .OffsetIsZero
 158+ C1E4                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64, .OffsetLT64  ; if offset >=64 then we adjust and mve to bank 0
 158+ C1E4 FE 40       >                        cp      64
 158+ C1E6 DA FE C1    >                        jp		c, .OffsetLT64
 159+ C1E9 D6 40        .OffsetGTE64:           sub     64
 160+ C1EB 32 ED C5                             ld      (MinYOffset),a          ; adjust offset for bank 2
 161+ C1EE C3 36 C2                             jp      .StartBank2
 162+ C1F1 06 00        .OffsetIsZero:          ld      b,0                     ; row
 163+ C1F3 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64                  ; counter
 164+ C1F6 21 91 C0                             ld      hl,SBnKLineArray        ; set hl to start of array
 165+ C1F9 C3 10 C2                             jp      .StartBank1
 166+ C1FC              ;-- Snuck routine in here so that the macro will be happier
 167+ C1FC 3D           .FixWidth:              dec     a                       ; if carry resulted in a value of zero then correct
 168+ C1FD C9                                   ret
 169+ C1FE 21 91 C0     .OffsetLT64:            ld      hl,SBnKLineArray        ; adjust hl for line array offset
 170+ C201 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 171+ C203 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 172+ C205 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; set b row to the actual offset
 173+ C206 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; iyh = 64 - Y offset
 174+ C207 3E 40                                ld      a,64                    ; .
 175+ C209 91                                   sub     c                       ; .
 176+ C20A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 177+ C20C AF                                   xor     a                       ; Ready bank 2 with no offset
 178+ C20D 32 ED C5                             ld      (MinYOffset),a          ; .
 179+ C210 D9           .StartBank1:            exx
 180+ C211 3E 00                                ld      a,LAYER2_SHIFTED_SCREEN_TOP
 181+ C213 CD 38 E0                             call    asm_l2_bank_select      ; get in the first bank, we will only then bank select when needed
 182+ C216 D9                                   exx
 183+ C217                                      SunBankDraw
 183+ C217 7E          >.drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 183+ C218 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 183+ C219 23          >                        inc     hl
 183+ C21A 56          >                        ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 183+ C21B 23          >                        inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 183+ C21C E5 C5       >                        push    hl,,bc
 183+ C21E BA          >                        cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 183+ C21F             >                        IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 183+ C21F CA 2E C2    >                        jp	z,.NoLineDraw
 183+ C222 7A          >                        ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 183+ C223 91          >                        sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 183+ C224 3C          >                        inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 183+ C225 CC FC C1    >                        call    z, .FixWidth
 183+ C228 57          >                        ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 183+ C229 1E D8       >                        ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 183+ C22B CD 5E E4    >                        call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 183+ C22E C1 E1       >.NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 183+ C230 04          >                        inc     b
 183+ C231 FD 25       >                        dec     iyh
 183+ C233             >                        IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 183+ C233 C2 17 C2    >                        jp	nz,.drawLoop
 184+ C236 3A ED C5     .StartBank2:            ld      a,(MinYOffset)
 185+ C239                                      JumpIfAIsZero .OffsetBank2IsZero; if offset is 0 then we just continue, offset can never be >127 else there would be no draw
 185+ C239 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 185+ C23A CA 4E C2    >                        jp	    z, .OffsetBank2IsZero
 186+ C23D 21 11 C1     .NotZeroOffset:         ld      hl,SBnKLineArray + (64 * 2); adjust to correct offset
 187+ C240 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 188+ C242 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 189+ C244 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; iyh = 64 - offset
 190+ C245 3E 40                                ld      a,64                    ; .
 191+ C247 91                                   sub     c                       ; .
 192+ C248 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                   ; .
 193+ C24A 41                                   ld      b,c                     ; b = offset row
 194+ C24B C3 56 C2                             jp      .drawLineBank2
 195+ C24E 21 11 C1     .OffsetBank2IsZero:     ld      hl,SBnKLineArray + (64 * 2); start with offset adjusted
 196+ C251 06 00                                ld      b,0
 197+ C253 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64
 198+ C256 D9           .drawLineBank2:         exx
 199+ C257 3E 40                                ld      a,LAYER2_SHIFTED_SCREEN_MIDDLE
 200+ C259 CD 38 E0                             call    asm_l2_bank_select      ; now do the lower bank
 201+ C25C D9                                   exx
 202+ C25D              ; Could make this a sub routine but unwrapping saves a call
 203+ C25D                                      SunBankDraw
 203+ C25D 7E          >.drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 203+ C25E 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 203+ C25F 23          >                        inc     hl
 203+ C260 56          >                        ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 203+ C261 23          >                        inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 203+ C262 E5 C5       >                        push    hl,,bc
 203+ C264 BA          >                        cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 203+ C265             >                        IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 203+ C265 CA 74 C2    >                        jp	z,.NoLineDraw
 203+ C268 7A          >                        ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 203+ C269 91          >                        sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 203+ C26A 3C          >                        inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 203+ C26B CC FC C1    >                        call    z, .FixWidth
 203+ C26E 57          >                        ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 203+ C26F 1E D8       >                        ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 203+ C271 CD 5E E4    >                        call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 203+ C274 C1 E1       >.NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 203+ C276 04          >                        inc     b
 203+ C277 FD 25       >                        dec     iyh
 203+ C279             >                        IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 203+ C279 C2 5D C2    >                        jp	nz,.drawLoop
 204+ C27C C9                                   ret
 205+ C27D              ; -------------------------------------------------------------
 206+ C27D              ; Sun Position    z = ((seed.d & 7) | 1)      shift left 16
 207+ C27D              ;                 x = (seed.f & 3) shift left 16  | seed.f & 3 << 8 * -1 if seed f odd
 208+ C27D              ;                 y    = sun x position
 209+ C27D              ;
 210+ C27D              CalculateSunWarpPositon:
 211+ C27D 3A 3F 80     .CalcZPosition:         ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)      ; seed d & 7
 212+ C280 E6 07                                and     %00000111               ; .
 213+ C282 F6 81                                or      %10000001               ; | 1
 214+ C284 32 18 C0     .SetZPosition:          ld      (SBnKzsgn),a            ; << 16 (i.e. load into z sign byte
 215+ C287 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000               ; now set z hi and lo
 216+ C28A 22 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),hl            ;
 217+ C28D 3A 41 80     .CalcXandYPosition:     ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)      ; seed f & 3
 218+ C290 E6 03                                and     %00000011               ; .
 219+ C292 47                                   ld      b,a
 220+ C293 3A 40 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)      ; get low bit of seed e
 221+ C296 E6 01                                and     %00000001
 222+ C298 1F                                   rra                             ; roll bi t0 into bit 7
 223+ C299 B0                                   or      b                       ; now calc is f & 3 * -1 if seed e is odd
 224+ C29A 32 12 C0     .SetXandYPosition:      ld      (SBnKxsgn),a            ; set into x and y sign byte
 225+ C29D 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a            ; .
 226+ C2A0 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; we want just seed f & 3 here
 227+ C2A1 32 11 C0                             ld      (SBnKxhi),a             ; set into x and y high byte
 228+ C2A4 32 14 C0                             ld      (SBnKyhi),a             ; .
 229+ C2A7                                      ZeroA
 229+ C2A7 AF          >                        xor a
 230+ C2A8 32 10 C0                             ld      (SBnKxlo),a
 231+ C2AB 32 13 C0                             ld      (SBnKylo),a
 232+ C2AE C9                                   ret
 233+ C2AF
 234+ C2AF              CalculateSunLaunchedPosition:
 235+ C2AF              .CalcXPosition:         MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 235+ C2AF ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 236+ C2B3 DD 21 10 C0                          ld      ix,SBnKxlo              ; Sun BnKxlo += ParentPlanetX
 237+ C2B7 FD 21 74 80                          ld      iy,ParentPlanetX        ; .
 238+ C2BB CD 90 00                             call    AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed   ; .
 239+ C2BE DD 21 13 C0  .CalcYPosition:         ld      ix,SBnKylo              ; Sun BnKylo += ParentPlanetZ
 240+ C2C2 FD 21 77 80                          ld      iy,ParentPlanetY        ; .
 241+ C2C6 CD 90 00                             call    AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed   ; .
 242+ C2C9 DD 21 16 C0  .CalcZPosition:         ld      ix,SBnKzlo              ; Sun BnKzlo += ParentPlanetZ
 243+ C2CD FD 21 7A 80                          ld      iy,ParentPlanetZ        ; .
 244+ C2D1 CD 90 00                             call    AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed   ; .
 245+ C2D4 C9                                   ret
 246+ C2D5
 247+ C2D5              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 248+ C2D5              ; This sets current universe object to a star / sun, they use sign + 23 bit positions
 249+ C2D5 CD 93 C1     CreateSun:              call    ResetSBnKData
 250+ C2D8 3A 3F 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 251+ C2DB E6 07                                and     %00000111
 252+ C2DD F6 81                                or      %10000001
 253+ C2DF 32 18 C0                             ld      (SBnKzsgn),a
 254+ C2E2 3A 41 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 255+ C2E5 E6 03                                and     %00000011
 256+ C2E7 32 12 C0                             ld      (SBnKxsgn),a
 257+ C2EA 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a
 258+ C2ED 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000
 259+ C2F0 22 17 C0                             ld      (SBnKzhi),hl
 260+ C2F3 3E E3                                ld      a, $E3
 261+ C2F5 32 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),a
 262+ C2F8 C9                                   ret
 263+ C2F9              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 264+ C2F9              ; This creates a sun relative to space station on launch
 265+ C2F9 CD 93 C1     CreateSunLaunched:      call    ResetSBnKData
 266+ C2FC 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 267+ C2FF 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 268+ C301 22 10 C0                             ld      (SBnKxlo),hl
 269+ C304 22 13 C0                             ld      (SBnKylo),hl
 270+ C307 21 00 E0                             ld      hl,$E000
 271+ C30A 22 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),hl
 272+ C30D 32 12 C0                             ld      (SBnKxsgn),a
 273+ C310 32 18 C0                             ld      (SBnKzsgn),a
 274+ C313 3E 06                                ld      a,$06
 275+ C315 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a
 276+ C318 C9                                   ret
